atk-s0202a0:3_3: Tassa hi nagarassa ārāmapokkharaṇīādīsu tesu tesu ṭhānesu campakarukkhāva ussannā ahesuṃ,
atk-s0202a0:3_5: Gaggarāya pokkharaṇiyā tīreti tassa campānagarassa avidūre gaggarāya nāma rājamahesiyā khaṇitattā gaggarāti laddhavohārā pokkharaṇī atthi.
atk-s0202a0:3_6: Tassā tīre samantato nīlādipañcavaṇṇakusumapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ mahantaṃ campakavanaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:3_9: Mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhinti adassitaparicchedena mahantena bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ.
atk-s0202a0:3_12: Kandarako ca paribbājakoti kandarakoti evaṃnāmo channaparibbājako.
atk-s0202a0:3_13: Abhivādetvāti chabbaṇṇānaṃ ghanabuddharasmīnaṃ antaraṃ pavisitvā pasannalākhārase nimujjamāno viya,
atk-s0202a0:3_14: siṅgīsuvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ dussavaraṃ pasāretvā sasīsaṃ pārupamāno viya,
atk-s0202a0:3_16: sinerupādaṃ upagacchanto puṇṇacando viya bhagavato cakkalakkhaṇapaṭimaṇḍite alattakavaṇṇaphullapadumasassirike pāde vanditvāti attho.
atk-s0202a0:3_17: Ekamantaṃ nisīdīti chanisajjadosavirahite ekasmiṃ okāse nisīdi.
atk-s0202a0:4_0: Tuṇhībhū taṃ tuṇhībhūtanti yato yato anuviloketi,
atk-s0202a0:4_2: Tattha hi ekabhikkhussāpi hatthakukkuccaṃ vā pādakukkuccaṃ vā natthi,
atk-s0202a0:4_3: sabbe bhagavato ceva gāravena attano ca sikkhitasikkhatāya aññamaññaṃ vigatasallāpā antamaso ukkāsitasaddampi
atk-s0202a0:4_4: akarontā sunikhātaindakhīlā viya nivātaṭṭhāne sannisinnaṃ mahāsamuddaudakaṃ viya kāyenapi niccalā manasāpi
atk-s0202a0:4_5: avikkhittā rattavalāhakā viya sinerukūṭaṃ bhagavantaṃ parivāretvā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0202a0:4_6: Paribbājakassa evaṃ sannisinnaṃ parisaṃ disvā mahantaṃ pītisomanassaṃ uppajji.
atk-s0202a0:4_7: Uppannaṃ pana antohadayasmiṃyeva sannidahituṃ asakkonto piyasamudāhāraṃ samuṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0202a0:5_0: Tattha andhassa pabbatārohanaṃ viya niccaṃ na hotīti acchariyaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:5_10: yāva bāhāgahaṇāpi nāma so moghapuriso āgamessatīti,
atk-s0202a0:5_13: yatra hi nāma cittuppādampi parisodhessasīti idaṃ pasaṃsāacchariyaṃ nāma.
atk-s0202a0:5_14: Idhāpi idameva adhippetaṃ” ayañhi taṃ pasaṃsanto evamāha.
atk-s0202a0:6_5: atha kho acchariyamevetaṃ abbhutamevetanti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0202a0:6_6: Etaparamaṃyevāti evaṃ sammā paṭipādito eso bhikkhusaṅgho tassāpi bhikkhusaṅghassa paramoti etaparamo,
atk-s0202a0:6_12: Tattha paṭipāditoti ābhisamācārikavattaṃ ādiṃ katvā sammā apaccanīkapaṭipattiyaṃ yojito.
atk-s0202a0:6_13: Atha kasmā ayaṃ paribbājako atītānāgate buddhe dasseti,
atk-s0202a0:6_15: nayaggāhe pana ṭhatvā “yenākārena ayaṃ bhikkhusaṅgho sannisinno danto vinīto upasanto,
atk-s0202a0:6_18: natthi ito uttari paṭipādanā”ti maññamāno anubuddhiyā evamāha.
atk-s0202a0:7_2: Bhagavā kira taṃ sutvā “kandaraka tvaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ upasantoti vadasi,
atk-s0202a0:7_3: imassa pana bhikkhusaṅghassa upasantakāraṇaṃ tuyhaṃ apākaṭaṃ,
atk-s0202a0:7_4: na hi tvaṃ samatiṃsa pāramiyā pūretvā kusalamūlaṃ paripācetvā bodhipallaṅke sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ paṭivijjhi,
atk-s0202a0:7_5: mayā pana pāramiyo pūretvā ñātatthacariyaṃ lokatthacariyaṃ buddhatthacariyañca koṭiṃ pāpetvā bodhipallaṅke sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ paṭividdhaṃ,
atk-s0202a0:7_6: mayhaṃ etesaṃ upasantakāraṇaṃ pākaṭa”nti dassetuṃ imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0202a0:8_0: Santi hi kandarakāti ayampi pāṭiekko anusandhi.
atk-s0202a0:8_3: ayañca bhikkhusaṅgho kappetvā pakappetvā kuhakabhāvena iriyāpathaṃ saṇṭhapento cittena anupasanto na upasantākāraṃ dasseti.
atk-s0202a0:8_4: Ettha pana bhikkhusaṅghe paṭipadaṃ pūrayamānāpi paṭipadaṃ pūretvā matthakaṃ patvā ṭhitabhikkhūpi atthi,
atk-s0202a0:8_5: tattha paṭipadaṃ pūretvā matthakaṃ pattā attanā paṭividdhaguṇeheva upasantā,
atk-s0202a0:8_7: ito muttā pana avasesā catūhi satipaṭṭhānehi upasantā.
atk-s0202a0:8_8: Taṃ nesaṃ upasantakāraṇaṃ dassessāmī”ti “iminā ca iminā ca kāraṇena ayaṃ bhikkhusaṅgho upasanto”ti dassetuṃ “santi hi kandarakā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0202a0:10_3: Yathā ekacco sāsane pabbajitvāpi jīvitakāraṇā chasu agocaresu carati,
atk-s0202a0:10_6: Saṃsaṭṭho viharati rājūhi rājamahāmattehi titthiyehi titthiyasāvakehi ananulomikena gihisaṃsaggena,
atk-s0202a0:10_27: jaṅghapesaniyaṃ karotīti ekavīsatividhāya anesanāya jīvikaṃ kappento anipakavutti nāma hoti,
atk-s0202a0:10_29: tato kālakiriyaṃ katvā samaṇayakkho nāma hutvā “tassa saṅghāṭipi ādittā hoti sampajjalitā”ti vuttanayena mahādukkhaṃ anubhoti.
atk-s0202a0:10_30: Evaṃvidhā ahutvā jīvitahetupi sikkhāpadaṃ anatikkamanto catupārisuddhisīle patiṭṭhāya yathābalaṃ buddhavacanaṃ uggaṇhitvā rathavinītapaṭipadaṃ,
atk-s0202a0:10_37: candopamapaṭipadanti imāni ariyapaṭipadāni pūrento catupaccaya- santosa-
atk-s0202a0:10_39: ariyavaṃsapaṭipattiyaṃ kāyasakkhino hutvā anīkā nikkhantahatthī viya yūthā vissaṭṭhasīho viya nipacchābandhamahānāvā
atk-s0202a0:10_40: viya ca gamanādīsu ekavihārino vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā ajjaajjeva arahattanti pavattaussāhā viharantīti attho.
atk-s0202a0:12_3: bhanteti iminā esa attano kārakabhāvaṃ dasseti,
atk-s0202a0:12_8: bhikkhusaṅghassa pana ayameva kasi ca bījañca yuganaṅgalañca phālapācanañca,
atk-s0202a0:12_10: mayaṃ pana kālena kālaṃ okāsaṃ labhitvā etaṃ manasikāraṃ karoma,
atk-s0202a0:12_18: Sattānaṃ hitāhitaṃ jānātīti evaṃ gahanakasaṭakerāṭiyānaṃ manussānaṃ hitāhitapaṭipadaṃ yāva suṭṭhu bhagavā jānāti.
atk-s0202a0:12_19: Yadidaṃ pasavoti ettha sabbāpi catuppadajāti pasavoti adhippetā.
atk-s0202a0:12_22: Campaṃ gatāgataṃ karissatīti assamaṇḍalato yāva campānagaradvārā gamanañca āgamanañca karissati.
atk-s0202a0:12_28: Na hi sakkā tena tāni ettakena antarena dassetuṃ.
atk-s0202a0:13_0: Tattha yassa kismiñcideva ṭhāne ṭhātukāmassa sato yaṃ ṭhānaṃ manussānaṃ sappaṭibhayaṃ,
atk-s0202a0:13_1: purato gantvā vañcetvā ṭhassāmīti na hoti,
atk-s0202a0:13_2: tasmiṃ ṭhātukāmaṭṭhāneyeva nikhātatthambho viya cattāro pāde niccale katvā tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0202a0:13_4: Yassa pana kismiñcideva ṭhāne avacchinditvā khandhagataṃ pātetukāmassa sato yaṃ ṭhānaṃ manussānaṃ sappaṭibhayaṃ,
atk-s0202a0:13_5: purato gantvā vañcetvā pātessāmīti na hoti,
atk-s0202a0:13_8: Yassa kismiñcideva ṭhāne maggā ukkamma nivattitvā paṭimaggaṃ ārohitukāmassa sato yaṃ ṭhānaṃ manussānaṃ sappaṭibhayaṃ,
atk-s0202a0:13_9: purato gantvā vañcetvā evaṃ karissāmīti na hoti,
atk-s0202a0:13_10: tattheva maggā ukkamma nivattitvā paṭimaggaṃ ārohati,
atk-s0202a0:13_12: Yassa pana kālena vāmato kālena dakkhiṇato kālena ujumaggeneva gantukāmassa sato yaṃ ṭhānaṃ manussānaṃ sappaṭibhayaṃ,
atk-s0202a0:13_13: purato gantvā vañcetvā evaṃ karissāmīti na hoti,
atk-s0202a0:13_14: tattheva kālena vāmato kālena dakkhiṇato kālena ujumaggaṃ gacchati,
atk-s0202a0:13_15: tathā laṇḍaṃ vā passāvaṃ vā vissajjetukāmassa sato idaṃ ṭhānaṃ susammaṭṭhaṃ ākiṇṇamanussaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ,
atk-s0202a0:13_16: imasmiṃ ṭhāne evarūpaṃ kātuṃ na yuttaṃ,
atk-s0202a0:13_17: purato gantvā paṭicchannaṭhāne karissāmīti na hoti,
atk-s0202a0:13_20: Iti imaṃ catubbidhampi kiriyaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:13_21: Sabbāni tāni sāṭheyyāni kūṭeyyāni vaṅkeyyāni jimheyyāni pātukarissatīti evaṃ karontāpi te saṭhādayo tāni sāṭheyyādīni pātukaronti nāma.
atk-s0202a0:14_0: Evaṃ pasūnaṃ uttānabhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni manussānaṃ gahanabhāvaṃ dassento amhākaṃ pana,
atk-s0202a0:14_2: Tattha dāsāti antojātakā vā dhanakkītā vā karamarānītā vā sayaṃ vā dāsabyaṃ upagatā.
atk-s0202a0:14_7: aññena ca nesaṃ ākārena cittaṃ ṭhitaṃ hotīti dasseti.
atk-s0202a0:14_8: Tattha ye sammukhā sāmike disvā paccuggamanaṃ karonti,
atk-s0202a0:14_10: imaṃ vissajjetvā imaṃ gaṇhantā sesānipi āsana-
atk-s0202a0:14_14: parammukhakāle pana telampi uttarantaṃ na olokenti,
atk-s0202a0:14_15: satagghanakepi sahassagghanakepi kamme parihāyante nivattitvā oloketumpi na icchanti,
atk-s0202a0:14_17: Ye pana sammukhā “amhākaṃ sāmi amhākaṃ ayyo”tiādīni vatvā pasaṃsanti,
atk-s0202a0:15_3: bhagavā evaṃ manussagahaṇe evaṃ manussakasaṭe evaṃ manussasāṭheyye vattamāne sattānaṃ hitāhitaṃ jānātī”ti āha.
atk-s0202a0:15_4: Purime ca tayo puggalā ahitapaṭipadaṃ paṭipannā,
atk-s0202a0:15_6: evamahaṃ sattānaṃ hitāhitaṃ jānāmīti dassetuṃ imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0202a0:15_7: Heṭṭhā kandarakassa kathāya saddhiṃ yojetumpi vaṭṭati.
atk-s0202a0:15_8: Tena vuttaṃ “yāvañcidaṃ bhotā gotamena sammā bhikkhusaṅgho paṭipādito”ti.
atk-s0202a0:15_9: Athassa bhagavā “purime tayo puggale pahāya upari catutthapuggalassa hitapaṭipattiyaṃyeva paṭipādemī”ti dassentopi imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0202a0:15_11: “Santā honti samitā vūpasantā”ti ettha hi niruddhā santāti vuttā.
atk-s0202a0:15_12: “Santā ete vihārā ariyassa vinaye vuccantī”ti ettha nibbutā.
atk-s0202a0:16_8: Anto tāpanakilesānaṃ abhāvā sītalo jātoti sītibhūto.
atk-s0202a0:17_0: 5. Dukkhapaṭikkūlanti dukkhassa paṭikūlaṃ, paccanīkasaṇṭhitaṃ dukkhaṃ apatthayamānanti attho.
atk-s0202a0:18_1: Paṇḍitoti idha catūhi kāraṇehi paṇḍitoti na vattabbo,
atk-s0202a0:18_2: satipaṭṭhānesu pana kammaṃ karotīti paṇḍitoti vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0202a0:18_3: Mahāpaññoti idampi mahante atthe pariggaṇhātītiādinā mahāpaññalakkhaṇena na vattabbaṃ,
atk-s0202a0:18_4: satipaṭṭhānapariggāhikāya pana paññāya samannāgatattā mahāpaññoti vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0202a0:18_5: Mahatā atthena saṃyutto agamissāti mahatā atthena saṃyutto hutvā gato bhaveyya,
atk-s0202a0:18_7: Kiṃ pana yesaṃ maggaphalānaṃ upanissayo atthi,
atk-s0202a0:18_8: buddhānaṃ sammukhībhāve ṭhitepi tesaṃ antarāyo hotīti. Āma hoti,
atk-s0202a0:18_10: atha kho kiriyaparihāniyā vā pāpamittatāya vā hoti.
atk-s0202a0:18_12: sace hi dhammasenāpati dhanañjānissa brāhmaṇassa āsayaṃ ñatvā dhammaṃ adesayissā,
atk-s0202a0:18_16: sace hi ajātasattu devadattassa vacanaṃ gahetvā pitughātakammaṃ nākarissā,
atk-s0202a0:18_18: tassa vacanaṃ gahetvā pitughātakammassa katattā pana na hoti,
atk-s0202a0:18_23: ettāvatāpi pesso hatthārohaputto mahatā atthena saṃyuttoti katarena mahantena atthena?
atk-s0202a0:18_25: So kira upāsako saṅghe ca pasādaṃ paṭilabhi,
atk-s0202a0:20_6: Ṭhapetvā hi sappiṃ avaseso yo koci sneho telanti vuccati.
atk-s0202a0:20_7: Kaṇḍūvamānoti nakhānaṃ chinnattā kaṇḍūvitabbakāle tena kaṇḍūvamāno.
atk-s0202a0:20_12: Sace gāvī kabarā vā rattā vā,
atk-s0202a0:20_14: So evamāhāti so rājā evaṃ vadeti.
atk-s0202a0:20_17: Barihisatthāyāti parikkhepakaraṇatthāya ceva yaññabhūmiyaṃ attharaṇatthāya ca.
atk-s0202a0:20_18: Sesaṃ heṭṭhā tattha tattha vitthāritattā uttānamevāti.
atk-s0202a0:24_2: Tattha beluvagāmaketi vesāliyā dakkhiṇapasse avidūre beluvagāmako nāma atthi,
atk-s0202a0:24_4: Dasamoti so hi jātigottavasena ceva sārappattakulagaṇanāya ca dasame ṭhāne gaṇīyati,
atk-s0202a0:25_3: yo so bhagavā samatiṃsa pāramiyo pūretvā sabbakilese bhañjitvā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho,
atk-s0202a0:25_6: hatthatale ṭhapitaāmalakaṃ viya sabbaṃ ñeyyadhammaṃ passatā.
atk-s0202a0:25_9: tīhi vijjāhi chahi vā pana abhiññāhi jānatā,
atk-s0202a0:25_12: sabbasattānaṃ cakkhuvisayātītāni tirokuṭṭādigatānipi rūpāni ativisuddhena maṃsacakkhunā passatā,
atk-s0202a0:25_20: sāmaṃ sabbadhammānaṃ buddhattā sammāsambuddhenāti evaṃ catuvesārajjavasena catūhi kāraṇehi thomitena.
atk-s0202a0:25_21: Atthi nu kho eko dhammo akkhātoti.
atk-s0202a0:26_3: So tattha ṭhitoti so tasmiṃ samathavipassanādhamme ṭhito.
atk-s0202a0:26_4: Dhammarāgena dhammanandiyāti padadvayehi samathavipassanāsu chandarāgo vutto.
atk-s0202a0:26_5: Samathavipassanāsu hi sabbena sabbaṃ chandarāgaṃ pariyādiyituṃ sakkonto arahā hoti,
atk-s0202a0:26_7: So samathavipassanāsu chandarāgassa appahīnattā catutthajjhānacetanāya suddhāvāse nibbattati,
atk-s0202a0:27_0: Vitaṇḍavādī panāha “teneva dhammarāgenāti vacanato akusalena suddhāvāse nibbattatī”ti so “suttaṃ āharā”ti vattabbo,
atk-s0202a0:27_2: tato vattabbo “kiṃ panidaṃ suttaṃ neyyatthaṃ nītattha”nti,
atk-s0202a0:27_5: evaṃ sante anāgāmiphalatthikena samathavipassanāsu chandarāgo kattabbo bhavissati,
atk-s0202a0:27_6: chandarāge uppādite anāgāmiphalaṃ paṭividdhaṃ bhavissati “mā suttaṃ me laddha”nti yaṃ vā taṃ vā dīpehi.
atk-s0202a0:27_7: Pañhaṃ kathentena hi ācariyassa santike uggahetvā attharasaṃ paṭivijjhitvā kathetuṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-s0202a0:27_9: kusalena vā apāye paṭisandhi nāma natthi.
atk-s0202a0:28_2: lobhajena kammena dosajena kammena mohajena kammena devā paññāyanti,
atk-s0202a0:28_4: yā vā panaññāpi kāci sugatiyo, atha kho,
atk-s0202a0:28_6: lobhajena kammena dosajena kammena mohajena kammena nirayo paññāyati,
atk-s0202a0:29_3: “gaccha pātova vihāraṃ pavisitvā yāguṃ pivāhī”ti uyyojetabbo.
atk-s0202a0:30_1: evaṃ mahāmālukyovādepi mahāsatipaṭṭhānepi kāyagatāsatisuttepi samathavipassanā kathitā.
atk-s0202a0:30_2: Tattha imasmiṃ sutte samathavasena gacchatopi vipassanāvasena gacchatopi samathadhurameva dhuraṃ,
atk-s0202a0:31_1: ekadhammo akkhātoti ekadhammaṃ pucchitena ayampi ekadhammoti evaṃ pucchāvasena kathitattā ekādasapi dhammā ekadhammo nāma jāto.
atk-s0202a0:31_2: Mahāsakuludāyisuttasmiñhi ekūnavīsati pabbāni paṭipadāvasena ekadhammo nāma jātāni,
atk-s0202a0:31_4: Amatuppattiyatthena vā sabbānipi ekadhammoti vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0202a0:32_3: Kathaṃ pana ekapayogeneva ekādasannaṃ nidhīnaṃ adhigamo hotīti.
atk-s0202a0:32_5: tamenaṃ aññataro atthacarako disvā “kiṃ bho carasī”ti pucchati.
atk-s0202a0:32_9: So taṃ pavattetvā uparūpari ṭhapitā vā kucchiyā kucchiṃ āhacca ṭhitā vā ekādasa kumbhiyo passeyya,
atk-s0202a0:32_10: evaṃ ekapayogena ekādasannaṃ nidhīnaṃ adhigamo hoti.
atk-s0202a0:33_0: Ācariyadhanaṃ pariyesissantīti aññatitthiyā hi yassa santike sippaṃ uggaṇhanti,
atk-s0202a0:33_1: tassa sippuggahaṇato pure vā pacchā vā antarantare vā gehato nīharitvā dhanaṃ denti.
atk-s0202a0:34_0: Kimaṅgaṃ panāhanti bāhirakā tāva aniyyānikepi sāsane sippamattadāyakassa dhanaṃ pariyesanti;
atk-s0202a0:34_1: ahaṃ pana evaṃvidhe niyyānikasāsane ekādasavidhaṃ amatuppattipaṭipadaṃ desentassa ācariyassa pūjaṃ kiṃ na karissāmi,
atk-s0202a0:34_3: Paccekadussayugena acchādesīti ekamekassa bhikkhuno ekekaṃ dussayugamadāsīti attho.
atk-s0202a0:38_2: Tattha navaṃ santhāgāranti adhunā kāritaṃ santhāgāraṃ,
atk-s0202a0:38_4: Uyyogakālādīsu hi rājāno tattha ṭhatvā “ettakā purato gacchantu,
atk-s0202a0:38_9: ettakā rathesu tiṭṭhantū”ti evaṃ santhaṃ karonti,
atk-s0202a0:38_12: Uyyogaṭṭhānato ca āgantvā yāva gehesu allagomayaparibhaṇḍādīni karonti,
atk-s0202a0:38_13: tāva dve tīṇi divasāni te rājāno tattha santhambhantītipi santhāgāraṃ.
atk-s0202a0:38_14: Tesaṃ rājūnaṃ saha atthānusāsanaṃ agārantipi santhāgāraṃ gaṇarājāno hi te,
atk-s0202a0:38_15: tasmā uppannakiccaṃ ekassa vasena na chijjati,
atk-s0202a0:38_19: Yasmā panete tattha sannipatitvā “imasmiṃ kāle kasituṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-s0202a0:38_20: imasmiṃ kāle vapitu”nti evamādinā nayena gharāvāsakiccāni sammantayanti,
atk-s0202a0:38_21: tasmā chiddāvachiddaṃ gharāvāsaṃ tattha santharantītipi santhāgāraṃ.
atk-s0202a0:38_24: cittakammādivasena susajjitaṃ devavimānaṃ viya adhunā niṭṭhāpitaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:38_25: Samaṇena vāti ettha yasmā gharavatthupariggahakāleyeva devatā attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gaṇhanti,
atk-s0202a0:38_26: tasmā “devena vā”ti avatvā “samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā kenaci vā manussabhūtenā”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:39_0: Yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsūti santhāgāraṃ niṭṭhitanti sutvā “gacchāma,
atk-s0202a0:39_1: naṃ passissāmā”ti gantvā dvārakoṭṭhakato paṭṭhāya sabbaṃ oloketvā “idaṃ santhāgāraṃ devavimānasadisaṃ
atk-s0202a0:39_2: ativiya manoramaṃ sassirikaṃ kena paṭhamaṃ paribhuttaṃ amhākaṃ dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya assā”ti cintetvā
atk-s0202a0:39_7: bhikkhusaṅghe āgate tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ āgatameva bhavissati,
atk-s0202a0:39_9: iti tīhi ratanehi paribhuttaṃ mayaṃ pacchā paribhuñjissāma,
atk-s0202a0:39_10: evaṃ no dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissatī”ti sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā upasaṅkamiṃsu.
atk-s0202a0:40_0: Yena santhāgāraṃ tenupasaṅkamiṃsūti taṃ divasaṃ kira santhāgāraṃ kiñcāpi rājakulānaṃ dassanatthāya devavimānaṃ viya susajjitaṃ hoti supaṭijaggitaṃ,
atk-s0202a0:40_2: Buddhā hi nāma araññajjhāsayā araññārāmā antogāme vaseyyuṃ vā no vā,
atk-s0202a0:40_3: tasmā bhagavato manaṃ jānitvāva paññāpessāmāti cintetvā te bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamiṃsu.
atk-s0202a0:40_4: Idāni pana manaṃ labhitvā paññāpetukāmā yena santhāgāraṃ tenupasaṅkamiṃsu.
atk-s0202a0:41_0: Sabbasanthariṃ santhāgāraṃ santharitvāti yathā sabbameva santhataṃ hoti,
atk-s0202a0:41_2: Sabbapaṭhamaṃ tāva “gomayaṃ nāma sabbamaṅgalesu vaṭṭatī”ti sudhāparikammakatampi bhūmiṃ allagomayena
atk-s0202a0:41_3: opuñchāpetvā parisukkhabhāvaṃ ñatvā yathā akkantaṭṭhāne padaṃ na paññāyati,
atk-s0202a0:41_4: evaṃ catujjātiyagandhehi limpāpetvā upari nānāvaṇṇe kaṭasārake santharitvā tesaṃ upari mahāpiṭṭhikakojavake ādiṃ katvā hatthattharaka-
atk-s0202a0:41_10: cittattharakādīhi nānāvaṇṇehi attharaṇehi santharitabbakayuttaṃ sabbokāsaṃ santharāpesuṃ.
atk-s0202a0:42_0: Āsanāni paññāpetvāti majjhaṭṭhāne tāva maṅgalatthambhaṃ nissāya mahārahaṃ buddhāsanaṃ paññāpetvā tattha yaṃ yaṃ mudukañca manoramañca paccattharaṇaṃ,
atk-s0202a0:42_1: taṃ taṃ paccattharitvā bhagavato lohitakaṃ manuññadassanaṃ upadhānaṃ upadahitvā upari suvaṇṇarajatatārakavicittaṃ
atk-s0202a0:42_2: vitānaṃ bandhitvā gandhadāmapupphadāmapattadāmādīhi paccattharaṇehi alaṅkaritvā samantā dvādasahatthaṭṭhāne
atk-s0202a0:42_3: pupphajālaṃ karitvā tiṃsahatthamattaṃ ṭhānaṃ paṭasāṇiyā parikkhipāpetvā pacchimabhittiṃ nissāya bhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-s0202a0:42_6: muṇḍapīṭhāni paññāpetvā upari setapaccattharaṇehi paccattharāpetvā pācīnabhittiṃ nissāya attano attano
atk-s0202a0:42_7: mahāpiṭṭhikakojavake paññāpetvā haṃsalomādipūritāni upadhānāni ṭhapāpesuṃ “evaṃ akilamamānā sabbarattiṃ
atk-s0202a0:43_1: Upaṭṭhapetvāti evaṃ bhagavā ca bhikkhusaṅgho ca yathāruciyā hatthe vā dhovissanti pāde vā,
atk-s0202a0:43_2: mukhaṃ vā vikkhālessantīti tesu tesu ṭhānesu maṇivaṇṇassa udakassa pūrāpetvā vāsatthāya nānāpupphāni
atk-s0202a0:43_3: ceva udakavāsacuṇṇāni ca pakkhipitvā kadalipaṇṇehi pidahitvā patiṭṭhāpesuṃ.
atk-s0202a0:44_0: Telappadīpaṃ āropetvāti rajatasuvaṇṇādimayadaṇḍāsu dīpikāsu yonakarūpakirātarūpakādīnaṃ hatthe ṭhapitasuvaṇṇarajatādimayakapallakādīsu
atk-s0202a0:44_2: Yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsūti ettha pana te sakyarājāno na kevalaṃ santhāgārameva,
atk-s0202a0:44_3: atha kho yojanāvaṭṭe kapilavatthusmiṃ nagaravīthiyopi sammajjāpetvā dhaje ussāpetvā gehadvāresu puṇṇaghaṭe
atk-s0202a0:44_4: ca kadaliyo ca ṭhapāpetvā sakalanagaraṃ dīpamālādīhi vippakiṇṇatārakaṃ viya katvā “khīrapāyake dārake
atk-s0202a0:44_6: dahare kumāre lahuṃ lahuṃ bhojetvā sayāpetha,
atk-s0202a0:44_9: buddhā nāma appasaddakāmā hontī”ti bheriṃ carāpetvā sayaṃ daṇḍadīpikā ādāya yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu.
atk-s0202a0:45_0: Atha kho bhagavā nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghena yena navaṃ santhāgāraṃ tenupasaṅkamīti.
atk-s0202a0:45_2: bhagavā kālaṃ maññatī”ti evaṃ kira kāle ārocite bhagavā lākhārasena tintarattakoviḷārapupphavaṇṇaṃ rattadupaṭṭaṃ
atk-s0202a0:45_3: kattariyā padumaṃ kantanto viya saṃvidhāya timaṇḍalaṃ paṭicchādento nivāsetvā suvaṇṇapāmaṅgena padumakalāpaṃ
atk-s0202a0:45_4: parikkhipanto viya vijjullatāsassirikaṃ kāyabandhanaṃ bandhitvā rattakambalena gajakumbhaṃ pariyonaddhanto
atk-s0202a0:45_5: viya ratanasatubbedhe suvaṇṇagghike pavāḷajālaṃ khipamāno viya suvaṇṇacetiye rattakambalakañcukaṃ paṭimuñcanto
atk-s0202a0:45_6: viya gacchantaṃ puṇṇacandaṃ rattavaṇṇavalāhakena paṭicchādayamāno viya kañcanapabbatamatthake supakkalākhārasaṃ
atk-s0202a0:45_7: parisiñcanto viya cittakūṭapabbatamatthakaṃ vijjullatāya parikkhipanto viya ca sacakkavāḷasineruyugandharaṃ
atk-s0202a0:45_8: mahāpathaviṃ cāletvā gahitaṃ nigrodhapallavasamānavaṇṇaṃ rattavarapaṃsukūlaṃ pārupitvā gandhakuṭidvārato
atk-s0202a0:45_9: nikkhami kañcanaguhato sīho viya udayapabbatakūṭato puṇṇacando viya ca.
atk-s0202a0:46_0: Athassa kāyato meghamukhehi vijjukalāpā viya rasmiyo nikkhamitvā suvaṇṇarasadhārāparisekamañjaripattapupphaphalaviṭape viya ārāmarukkhe kariṃsu.
atk-s0202a0:46_1: Tāvadeva ca attano attano pattacīvaramādāya mahābhikkhusaṅgho bhagavantaṃ parivāresi.
atk-s0202a0:46_2: Te pana parivāretvā ṭhitā bhikkhū evarūpā ahesuṃ appicchā santuṭṭhā pavivittā asaṃsaṭṭhā āraddhavīriyā
atk-s0202a0:46_3: vattāro vacanakkhamā codakā pāpagarahī sīlasampannā samādhisampannā paññāvimuttivimuttiñāṇadassanasampannāti.
atk-s0202a0:46_4: Tehi parivārito bhagavā rattakambalaparikkhitto viya suvaṇṇakkhandho rattapadumasaṇḍamajjhagatā viya
atk-s0202a0:46_6: Sāriputtamoggallānādayo mahātherāpi naṃ meghavaṇṇaṃ paṃsukūlaṃ pārupitvā maṇivammavammikā viya mahānāgā
atk-s0202a0:46_7: parivārayiṃsu vantarāgā bhinnakilesā vijaṭitajaṭā chinnabandhanā kule vā gaṇe vā alaggā.
atk-s0202a0:47_14: asamena buddhavesena aparimāṇena buddhavilāsena kapilavatthugamanamaggaṃ paṭipajji.
atk-s0202a0:48_0: Athassa puratthimakāyato suvaṇṇavaṇṇā rasmī uṭṭhahitvā asītihatthaṭṭhānaṃ aggahesi.
atk-s0202a0:48_2: vāmahatthato suvaṇṇavaṇṇā rasmī uṭṭhahitvā asītihatthaṭṭhānaṃ aggahesi.
atk-s0202a0:48_3: Upari kesantato paṭṭhāya sabbakesāvattehi moragīvavaṇṇā rasmī uṭṭhahitvā gaganatale asītihatthaṭṭhānaṃ aggahesi.
atk-s0202a0:48_4: Heṭṭhā pādatalehi pavāḷavaṇṇā rasmī uṭṭhahitvā ghanapathaviyaṃ asītihatthaṭṭhānaṃ aggahesi.
atk-s0202a0:48_5: Evaṃ samantā asītihatthamattaṃ ṭhānaṃ chabbaṇṇā buddharasmiyo vijjotamānā vipphandamānā kañcanadaṇḍadīpikāhi
atk-s0202a0:48_6: niccharitvā ākāsaṃ pakkhandajālā viya cātuddīpikamahāmeghato nikkhantavijjullatā viya vidhāviṃsu.
atk-s0202a0:49_3: paṭipāṭiyā ṭhapitānaṃ dvattiṃsūcandānaṃ dvattiṃsasūriyānaṃ dvattiṃsacakkavattīnaṃ dvattiṃsadevarājānaṃ
atk-s0202a0:49_4: dvattiṃsamahābrahmānaṃ siriyā siriṃ abhibhavamānaṃ viya virocittha,
atk-s0202a0:49_5: yathā taṃ dasahi pāramīhi dasahi upapāramīhi dasahi paramatthapāramīhi supūritāhi samatiṃsapāramitāhi alaṅkataṃ.
atk-s0202a0:49_6: Kappasatasahasādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni dinnadānaṃ rakkhitasīlaṃ katakalyāṇakammaṃ ekasmiṃ attabhāve
atk-s0202a0:49_7: osaritvā vipākaṃ dātuṃ ṭhānaṃ alabhamānaṃ sambādhapattaṃ viya ahosi.
atk-s0202a0:49_10: pañcavīsatiyā nadīnaṃ oghassa sambhijja mukhadvāre ekato rāsībhūtakālo viya ca ahosi.
atk-s0202a0:50_0: Imāya buddhasiriyā obhāsamānassāpi ca bhagavato purato anekāni daṇḍadīpikasahassāni ukkhipiṃsu.
atk-s0202a0:50_5: Pañcaṅgikatūriyanigghosā ceva buddhadhammasaṅghaguṇappaṭisaṃyuttā thutighosā ca sabbadisā pūrayiṃsu.
atk-s0202a0:50_7: Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne ṭhatvā padasahassena gamanavaṇṇaṃ vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0202a0:58_0: Unnatañca samaṃ hoti, pathavī ca acetanā.
atk-s0202a0:62_0: Aghaṭṭayanto niyyāti, ubho jāṇū ca gopphake.
atk-s0202a0:65_0: Uddhaṃ adho ca tiriyaṃ, disañca vidisaṃ tathā;
atk-s0202a0:66_0: Na pekkhamāno so yāti, yugamattamhi pekkhati.
atk-s0202a0:70_0: Tosayanto bahū satte, puraṃ seṭṭhaṃ upāgamī”ti.
atk-s0202a0:71_1: evaṃvidhesu kālesu buddhassa sarīravaṇṇe vā guṇavaṇṇe vā dhammakathikassa thāmoyeva pamāṇaṃ cuṇṇiyapadehi vā gāthābandhena vā yattakaṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0202a0:71_5: tesaṃ buddhāpi anavasesato vaṇṇaṃ vattuṃ asamatthā,
atk-s0202a0:71_7: Iminā sirivilāsena alaṅkatappaṭiyattaṃ sakyarājapuraṃ pavisitvā bhagavā pasannacittena janena gandhadhūmavāsacuṇṇādīhi pūjayamāno santhāgāraṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0202a0:71_9: “atha kho bhagavā nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghena yena evaṃ santhāgāraṃ tenupasaṅkamī”ti.
atk-s0202a0:72_1: Tattha bhagavā bhikkhūnañceva upāsakānañca majjhe nisinno gandhodakena nhāpetvā dukūlacumbaṭakena vodakaṃ
atk-s0202a0:72_2: katvā jātihiṅgulakena majjitvā rattakambalapaliveṭhite pīṭhe ṭhapitarattasuvaṇṇaghanapaṭimā viya ativirocittha.
atk-s0202a0:85_0: Kāpilavatthave sakye bahudeva rattiṃ dhammiyā kathāyāti ettha dhammī kathā nāma santhāgāraanumodanappaṭisaṃyuttā pakiṇṇakakathā veditabbā.
atk-s0202a0:85_1: Tadā hi bhagavā ākāsagaṅgaṃ otārento viya pathavojaṃ ākaḍḍhanto viya mahājambuṃ khandhe gahetvā cālento
atk-s0202a0:85_2: viya yojanikaṃ madhubhaṇḍaṃ cakkayantena pīḷetvā madhupānaṃ pāyamāno viya kāpilavatthavānaṃ sakyānaṃ
atk-s0202a0:85_5: tumhākaṃ āvāso mayā paribhutto bhikkhusaṅghena paribhutto mayā ca bhikkhusaṅghena ca paribhutto pana
atk-s0202a0:85_6: dhammaratanena paribhutto yevāti tīhi ratanehi paribhutto nāma hoti.
atk-s0202a0:85_8: Bhūmaṭṭhakapaṇṇasālāya vā sākhāmaṇḍapassa vāpi ānisaṃso nāma paricchindituṃ na sakkā”ti nānānayavicittaṃ bahuṃ dhammakathaṃ kathetvā –
atk-s0202a0:87_0: Sarīsape ca makase, sisire cāpi vuṭṭhiyo.
atk-s0202a0:91_0: Tasmā hi paṇḍito poso, sampassaṃ atthamattano.
atk-s0202a0:96_0: Yaṃ so dhammaṃ idhaññāya, parinibbāti anāsavo”ti. –
atk-s0202a0:97_1: ayampi ānisaṃsoti bahudevarattiṃ atirekataraṃ diyaḍḍhayāmaṃ āvāsānisaṃsakathaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0202a0:98_0: Āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ āmantesīti dhammakathaṃ kathāpetukāmo jānāpesi.
atk-s0202a0:98_1: Atha kasmā sāriputtamahāmoggallānamahākassapādīsu asītimahātheresu vijjamānesu bhagavā ānandattherassa bhāramakāsīti.
atk-s0202a0:98_4: pahosi parimaṇḍalehi padabyañjanehi madhuradhammakathaṃ kathetunti sākiyamaṇḍale pākaṭo paññāto.
atk-s0202a0:98_5: Tassa sakyarājūhi vihāraṃ gantvāpi dhammakathā sutapubbā,
atk-s0202a0:98_6: orodhā pana nesaṃ na yathāruciyā vihāraṃ gantuṃ labhanti,
atk-s0202a0:98_8: “aho vata bhagavā appaṃyeva dhammakathaṃ kathetvā amhākaṃ ñātiseṭṭhassa ānandassa bhāraṃ kareyyā”ti.
atk-s0202a0:99_2: tassa paṭipadaṃ desehīti paṭipadāya puggalaṃ niyametvā dasseti.
atk-s0202a0:99_3: Kasmā pana bhagavā imaṃ paṭipadaṃ niyamesi?
atk-s0202a0:99_5: Ime tāva sakyā maṅgalasālāya maṅgalaṃ paccāsīsanti vaḍḍhiṃ icchanti,
atk-s0202a0:99_6: ayañca sekhapaṭipadā mayhaṃ sāsane maṅgalapaṭipadā vaḍḍhamānakapaṭipadātipi imaṃ paṭipadaṃ niyamesi.
atk-s0202a0:99_8: te attanā paṭividdhaṭṭhāne kathīyamāne akilamantāva sallakkhessantītipi imaṃ paṭipadaṃ niyamesi.
atk-s0202a0:99_10: so attanā paṭividdhe paccakkhaṭṭhāne kathento akilamanto viññāpetuṃ sakkhissatītipi imaṃ paṭipadaṃ niyamesi.
atk-s0202a0:99_12: tattha adhisīlasikkhāya kathitāya sakalaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ kathitameva hoti,
atk-s0202a0:99_13: adhicittasikkhāya kathitāya sakalaṃ suttantapiṭakaṃ kathitaṃ hoti,
atk-s0202a0:99_14: adhipaññāsikkhāya kathitāya sakalaṃ abhidhammapiṭakaṃ kathitaṃ hoti,
atk-s0202a0:99_16: so pahoti tīhi piṭakehi tisso sikkhā kathetuṃ,
atk-s0202a0:99_17: evaṃ kathite sakyānaṃ maṅgalameva vaḍḍhiyeva bhavissatītipi imaṃ paṭipadaṃ niyamesi.
atk-s0202a0:100_1: Bhagavato hi chabbassāni padhānaṃ padahantassa mahantaṃ kāyadukkhaṃ ahosi,
atk-s0202a0:100_4: Pahoti hi bhagavā uppannaṃ vedanaṃ vikkhambhetvā ekampi dvepi sattāhe ekapallaṅkena nisīdituṃ.
atk-s0202a0:100_5: Santhāgārasālaṃ pana catūhi iriyāpathehi paribhuñjitukāmo ahosi,
atk-s0202a0:100_12: Idāni dakkhiṇena passena thokaṃ nipanne sayanaṃ nipphajjissatīti evaṃ catūhi iriyāpathehi paribhuñjitukāmo ahosi.
atk-s0202a0:100_14: tasmā ciraṃ nisajjāya sañjātaṃ appakampi āgilāyanaṃ gahetvā evamāha.
atk-s0202a0:101_0: Saṅghāṭiṃ paññāpetvāti santhāgārassa kira ekapasse te rājāno paṭṭasāṇiṃ parikkhipāpetvā kappiyamañcakaṃ
atk-s0202a0:101_1: paññapetvā kappiyapaccattharaṇena attharitvā upari suvaṇṇa- tāraka-
atk-s0202a0:101_3: dāmapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ vitānaṃ bandhitvā gandhatelappadīpaṃ āropayiṃsu “appeva nāma satthā dhammāsanato vuṭṭhāya thokaṃ vissamanto idha nipajjeyya,
atk-s0202a0:101_4: evaṃ no imaṃ santhāgāraṃ bhagavatā catūhi iriyāpathehi paribhuttaṃ dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0202a0:101_5: Satthāpi tadeva sandhāya tattha saṅghāṭiṃ paññapetvā nipajji.
atk-s0202a0:101_6: Uṭṭhānasaññaṃ manasi karitvāti ettakaṃ kālaṃ atikkamitvā vuṭṭhahissāmīti vuṭṭhānasaññaṃ citte ṭhapetvā.
atk-s0202a0:102_1: Mahānāmaṃ sakkaṃ āmantesīti so kira tasmiṃ kāle tassaṃ parisati jeṭṭhako pāmokkho,
atk-s0202a0:102_2: tasmiṃ saṅgahite sesaparisā saṅgahitāva hotīti thero tameva āmantesi.
atk-s0202a0:103_1: Kathañca mahānāmāti iminā ettakena ṭhānena sekhapaṭipadāya mātikaṃ ṭhapetvā paṭipāṭiyā vitthāretukāmo evamāha.
atk-s0202a0:104_4: kāyaduccaritādīhi ottappassa hetubhūtehi ottappati bhāyatīti attho.
atk-s0202a0:104_10: Anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesūti kusalesu dhammesu anoropitadhuro anosakkitavīriyo.
atk-s0202a0:105_0: Cirakatampīti attanā vā parena vā kāyena cirakataṃ cetiyaṅgaṇavattādi asīti mahāvattapaṭipattipūraṇaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:105_1: Cirabhāsitampīti attanā vā parena vā vācāya cirabhāsitaṃ sakkaccaṃ uddisana-
atk-s0202a0:105_7: Saritā anussaritāti tasmiṃ kāyena cirakate “kāyo nāma kāyaviññatti,
atk-s0202a0:105_11: Iti ime rūpārūpadhammā evaṃ uppajjitvā evaṃ niruddhā”ti sarati ceva anussarati ca,
atk-s0202a0:105_14: Tāya satiyā esa sakimpi saraṇena saritā,
atk-s0202a0:106_0: Udayatthagāminiyāti pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ udayavayagāminiyā udayañca vayañca paṭivijjhituṃ samatthāya.
atk-s0202a0:106_1: Ariyāyāti vikkhambhanavasena ca samucchedavasena ca kilesehi ārakā ṭhitāya parisuddhāya.
atk-s0202a0:106_2: Paññāya samannāgatoti vipassanāpaññāya ceva maggapaññāya ca samaṅgībhūto.
atk-s0202a0:106_5: Tattha maggapaññāya samucchedavasena anibbiddhapubbaṃ apadālitapubbaṃ lobhakkhandhaṃ dosakkhandhaṃ mohakkhandhaṃ nibbijjhati padāletīti nibbedhikā.
atk-s0202a0:106_6: Vipassanāpaññāya tadaṅgavasena nibbedhikāya maggapaññāya paṭilābhasaṃvattanato cāti vipassanā “nibbedhikā”ti vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0202a0:106_7: Sammā dukkhakkhayagāminiyāti idhāpi maggapaññā “sammā hetunā nayena vaṭṭadukkhaṃ khepayamānā gacchatīti sammā dukkhakkhayagāminī nāma.
atk-s0202a0:106_8: Vipassanā tadaṅgavasena vaṭṭadukkhañca kilesadukkhañca khepayamānā gacchatīti dukkhakkhayagāminī.
atk-s0202a0:106_9: Dukkhakkhayagāminiyā vā maggapaññāya paṭilābhasaṃvattanato esā dukkhakkhayagāminī”ti veditabbā.
atk-s0202a0:107_7: samādhipāripanthikadhamme pana akilamanto vikkhambhetuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0202a0:107_9: yathāparicchedavasena samāpattiṃ ṭhapetuṃ na sakkoti ayaṃ kicchalābhī kasiralābhī nāma.
atk-s0202a0:108_1: Ayaṃ vuccati mahānāma ariyasāvako sekho pāṭipadoti mahānāma ariyasāvako sekho pāṭipado vipassanāgabbhāya
atk-s0202a0:108_6: Anuttarassa yogakkhemassāti arahattaṃ anuttaro yogakkhemo nāma,
atk-s0202a0:108_10: Kevalañhi tattha “tassā kukkuṭiyā aṇḍesu tividhakiriyakaraṇaṃ viya hi imassa bhikkhuno ussoḷhipannarasehi
atk-s0202a0:108_11: aṅgehi samannāgatabhāvo”ti yaṃ evaṃ opammasaṃsandanaṃ āgataṃ,
atk-s0202a0:108_12: taṃ idha evaṃ sīlasampanno hotītiādivacanato “tassā kukkuṭiyā aṇḍesu tividhakiriyakaraṇaṃ viya imassa
atk-s0202a0:109_1: Imaṃyeva anuttaraṃ upekkhāsatipārisuddhinti imaṃ paṭhamādijjhānehi asadisaṃ uttamaṃ catutthajjhānikaṃ upekkhāsatipārisuddhiṃ.
atk-s0202a0:109_4: Kukkuṭacchāpako pana ekavāraṃ mātukucchito ekavāraṃ aṇḍakosatoti dve vāre jāyati.
atk-s0202a0:109_5: Ariyasāvako tīhi vijjāhi tāyo vāre jāyati.
atk-s0202a0:109_6: Pubbenivāsacchādakaṃ tamaṃ vinodetvā pubbenivāsañāṇena paṭhamaṃ jāyati,
atk-s0202a0:109_7: sattānaṃ cutipaṭisandhicchādakaṃ tamaṃ vinodetvā dibbacakkhuñāṇena dutiyaṃ jāyati,
atk-s0202a0:109_8: catusaccapaṭicchādakaṃ tamaṃ vinodetvā āsavakkhayañāṇena tatiyaṃ jāyati.
atk-s0202a0:110_1: Idampissa hoti caraṇasminti idampi sīlaṃ assa bhikkhuno caraṇaṃ nāma hotīti attho.
atk-s0202a0:110_5: Padattho pana carati tena agatapubbaṃ disaṃ gacchatīti caraṇaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:111_0: Idampissa hoti vijjāyāti idaṃ pubbenivāsañāṇaṃ tassa vijjā nāma hotīti attho.
atk-s0202a0:111_3: tattha idampi ñāṇaṃ ekā vijjātipi attho.
atk-s0202a0:111_4: Padattho pana vinivijjhitvā etāya jānātīti vijjā.
atk-s0202a0:111_6: Vijjāsampanno itipīti tīhi vijjāhi vijjāsampanno itipi.
atk-s0202a0:111_7: Caraṇasampanno itipīti pañcadasahi dhammehi caraṇasampanno itipi.
atk-s0202a0:112_3: So kira manussapathe pañcacūḷakakumārakakāle jhānaṃ nibbattetvā aparihīnajjhāno brahmaloke nibbatti,
atk-s0202a0:112_4: tassa so attabhāvo piyo ahosi manāpo,
atk-s0202a0:112_9: Ye gottapaṭisārinoti ye janetasmiṃ gottaṃ paṭisaranti “ahaṃ gotamo,
atk-s0202a0:112_12: Anumatā bhagavatāti mama pañhabyākaraṇena saddhiṃ saṃsanditvā desitāti ambaṭṭhasutte buddhena bhagavatā “ahampi, ambaṭṭha,
atk-s0202a0:115_2: bhagavā kira ādito paṭṭhāya niddaṃ anokkamantova imaṃ suttaṃ sutvā ānandena sekhapaṭipadāya kūṭaṃ gahitanti
atk-s0202a0:115_3: ñatvā uṭṭhāya pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā nisinno sādhukāraṃ adāsi.
atk-s0202a0:115_4: Ettāvatā ca pana idaṃ suttaṃ jinabhāsitaṃ nāma jātaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:119_9: Tattha ca catusahassayojanappamāṇo padeso udakena ajjhotthaṭo samuddoti saṅkhaṃ gato.
atk-s0202a0:119_11: Tisahassayojanappamāṇe himavā patiṭṭhito ubbedhena pañcayojanasatiko caturāsītikūṭasahassapaṭimaṇḍito samantato sandamānapañcasatanadīvicitto,
atk-s0202a0:119_12: yattha āyāmavitthārena ceva gambhīratāya ca paṇṇāsapaṇṇāsayojanā diyaḍḍhayojanasataparimaṇḍalā anotattadaho
atk-s0202a0:119_13: kaṇṇamuṇḍadaho rathakāradaho chaddantadaho kuṇāladaho mandākinīdaho sīhapapātadahoti satta mahāsarā patiṭṭhitā.
atk-s0202a0:119_14: Tesu anotattadaho sudassanakūṭaṃ citrakūṭaṃ kāḷakūṭaṃ gandhamādanakūṭaṃ kelāsakūṭanti imehi pañcahi pabbatehi parikkhitto.
atk-s0202a0:120_0: Tattha sudassanakūṭaṃ sovaṇṇamayaṃ dviyojanasatubbedhaṃ antovaṅkaṃ kākamukhasaṇṭhānaṃ tameva saraṃ paṭicchādetvā ṭhitaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:120_4: mūlagandho sāragandho pheggugandho tacagandho papaṭikagandho rasagandho pattagandho pupphagandho phalagandho
atk-s0202a0:120_5: gandhagandhoti imehi dasahi gandhehi ussannaṃ nānappakāraosadhasañchannaṃ,
atk-s0202a0:120_10: Tāni sabbāni devānubhāvena nāgānubhāvena ca vassanti,
atk-s0202a0:120_13: Candimasūriyā dakkhiṇena vā uttarena vā gacchantā pabbatantarena tattha obhāsaṃ karonti,
atk-s0202a0:121_0: Tattha manoharasilātalāni nimmacchakacchapāni phalikasadisanimmaludakāni nhānatitthāni supaṭiyattāni honti,
atk-s0202a0:121_1: yesu buddhapaccekabuddhakhīṇāsavā ca iddhimanto ca isayo nhāyanti,
atk-s0202a0:122_0: Tassa catūsu passesu sīhamukhaṃ hatthimukhaṃ assamukhaṃ usabhamukhanti cattāri mukhāni honti,
atk-s0202a0:122_4: Puratthimadisato nikkhantanadī anotattaṃ tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā itarā tisso nadiyo anupagamma pācīnahimavanteneva
atk-s0202a0:122_6: Pacchimadisato ca uttaradisato ca nikkhantanadiyopi tatheva padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pacchimahimavanteneva uttarahimavanteneva
atk-s0202a0:122_8: Dakkhiṇadisato nikkhantanadī pana taṃ tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā dakkhiṇena ujukaṃ pāsāṇapiṭṭheneva
atk-s0202a0:122_9: saṭṭhiyojanāni gantvā pabbataṃ paharitvā vuṭṭhāya parikkhepena tigāvutappamāṇā udakadhārā ca hutvā ākāsena
atk-s0202a0:122_10: saṭṭhiyojanāni gantvā tiyaggaḷe nāma pāsāṇe patitā,
atk-s0202a0:122_12: Tattha paññāsayojanappamāṇā tiyaggaḷā nāma pokkharaṇī jātā,
atk-s0202a0:122_13: pokkharaṇiyā kūlaṃ bhinditvā pāsāṇaṃ pavisitvā saṭṭhiyojanāni gatā.
atk-s0202a0:122_14: Tato ghanapathaviṃ bhinditvā umaṅgena saṭṭhiyojanāni gantvā viñjhuṃ nāma tiracchānapabbataṃ paharitvā
atk-s0202a0:122_16: Sā tikkhattuṃ anotattaṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā gataṭṭhāne āvaṭṭagaṅgāti vuccati.
atk-s0202a0:122_20: kūlaṃ bhinditvā pāsāṇaṃ pavisitvā saṭṭhiyojanāni gataṭṭhāne bahalagaṅgāti,
atk-s0202a0:122_22: Viñjhuṃ nāma tiracchānapabbataṃ paharitvā pañcadhārā hutvā pavattaṭṭhāne pana gaṅgā yamunā aciravatī sarabhū mahīti pañcadhā saṅkhaṃ gatā.
atk-s0202a0:122_24: Tāsu yā ayaṃ pañcamī mahī nāma,
atk-s0202a0:122_27: tāsaṃ avidūrattā so janapado aṅguttarāpoti veditabbo.
atk-s0202a0:123_0: Āpaṇaṃ nāmāti tasmiṃ kira nigame vīsati āpaṇamukhasahassāni vibhattāni ahesuṃ.
atk-s0202a0:123_1: Iti so āpaṇānaṃ ussannattā āpaṇantveva saṅkhaṃ gato.
atk-s0202a0:123_2: Tassa ca nigamassa avidūre nadītīre ghanacchāyo ramaṇīyo bhūmibhāgo mahāvanasaṇḍo,
atk-s0202a0:123_5: Yenaññataro vanasaṇḍo tenupasaṅkamīti bhikkhusaṅghaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pesetvā ekakova upasaṅkami potaliyaṃ gahapatiṃ sandhāya.
atk-s0202a0:123_6: Potaliyopi kho gahapatīti potaliyoti evaṃnāmako gahapati.
atk-s0202a0:123_8: ekaṃ dīghadasaṃ sāṭakaṃ nivattho ekaṃ pārutoti attho.
atk-s0202a0:123_9: Chattupāhanāhīti chattaṃ gahetvā upāhanā āruyhāti attho.
atk-s0202a0:124_0: Bhagavantaṃ etadavocāti tatiyaṃ gahapatīti vacanaṃ adhivāsetuṃ asakkonto bhagavantametaṃ “tayidaṃ, bho,
atk-s0202a0:124_6: kesamassunakhaṭhapanādīni hi sabbāneva gihibyañjanāni tassa gihibhāvaṃ pākaṭaṃ karontīti ākārā,
atk-s0202a0:124_9: Yathā taṃ gahapatissāti yathā gahapatissa ākāraliṅganimittā bhaveyyuṃ,
atk-s0202a0:124_12: Atha so yena kāraṇena gahapativādaṃ nādhivāseti,
atk-s0202a0:125_2: vaṇippathaṃ payojethā”tiādinā hi nayena ovadanto ovādī nāma hoti.
atk-s0202a0:125_7: puttadāraṃ vā bharissathā”tiādinā nayena pana upavadanto upavādī nāma hoti.
atk-s0202a0:125_8: Ahaṃ pana ubhayampi taṃ na karomi.
atk-s0202a0:125_10: Ghāsacchādanaparamo viharāmīti ghāsamattañceva acchādanamattañca paramaṃ katvā viharāmi,
atk-s0202a0:126_4: Vohārasamucchedāyāti ettha vohāroti byavahāravohāropi paṇṇattipi vacanampi cetanāpi. Tattha –
atk-s0202a0:128_0: Evaṃ vāseṭṭha jānāhi, vāṇijo so na brāhmaṇo”ti. –
atk-s0202a0:129_1: “Saṅkhā samaññā paññatti vohāro”ti ayaṃ paṇṇattivohāro nāma.
atk-s0202a0:129_2: “Tathā tathā voharati aparāmasa”nti ayaṃ vacanavohāro nāma.
atk-s0202a0:129_3: “Aṭṭha ariyavohārā aṭṭha anariyavoharā”ti ayaṃ cetanāvohāro nāma,
atk-s0202a0:129_5: Yasmā vā pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya gihīti cetanā natthi,
atk-s0202a0:129_12: samaṇoti vā pabbajitoti vā byavahāro hoti.
atk-s0202a0:130_1: Yesaṃ kho ahaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ hetu pāṇātipātīti ettha pāṇātipātova saṃyojanaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:130_2: Pāṇātipātasseva hi hetu pāṇātipātapaccayā pāṇātipātī nāma hoti.
atk-s0202a0:130_3: Pāṇātipātānaṃ pana bahutāya “yesaṃ kho aha”nti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:130_5: Pahānāya samucchedāya paṭipannoti iminā apāṇātipātasaṅkhātena kāyikasīlasaṃvarena pahānatthāya samucchedanatthāya paṭipanno.
atk-s0202a0:130_6: Attāpi maṃ upavadeyyāti kunthakipillikampi nāma jīvitā avoropanakasāsane pabbajitvā pāṇātipātamattatopi oramituṃ na sakkomi,
atk-s0202a0:130_7: kiṃ mayhaṃ pabbajjāyāti evaṃ attāpi maṃ upavadeyya.
atk-s0202a0:130_8: Anuviccāpi maṃ viññū garaheyyunti evarūpe nāma sāsane pabbajitvā pāṇātipātamattatopi oramituṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0202a0:130_9: kiṃ etassa pabbajjāyāti evaṃ anuvicca tulayitvā pariyogāhetvā aññepi viññū paṇḍitā garaheyyuṃ.
atk-s0202a0:130_10: Etadeva kho pana saṃyojanametaṃ nīvaraṇanti dasasu saṃyojanesu pañcasu ca nīvaraṇesu apariyāpannampi “aṭṭha nīvaraṇā”ti desanāvasenetaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:130_11: Vaṭṭabandhanaṭṭhena hi hitapaṭicchādanaṭṭhena ca saṃyojanantipi nīvaraṇantipi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:130_15: pariḷāhaggahaṇenapi kilesapariḷāho ca vipākapariḷāho ca gahito.
atk-s0202a0:131_2: tesāhaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ pahānāyāti imasmiṃ pade iminā dinnādānasaṅkhātena kāyikasīlasaṃvarena,
atk-s0202a0:131_8: anatimānasaṅkhātena mānasikasīlasaṃvarena pahānatthāya samucchedanatthāya paṭipannoti evaṃ sabbavāresu yojanā kātabbā.
atk-s0202a0:132_0: Attāpi maṃ upavadeyya anuviccāpi maṃ viññū garaheyyunti imesu pana padesu tiṇasalākampi nāma upādāya
atk-s0202a0:132_1: adinnaṃ aggahaṇasāsane pabbajitvā adinnādānamattatopi viramituṃ na sakkomi,
atk-s0202a0:132_2: kiṃ mayhaṃ pabbajjāyāti evaṃ attāpi maṃ upavadeyya.
atk-s0202a0:132_3: Evarūpe nāma sāsane pabbajitvā adinnādānamattatopi oramituṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0202a0:132_4: kiṃ imassa pabbajjāyāti evaṃ anuviccāpi maṃ viññū garaheyyuṃ?
atk-s0202a0:132_5: Hasāpekkhatāyapi nāma davakamyatāya vā musāvādaṃ akaraṇasāsane pabbajitvā.
atk-s0202a0:132_8: Kakacena aṅgesu okkantiyamānesupi nāma paresaṃ nindārosaṃ akaraṇasāsane pabbajitvā.
atk-s0202a0:132_10: Adhimānamattampi nāma mānaṃ akaraṇasāsane pabbajitvā atimānamattampi pajahituṃ na sakkomi,
atk-s0202a0:132_11: kiṃ mayhaṃ pabbajjāyāti evaṃ attāpi maṃ upavadeyya.
atk-s0202a0:132_12: Evarūpe nāma sāsane pabbajitvā atimānamattampi pajahituṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0202a0:132_13: kiṃ imassa pabbajjāyāti evaṃ anuviccāpi maṃ viññū garaheyyunti evaṃ sabbavāresu yojanā kātabbā.
atk-s0202a0:133_0: Āsavāti imasmiṃ pana pade adinnādānakāraṇā kāmāsavo diṭṭhāsavo avijjāsavoti tayo āsavā uppajjanti,
atk-s0202a0:133_5: atimānakāraṇā bhavāsavo avijjāsavo cāti dveva āsavā uppajjantīti evaṃ āsavuppatti veditabbā.
atk-s0202a0:134_0: Imesu pana aṭṭhasupi vāresu asammohatthaṃ puna ayaṃ saṅkhepavinicchayo –
atk-s0202a0:134_1: purimesu tāva catūsu viramituṃ na sakkomīti vattabbaṃ,
atk-s0202a0:134_10: Yasmā pana kāyenapi ghaṭṭeti roseti vācāyapi,
atk-s0202a0:134_15: Pātimokkhasaṃvarasīle ṭhitassa ca bhikkhuno paṭisaṅkhāpahānavasena gihivohārasamucchedo kathitoti veditabbo.
atk-s0202a0:136_1: Vitthāradesanāyaṃ tamenaṃ dakkhoti padassa upasumbheyyāti iminā saddhiṃ sambandho veditabbo.
atk-s0202a0:136_5: Aṭṭhikaṅkalanti uraṭṭhiṃ vā piṭṭhikaṇṭakaṃ vā sīsaṭṭhiṃ vā.
atk-s0202a0:136_10: taṃ sabbaṃ nillikhitvā aṭṭhimattameva katanti attho.
atk-s0202a0:137_2: Yāyaṃ upekkhā nānattā nānattasitāti yā ayaṃ pañcakāmaguṇārammaṇavasena nānāsabhāvā,
atk-s0202a0:137_3: tāneva ca ārammaṇāni nissitattā “nānattasitā”ti vuccati pañcakāmaguṇūpekkhā,
atk-s0202a0:137_6: sā hi divasampi ekasmiṃ ārammaṇe uppajjanato ekasabhāvā,
atk-s0202a0:137_7: tadeva ekaṃ ārammaṇaṃ nissitattā ekattasitā nāma.
atk-s0202a0:137_8: Yattha sabbaso lokāmisūpādānā aparisesā nirujjhantīti yattha catutthajjhānupekkhāyaṃ yaṃ upekkhaṃ āgamma
atk-s0202a0:137_9: yaṃ paṭicca sabbena sabbaṃ aparisesā lokāmisasaṅkhātā pañcakāmaguṇāmisā nirujjhanti.
atk-s0202a0:137_12: Tamevūpekkhaṃ bhāvetīti taṃ lokāmisūpādānānaṃ paṭipakkhabhūtaṃ catutthajjhānupekkhameva vaḍḍheti.
atk-s0202a0:142_2: bhanteti pathavito nabhaṃ viya samuddassa orimatīrato paratīraṃ viya ca suvidūravidūre ahaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:146_2: Tattha jīvakassa komārabhaccassa ambavaneti ettha jīvatīti jīvako.
atk-s0202a0:146_8: Tena hi bhaṇe taṃ dārakaṃ amhākaṃ antepuraṃ netvā dhātīnaṃ detha posetunti.
atk-s0202a0:147_0: Ayaṃ pana jīvako ekasmiṃ samaye bhagavato dosābhisannaṃ kāyaṃ virecetvā sīveyyakaṃ dussayugaṃ datvā vatthānumodanapariyosāne
atk-s0202a0:147_6: So tasmiṃ ambavane rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānaleṇakuṭimaṇḍapādīni sampādetvā bhagavato anucchavikaṃ gandhakuṭiṃ
atk-s0202a0:147_7: kāretvā ambavanaṃ aṭṭhārasahatthubbedhena tambapaṭṭavaṇṇena pākārena parikkhipāpetvā buddhappamukhaṃ
atk-s0202a0:147_8: bhikkhusaṅghaṃ cīvarabhattena santappetvā dakkhiṇodakaṃ pātetvā vihāraṃ niyyātesi.
atk-s0202a0:148_4: taṃ paṭicca kammamettha atthīti maṃsaṃ “paṭiccakamma”nti vuttaṃ hoti yo evarūpaṃ maṃsaṃ paribhuñjati,
atk-s0202a0:148_6: vadhakassa viya tassāpi pāṇaghātakammaṃ hotīti tesaṃ laddhi.
atk-s0202a0:148_7: Dhammassa cānudhammaṃ byākarontīti bhagavatā vuttakāraṇassa anukāraṇaṃ kathenti.
atk-s0202a0:148_10: Yasmā pana bhagavā uddissakataṃ na paribhuñjati,
atk-s0202a0:148_13: Sahadhammiko vādānuvādoti parehi vuttakāraṇena sakāraṇo hutvā tumhākaṃ vādo vā anuvādo vā viññūhi garahitabbakāraṇaṃ
atk-s0202a0:148_16: “kiṃ sabbākārenapi tumhākaṃ vāde gārayhaṃ kāraṇaṃ natthī”ti.
atk-s0202a0:149_2: Diṭṭhādīsu diṭṭhaṃ nāma bhikkhūnaṃ atthāya migamacche vadhitvā gayhamānaṃ diṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:149_3: Sutaṃ nāma bhikkhūnaṃ atthāya migamacche vadhitvā gahitanti sutaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:149_4: Parisaṅkitaṃ nāma diṭṭhaparisaṅkitaṃ sutaparisaṅkitaṃ tadubhayavimuttaparisaṅkitanti tividhaṃ hoti.
atk-s0202a0:150_1: idha bhikkhū passanti manusse jālavāgurādihatthe gāmato vā nikkhamante araññe vā vicarante.
atk-s0202a0:150_2: Dutiyadivase ca nesaṃ taṃ gāmaṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭhānaṃ samacchamaṃsaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ abhiharanti.
atk-s0202a0:150_3: Te tena diṭṭhena parisaṅkanti “bhikkhūnaṃ nu kho atthāya kata”nti,
atk-s0202a0:150_9: na gaṇhathā”ti pucchitvā tamatthaṃ sutvā “nayidaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0202a0:150_11: amhehi attano atthāya vā rājayuttādīnaṃ atthāya vā kata”nti vadanti, kappati.
atk-s0202a0:151_1: apica suṇanti “manussā kira jālavāgurādihatthā gāmato vā nikkhamanti araññe vā vicarantī”ti.
atk-s0202a0:151_2: Dutiyadivase ca nesaṃ taṃ gāmaṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭhānaṃ samacchamaṃsaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ abhiharanti.
atk-s0202a0:151_3: Te tena sutena parisaṅkanti “bhikkhūnaṃ nu kho atthāya kata”nti,
atk-s0202a0:151_9: na gaṇhathā”ti pucchitvā tamatthaṃ sutvā “nayidaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0202a0:151_11: amhehi attano atthāya vā rājayuttādīnaṃ atthāya vā kata”nti vadanti, kappati.
atk-s0202a0:152_0: Na heva kho pana passanti na suṇanti,
atk-s0202a0:152_1: apica tesaṃ gāmaṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭhānaṃ pattaṃ gahetvā samacchamaṃsaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ abhisaṅkharitvā abhiharanti.
atk-s0202a0:152_2: Te parisaṅkanti “bhikkhūnaṃ nu kho atthāya kata”nti,
atk-s0202a0:152_8: na gaṇhathā”ti pucchitvā tamatthaṃ sutvā “nayidaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0202a0:152_10: amhehi attano atthāya vā rājayuttādīnaṃ atthāya vā kataṃ,
atk-s0202a0:152_12: kappiyameva labhitvā bhikkhūnaṃ atthāya sampādita”nti vadanti, kappati.
atk-s0202a0:153_0: Matānaṃ petakiccatthāya maṅgalādīnaṃ vā atthāya katepi eseva nayo.
atk-s0202a0:153_4: Sace pana ekasmiṃ vihāre bhikkhū uddissa kataṃ hoti,
atk-s0202a0:153_5: te ca attano atthāya katabhāvaṃ na jānanti,
atk-s0202a0:153_14: Tepi “amhākaṃ atthāya kataṃ”ti jānanti aññepi “etesaṃ atthāya kata”nti jānanti,
atk-s0202a0:153_18: Pañcasu hi sahadhammikesu yassa kassaci vā atthāya uddissa kataṃ sabbesaṃ na kappati.
atk-s0202a0:154_0: Sace pana koci ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ uddissa pāṇaṃ vadhitvā tassa pattaṃ pūretvā deti,
atk-s0202a0:154_1: so ce attano atthāya katabhāvaṃ jānaṃyeva gahetvā aññassa bhikkhuno deti,
atk-s0202a0:154_9: Uddissakatañca ajānitvā bhuttassa pacchā ñatvā āpattidesanākiccaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-s0202a0:154_10: Akappiyamaṃsaṃ pana ajānitvā bhuttena pacchā ñatvāpi āpatti desetabbā.
atk-s0202a0:154_13: Tasmā āpattibhīrukena rūpaṃ sallakkhentenāpi pucchitvāva maṃsaṃ paṭiggahetabbaṃ,
atk-s0202a0:154_14: paribhogakāle pucchitvā paribhuñjissāmīti vā gahetvā pucchitvāva paribhuñjitabbaṃ. Kasmā?
atk-s0202a0:155_0: Adiṭṭhanti bhikkhūnaṃ atthāya vadhitvā gayhamānaṃ adiṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:155_1: Asutanti bhikkhūnaṃ atthāya vadhitvā gahitanti asutaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:155_3: Paribhoganti vadāmīti imehi tīhi kāraṇehi parisuddhaṃ tikoṭiparisuddhaṃ nāma hoti,
atk-s0202a0:155_5: tathārūpaṃ paribhuñjantassa mettāvihārissa bhikkhuno doso vā vajjaṃ vā natthi,
atk-s0202a0:156_1: Idāni tādisassa paribhoge mettāvihārinopi anavajjataṃ dassetuṃ idha, jīvaka,
atk-s0202a0:156_4: atha kho attānameva sandhāya etaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:156_7: imasmiṃ sutteti tīsu ṭhānesu attānaṃyeva sandhāya desanā katā.
atk-s0202a0:156_8: Paṇītena piṇḍapātenāti heṭṭhā anaṅgaṇasutte yo koci mahaggho piṇḍapāto paṇītapiṇḍapātoti adhippeto,
atk-s0202a0:156_13: sabbaṃ ālumpitvā ekappahāreneva gilitukāmo kāko viya na hotīti attho.
atk-s0202a0:156_14: Ādīnavadassāvīti ekarattivāsena udarapaṭalaṃ pavisitvā navahi vaṇamukhehi nikkhamissatītiādinā nayena ādīnavaṃ passanto.
atk-s0202a0:156_15: Nissaraṇapañño paribhuñjatīti idamatthamāhāraparibhogoti paññāya paricchinditvā paribhuñjati.
atk-s0202a0:156_16: Attabyābādhāya vā cetetīti attadukkhāya vā citeti.
atk-s0202a0:156_24: evaṃ sante tava idaṃ vacanaṃ anujānāmīti attho.
atk-s0202a0:157_1: Athassa bhagavā sesabrahmavihāravasenāpi uttari desanaṃ vaḍḍhento “idha, jīvaka,
atk-s0202a0:158_1: Yo kho jīvakāti ayaṃ pāṭiekko anusandhi.
atk-s0202a0:158_4: Sace hi kassaci evamassa “ekaṃ rasapiṇḍapātaṃ datvā kappasatasahassaṃ saggasampattiṃ paṭilabhanti,
atk-s0202a0:158_5: yaṃkiñci katvā paraṃ māretvāpi rasapiṇḍapātova dātabbo”ti,
atk-s0202a0:159_0: Tattha iminā paṭhamena ṭhānenāti iminā āṇattimatteneva tāva paṭhamena kāraṇena.
atk-s0202a0:159_1: Galappavedhakenāti yottena gale bandhitvā kaḍḍhito galena pavedhentena.
atk-s0202a0:159_7: Ye pana dubbhikkhādīsu vā byādhiniggahaṇatthaṃ vā “acchamaṃsaṃ nāma sūkaramaṃsasadisaṃ,
atk-s0202a0:159_12: bhagavantaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmi dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañcāti ayaṃ āgataphalo viññātasāsano diṭṭhasacco ariyasāvako.
atk-s0202a0:159_13: Imaṃ pana dhammadesanaṃ ogāhanto pasādaṃ uppādetvā dhammakathāya thutiṃ karonto evamāha.
atk-s0202a0:163_2: Tattha nāḷandāyanti nālandāti evaṃnāmake nagare taṃ nagaraṃ gocaragāmaṃ katvā.
atk-s0202a0:163_5: so bhagavato dhammadesanaṃ sutvā bhagavati pasanno tasmiṃ uyyāne kuṭileṇamaṇḍapādipaṭimaṇḍitaṃ bhagavato vihāraṃ katvā niyyādesi,
atk-s0202a0:163_6: so vihāro jīvakambavanaṃ viya pāvārikambavananteva saṅkhaṃ gato.
atk-s0202a0:163_10: Sāsane viya kiṃ pana bāhirāyatane piṇḍapātoti vohāro atthīti, natthi.
atk-s0202a0:164_1: Daṇḍāni paññapetīti idaṃ nigaṇṭhasamayena pucchanto āha.
atk-s0202a0:164_2: Kāyadaṇḍaṃ vacīdaṇḍaṃ manodaṇḍanti ettha purimadaṇḍadvayaṃ te acittakaṃ payyapenti.
atk-s0202a0:164_3: Yathā kira vāte vāyante sākhā calati,
atk-s0202a0:164_7: Yathā ca vāte vāyante tālapaṇṇādīni saddaṃ karonti,
atk-s0202a0:164_10: evaṃ vacīdaṇḍopi acittakova hotīti imaṃ daṇḍadvayaṃ acittakaṃ paññapenti.
atk-s0202a0:164_12: Athassa bhagavā vacanaṃ patiṭṭhapetukāmo “kiṃ pana tapassī”tiādimāha.
atk-s0202a0:165_3: Passati hi bhagavā “ayaṃ imaṃ kathaṃ ādāya gantvā attano satthu mahānigaṇṭhassa ārocessati,
atk-s0202a0:165_6: so imaṃ kathaṃ sutvā mama vādaṃ āropetuṃ āgamissati,
atk-s0202a0:165_11: paresaṃ saṅgahatthameva hi mayā pāramiyo pūritā”ti.
atk-s0202a0:166_1: Kammāni paññapesīti idaṃ nigaṇṭho buddhasamayena pucchanto āha.
atk-s0202a0:166_2: Kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ manokammanti ettha kāyadvāre ādānagahaṇamuñcanacopanapattā aṭṭhakāmāvacarakusalacetanā
atk-s0202a0:166_4: Kāyadvāre ādānādīni apatvā vacīdvāre vacanabhedaṃ pāpayamānā uppannā tāyeva vīsaticetanā vacīkammaṃ nāma.
atk-s0202a0:166_5: Ubhayadvāre copanaṃ appatvā manodvāre uppannā ekūnatiṃsakusalākusalacetanā manokammaṃ nāma.
atk-s0202a0:166_6: Apica saṅkhepato tividhaṃ kāyaduccaritaṃ kāyakammaṃ nāma,
atk-s0202a0:166_10: anantarasutte “cattārimāni puṇṇa kammāni mayā sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā paveditānī”ti evamāgatepi cetanā dhuraṃ.
atk-s0202a0:166_11: Yattha katthaci pavattā cetanā “kaṇhaṃ kaṇhavipāka”ntiādibhedaṃ labhati.
atk-s0202a0:166_12: Niddesavāre cassa “sabyābajjhaṃ kāyasaṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkharotī”tiādinā nayena sā vuttāva.
atk-s0202a0:166_13: Kāyadvāre pavattā pana idha kāyakammanti adhippetaṃ,
atk-s0202a0:166_19: Kammampi hi bhagavā kammanti paññapeti yathā imasmiṃyeva sutte.
atk-s0202a0:167_0: Ettha ca akusalaṃ patvā kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ mahantanti vadanto na kilamati,
atk-s0202a0:167_2: Tathā hi mātughātādīni cattāri kammāni kāyeneva upakkamitvā kāyeneva karoti,
atk-s0202a0:167_4: Evaṃ akusalaṃ patvā kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ mahantanti vadanto na kilamati nāma.
atk-s0202a0:167_5: Ekā pana jhānacetanā caturāsītikappasahassāni saggasampattiṃ āvahati,
atk-s0202a0:167_6: ekā maggacetanā sabbākusalaṃ samugghātetvā arahattaṃ gaṇhāpeti.
atk-s0202a0:167_7: Evaṃ kusalaṃ patvā manokammaṃ mahantanti vadanto na kilamati nāma.
atk-s0202a0:167_8: Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne bhagavā akusalaṃ patvā manokammaṃ mahāsāvajjaṃ vadamāno niyatamicchādiṭṭhiṃ sandhāya vadati.
atk-s0202a0:168_0: Idāni nigaṇṭhopi tathāgatena gatamaggaṃ paṭipajjanto kiñci atthanipphattiṃ apassantopi “kiṃ panāvuso,
atk-s0202a0:169_1: Bālakiniyāti upālissa kira bālakaloṇakāragāmo nāma atthi,
atk-s0202a0:169_4: amhākaṃ satthāraṃ mahānigaṇṭhaṃ passissāmā”ti tāya parisāya parivuto tattha agamāsi.
atk-s0202a0:169_17: kāyadaṇḍassa santike nikkhipitvā “ayaṃ nu kho mahanto,
atk-s0202a0:169_18: ayaṃ mahanto”ti evaṃ olokiyamāno chavo manodaṇḍo kiṃ sobhati,
atk-s0202a0:170_7: Gaccha tvaṃ gahapatīti kasmā mahānigaṇṭho gahapatiṃ yāvatatiyaṃ pahiṇatiyeva?
atk-s0202a0:170_9: Mahānigaṇṭhena hi bhagavatā saddhiṃ ekaṃ nagaraṃ upanissāya viharantenapi na bhagavā diṭṭhapubbo.
atk-s0202a0:170_11: so taṃ paṭiññaṃ appahāya buddhadassane abhabbo.
atk-s0202a0:170_12: Tasmā esa buddhadassanassa aladdhapubbattā dasabalassa dassanasampattiñca niyyānikakathābhāvañca ajānanto yāvatatiyaṃ pahiṇateva.
atk-s0202a0:170_13: Dīghatapassī pana kālena kālaṃ bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā tiṭṭhatipi nisīdatipi pañhampi pucchati,
atk-s0202a0:170_17: samaṇassa gotamassa santike gantvā dassanepi pasīdeyya,
atk-s0202a0:170_19: Tato na puna amhākaṃ santikaṃ āgaccheyyā”ti.
atk-s0202a0:171_1: Tathāgatañhi disvā pasannāpi appasannāpi yebhuyyena vandantiyeva,
atk-s0202a0:171_3: Atiucce hi kule jāto agāraṃ ajjhāvasantopi vanditabboyevāti.
atk-s0202a0:171_6: Āgamā nu khvidhāti āgamā nu kho idha.
atk-s0202a0:172_4: Sacce patiṭṭhāyāti thusarāsimhi ākoṭitakhāṇuko viya acalanto vacīsacce patiṭṭhahitvā.
atk-s0202a0:173_5: Manosattā nāma devāti manamhi sattā laggā lagitā.
atk-s0202a0:173_6: Manopaṭibaddhoti yasmā manamhi paṭibaddho hutvā kālaṅkaroti,
atk-s0202a0:173_9: Tenassa uṇhodakaṃ pivituṃ vā hatthapādādidhovanatthāya vā gattaparisiñcanatthāya vā upanetuṃ na vaṭṭati,
atk-s0202a0:173_15: Cittena pana sītodakaṃ pātukāmo ca paribhuñjitukāmo ca hoti.
atk-s0202a0:173_17: So kāyadaṇḍaṃ vacīdaṇḍaṃ rakkhāmīti sītodakaṃ pātukāmo vā paribhuñjitukāmo vā sītodakameva dethāti vattuṃ na visahati.
atk-s0202a0:173_18: Tassa evaṃ rakkhitāpi kāyadaṇḍavacīdaṇḍā cutiṃ vā paṭisandhiṃ vā ākaḍḍhituṃ na sakkonti.
atk-s0202a0:173_19: Manodaṇḍo pana bhinnopi cutimpi paṭisandhimpi ākaḍḍhatiyeva.
atk-s0202a0:173_20: Iti naṃ bhagavā dubbalakāyadaṇḍavacīdaṇḍā chavā lāmakā,
atk-s0202a0:174_2: cittasantatipavattimatteneva pana te matāti na vuccanti.
atk-s0202a0:174_4: tadā ‘matā ete nīharitvā te jhāpethā’ti vattabbataṃ āpajjanti.
atk-s0202a0:174_7: Citteneva pana tesaṃ cutipi paṭisandhipi hoti.
atk-s0202a0:174_10: Amhākaṃ pana mahānigaṇṭhassa kathā aniyyānikā”ti sallakkhesi.
atk-s0202a0:174_11: Bhagavato pana vicittāni pañhapaṭibhānāni sotukāmo na tāva anujānāti.
atk-s0202a0:175_0: Na kho te sandhiyatīti na kho te ghaṭiyati.
atk-s0202a0:175_1: Purimena vā pacchimanti “kāyadaṇḍo mahanto”ti iminā purimena vacanena idāni “manodaṇḍo mahanto”ti idaṃ vacanaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:175_2: Pacchimena vā purimanti tena vā pacchimena aduṃ purimavacanaṃ na ghaṭiyati.
atk-s0202a0:176_1: Idānissa bhagavā aññānipi kāraṇāni āharanto “taṃ kiṃ maññasī”tiādimāha.
atk-s0202a0:176_13: na bhāvitamāsīsato samanuñño hotīti iminā catukoṭṭhāsena saṃvarena saṃvuto.
atk-s0202a0:177_4: Atha vā sabbavārivāritoti sabbena pāpavāraṇena vāritapāpo.
atk-s0202a0:177_8: Khuddake pāṇe saṅghātaṃ āpādetīti khuddake pāṇe vadhaṃ āpādeti.
atk-s0202a0:177_9: So kira ekindriyaṃ pāṇaṃ duvindriyaṃ pāṇanti paññapeti.
atk-s0202a0:177_16: Kismiṃ paññapetīti kattha katarasmiṃ koṭṭhāse paññapeti.
atk-s0202a0:177_18: Ayaṃ pana upāsako bhaṇantova sayampi sallakkhesi –
atk-s0202a0:177_20: sañcetanikaṃ mahāsāvajja’nti paññapetvā cetanaṃ manodaṇḍoti paññapeti,
atk-s0202a0:178_4: Pāṇāti hatthiassādayo tiracchānagatā ceva itthipurisadārakādayo manussajātikā ca.
atk-s0202a0:178_10: Kiñhi sobhati ekā chavā nāḷandāti idampi bhaṇanto so gahapati –
atk-s0202a0:178_11: “kāyapayogena paññāsampi manussā ekaṃ nāḷandaṃ ekaṃ maṃsakhalaṃ kātuṃ na sakkonti,
atk-s0202a0:178_12: iddhimā pana eko ekeneva manopadosena bhasmaṃ kātuṃ samattho.
atk-s0202a0:179_1: Araññaṃ araññabhūtanti agāmakaṃ araññameva hutvā araññaṃ jātaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:179_2: Isīnaṃ manopadosenāti isīnaṃ atthāya katena manopadosena taṃ manopadosaṃ asahamānāhi devatāhi tāni raṭṭhāni vināsitāni.
atk-s0202a0:179_3: Lokikā pana isayo manaṃ padosetvā vināsayiṃsūti maññanti.
atk-s0202a0:179_4: Tasmā imasmiṃ lokavāde ṭhatvāva idaṃ vādāropanaṃ katanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:180_1: sarabhaṅgabodhisattassa tāva parisāya ativepullataṃ gatāya kisavaccho nāma tāpaso mahāsattassa antevāsī
atk-s0202a0:180_2: vivekavāsaṃ patthayamāno gaṇaṃ pahāya godhāvarītīrato kaliṅgaraṭṭhe daṇḍakīrañño kumbhapuraṃ nāma nagaraṃ
atk-s0202a0:181_0: Tadā ca ekā gaṇikā rathaṃ abhiruhitvā pañcamātugāmasataparivārā nagaraṃ upasobhayamānā vicarati.
atk-s0202a0:181_3: Rājā vātapānaṃ vivaritvā ṭhito taṃ disvā kā esāti pucchi.
atk-s0202a0:181_6: nagaraṃ sayaṃ sobhissatī”ti taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ acchindāpesi.
atk-s0202a0:182_0: Sā tato paṭṭhāya kenaci saddhiṃ santhavaṃ katvā ṭhānantaraṃ pariyesamānā ekadivasaṃ rājuyyānaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0202a0:182_1: caṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ ālambanaphalakaṃ nissāya pāsāṇaphalake nisinnaṃ tāpasaṃ disvā cintesi –
atk-s0202a0:182_10: akkhīni dhovissāmī”ti udakadantakaṭṭhaṃ āharāpetvā dantakaṭṭhaṃ khāditvā tāpasassa sarīre piṇḍaṃ piṇḍaṃ
atk-s0202a0:182_11: kheḷaṃ pātetvā dantakaṭṭhaṃ jaṭāmatthake khipitvā mukhaṃ vikkhāletvā udakaṃ tāpasassa matthakasmiṃyeva
atk-s0202a0:183_4: Sā pubbe sukatakammaṃ nissāya laddhaṃ ṭhānantaraṃ tāpasassa sarīre kheḷapātanena laddhanti saññamakāsi.
atk-s0202a0:184_0: Tato katipāhassaccayena rājā purohitassa ṭhānantaraṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0202a0:184_1: So nagarasobhiniyā santikaṃ gantvā “bhagini kinti katvā ṭhānantaraṃ paṭilabhī”ti pucchi.
atk-s0202a0:184_6: So “evaṃ karissāmi bhaginī”ti tattha gantvā tāya kathitasadisameva sabbaṃ katvā nikkhami.
atk-s0202a0:184_12: Sopi puññabalena labhitvā “tāpasassa sarīre kheḷapātanena laddhaṃ me”ti saññamakāsi.
atk-s0202a0:185_1: Rājā paccantaṃ vūpasamessāmīti caturaṅginiyā senāya nikkhami.
atk-s0202a0:185_2: Purohito gantvā rañño purato ṭhatvā “jayatu mahārājā”ti vatvā – “tumhe, mahārāja,
atk-s0202a0:185_5: Evaṃ sante rājuyyāne anañjitakāḷakaṇṇī eko kūṭajaṭilo vasati,
atk-s0202a0:185_7: Rājā tassa vacanaṃ gahetvā yathā gaṇikāya ca tena ca kataṃ,
atk-s0202a0:185_11: Atha rājā uyyānadvāre rakkhaṃ ṭhapāpetvā “raññā saddhiṃ nikkhamantā sabbe tāpasassa sarīre kheḷaṃ apātetvā nikkhamituṃ na labhantī”ti āṇāpesi.
atk-s0202a0:185_12: Atha sabbo balakāyo ca seniyo ca teneva niyāmena tāpasassa upari kheḷañca dantakaṭṭhāni ca mukhavikkhālita udakañca pāpayiṃsu,
atk-s0202a0:185_13: kheḷo ca dantakaṭṭhāni ca sakalasarīraṃ avatthariṃsu.
atk-s0202a0:186_0: Senāpati sabbapacchā suṇitvā “mayhaṃ kira satthāraṃ bhavantaṃ puññakkhettaṃ saggasopānaṃ evaṃ ghaṭṭayiṃsū”ti
atk-s0202a0:186_1: usumajātahadayo mukhena assasanto vegena rājuyyānaṃ āgantvā tathā byasanapattaṃ isiṃ disvā kacchaṃ bandhitvā
atk-s0202a0:186_2: dvīhi hatthehi dantakaṭṭhāni apaviyūhitvā ukkhipitvā nisīdāpetvā udakaṃ āharāpetvā nhāpetvā sabbaosadhehi
atk-s0202a0:186_3: ceva catujjātigandhehi ca sarīraṃ ubbaṭṭetvā sukhumasāṭakena puñchitvā purato añjaliṃ katvā ṭhito evamāha “ayuttaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0202a0:186_10: Idaṃ vatvā pana tāpaso appamattakampi kopaṃ akatvā lokassa santiupāyameva ācikkhanto āha “aparādho nāma hoti,
atk-s0202a0:186_11: accayaṃ pana desetuṃ jānantassa pākatikameva hotī”ti.
atk-s0202a0:187_0: Senāpati nayaṃ labhitvā rañño santikaṃ gantvā rājānaṃ vanditvā āha – “tumhehi, mahārāja,
atk-s0202a0:187_1: nirāparādhe mahiddhike tāpase aparajjhantehi bhāriyaṃ kammaṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0202a0:187_2: devatā kira tidhā bhinnā evaṃ vadantī”ti sabbaṃ ārocetvā –
atk-s0202a0:187_7: Rājā attani dosaṃ kataṃ disvāpi evaṃ vadati “na taṃ khamāpessāmī”ti.
atk-s0202a0:187_12: sattānuddayena pana evamāha khamāpetha naṃ mahārājā”ti.
atk-s0202a0:187_18: Tato senāpati tāpasassa santikaṃ āgantvā vanditvā “kathaṃ paṭipajjāmi,
atk-s0202a0:187_21: sabbe saparikkhāre sadhane sadvipadacatuppade gahetvā sattadivasabbhantare bahi rajjasīmaṃ gaccha,
atk-s0202a0:187_22: devatā ativiya kupitā dhuvaṃ raṭṭhampi araṭṭhaṃ karissantīti.
atk-s0202a0:188_0: Rājā gatamattoyeva amittamathanaṃ katvā janapadaṃ vūpasametvā āgamma jayakhandhāvāraṭṭhāne nisīditvā nagaraṃ paṭijaggāpetvā antonagaraṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0202a0:188_2: Mahājano attamano ahosi “kūṭajaṭilaṃ aparaddhakālato paṭṭhāya amhākaṃ rañño vaḍḍhiyeva,
atk-s0202a0:188_9: tato kahāpaṇatthaṃ na nikkhameyyunti maññamānā hatthūpagapādūpagādikatabhaṇḍavuṭṭhiṃ pātesuṃ.
atk-s0202a0:188_10: Mahājano sattabhūmikapāsāde ṭhitopi otaritvā ābharaṇāni piḷandhanto attamano ahosi.
atk-s0202a0:188_12: tassa upari kheḷapātitakālato paṭṭhāya amhākaṃ rañño vaḍḍhi jātā,
atk-s0202a0:188_15: tato sumanavuṭṭhi māsakavuṭṭhi kahāpaṇavuṭṭhi katabhaṇḍavuṭṭhīti catasso vuṭṭhiyo jātā”ti attamanavācaṃ nicchāretvā rañño katapāpe samanuñño jāto.
atk-s0202a0:189_0: Tasmiṃ samaye devatā ekatodhāraubhatodhārādīni nānappakārāni āvudhāni mahājanassa upari phalake maṃsaṃ koṭṭayamānā viya pātayiṃsu.
atk-s0202a0:189_3: tadanantaraṃ antomuṭṭhiyaṃ asaṇṭhahanikaṃ sukhumavālikaṃ vassāpayamānā asītihatthubbedhaṃ thalaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0202a0:189_4: Rañño vijitaṭṭhāne kisavacchatāpaso senāpati mātuposakarāmoti tayova manussabhūtā arogā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0202a0:189_5: Sesānaṃ tasmiṃ kamme asamaṅgībhūtānaṃ tiracchānānaṃ pānīyaṭṭhāne pānīyaṃ nāhosi,
atk-s0202a0:189_7: Te yena pānīyaṃ yena tiṇanti gacchantā appatteyeva sattame divase bahirajjasīmaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0202a0:195_0: Kaliṅgaraṭṭhe pana nāḷikiraraññe rajjaṃ kārayamāne himavati pañcasatatāpasā anitthigandhā ajinajaṭavākacīradharā
atk-s0202a0:195_1: vanamūlaphalabhakkhā hutvā ciraṃ vītināmetvā loṇambilasevanatthaṃ manussapathaṃ otaritvā anupubbena kaliṅgaraṭṭhe
atk-s0202a0:195_3: Te jaṭājinavākacīrāni saṇṭhapetvā pabbajitānurūpaṃ upasamasiriṃ dassayamānā nagaraṃ bhikkhāya pavisiṃsu.
atk-s0202a0:195_4: Manussā anuppanne buddhuppāde tāpasapabbajite disvā pasannā nisajjaṭṭhānaṃ saṃvidhāya hatthato bhikkhābhājanaṃ
atk-s0202a0:195_7: Manussā sutvā pasannacittā “kuhiṃ bhadantā gacchantī”ti pucchiṃsu.
atk-s0202a0:195_13: Nāgarā bhuttapātarāsā suddhavatthanivatthā “dhammakathaṃ sossāmā”ti saṅghā gaṇā gaṇībhūtā uyyānābhimukhā agamaṃsu.
atk-s0202a0:195_14: Rājā uparipāsāde ṭhito te tathā gacchamāne disvā upaṭṭhākaṃ pucchi “kiṃ ete bhaṇe nāgarā suddhavatthā
atk-s0202a0:195_16: kimettha samajjaṃ vā nāṭakaṃ vā atthī”ti?
atk-s0202a0:195_18: ete tāpasānaṃ santike dhammaṃ sotukāmā gacchantīti.
atk-s0202a0:195_27: te āgamma rājāpi dhammiko bhavissatī”ti attamanatarā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0202a0:196_0: Rājā nikkhamitvā tehi parivārito uyyānaṃ gantvā tāpasehi saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ katvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0202a0:196_1: Tāpasā rājānaṃ disvā parikathāya kusalassekassa tāpasassa “rañño dhammaṃ kathehī”ti saññamadaṃsu,
atk-s0202a0:196_2: so tāpaso parisaṃ oloketvā pañcasu veresu ādīnavaṃ pañcasu ca sīlesu ānisaṃsaṃ kathento –
atk-s0202a0:197_5: pāṇātipāto nāma nirayasaṃvattaniko hoti tiracchānayonisaṃvattaniko pettivisayasaṃvattaniko,
atk-s0202a0:197_7: Pāṇātipāto niraye paccitvā manussalokaṃ āgatassa vipākāvasesena appāyukasaṃvattaniko hoti,
atk-s0202a0:199_5: ime pana mayhaṃ āgatakālato paṭṭhāya maṃyeva ghaṭṭentā vijjhantā parisamajjhe kathenti,
atk-s0202a0:199_7: So dhammakathāpariyosāne “ācariyā sve mayhaṃ gehe bhikkhaṃ gaṇhathā”ti nimantetvā agamāsi.
atk-s0202a0:199_8: So dutiyadivase mahante mahante koḷumbe āharāpetvā gūthassa pūrāpetvā kadalipattehi nesaṃ mukhāni bandhāpetvā tattha tattha ṭhapāpesi,
atk-s0202a0:199_9: puna bahalamadhukatelanāgabalapicchillādīnaṃ kūṭe pūretvā nisseṇimatthake ṭhapāpesi,
atk-s0202a0:199_10: tattheva ca mahāmalle baddhakacche hatthehi muggare gāhāpetvā ṭhapetvā āha “kūṭatāpasā ativiya maṃ viheṭhayiṃsu,
atk-s0202a0:199_11: tesaṃ pāsādato otaraṇakāle kūṭehi picchillaṃ sopānamatthake vissajjetvā sīse muggarehi pothetvā gale gahetvā sopāne khipathā”ti.
atk-s0202a0:201_0: Punadivase bhikkhācāravelaṃ sallakkhetvā vākacīraṃ nivāsetvā ajinacammaṃ ekaṃsagataṃ katvā jaṭākalāpaṃ
atk-s0202a0:201_1: saṇṭhapetvā bhikkhābhājanaṃ gahetvā paṭipāṭiyā rājanivesanaṃ abhiruḷhā.
atk-s0202a0:201_2: Rājā āruḷhabhāvaṃ ñatvā gūthakoḷumbamukhato kadalipattaṃ nīharāpesi.
atk-s0202a0:201_3: Duggandho tāpasānaṃ nāsapuṭaṃ paharitvā matthaluṅgapātanākārapatto ahosi.
atk-s0202a0:201_5: “ettha bhonto yāvadatthaṃ bhuñjantu ceva harantu ca,
atk-s0202a0:201_8: tumhe pana maṃyeva ghaṭṭento vijjhantā parisamajjhe kathayittha,
atk-s0202a0:201_12: “Ettakeneva gacchissatha tumhe”ti sopāne kūṭehi picchillaṃ vissajjāpetvā mallānaṃ saññamadāsi.
atk-s0202a0:201_13: Mallā muggarehi sīsāni pothetvā gīvāya gahetvā sopāne khipiṃsu,
atk-s0202a0:201_16: Sampatte sampatte caṇḍakukkurā paṭapaṭāti luñcamānā khādiṃsu.
atk-s0202a0:201_21: Evaṃ so rājā tapasampanne pañcasate tāpase ekadivaseneva jīvitā voropesi.
atk-s0202a0:202_0: Athassa raṭṭhe devatā purimanayeneva puna navavuṭṭhiyo pātesuṃ.
atk-s0202a0:208_0: Atīte pana bārāṇasinagare diṭṭhamaṅgalikā nāma cattālīsakoṭivibhavassa seṭṭhino ekā dhītā ahosi dassanīyā pāsādikā.
atk-s0202a0:208_3: taṃ taṃ disvānassa jātiyaṃ vā hatthapādādīsu vā yattha katthaci dosaṃ āropetvā “ko esa dujjāto dussaṇṭhito”tiādīni vatvā –
atk-s0202a0:208_7: Tassā diṭṭhaṃ diṭṭhaṃ vippakāraṃ pāpetvā nīharāpetīti diṭṭhamaṅgalikā tveva saṅkhā udapādi,
atk-s0202a0:209_0: Sā ekadivasaṃ gaṅgāya udakakīḷaṃ kīḷissāmīti titthaṃ sajjāpetvā pahūtaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ sakaṭesu
atk-s0202a0:209_1: pūrāpetvā bahūni gandhamālādīni ādāya paṭicchannayānaṃ āruyha ñātigaṇaparivutā gehamhā nikkhami.
atk-s0202a0:209_2: Tena ca samayena mahāpuriso caṇḍālayoniyaṃ nibbatto bahinagare cammagehe vasati,
atk-s0202a0:209_4: So soḷasavassuddesiko hutvā kenacideva karaṇīyena antonagaraṃ pavisitukāmo ekaṃ nīlapilotikaṃ nivāsetvā ekaṃ hatthe bandhitvā ekena hatthena pacchiṃ,
atk-s0202a0:209_6: caṇḍāloha”nti jānāpanatthaṃ taṃ vādento nīcacittaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā diṭṭhadiṭṭhe manusse namassamāno nagaraṃ pavisitvā mahāpathaṃ paṭipajji.
atk-s0202a0:210_0: Diṭṭhamaṅgalikā ghaṇḍasaddaṃ sutvā sāṇiantarena olokentī dūratova taṃ āgacchantaṃ disvā “kimeta”nti pucchi.
atk-s0202a0:210_6: maṅgalakiccena nāma gacchamānā caṇḍālaṃ addasa”nti sarīraṃ kampetvā jigucchamānā kheḷaṃ pātetvā dhātiyo āha –
atk-s0202a0:210_9: akkhīni ceva nāma gahitamukhañca dhovissāmī”ti dhovitvā rathaṃ nivattāpetvā sabbapaṭiyādānaṃ gehaṃ pesetvā pāsādaṃ abhiruhi.
atk-s0202a0:210_12: imāyapi velāya nāgacchatī”ti pucchantā taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā –
atk-s0202a0:210_14: surāmaṃsagandhamālādisakkāraṃ caṇḍālaṃ nissāya anubhavituṃ na labhimha,
atk-s0202a0:210_15: gaṇhatha caṇḍāla”nti gataṭṭhānaṃ gavesitvā nirāparādhaṃ mātaṅgapaṇḍitaṃ tajjitvā –
atk-s0202a0:210_16: “are mātaṅga taṃ nissāya idañcidañca sakkāraṃ anubhavituṃ na labhimhā”ti kesesu gahetvā bhūmiyaṃ pātetvā
atk-s0202a0:210_17: jāṇukapparapāsāṇādīhi koṭṭetvā matoti saññāya pāde gahetvā kaḍḍhantā saṅkārakūṭe chaḍḍesuṃ.
atk-s0202a0:211_4: pādesu naṃ nipātessāmī”ti cintetvā vedhamāno diṭṭhamaṅgalikāya kuladvāraṃ gantvā –
atk-s0202a0:211_7: Tena ca samayena jambudīpe ayaṃ dhammatā hoti –
atk-s0202a0:211_8: yassa caṇḍālo kujjhitvā gabbhadvāre nipanno marati,
atk-s0202a0:211_13: aṅgaṇamhi mate ito satta ito sattāti cuddasagehavāsino sabbe caṇḍālā hontīti.
atk-s0202a0:212_1: “mātaṅgo te sāmi gehaṅgaṇe patito”ti gacchatha bhaṇe,
atk-s0202a0:212_2: kiṃ kāraṇāti vatvā ekamāsakaṃ datvā uṭṭhāpethāti.
atk-s0202a0:212_3: Te gantvā “imaṃ kira māsakaṃ gahetvā uṭṭhahā”ti vadiṃsu. So –
atk-s0202a0:212_8: niraparādho ahaṃ tassā manussehi byasanaṃ pāpito,
atk-s0202a0:213_5: Taṃ sutvā seṭṭhi ca seṭṭhibhariyā ca –
atk-s0202a0:213_7: paveṇiyā ghaṭako añño dārakopi natthī”ti saṃvegappattā –
atk-s0202a0:213_9: koci amhākaṃ asahanako etaṃ jīvitāpi voropeyya,
atk-s0202a0:213_10: etasmiñhi mate sabbe mayaṃ naṭṭhā homa,
atk-s0202a0:213_11: ārakkhamassa gaṇhathā”ti parivāretvā ārakkhaṃ saṃvidhāya yāguṃ pesayiṃsu,
atk-s0202a0:213_14: Evaṃ eko divaso gato; dve, tayo, cattāro,
atk-s0202a0:214_1: “na sakkoma mayaṃ tumhe nissāya caṇḍālā bhavituṃ,
atk-s0202a0:214_3: tumhākaṃ dārikaṃ datvā etaṃ uṭṭhāpethā”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0202a0:214_9: tumhākaṃ akāmakānampi mayaṃ etassa dārikaṃ dassāmā”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0202a0:215_0: Mātāpitaro sokasallasamappitā visaññī hutvā sayane nipatiṃsu.
atk-s0202a0:215_1: Ubhato cuddasagehavāsino pāsādaṃ āruyha supupphitakiṃsukasākhaṃ ucchindantā viya tassā sabbābharaṇāni
atk-s0202a0:215_2: omuñcitvā nakhehi sīmantaṃ katvā kese bandhitvā nīlasāṭakaṃ nivāsāpetvā hatthe nīlapilotikakhaṇḍaṃ veṭhetvā
atk-s0202a0:215_3: kaṇṇesu tipupaṭṭake piḷandhāpetvā tālapaṇṇapacchiṃ datvā pāsādato otārāpetvā dvīsu bāhāsu gahetvā –
atk-s0202a0:216_6: Na tuyhaṃ manussā uṭṭhānasamatthaṃ maṃ akaṃsu,
atk-s0202a0:216_9: Bodhisatto uṭṭhahanto viya parivaṭṭetvā bhūmiyaṃ patitvā – “nāsitaṃ, bho,
atk-s0202a0:216_14: Sā tathā uṭṭhāpetvā nisīdāpetvā gacchāma sāmīti.
atk-s0202a0:216_28: Pācīnadvāre caṇḍālaputtā vasituṃ na labhantīti attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ anācikkhitvāva sabbadvārāni āhiṇḍāpesi. Kasmā?
atk-s0202a0:216_31: “ṭhapetvā tumhādisaṃ añño etissā mānaṃ bhedako natthī”ti.
atk-s0202a0:217_0: Sā pacchimadvāraṃ patvā “idha te sāmi vasanaṭṭhāna”nti pucchi.
atk-s0202a0:217_3: Iminā dvārena nikkhamitvā cammagehaṃ olokentī gacchāti.
atk-s0202a0:217_4: Sā tattha gantvā āha “idaṃ cammagehaṃ tumhākaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ sāmī”ti?
atk-s0202a0:218_0: Tattha sattaṭṭhadivase vasanto sabbaññutagavesanadhīro ettakesu divasesu na ca jātisambhedamakāsi.
atk-s0202a0:218_1: “Mahākulassa dhītā sace maṃ nissāya mahantaṃ yasaṃ na pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0202a0:218_3: Etissā pādadhovanaudakena sakalajambudīpe rājūnaṃ abhisekakiccaṃ karissāmī”ti cintetvā puna cintesi –
atk-s0202a0:218_7: “diṭṭhamaṅgalike mayaṃ pubbe ekacarā kammaṃ katvāpi akatvāpi sakkā jīvituṃ,
atk-s0202a0:218_11: tāva mā ukkaṇṭhitthā”ti araññaṃ pavisitvā susānādīsu nantakāni saṅkaḍḍhitvā nivāsanapārupanaṃ katvā samaṇapabbajjaṃ
atk-s0202a0:218_12: pabbajitvā ekacaro laddhakāyaviveko kasiṇaparikammaṃ katvā aṭṭha samāpattiyo pañca abhiññāyo ca nibbattetvā
atk-s0202a0:218_13: “idāni sakkā diṭṭhamaṅgalikāya avassayena mayā bhavitu”nti bārāṇasiabhimukho gantvā cīvaraṃ pārupitvā
atk-s0202a0:219_0: Sā taṃ dvāre ṭhitaṃ disvā asañjānantī –
atk-s0202a0:219_4: Sā punappunaṃ olokentī sañjānitvā hatthehi uraṃ paharitvā viravamānā pādamūle patitvā āha –
atk-s0202a0:219_6: kasmā maṃ mahatā yasā parihāpetvā anāthaṃ akāsī”ti.
atk-s0202a0:219_7: Nānappakāraṃ paridevaṃ paridevitvā akkhīni puñchamānā uṭṭhāya bhikkhābhājanaṃ gahetvā antogehe nisīdāpetvā bhikkhaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0202a0:219_10: ahaṃ tuyhaṃ pādadhovanaudakena sakalajambudīpe rājūnaṃ abhisekakiccaṃ kāretuṃ samattho,
atk-s0202a0:219_11: tvaṃ pana ekaṃ mama vacanaṃ karohi,
atk-s0202a0:219_13: mahābrahmā mayhaṃ sāmiko’ti ugghosayamānā sakalanagaraṃ carāhī”ti.
atk-s0202a0:220_4: “kiṃ pana tayā mayhaṃ agāre vasantassa alikavacanaṃ sutapubbaṃ,
atk-s0202a0:220_9: tvaṃ ‘ito sattāhassaccayena uposathadivase mayhaṃ sāmiko mahābrahmā candamaṇḍalaṃ bhinditvā mama santikaṃ
atk-s0202a0:221_0: Sā saddahitvā haṭṭhatuṭṭhā sūrā hutvā sāyaṃpātaṃ nagaraṃ pavisitvā tathā ugghosesi.
atk-s0202a0:221_3: amhākaṃ diṭṭhamaṅgalikā caṇḍālaputtaṃ mahābrahmānaṃ karotī”ti hasantā keḷiṃ karonti.
atk-s0202a0:221_6: ekāhaccayena mayhaṃ sāmiko mahābrahmā candamaṇḍalaṃ bhinditvā mama santikaṃ āgamissatī”ti ugghosesi.
atk-s0202a0:222_3: etha mayaṃ diṭṭhamaṅgalikāya vasanaṭṭhānaṃ paṭijaggāmā”ti cammagehassa bāhirabhāgaṃ samantā tacchāpetvā vālikaṃ okiriṃsu.
atk-s0202a0:222_4: Sāpi uposathadivase pātova nagaraṃ pavisitvā “ajja mayhaṃ sāmiko āgamissatī”ti ugghosesi.
atk-s0202a0:222_8: vasanaṭṭhānaṃ saṃvidahāmā”ti cammagehaṃ samajjāpetvā haritūpalittaṃ ahatavatthehi parikkhipitvā mahārahaṃ
atk-s0202a0:222_9: pallaṅkaṃ attharitvā upari celavitānaṃ bandhitvā gandhamāladāmāni osārayiṃsu.
atk-s0202a0:223_0: Mahāpuriso cande uggatamatte abhiññāpādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya kāmāvacaracittena parikammaṃ
atk-s0202a0:223_1: katvā iddhicittena dvādasayojanikaṃ brahmattabhāvaṃ māpetvā vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā candavimānassa anto
atk-s0202a0:223_2: pavisitvā vanantato abbhussakkamānaṃ candaṃ bhinditvā candavimānaṃ ohāya purato hutvā “mahājano maṃ passatū”ti
atk-s0202a0:223_6: āgacchantaṃ mahābrahmānaṃ pūjessāmā”ti gandhamālaṃ ādāya diṭṭhamaṅgalikāya gharaṃ parivāretvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0202a0:223_7: Mahāpuriso matthakamatthakena sattavāre bārāṇasiṃ anuparigantvā mahājanena diṭṭhabhāvaṃ ñatvā dvādasayojanikaṃ
atk-s0202a0:223_8: attabhāvaṃ vijahitvā manussappamāṇameva māpetvā mahājanassa passantasseva cammagehaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0202a0:223_11: sāṇiṃ āharathā”ti nivesanaṃ mahāsāṇiyā parikkhipitvā parivāretvā ṭhito.
atk-s0202a0:224_4: Mayā dinnaṃ puttaṃ gaṇhāhīti aṅguṭṭhakena nābhimaṇḍalaṃ phusi.
atk-s0202a0:224_7: “ettāvatā te diṭṭhamaṅgalike pādadhovanaudakaṃ sakalajambudīpe rājūnaṃ abhisekodakaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0202a0:224_8: tvaṃ tiṭṭhā”ti vatvā brahmattabhāvaṃ māpetvā passantasseva mahājanassa nikkhamitvā vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā caṇḍamaṇḍalameva paviṭṭho.
atk-s0202a0:224_9: Sā tato paṭṭhāya brahmapajāpatī nāma jātā.
atk-s0202a0:225_1: “brahmapajāpatiṃ antonagare vasāpessāmā”ti suvaṇṇasivikāya āropetvā yāva sattamakoṭiyā aparisuddhajātikassa sivikaṃ gahetuṃ na adaṃsu.
atk-s0202a0:225_9: Tato paṭṭhāya cakkhupathe ṭhatvā vanditukāmā kahāpaṇaṃ datvā vandituṃ labhanti,
atk-s0202a0:225_11: āsanne pakatikathaṃ savanaṭṭhāne vanditukāmā pañcasatāni datvā labhanti,
atk-s0202a0:225_12: pādapiṭṭhiyaṃ sīsaṃ ṭhapetvā vanditukāmā sahassaṃ datvā labhanti,
atk-s0202a0:225_14: Bahinagarato antonagare yāva maṇḍapā āgacchantiyā laddhadhanaṃyeva koṭisatamattaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0202a0:226_1: tato sabbarājāno “brahmapajāpatiyā pādadhovanena abhisekaṃ karissāmā”ti satasahassaṃ pesetvā labhiṃsu.
atk-s0202a0:226_3: Mahāpurisaṃ paṭicca laddhakumāro pāsādiko ahosi lakkhaṇasampanno.
atk-s0202a0:226_4: Mahābrahmuno putto jātoti sakala jambudīpo ekakolāhalo ahosi.
atk-s0202a0:226_5: Kumārassa khīramaṇimūlaṃ hotūti tato tato āgatadhanaṃ koṭisahassaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0202a0:226_7: Kumārassa nāmakaraṇaṃ karissāmāti nivesanaṃ sajjetvā kumāraṃ gandhodakena nhāpetvā alaṅkaritvā maṇḍape jātattā maṇḍabyotveva nāmaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0202a0:227_0: Kumāro sukhena saṃvaḍḍhamāno sippuggahaṇavayapattoti sakalajambudīpe sippajānanakā tassa santike āgantvā sippaṃ sikkhāpenti.
atk-s0202a0:227_1: Kumāro medhāvī paññavā sutaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ āvuṇanto viya gaṇhāti,
atk-s0202a0:227_9: Gehe maṅgaladivase jambudīpavāsīhi pesitadhanaṃ koṭisahassamattaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0202a0:228_6: gacchāmi naṃ damemī”ti cīvaraṃ pārupitvā bhikkhābhājanaṃ gahetvā –
atk-s0202a0:228_8: na sakkā koṭṭhakena pavisitu”nti ākāsenāgantvā asītibrāhmaṇasahassānaṃ bhuñjanaṭṭhāne ākāsaṅgaṇe otari.
atk-s0202a0:228_10: “idha sūpaṃ detha idha odana”nti parivisāpento bodhisattaṃ disvā daṇḍakena ghaṭṭitaāsiviso viya kupitvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0202a0:233_0: Atha naṃ mahāsatto akujjhitvāva ovadanto āha –
atk-s0202a0:238_0: So nayidaṃ tumhādisānaṃ paṭiyattanti dassento āha –
atk-s0202a0:243_0: Atha bodhisatto “dānaṃ nāma saguṇassapi nigguṇassapi yassa kassaci dātabbaṃ,
atk-s0202a0:243_1: yathā hi ninnepi thalepi patiṭṭhāpitaṃ bījaṃ pathavīrasaṃ āporasañca āgamma sampajjati,
atk-s0202a0:243_3: sukhette vapitabījaṃ viya guṇavante mahapphalaṃ hotī”ti dassetuṃ imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0202a0:248_0: Atha kumāro kodhābhibhūto – “kenimassa muṇḍakassa paveso dinno”ti dvārarakkhādayo tajjetvā –
atk-s0202a0:253_0: Gāthaṃ vatvā “imaṃ jammaṃ veṇupadarena pothetvā gīvāyaṃ gahetvā sattapi dvārakoṭṭhake atikkamitvā bahi nīharathā”ti āha.
atk-s0202a0:256_1: “sace myāyaṃ hatthe vā pāde vā gaṇhāpetvā dukkhaṃ uppādeyya,
atk-s0202a0:256_2: bahuṃ apuññaṃ pasaveyyā”ti sattānuddayatāya vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā antaravīthiyaṃ otari.
atk-s0202a0:256_3: Bhagavā sabbaññutaṃ patto tamatthaṃ pakāsento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0202a0:259_0: Tāvadeva nagararakkhikadevatānaṃ jeṭṭhakadevarājā maṇḍabyassa gīvaṃ parivattesi.
atk-s0202a0:259_4: sarīraṃ thaddhaṃ sūle āropitaṃ viya ahosi.
atk-s0202a0:259_7: Sā taramānarūpā āgantvā taṃ vippakāraṃ disvā gāthamāha –
atk-s0202a0:269_1: “mayhaṃ yasadāyako ayyo anukampāya puttassa pamattabhāvaṃ ñatvā āgato bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0202a0:279_3: mā aññe”ti adhiṭṭhahitvā piṇḍāya caritvā yāpanamattaṃ missakodanaṃ gahetvā paṭikkamanasālāyaṃ nisinno
atk-s0202a0:279_5: Diṭṭhamaṅgalikāpi pāsādā oruyha antaravīthiṃ paṭipajjamānā padavaḷañjaṃ disvā –
atk-s0202a0:279_6: “idaṃ mayhaṃ yasadāyakassa ayyassa pada”nti padānusārenāgantvā vanditvā āha –
atk-s0202a0:285_3: pabbajitaṃ pana hiṃsante disvā pabbajitesu sagāravāhi bhūtayakkhadevatāhi kataṃ bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0202a0:286_7: tattha thokaṃ udakaṃ āsiñcitvā thokaṃ gahetvā tava puttassa mukhe pakkhipa,
atk-s0202a0:286_8: avasesaṃ udakacāṭiyaṃ āloḷetvā asītiyā brāhmaṇasahassānaṃ mukhe pakkhipāti.
atk-s0202a0:286_9: Sā evaṃ karissāmīti bhattaṃ gahetvā mahāpurisaṃ vanditvā gantvā tathā akāsi.
atk-s0202a0:287_1: “sāmimhi sayaṃ bhesajjaṃ karonte amhehi na sakkā kiñci kātu”nti kumāraṃ vissajjesi.
atk-s0202a0:287_2: Sopi khipitvā kiñci dukkhaṃ appattapubbo viya pakativaṇṇo ahosi.
atk-s0202a0:287_7: Tato sesakaṃ udakacāṭiyaṃ āluḷāpetvā brāhmaṇānaṃ mukhe pakkhipāpesi.
atk-s0202a0:287_9: Brāhmaṇā khipitvā khipitvā uṭṭhahitvā kiṃ amhākaṃ mukhe pakkhittanti pucchiṃsu.
atk-s0202a0:287_13: idāni no brāhmaṇā ‘asuddhabrāhmaṇā ime’ti sambhogaṃ na dassantī”ti tato palāyitvā majjharaṭṭhaṃ gantvā
atk-s0202a0:287_14: majjharājassa nagare aggāsanikā brāhmaṇā nāma mayanti rājagehe bhuñjanti.
atk-s0202a0:288_0: Tasmiṃ samaye bodhisatto pāpaniggahaṃ karonto mānajātike nimmadayanto vicarati.
atk-s0202a0:288_1: Atheko “jātimantatāpaso nāma mayā sadiso natthī”ti aññesu saññampi na karoti.
atk-s0202a0:288_2: Bodhisatto taṃ gaṅgātīre vasamānaṃ disvā “mānaniggahamassa karissāmī”ti tattha agamāsi.
atk-s0202a0:289_2: tumhehi vuttaṭṭhāne vasissāmī”ti heṭṭhāgaṅgāya vasanto “gaṅgāya udakaṃ paṭisotaṃ sandatū”ti adhiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0202a0:289_3: Jātimantatāpaso pātova gaṅgaṃ oruyha udakaṃ ācamati,
atk-s0202a0:289_5: Bodhisatto dantakaṭṭhaṃ khādanto piṇḍaṃ piṇḍaṃ kheḷaṃ udake pāteti.
atk-s0202a0:289_7: Yathā ce taṃ aññattha alaggitvā tāpasasseva jaṭāsu laggati,
atk-s0202a0:290_0: Tāpaso caṇḍālassidaṃ kammaṃ bhavissatīti vippaṭisārī hutvā gantvā pucchi – “idaṃ,
atk-s0202a0:290_4: Tena hi tvaṃ heṭṭhāgaṅgāya mā vasa,
atk-s0202a0:290_7: tumhehi vuttaṭṭhāne vasissāmīti tattha vasanto iddhiṃ paṭippassambhesi,
atk-s0202a0:290_12: tvamidaṃ gaṅgāya udakaṃ kālena paṭisotagāmiṃ kālena anusotagāmiṃ karosī”ti?
atk-s0202a0:290_14: “tvaṃ sukhavihārīnaṃ pabbajitānaṃ sukhena vasituṃ na desi,
atk-s0202a0:290_15: sattame te divase sattadhā muddhā phalatū”ti.
atk-s0202a0:290_17: ahaṃ pana sūriyassa uggantuṃ na dassāmīti.
atk-s0202a0:291_2: rakkhāmi na”nti sattānuddayatāya punadivase iddhiyā sūriyassa uggantuṃ na adāsi.
atk-s0202a0:292_1: “yakkhāvaṭṭo nu kho ayaṃ bhūtadevaṭṭonāgasupaṇṇāvaṭṭo”ti upaddavappattā “kiṃ nu kho kātabba”nti cintetvā “rājakulaṃ nāma mahāpaññaṃ,
atk-s0202a0:292_3: tattha gacchāmā”ti rājakulaṃ gantvā tamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0202a0:292_7: taṃ pucchitvā nikkaṅkhā bhavissāmā”ti katipayeheva atthacarakehi manussehi saddhiṃ tāpasaṃ upasaṅkamitvā katapaṭisanthāro tamatthaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0202a0:292_11: so imaṃ gaṅgāya udakaṃ kālena anusotagāmiṃ kālena patisotagāmiṃ karoti,
atk-s0202a0:293_1: aruṇassa uggantuṃ na dethā”ti pucchi. Āma,
atk-s0202a0:293_5: jātimantatāpasena āgantvā maṃ vanditvā khamāpitakāle dassāmi mahārājāti.
atk-s0202a0:293_13: Rājā bodhisattaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “ācariyo khamāpetuṃ na icchitī”ti āha.
atk-s0202a0:293_20: taṃ hatthesu ca pādesu ca gahetvā mātaṅgaisissa pādamūle netvā nipajjāpetvā khamāpetha etassa janapadānuddayataṃ paṭiccā”ti āha.
atk-s0202a0:293_21: Te rājapurisā gantvā taṃ tathā katvā ānetvā mātaṅgaisissa pādamūle nipajjāpetvā khamāpesuṃ.
atk-s0202a0:294_1: apica kho pana etassa kathā etasseva upari patissati.
atk-s0202a0:294_2: Mayā sūriye vissajjite sūriyarasmi etassa matthake patissati,
atk-s0202a0:294_4: Tañca kho panesa byasanaṃ mā pāpuṇātu,
atk-s0202a0:294_5: etha tumhe etaṃ galappamāṇe udake otāretvā mahantaṃ mattikāpiṇḍamassa sīse ṭhapetha.
atk-s0202a0:294_7: Sūriyarasmi mattikāpiṇḍe patitvā taṃ sattadhā bhindissati.
atk-s0202a0:294_8: Athesa mattikāpiṇḍaṃ chaḍḍetvā nimujjitvā aññena titthena uttaratu,
atk-s0202a0:294_15: pabbajitānaṃ abbhantare guṇova kāraṇa”nti jātigottamānaṃ pahāya nimmado ahosi.
atk-s0202a0:295_0: Iti jātimantatāpase damite mahājano bodhisattassa thāmaṃ aññāsi,
atk-s0202a0:295_2: Rājā attano nagaraṃ gamanatthāya bodhisattaṃ yāci.
atk-s0202a0:295_3: Mahāsatto paṭiññaṃ datvā tāni ca asītibrāhmaṇasahassāni damessāmi,
atk-s0202a0:295_7: idāneva sabbe ete mayhaṃ ucchiṭṭhakaṃ khāditvā abrāhmaṇā jātāti amhe pākaṭe karissati,
atk-s0202a0:295_8: evaṃ no idhāpi āvāso na bhavissati,
atk-s0202a0:295_9: paṭikacceva māressāmā”ti rājānaṃ puna upasaṅkamitvā āhaṃsu – “tumhe, mahārāja,
atk-s0202a0:295_17: icchanto pathaviṃ ukkhipitvā pātetuṃ maññe sakkoti.
atk-s0202a0:295_18: Parassa vā cittaṃ nāma sabbakālaṃ na sakkā gahetuṃ,
atk-s0202a0:295_19: ayaṃ idha patiṭṭhaṃ labhanto tumhākaṃ rajjampi nāseyya,
atk-s0202a0:296_1: iti so bahūnaṃ kathāvasena niṭṭhaṃ gato.
atk-s0202a0:296_2: Bodhisatto pana nagare piṇḍāya caritvā udakaphāsukaṭṭhāne missakodanaṃ bhuñjitvā rājuyyānaṃ gantvā nirāparādhatāya nirāsaṅko maṅgalasilāpaṭṭe nisīdi.
atk-s0202a0:296_4: anāgate cattālīsāti asītikappe anussarituṃ samatthañāṇassa anāvajjanatāya muhuttamattake kāle sati nappahoti,
atk-s0202a0:296_5: rājā aññaṃ ajānāpetvā sayameva gantvā nirāvajjanatāya pamādena nisinnaṃ mahāpurisaṃ asinā paharitvā dve bhāge akāsi.
atk-s0202a0:296_8: Iti imassāpi raṭṭhe nava vuṭṭhiyo patitā.
atk-s0202a0:296_9: So ca rājā sapariso mahāniraye nibbatto.
atk-s0202a0:299_1: Mātaṅgassa pana isino vasena tadeva mātaṅgāraññanti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:300_3: Amaññissanti vilomabhāgaṃ gaṇhanto viya ahosinti attho.
atk-s0202a0:301_1: Anuviccakāranti anuvicāretvā cintetvā tulayitvā kātabbaṃ karohīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0202a0:301_3: Tumhādisasmiñhi maṃ disvā maṃ saraṇaṃ gacchante nigaṇṭhaṃ disvā nigaṇṭhaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchante –
atk-s0202a0:301_7: Paṭākaṃ parihareyyunti te kira evarūpaṃ sāvakaṃ labhitvā –
atk-s0202a0:301_8: “asuko nāma rājā vā rājamahāmatto vā seṭṭhi vā amhākaṃ saraṇaṃ gato sāvako jāto”ti paṭākaṃ ukkhipitvā nagare ghosentā āhiṇḍanti. Kasmā?
atk-s0202a0:301_9: Evaṃ no mahantabhāvo āvi bhavissatīti ca,
atk-s0202a0:301_10: sace tassa “kimahaṃ etesaṃ saraṇaṃ gato”ti vippaṭisāro uppajjeyya,
atk-s0202a0:301_11: tampi so “etesaṃ me saraṇagatabhāvaṃ bahū jānanti,
atk-s0202a0:301_12: dukkhaṃ idāni paṭinivattitu”nti vinodetvā na paṭikkamissatīti ca.
atk-s0202a0:302_3: Dātabbaṃ maññeyyāsīti pubbe dasapi vīsatipi saṭṭhipi jane āgate disvā natthīti avatvā deti.
atk-s0202a0:302_4: Idāni maṃ saraṇaṃ gatakāraṇamattenava mā imesaṃ deyyadhammaṃ,
