atk-s0202a0:302_13: na aññesaṃ sāvakānaṃ dinnaṃ mahapphala’nti vadatī”ti.
atk-s0202a0:303_4: Tattha dānakathanti idaṃ dānaṃ nāma sukhānaṃ nidānaṃ,
atk-s0202a0:303_8: idhalokaparalokesu dānasadiso avassayo patiṭṭhā ārammaṇaṃ tāṇaṃ leṇaṃ gati parāyaṇaṃ natthi.
atk-s0202a0:303_27: sasabhūtena jalite aggikkhandhe attānaṃ niyyādentena sampattayācakānaṃ cittaṃ gahitaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:304_0: Yasmā pana dānaṃ dadanto sīlaṃ samādātuṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0202a0:304_2: Sīlakathanti sīlaṃ nāmetaṃ avassayo patiṭṭhā ārammaṇaṃ tāṇaṃ leṇaṃ gati parāyaṇaṃ,
atk-s0202a0:304_12: ārammaṇaṃ tāṇaṃ leṇaṃ gati parāyaṇaṃ natthi,
atk-s0202a0:304_16: Sīlālaṅkārena hi alaṅkataṃ sīlakusumapiḷandhanaṃ sīlagandhānulittaṃ sadevakopi loko olokento tittiṃ na
atk-s0202a0:305_0: Idaṃ pana sīlaṃ nissāya ayaṃ saggo labbhatīti dassetuṃ sīlānantaraṃ saggakathaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0202a0:305_1: Saggakathanti ayaṃ saggo nāma iṭṭho kanto manāpo,
atk-s0202a0:305_4: cātumahārājikā devā navutivassasatasahassāni dibbasukhaṃ dibbasampattiṃ anubhavanti,
atk-s0202a0:305_5: tāvatiṃsā tisso ca vassakoṭiyo saṭṭhi ca vassasatasahassānīti evamādiṃ saggaguṇapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ kathaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:306_0: Evaṃ saggakathāya palobhetvā puna hatthiṃ alaṅkaritvā tassa soṇḍaṃ chindanto viya –
atk-s0202a0:306_4: ādīnavo ettha bhiyyo”tiādinā nayena kāmānaṃ ādīnavaṃ okāraṃ saṃkilesaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0202a0:307_0: Evaṃ kāmādīnavena tajjitvā nekkhamme ānisaṃsaṃ pakāsesi.
atk-s0202a0:307_2: Sāmukkaṃsikāti sāmaṃ ukkaṃsikā attanāyeva gahetvā uddharitvā gahitā,
atk-s0202a0:308_7: Tañhi nirodhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā kiccavasena evaṃ sabbasaṅkhataṃ paṭivijjhantaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0202a0:309_7: na parassa saddhāya ettha vattatīti aparappaccayo.
atk-s0202a0:311_1: Assosi kho dīghatapassīti so kira tassa gatakālato paṭṭhāya –
atk-s0202a0:311_7: gato nu kho saraṇaṃ gahapati na tāva gato”ti ohitasotova hutvā vicarati.
atk-s0202a0:312_1: Tena hi sammāti balavasokena abhibhūto “ettheva tiṭṭhā”ti vacanaṃ sutvāpi atthaṃ asallakkhento dovārikena saddhiṃ sallapatiyeva.
atk-s0202a0:313_0: Majjhimāya dvārasālāyānti yassa gharassa satta dvārakoṭṭhakā,
atk-s0202a0:313_1: tassa sabbaabbhantarato vā sabbabāhirato vā paṭṭhāya catutthadvārakoṭṭhako,
atk-s0202a0:313_6: Ekadvārakoṭṭhakassa pana gharassa majjhaṭṭhāne maṅgalatthambhaṃ nissāya majjhimadvārasālā.
atk-s0202a0:314_2: Yaṃ sudanti ettha yanti yaṃ nāṭaputtaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:314_4: Pariggahetvāti teneva uttarāsaṅgena udare parikkhipanto gahetvā.
atk-s0202a0:314_6: saṇikaṃ ācariyāti mahantaṃ telaghaṭaṃ ṭhapento viya nisīdāpeti.
atk-s0202a0:314_9: Aṇḍahārakotiādiṃ duṭṭhullavacanampi samānaṃ upaṭṭhākassa aññathābhāvena uppannabalavasokatāya idaṃ nāma bhaṇāmīti asallakkhetvāva bhaṇati.
atk-s0202a0:315_8: tena kāraṇena upamaṃ te karissāmīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0202a0:316_4: Āpaṇesu hi saviññāṇakampi aviññāṇakampi makkaṭādikīḷanabhaṇḍakaṃ vikkiṇanti.
atk-s0202a0:316_6: Rajitanti bahalabahalaṃ pītāvalepanaraṅgajātaṃ gahetvā rajitvā dinnaṃ imaṃ icchāmīti attho.
atk-s0202a0:316_8: Ubhatobhāgavimaṭṭhanti maṇipāsāṇena ubhosu passesu suṭṭhu vimaṭṭhaṃ ghaṭṭetvā uppāditacchaviṃ.
atk-s0202a0:317_0: Raṅgakkhamo hi khoti saviññāṇakampi aviññāṇakampi raṅgaṃ pivati.
atk-s0202a0:317_2: No ākoṭṭanakkhamoti saviññāṇakassa tāva ākoṭṭanaphalake ṭhapetvā kucchiyaṃ ākoṭitassa kucchi bhijjati,
atk-s0202a0:317_8: No vimajjanakkhamoti saviññāṇako maṇipāsāṇena vimaddiyamāno nillomataṃ nicchavitañca āpajjati,
atk-s0202a0:317_11: Raṅgakkhamo hi kho bālānanti bālānaṃ mandabuddhīnaṃ raṅgakkhamo,
atk-s0202a0:317_14: Paṇḍitānaṃ pana nigaṇṭhavādo vā añño vā bhāratarāmasītāharaṇādi niratthakakathāmaggo appiyova hoti.
atk-s0202a0:317_16: no vimajjanakkhamoti anuyogaṃ vā vīmaṃsaṃ vā na khamati,
atk-s0202a0:317_17: thuse koṭṭetvā taṇḍulapariyesanaṃ viya kadaliyaṃ sāragavesanaṃ viya ca rittako tucchakova hoti.
atk-s0202a0:317_18: Raṅgakkhamo ceva paṇḍitānanti catusaccakathā hi paṇḍitānaṃ piyā hoti,
atk-s0202a0:317_21: Buddhavacanaṃ pana yathā yathāpi ogāhissati mahāsamuddo viya gambhīrameva hotīti “anuyogakkhamo ca vimajjanakkhamo cā”ti āha.
atk-s0202a0:317_22: Suṇohi yassāhaṃ sāvakoti tassa guṇe suṇāhīti bhagavato vaṇṇe vattuṃ āraddho.
atk-s0202a0:318_5: so mayhaṃ satthāti evaṃ sabbapadesu sambandho veditabbo.
atk-s0202a0:318_7: Sabbaputhujjane vijiniṃsu vijinanti vijinissanti vāti vijayā. Ke te,
atk-s0202a0:318_9: Te vijitā vijayā etenāti vijitavijayo. Bhagavā,
atk-s0202a0:319_4: Pasādavasena hi ekampi guṇaṃ punappunaṃ vadatiyeva.
atk-s0202a0:319_9: Aññathā vuccamāne ekekagāthāya dasa guṇā nappahonti.
atk-s0202a0:322_0: Isisattamassāti vipassiādayo cha isayo upādāya sattamassa.
atk-s0202a0:322_10: Bhagavatā hi abyākataṃ nāma tanti padaṃ natthi sabbesaṃyeva attho kathito.
atk-s0202a0:323_0: Vipassissāti vipassanakassa. Anabhinatassāti anatassa. No apanatassāti aduṭṭhassa.
atk-s0202a0:325_1: tāya pathavīsamāya paññāya vipulāya mahantāya vitthatāya samannāgatassāti attho.
atk-s0202a0:326_2: Yakkhassāti ānubhāvadassanaṭṭhena ādissamānakaṭṭhena vā bhagavā yakkho nāma.
atk-s0202a0:326_5: Tassa sāvakohamasmīti tassa evaṃvividhaguṇassa satthussa ahaṃ sāvakoti.
atk-s0202a0:326_7: Iti paṭisambhidāvisaye ṭhatvā padasatena dasabalassa kilesappahānavaṇṇaṃ kathento “kassa taṃ gahapati sāvakaṃ dhāremā”ti pañhassa atthaṃ vissajjesi.
atk-s0202a0:327_3: “ayaṃ idāneva samaṇassa gotamassa santikaṃ gantvā āgato,
atk-s0202a0:327_6: Vicittaṃ mālaṃ gantheyyāti sayampi dakkhatāya pupphānampi nānāvaṇṇatāya ekatovaṇṭikādibhedaṃ vicitramālaṃ gantheyya.
atk-s0202a0:327_8: bhanteti ettha nānāpupphānaṃ mahāpuppharāsi viya nānāvidhānaṃ vaṇṇānaṃ bhagavato sinerumatto vaṇṇarāsi daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0202a0:327_10: Mālākārassa vicitramālāganthanaṃ viya gahapatino tathāgatassa vicitravaṇṇaganthanaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:328_0: Uṇhaṃ lohitaṃ mukhato uggañchīti tassa hi bhagavato sakkāraṃ asahamānassa etadahosi –
atk-s0202a0:328_2: sve paṭṭhāya paṇṇāsa saṭṭhi jane gahetvā etassa gharaṃ pavisitvā bhuñjituṃ na labhissāmi,
atk-s0202a0:328_5: Ime hi sattā attano attanova cintayanti.
atk-s0202a0:328_6: Tassa tasmiṃ soke uppanne abbhantaraṃ uṇhaṃ ahosi,
atk-s0202a0:328_8: taṃ mahāvātena samuddharitaṃ kuṭe pakkhittarajanaṃ viya pattamattaṃ mukhato uggañchi.
atk-s0202a0:328_9: Nidhānagatalohitaṃ vamitvā pana appakā sattā jīvituṃ sakkonti.
atk-s0202a0:328_11: atha naṃ pāṭaṅkiyā bahinagaraṃ nīharitvā mañcakasivikāya gahetvā pāvaṃ agamaṃsu,
atk-s0202a0:328_13: Imasmiṃ pana sutte ugghāṭitaññūpuggalassa vasena dhammadesanā pariniṭṭhitāti.
atk-s0202a0:332_3: So hi ekopi kolanagare patiṭṭhitānaṃ koliyānaṃ rājakumārānaṃ nivāsaṭṭhānattā evaṃ vuccati.
atk-s0202a0:332_5: Haliddavasananti tassa kira nigamassa māpitakāle pītakavatthanivatthā manussā nakkhattaṃ kīḷiṃsu.
atk-s0202a0:332_6: Te nakkhattakīḷāvasāne nigamassa nāmaṃ āropentā haliddavasananti nāmaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0202a0:332_9: tathāpi buddhānaṃ anucchavike senāsaneyeva vihāsīti veditabbo.
atk-s0202a0:332_11: sīse siṅgāni ṭhapetvā naṅguṭṭhaṃ bandhitvā gāvīhi saddhiṃ tiṇāni khādanto viya carati.
atk-s0202a0:333_3: Kukkurova palikujjitvāti sunakho nāma sāmikassa santike nisīdanto dvīhi pādehi bhūmiyaṃ vilekhitvā kukkurakūjitaṃ kūjanto nisīdati,
atk-s0202a0:333_4: ayampi “kukkurakiriyaṃ karissāmī”ti bhagavatā saddhiṃ sammoditvā dvīhi hatthehi bhūmiyaṃ vilekhitvā sīsaṃ
atk-s0202a0:333_5: vidhunanto ‘bhū bhū’ti katvā hatthapāde samiñjitvā sunakho viya nisīdi.
atk-s0202a0:333_10: Alanti tassa appiyaṃ bhavissatīti yāvatatiyaṃ paṭibāhati.
atk-s0202a0:334_5: Kukkuracittanti “ajja paṭṭhāya kukkurehi kātabbaṃ karissāmī”ti evaṃ uppannacittaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:334_11: aññe kukkure disvā dante vivaritvā gamanākāro atthi,
atk-s0202a0:334_14: Imināhaṃ sīlenātiādīsu ahaṃ iminā ācārena vā vatasamādānena vā dukkaratapacaraṇena vā methunaviratibrahmacariyena vāti attho.
atk-s0202a0:334_17: Micchādiṭṭhīti adevalokagāmimaggameva devalokagāmimaggoti gahetvā uppannatāya sā assa micchādiṭṭhi nāma hoti.
atk-s0202a0:334_18: Aññataraṃ gatiṃ vadāmīti tassa hi nirayato vā tiracchānayonito vā aññā gati natthi,
atk-s0202a0:335_2: yaṃ maṃ bhagavā evamāhāti yaṃ maṃ, bhante,
atk-s0202a0:335_4: ahametaṃ bhagavato byākaraṇaṃ na rodāmi na paridevāmi,
atk-s0202a0:336_0: “Mataṃ vā amma rodanti, yo vā jīvaṃ na dissati;
atk-s0202a0:337_0: Jīvantaṃ amma passantī, kasmā maṃ amma rodasī”ti. –
atk-s0202a0:338_2: bhanteti apica kho me idaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0202a0:338_6: Iti “ettakaṃ kālaṃ mayā katakammaṃ moghaṃ jāta”nti attano vipattiṃ paccavekkhamāno rodāmi, bhanteti.
atk-s0202a0:339_4: Yathā pana tattha aññe kukkure disvā dante vivaritvā gamanākāro,
atk-s0202a0:339_5: evamidha aññe gāvo disvā kaṇṇe ukkhipitvā gamanākāro veditabbo.
atk-s0202a0:340_1: Cattārimāni puṇṇa kammānīti kasmā imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi?
atk-s0202a0:340_3: imasmiñca kammacatukke kathite imesaṃ kiriyā pākaṭā bhavissatīti imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0202a0:340_4: Apica imaṃ kammacatukkameva desiyamānaṃ ime sañjānissanti,
atk-s0202a0:340_6: eko pabbajitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇissatīti ayameva etesaṃ sappāyāti ñatvāpi imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0202a0:341_6: Missakakammañhi katvā akusalena tiracchānayoniyaṃ maṅgalahatthiṭṭhānādīsu uppanno kusalena pavatte sukhaṃ vediyati.
atk-s0202a0:341_7: Kusalena rājakulepi nibbatto akusalena pavatte dukkhaṃ vediyati.
atk-s0202a0:341_13: Ubhayavipākassa pana adānato akaṇhāsukkavipākattā “akaṇhaṃ asukka”nti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:342_1: Kāyasaṅkhārādīsu kāyadvāre gahaṇādivasena copanappattā dvādasa akusalacetanā sabyābajjhakāyasaṅkhāro nāma.
atk-s0202a0:342_2: Vacīdvāre hanusañcopanavasena vacībhedapavattikā tāyeva dvādasa vacīsaṅkhāro nāma.
atk-s0202a0:342_3: Ubhayacopanaṃ appattā raho cintayantassa manodvāre pavattā manosaṅkhāro nāma.
atk-s0202a0:342_4: Iti tīsupi dvāresu kāyaduccaritādibhedā akusalacetanāva saṅkhārāti veditabbā.
atk-s0202a0:342_10: Sabyābajjhā phassā phusantīti sadukkhā vipākaphassā phusanti.
atk-s0202a0:342_16: tathābhūtena kammena kammasabhāgavasena tesaṃ upapatti hoti.
atk-s0202a0:342_18: Ettha ca tenāti kammena viya vuttā,
atk-s0202a0:342_21: tasmā tena mūlahetubhūtena kammena nibbattatīti ayamettha attho.
atk-s0202a0:342_24: Kammadāyādāti kammadāyajjā kammameva nesaṃ dāyajjaṃ santakanti vadāmi.
atk-s0202a0:343_1: Imasmiṃ vāre kāyadvāre pavattā aṭṭha kāmāvacarakusalacetanā kāyasaṅkhāro nāma.
atk-s0202a0:343_10: Iti tīsupi dvāresu kāyasucaritādibhedā kusalacetanāva saṅkhārāti veditabbo.
atk-s0202a0:344_0: Seyyathāpi manussātiādīsu manussānaṃ tāva kālena sukhaṃ kālena dukkhaṃ pākaṭameva,
atk-s0202a0:344_2: vinipātikesu vemānikapetānaṃ kālena sukhaṃ kālena dukkhaṃ hotīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:345_1: Tassa pahānāya yā cetanāti tassa pahānatthāya maggacetanā.
atk-s0202a0:345_2: Kammaṃ patvāva maggacetanāya añño paṇḍarataro dhammo nāma natthi.
atk-s0202a0:345_3: Idaṃ pana kammacatukkaṃ patvā dvādasa akusalacetanā kaṇhā nāma,
atk-s0202a0:346_2: bhante”ti idaṃ so “ciraṃ vata me aniyyānikapakkhe yojetvā attā kilamito,
atk-s0202a0:346_3: ‘sukkhanadītīre nhāyissāmī’ti samparivattentena viya thuse koṭṭentena viya ca na koci attho nipphādito,
atk-s0202a0:346_4: handāhaṃ attānaṃ yoge yojemī”ti cintetvā āha.
atk-s0202a0:346_5: Atha bhagavā yonena khandhake titthiyaparivāso paññatto,
atk-s0202a0:346_7: itthannāmo aññatitthiyapubbo imasmiṃ dhammavinaye ākaṅkhāmi upasampadaṃ, svāhaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0202a0:346_8: saṅghaṃ cattāro māse parivāsaṃ yācāmī”tiādinā nayena samādiyitvā parivasati,
atk-s0202a0:347_2: Upasampadatthikena pana nātikālena gāmappavesanādīni aṭṭha vattāni pūrentena parivasitabbaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:347_5: Vitthārato panesa titthiyaparivāso samantapāsādikāya vinayaṭṭhakathāya pabbajjakhandhakavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-s0202a0:347_9: ayaṃ na parivāsārahoti idaṃ mayhaṃ pākaṭanti dasseti.
atk-s0202a0:348_2: yattha evaṃ ghaṃsitvā koṭṭetvā yuttameva gaṇhanti,
atk-s0202a0:348_6: Atha bhagavā tassa tibbacchandataṃ viditvā na seniyo parivāsaṃ arahatīti aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ āmantesi –
atk-s0202a0:348_9: So tathā katvā taṃ pabbājetvā bhagavato santikaṃ ānayi.
atk-s0202a0:348_12: “alattha kho acelo seniyo bhagavato santike pabbajjaṃ alattha upasampada”nti.
atk-s0202a0:349_1: Vūpakaṭṭhoti vatthukāmakilesakāmehi kāyena ca cittena ca vūpakaṭṭho.
atk-s0202a0:349_4: Pahitattoti kāye ca jīvite ca anapekkhatāya pesitatto vissaṭṭhaattabhāvo.
atk-s0202a0:349_12: Sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvāti attanāyeva paññāya paccakkhaṃ katvā,
atk-s0202a0:350_0: Evamassa paccavekkhaṇabhūmiṃ dassetvā arahattanikūṭeneva desanaṃ niṭṭhāpetuṃ “aññataro kho panāyasmā seniyo arahataṃ ahosī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:350_3: bhagavato sāvakānaṃ arahantānaṃ abbhantaro ahosīti ayamevattha adhippāyo.
atk-s0202a0:354_8: Uggilitunti dve ante mocetvā kathetuṃ asakkonto uggilituṃ bahi nīharituṃ na sakkhiti.
atk-s0202a0:354_9: Ogilitunti pucchāya dosaṃ datvā hāretuṃ asakkonto ogilituṃ anto pavesetuṃ na sakkhiti.
atk-s0202a0:355_4: yaṃ puṭṭho samaṇo gotamo ukkuṭiko hutvā nisinno uṭṭhātuṃ na sakkhissatī”ti.
atk-s0202a0:355_5: So abhayassa gehā nīhaṭabhatto siniddhabhojanaṃ bhuñjanto bahū pañhe abhisaṅkharitvā –
atk-s0202a0:355_6: “ettha samaṇo gotamo imaṃ nāma dosaṃ dassessati,
atk-s0202a0:355_7: ettha imaṃ nāmā”ti sabbe pahāya cātumāsamatthake imaṃ pañhaṃ addasa.
atk-s0202a0:355_9: “imassa pañhassa pucchāya vā vissajjane vā na sakkā doso dātuṃ,
atk-s0202a0:355_11: ko nu kho imaṃ gahetvā samaṇassa gotamassa vādaṃ āropessatī”ti.
atk-s0202a0:355_13: so sakkhissatīti taṃ uggaṇhāpemī”ti niṭṭhaṃ gantvā uggaṇhāpesi.
atk-s0202a0:356_1: Akālo kho ajjāti ayaṃ pañho catūhi māsehi abhisaṅkhato,
atk-s0202a0:356_2: tattha idaṃ gahetvā idaṃ vissajjiyamāne divasabhāgo nappahossatīti maññanto evaṃ cintesi.
atk-s0202a0:356_4: Attacatutthoti kasmā bahūhi saddhiṃ na nimantesi?
atk-s0202a0:356_6: “bahūsu nisinnesu thokaṃ datvā vadantassa aññaṃ suttaṃ aññaṃ kāraṇaṃ aññaṃ tathārūpaṃ vatthuṃ āharitvā dassessati,
atk-s0202a0:356_7: evaṃ sante kalaho vā kolāhalameva vā bhavissati.
atk-s0202a0:356_9: evampi me garahā uppajjissati ‘yāvamaccharī vāyaṃ abhayo,
atk-s0202a0:356_10: bhagavantaṃ divase divase bhikkhūnaṃ satenapi sahassenapi saddhiṃ carantaṃ disvāpi ekakaṃyeva nimantesī”’ti.
atk-s0202a0:356_11: “Evaṃ pana doso na bhavissatī”ti aparehi tīhi saddhiṃ attacatutthaṃ nimantesi.
atk-s0202a0:357_6: Evarūpañhi vācaṃ tathāgato bhāseyyāpi na bhāseyyāpi.
atk-s0202a0:357_9: Iti bhagavā mahānigaṇṭhena catūhi māsehi abhisaṅkhataṃ pañhaṃ asanipātena pabbatakūṭaṃ viya ekavacaneneva saṃcuṇṇesi.
atk-s0202a0:358_1: Aṅke nisinno hotīti ūrūsu nisinno hoti.
atk-s0202a0:358_2: Lesavādino hi vādaṃ paṭṭhapentā kiñcideva phalaṃ vā pupphaṃ vā potthakaṃ vā gahetvā nisīdanti.
atk-s0202a0:358_3: Te attano jaye sati paraṃ ajjhottharanti,
atk-s0202a0:358_4: parassa jaye sati phalaṃ khādantā viya pupphaṃ ghāyantā viya potthakaṃ vācentā viya vikkhepaṃ dassenti.
atk-s0202a0:358_14: pacchāpi jānissāmā”ti tasmā dārakaṃ gahetvā nisīdi.
atk-s0202a0:358_15: Bhagavā pana rājakumārato sahassaguṇenapi satasahassaguṇenapi vādīvarataro,
atk-s0202a0:358_16: “imamevassa dārakaṃ upamaṃ katvā vādaṃ bhindissāmī”ti cintetvā “taṃ kiṃ maññasi rājakumārā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0202a0:359_6: Appiyā amanāpāti neva piyā na manāpā.
atk-s0202a0:360_7: idha ṭhatvāpi puna puññaṃ na karosi,
atk-s0202a0:360_8: dutiyacittavāre kathaṃ catūhi apāyehi na muccissasī”ti evaṃ mahājanassa atthapurekkhārena dhammapurekkhārena anusāsanīpurekkhārena ca vattabbavācā.
atk-s0202a0:360_9: Tatra kālaññū tathāgatoti tasmiṃ tatiyabyākaraṇe tassā vācāya byākaraṇatthāya tathāgato kālaññū hoti,
atk-s0202a0:360_10: mahājanassa ādānakālaṃ gahaṇakālaṃ jānitvāva byākarotīti attho.
atk-s0202a0:361_2: evaṃ kira gāmavāsimahallakaṃ nagaraṃ āgantvā pānāgāre pivantaṃ vañcetukāmā sambahulā dhuttā pītaṭṭhāne
atk-s0202a0:361_3: ṭhatvā tena saddhiṃ suraṃ pivantā “imassa nivāsanapāvuraṇampi hatthe bhaṇḍakampi sabbaṃ gaṇhissāmā”ti
atk-s0202a0:362_0: Eko dhutto āha – mayhaṃ, bho mātu,
atk-s0202a0:362_2: Sā aññaṃ kapiṭṭhahārakaṃ alabbhamānā maṃyeva pesesi.
atk-s0202a0:362_3: Ahaṃ gantvā rukkhaṃ abhiruhituṃ asakkonto attanāva attānaṃ pāde gahetvā muggaraṃ viya rukkhassa upari khipiṃ;
atk-s0202a0:362_4: atha sākhato sākhaṃ vicaranto phalāni gahetvā otarituṃ asakkonto gharaṃ gantvā nisseṇiṃ āharitvā oruyha mātu santikaṃ gantvā phalāni mātuyā adāsiṃ;
atk-s0202a0:362_6: Tato me mātarā ekāsane nisinnāya samasaṭṭhiphalāni khāditāni.
atk-s0202a0:362_7: Mayā ekucchaṅgena ānītaphalesu sesakāni kulasantake gāme khuddakamahallakānaṃ ahesuṃ.
atk-s0202a0:362_9: sesaparikkhārabhaṇḍakaṃ apanetvā kapiṭṭhaphaleheva yāva chadanaṃ pūritaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:362_10: Tato atirekāni gahetvā gehadvāre rāsiṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0202a0:363_0: Gāmikamahallako tuṇhī nisīditvā sabbesaṃ kathāpariyosāne pucchito āha –
atk-s0202a0:363_5: evaṃ sesehipi tathārūpāsu nikkāraṇakathāsu kathitāsu āha –
atk-s0202a0:363_10: Tassa anekakarīsasatassa kappāsakhettassa majjhe eko kappāsarukkho mahā asītihatthubbedho ahosi.
atk-s0202a0:363_16: Ahaṃ massuṃ kāretvā nhātavilitto khettaṃ gantvā tā kappāsapiṇḍiyo pupphitā disvā ṭhitakova hatthaṃ pasāretvā gaṇhiṃ.
atk-s0202a0:363_17: Tā kappāsapiṇḍiyo thāmasampannā cha dāsā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0202a0:363_18: Te sabbe maṃ ekakaṃ ohāya palātā.
atk-s0202a0:363_25: tvaṃ citto nāma tvaṃ maṅgalo nāma,
atk-s0202a0:363_26: tvaṃ poṭṭhiyo nāmāti vatvā uṭṭhāya nisinnakeyeva cūḷāsu gahetvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0202a0:363_28: Atha ne kaḍḍhanto vinicchayaṃ netvā lakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā yāvajīvaṃ dāse katvā paribhuñji.
atk-s0202a0:364_0: Dutiyavācā āmisahetucāṭukamyatādivasena nānappakārā paresaṃ thomanavācā ceva,
atk-s0202a0:364_4: yaṃ vassasatampi suṇantā paṇḍitā neva tittiṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0202a0:364_5: Iti tathāgato neva sabbampi appiyavācaṃ bhāsati na piyavācaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:364_6: Tatiyaṃ tatiyameva pana bhāsitabbakālaṃ anatikkamitvā bhāsati.
atk-s0202a0:364_7: Tattha tatiyaṃ appiyavācaṃ sandhāya heṭṭhā daharakumāraupamā āgatāti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:365_1: Udāhu ṭhānasovetanti udāhu ṭhānuppattikañāṇena taṅkhaṇaṃyeva taṃ tathāgatassa upaṭṭhātīti pucchati.
atk-s0202a0:369_2: Tattha pañcakaṅgo thapatīti pañcakaṅgoti tassa nāmaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:369_3: Vāsipharasunikhādanadaṇḍamuggarakāḷasuttanāḷisaṅkhātehi vā aṅgehi samannāgatattā so pañcaṅgoti paññāto.
atk-s0202a0:370_8: upavicāravasena “cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā somanassaṭṭhāniyaṃ rūpaṃ upavicaratī”tiādikā aṭṭhārasa,
atk-s0202a0:371_3: Na kevalampi dve ādiṃ katvā vedanā bhagavatā paññattā,
atk-s0202a0:371_5: Taṃ dassento pañcakaṅgassa thapatino vādaṃ upatthambhetuṃ imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0202a0:372_2: Ettha ca catutthajjhānato paṭṭhāya adukkhamasukhā vedanā,
atk-s0202a0:372_3: sāpi santaṭṭhena paṇītaṭṭhena ca sukhanti vuttā.
atk-s0202a0:372_6: Pañcakāmaguṇavasena hi aṭṭhasamāpattivasena ca uppannaṃ vedayitasukhaṃ nāma.
atk-s0202a0:372_8: Iti vedayitasukhaṃ vā hotu avedayitasukhaṃ vā,
atk-s0202a0:373_2: Sukhaṃ upalabbhatīti vedayitasukhaṃ vā avedayitasukhaṃ vā upalabbhati.
atk-s0202a0:373_3: Taṃ taṃ tathāgato sukhasmiṃ paññapetīti taṃ sabbaṃ tathāgato niddukkhabhāvaṃ sukhasmiṃyeva paññapetīti.
atk-s0202a0:373_4: Idha bhagavā nirodhasamāpattiṃ sīsaṃ katvā neyyapuggalavasena arahattanikūṭeneva desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesīti.
atk-s0202a0:377_0: 92. Evaṃ me sutanti apaṇṇakasuttaṃ. Tattha cārikanti aturitacārikaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:378_1: Atthi pana vo gahapatayoti kasmā āha?
atk-s0202a0:378_3: Nānāvidhā samaṇabrāhmaṇā divasaṃ maggaṃ gantvā sāyaṃ taṃ gāmaṃ vāsatthāya upenti,
atk-s0202a0:378_4: tesaṃ te manussā mañcapīṭhāni pattharitvā pāde dhovitvā pāde makkhetvā kappiyapānakāni datvā punadivase nimantetvā dānaṃ denti.
atk-s0202a0:378_5: Te pasannacittā tehi saddhiṃ sammantayamānā evaṃ vadanti “atthi pana vo gahapatayo kiñci dassanaṃ gahita”nti? Natthi, bhanteti.
atk-s0202a0:378_7: ekaṃ dassanaṃ ruccitvā khamāpetvā gahetuṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-s0202a0:378_12: purimesu divasesu tumhādisā samaṇabrāhmaṇā āgantvā ‘sassato loko’ti amhe idaṃ dassanaṃ gāhāpetvā gatā”ti ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0202a0:378_14: ‘Ucchijjati ayaṃ loko’ti ucchedadassanaṃ gaṇhathā”ti evaṃ tepi ucchedadassanaṃ gaṇhāpetvā pakkantā.
atk-s0202a0:378_17: aññe amarāvikkhepanti evaṃ dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhiyo uggaṇhāpesuṃ.
atk-s0202a0:378_20: So tesaṃ hitatthāya pucchanto “atthi pana vo gahapatayo”tiādimāha.
atk-s0202a0:379_1: Natthi dinnantiādi dasavatthukā micchādiṭṭhi heṭṭhā sāleyyakasutte vitthāritā.
atk-s0202a0:380_1: Nekkhamme ānisaṃsanti yo nesaṃ akusalato nikkhantabhāve ānisaṃso,
atk-s0202a0:380_5: Attānukkaṃsetīti ṭhapetvā maṃ ko añño attano dassanaṃ pare gaṇhāpetuṃ sakkotīti attānaṃ ukkhipati.
atk-s0202a0:380_6: Paraṃ vambhetīti ettakesu janesu ekopi attano dassanaṃ pare gaṇhāpetuṃ na sakkotīti evaṃ paraṃ heṭṭhā khipati.
atk-s0202a0:380_7: Pubbeva kho panāti pubbe micchādassanaṃ gaṇhantasseva susīlyaṃ pahīnaṃ hoti,
atk-s0202a0:380_9: Evamassimeti evaṃ assa ime micchādiṭṭhiādayo satta.
atk-s0202a0:380_10: Aparāparaṃ uppajjanavasena pana teyeva micchādiṭṭhipaccayā aneke pāpakā akusalā dhammā uppajjanti nāma.
atk-s0202a0:381_3: Ekaṃsaṃ pharitvā tiṭṭhatīti ekantaṃ ekakoṭṭhāsaṃ sakavādameva pharitvā adhimuccitvā tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0202a0:381_4: “sace kho natthi paro loko”ti evaṃ santeyeva sotthibhāvāvaho hoti.
atk-s0202a0:383_2: Ubhayaṃsaṃ pharitvā tiṭṭhatīti ubhayantaṃ ubhayakoṭṭhāsaṃ sakavādaṃ paravādañca pharitvā adhimuccitvā
atk-s0202a0:383_3: tiṭṭhati “sace kho atthi paro loko”ti evaṃ santepi “sace kho natthi paro loko”ti evaṃ santepi sotthibhāvāvaho hoti.
atk-s0202a0:383_4: Paratopi ekaṃsaubhayaṃsesu imināva nayena attho veditabbo.
atk-s0202a0:384_4: Pacatoti daṇḍena pīḷentassa vā tajjentassa vā.
atk-s0202a0:384_5: Socayatoti parassa bhaṇḍaharaṇādīhi sokaṃ sayaṃ karontassapi parehi kārentassapi.
atk-s0202a0:384_8: Phandato phandāpayatoti paraṃ phandantaṃ phandanakāle sayampi phandato parampi phandāpayato.
atk-s0202a0:385_3: Paripanthe tiṭṭhatoti āgatāgatānaṃ acchindanatthaṃ magge tiṭṭhato.
atk-s0202a0:385_4: Karoto na karīyati pāpanti yaṃkiñci pāpaṃ karomīti saññāya karotopi pāpaṃ na karīyati,
atk-s0202a0:385_6: Sattā pana karomāti evaṃsaññino hontīti attho.
atk-s0202a0:385_14: Uttaratīre saddhā honti pasannā buddhamāmakā dhammamāmakā saṅghamāmakā,
atk-s0202a0:387_1: Natthi hetu natthi paccayoti ettha paccayo hetuvevacanaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:387_6: natthi purisaparakkamoti sattānaṃ saṃkilesituṃ vā visujjhituṃ vā balaṃ vā vīriyaṃ vā purisena kātabbo nāma purisathāmo vā purisaparakkamo vā natthi.
atk-s0202a0:388_1: Sabbe pāṇāti ekindriyo pāṇo dvindriyo pāṇoti ādivasena vadanti.
atk-s0202a0:388_2: Sabbe bhūtāti aṇḍakosavatthikosesu bhūte sandhāya vadanti.
atk-s0202a0:388_5: Avasā abalā avīriyāti tesaṃ attano vaso vā balaṃ vā vīriyaṃ vā natthi.
atk-s0202a0:388_7: Saṅgatīti channaṃ abhijātīnaṃ tattha tattha gamanaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:388_9: Evaṃ niyatiyā ca saṅgatiyā ca bhāvena ca pariṇatā nānappakārataṃ pattā.
atk-s0202a0:388_14: Chasvevābhijātīsūti chasu eva abhijātīsu ṭhatvā sukhañca dukkhañca paṭisaṃvedenti,
atk-s0202a0:389_0: Tattha cha abhijātiyo nāma kaṇhābhijāti nīlābhijāti lohitābhijāti haliddābhijāti sukkābhijāti paramasukkābhijātīti.
atk-s0202a0:389_1: Tattha sākuṇiko sūkariko luddo macchaghātako coro coraghātako,
atk-s0202a0:389_5: Te kira catūsu paccayesu kaṇṭake pakkhipitvā khādanti.
atk-s0202a0:389_7: Atha vā kaṇṭakavuttikā evaṃ nāma eke pabbajitāti vadanti.
atk-s0202a0:389_12: Iti attano paccayadāyake nigaṇṭhehipi jeṭṭhakatare karonti. Nando, vaccho, saṅkicco,
atk-s0202a0:390_0: Tattha sabbe sattā paṭhamaṃ sākuṇikādayova honti,
atk-s0202a0:391_0: Imāsu pana tīsu diṭṭhīsu natthikadiṭṭhi vipākaṃ paṭibāhati,
atk-s0202a0:391_3: Tattha kammaṃ paṭibāhantenāpi vipāko paṭibāhito hoti,
atk-s0202a0:391_5: Iti sabbepete atthato ubhayapaṭibāhakā natthikavādā ceva ahetukavādā akiriyavādā ca honti.
atk-s0202a0:391_6: Ye pana tesaṃ laddhiṃ gahetvā rattiṭṭhāne divāṭṭhāne nisinnā sajjhāyanti vīmaṃsanti, tesaṃ –
atk-s0202a0:391_9: natthi hetu natthi paccayo”ti tasmiṃ ārammaṇe micchāsati santiṭṭhati,
atk-s0202a0:392_0: Tattha koci ekaṃ dassanaṃ okkamati, koci dve,
atk-s0202a0:392_2: ekasmiṃ okkantepi dvīsu tīsu okkantesupi niyatamicchādiṭṭhikova hoti,
atk-s0202a0:392_4: abhabbo tassa attabhāvassa anantaraṃ saggampi gantuṃ,
atk-s0202a0:392_7: Kiṃ panesa ekasmiṃyeva attabhāve niyato hoti,
atk-s0202a0:392_10: āsevanavasena pana bhavantarepi taṃ taṃ diṭṭhiṃ rocetiyeva.
atk-s0202a0:392_11: Evarūpassa hi yebhuyyena bhavato vuṭṭhānaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-s0202a0:395_1: Natthi sabbaso āruppāti arūpabrahmaloko nāma sabbākārena natthi.
atk-s0202a0:395_4: Rūpānaṃyeva nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipanno hotīti ayaṃ lābhī vā hoti takkī vā.
atk-s0202a0:395_8: “ahaṃ āruppā atthīti vadantānampi natthīti vadantānampi suṇāmi,
atk-s0202a0:395_15: Evaṃ me apaṇṇako dhammo apaṇṇakova aviraddhova bhavissatī”ti tathā paṭipajjati.
atk-s0202a0:395_19: “ahaṃ āruppā atthīti vadantānampi natthīti vadantānampi suṇāmi,
atk-s0202a0:395_21: Kasiṇaparikammaṃ katvā catutthajjhānaṃ nibbattetvā taṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ katvā arūpāvacarajjhānaṃ nibbattessāmi.
atk-s0202a0:395_26: Evaṃ me apaṇṇako dhammo apaṇṇakova aviraddhova bhavissatī”ti tathā paṭipajjati.
atk-s0202a0:396_2: Sārāgāya santiketi rāgavasena vaṭṭe rajjanassa santike.
atk-s0202a0:396_5: Paṭipanno hotīti ayampi lābhī vā hoti takkī vā.
atk-s0202a0:396_21: kasiṇaparikammaṃ katvā aṭṭhasamāpattiyo nibbattetvā samāpattipadaṭṭhānaṃ vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhessāmi.
atk-s0202a0:396_29: Tāni hi apaṇṇakaṃ apaṇṇakanti evaṃ gahitattā apaṇṇakāni nāma jātāni.
atk-s0202a0:397_4: āruppā natthi nirodho natthīti evaṃvādino ca dveti ime pañca puggalā heṭṭhā tayo puggalāva honti.
atk-s0202a0:397_6: Etamatthaṃ dassetuṃ bhagavā imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0202a0:402_2: Tattha ambalaṭṭhikāyaṃ viharatīti veḷuvanavihārassa paccante padhānagharasaṅkhepe vivekakāmānaṃ vasanatthāya
atk-s0202a0:402_3: kate ambalaṭṭhikāti evaṃnāmake pāsāde pavivekaṃ brūhayanto viharati.
atk-s0202a0:402_4: Kaṇṭako nāma jātakālato paṭṭhāya tikhiṇova hoti,
atk-s0202a0:402_5: evamevaṃ ayampi āyasmā sattavassikasāmaṇerakāleyeva pavivekaṃ brūhayamāno tattha vihāsi.
atk-s0202a0:403_1: Bhagavatā hi rāhulattherassa sambahulā dhammadesanā katā.
atk-s0202a0:404_0: Ayañhi āyasmā sattavassikakāle bhagavantaṃ cīvarakaṇṇe gahetvā “dāyajjaṃ me samaṇa dehī”ti dāyajjaṃ yācamāno
atk-s0202a0:404_2: Atha bhagavā daharakumārā nāma yuttāyuttaṃ kathaṃ kathenti,
atk-s0202a0:404_3: ovādamassa demīti rāhulakumāraṃ āmantetvā “sāmaṇerena nāma, rāhula,
atk-s0202a0:404_5: tvaṃ kathayamāno evarūpaṃ kathaṃ katheyyāsī”ti sabbabuddhehi avijahitaṃ dasapucchaṃ pañcapaṇṇāsavissajjanaṃ –
atk-s0202a0:404_6: “eko pañho eko uddeso ekaṃ veyyākaraṇaṃ dve pañhā…pe…
atk-s0202a0:404_7: dasa pañhā dasa uddesā dasa veyyākaraṇāti.
atk-s0202a0:404_11: Dasahaṅgehi samannāgato arahāti vuccatī”ti imaṃ sāmaṇerapañhaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0202a0:404_14: diṭṭhameva na diṭṭhaṃ amhehīti vadanti ovādamassa demī”ti akkhīhi oloketvāpi sukhasañjānanatthaṃ paṭhamameva catasso udakādhānūpamāyo,
atk-s0202a0:404_15: tato dve hatthiupamāyo ekaṃ ādāsūpamañca dassetvā imaṃ suttaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0202a0:404_16: Catūsu pana paccayesu taṇhāvivaṭṭanaṃ pañcasu kāmaguṇesu chandarāgappahānaṃ kalyāṇamittupanissayassa mahantabhāvañca dassetvā rāhulasuttaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0202a0:404_17: Āgatāgataṭṭhāne bhavesu chandarāgo na kattabboti dassetuṃ rāhulasaṃyuttaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0202a0:404_19: mama vaṇṇāyatanaṃ pasanna”nti attabhāvaṃ nissāya gehassitachandarāgo na kattabboti mahārāhulovādasuttaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0202a0:405_0: Tattha rāhulasuttaṃ imasmiṃ nāma kāle vuttanti na vattabbaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:405_2: Rāhulasaṃyuttaṃ sattavassikakālato paṭṭhāya yāva avassikabhikkhukālā vuttaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:405_13: Idañca pana sandhāya rāhulatthero bhikkhusaṅghamajjhe tathāgatassa guṇaṃ kathento idamāha –
atk-s0202a0:410_2: rañño nāgoti ayaṃ upamā sampajānamusāvāde saṃvararahitassa opammadassanatthaṃ vuttā.
atk-s0202a0:410_8: Puratthimakāyādīsu pana puratthimakāyena tāva paṭisenāya phalakakoṭṭhakamuṇḍapākārādayo pāteti,
atk-s0202a0:410_10: Sīsena kammaṃ nāma niyametvā etaṃ padesaṃ maddissāmīti nivattitvā oloketi,
atk-s0202a0:410_12: Kaṇṇehi kammaṃ nāma āgatāgate sare kaṇṇehi paharitvā pātanaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:410_14: Naṅguṭṭhena kammaṃ nāma naṅguṭṭhe bandhāya dīghāsilaṭṭhiyā vā ayamusalena vā chedanabhedanaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:410_15: Rakkhateva soṇḍanti soṇḍaṃ pana mukhe pakkhipitvā rakkhati.
atk-s0202a0:411_2: paresaṃ jayaṃ amhākañca parājayaṃ passīti maññati.
atk-s0202a0:411_3: Soṇḍāyapi kammaṃ karotīti ayamuggaraṃ vā khadiramusalaṃ vā gahetvā samantā aṭṭhārasahatthaṭṭhānaṃ maddati.
atk-s0202a0:411_6: amhākaṃ jayaṃ paresañca parājayaṃ passīti maññati.
atk-s0202a0:411_7: Nāhaṃ tassa kiñci pāpanti tassa dukkaṭādiāpattivītikkame vā mātughātakādikammesu vā kiñci pāpaṃ akattabbaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-s0202a0:411_8: Tasmā tiha teti yasmā sampajānamusāvādino akattabbaṃ pāpaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-s0202a0:411_9: tasmā tayā hasāyapi davakamyatāyapi musā na bhaṇissāmīti sikkhitabbaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:412_1: Sasakkaṃ na karaṇīyanti ekaṃseneva na kātabbaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:413_3: Jigucchitabbanti gūthaṃ disvā viya jigucchā uppādetabbā.
atk-s0202a0:413_4: Manokammassa pana adesanāvatthukattā idha desetabbanti na vuttaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:413_8: Bhattakiccaṃ katvā divāṭṭhāne nisinnena hi paccavekkhitabbaṃ “aruṇuggamanato paṭṭhāya yāva imasmiṃ ṭhāne
atk-s0202a0:413_9: nisajjā atthi nu kho me imasmiṃ antare paresaṃ appiyaṃ kāyakammaṃ vā vacīkammaṃ vā”ti.
atk-s0202a0:413_15: Manokammaṃ pana etasmiṃ piṇḍapātapariyesanaṭṭhāne sodhetabbaṃ. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0202a0:413_16: “Atthi nu kho me ajja piṇḍapātapariyesanaṭṭhāne rūpādīsu chando vā rāgo vā paṭighaṃ vā”ti?
atk-s0202a0:414_1: Samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vāti buddhā vā paccekabuddhā vā tathāgatasāvakā vā.
atk-s0202a0:414_5: tasmā tumhehipi tesaṃ anusikkhantehi evaṃ sikkhitabbanti attho.
atk-s0202a0:414_7: Imaṃ pana desanaṃ bhagavā yāva bhavaggā ussitassa ratanarāsino yojaniyamaṇikkhandhena kūṭaṃ gaṇhanto viya neyyapuggalavasena pariniṭṭhāpesīti.
atk-s0202a0:418_2: Tattha piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandhīti dassanaṃ avijahitvā gamanaṃ abbocchinnaṃ katvā pacchato pacchato iriyāpathānubandhanena anubandhi.
atk-s0202a0:418_3: Tadā hi bhagavā pade padaṃ nikkhipanto vilāsitagamanena purato purato gacchati,
atk-s0202a0:418_4: rāhulatthero dasabalassa padānupadiko hutvā pacchato pacchato.
atk-s0202a0:419_0: Tattha bhagavā supupphitasālavanamajjhagato subhūmiotaraṇatthāya nikkhantamattavaravāraṇo viya virocittha,
atk-s0202a0:419_1: rāhulabhaddo ca varavāraṇassa pacchato nikkhantagajapotako viya.
atk-s0202a0:419_2: Bhagavā sāyanhasamaye maṇiguhato nikkhamitvā gocaraṃ paṭipanno kesarasīho viya,
atk-s0202a0:419_3: rāhulabhaddo ca sīhamigarājānaṃ anubandhanto nikkhantasīhapotako viya.
atk-s0202a0:419_7: rāhulabhaddo ca supaṇṇarājassa pacchato nikkhantasupaṇṇapotako viya.
atk-s0202a0:419_11: rāhulabhaddo ca suvaṇṇanāvaṃ pacchā anubandhanāvāpotako viya.
atk-s0202a0:419_15: rāhulabhaddo ca tārakādhipatino anumaggapaṭipannā parisuddhaosadhitārakā viya.
atk-s0202a0:420_6: Bhagavatopi sarīraṃ dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ devanagaresu samussitaratanatoraṇaṃ viya
atk-s0202a0:420_13: dvepi lakkhaṇasampannā ekamaggaṃ paṭipannā paṭipāṭiyā gacchantānaṃ dvinnaṃ candamaṇḍalānaṃ dvinnaṃ sūriyamaṇḍalānaṃ
atk-s0202a0:420_14: dvinnaṃ sakkasuyāmasantusitasunimmitavasavattimahābrahmādīnaṃ siriyā siriṃ abhibhavamānā viya virociṃsu.
atk-s0202a0:421_0: Tatrāyasmā rāhulo bhagavato piṭṭhito piṭṭhito gacchantova pādatalato yāva upari kesantā tathāgataṃ ālokesi.
atk-s0202a0:421_1: So bhagavato buddhavesavilāsaṃ disvā “sobhati bhagavā dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇavicittasarīro byāmappabhāparikkhittatāya
atk-s0202a0:421_13: Sace bhagavā catūsu mahādīpesu cakkavattirajjaṃ akarissā,
atk-s0202a0:421_15: Evaṃ sante ativiya jambudīpatalaṃ asobhissā”ti attabhāvaṃ nissāya gehassitaṃ chandarāgaṃ uppādesi.
atk-s0202a0:422_2: Rajanīyesu rūpārammaṇādīsu hi cittassa pakkhandanakālo jāto,
atk-s0202a0:422_3: kiṃ bahulatāya nu kho rāhulo vītināmetī”ti.
atk-s0202a0:422_5: parisuddhe ādāsamaṇḍale mukhanimittaṃ viya ca tassa taṃ cittuppādaṃ addasa. Disvāva –
atk-s0202a0:422_6: “ayaṃ rāhulo mayhaṃ atrajo hutvā mama pacchato āgacchanto ‘ahaṃ sobhāmi,
atk-s0202a0:422_7: mayhaṃ vaṇṇāyatanaṃ pasanna’nti attabhāvaṃ nissāya gehassitachandarāgaṃ uppādeti,
atk-s0202a0:422_8: atitthe pakkhando uppathaṃ paṭipanno agocare carati,
atk-s0202a0:422_10: Ayaṃ kho panassa kileso abbhantare vaḍḍhanto attatthampi yathābhūtaṃ passituṃ na dassati,
atk-s0202a0:422_17: sambādhepi mātukucchisminti anamatagge saṃsāravaṭṭe paripātessati. Ayañhi –
atk-s0202a0:425_0: Luddho atthaṃ na jānāti, luddho dhammaṃ na passati;
atk-s0202a0:426_0: Andhatamaṃ tadā hoti, yaṃ lobho sahate naraṃ. –
atk-s0202a0:427_0: Yathā kho pana anekaratanapūrā mahānāvā bhinnaphalakantarena udakaṃ ādiyamānā muhuttampi na ajjhupekkhitabbā hoti,
atk-s0202a0:427_3: Yāvassa ayaṃ kileso abbhantare sīlaratanādīni na vināseti,
atk-s0202a0:427_5: Evarūpesu pana ṭhānesu buddhānaṃ nāgavilokanaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0202a0:427_6: Tasmā yantena parivattitasuvaṇṇapaṭimā viya sakalakāyeneva parivattetvā ṭhito rāhulabhaddaṃ āmantesi.
atk-s0202a0:427_7: Taṃ sandhāya “atha kho bhagavā apaloketvā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:428_0: Tattha yaṃkiñci rūpantiādīni sabbākārena visuddhimagge khandhaniddese vitthāritāni.
atk-s0202a0:428_2: Rūpameva nu kho bhagavāti kasmā pucchati?
atk-s0202a0:428_6: “bhagavā sabbaṃ rūpaṃ vipassanāpaññāya evaṃ daṭṭhabbanti vadati,
atk-s0202a0:428_7: vedanādīsu nu kho kathaṃ paṭipajjitabba”nti nayo udapādi.
atk-s0202a0:428_10: idaṃ na kattabbanti vutte idampi na kattabbaṃ idampi na kattabbamevāti nayasatenapi nayasahassenapi paṭivijjhati.
atk-s0202a0:429_2: “ajja sammāsambuddhassa santikā mayhaṃ upajjhāyassa santikā ettakaṃ ovādaṃ ettakaṃ paribhāsaṃ labhāmī”ti.
atk-s0202a0:429_6: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhākāmānaṃ yadidaṃ rāhulo”ti sikkhāyameva aggaṃ katvā ṭhapesi.
atk-s0202a0:429_7: Sopi āyasmā bhikkhusaṅghamajjhe tameva sīhanādaṃ nadi –
atk-s0202a0:434_0: Dhammarājā pitā mayhaṃ, dhammārakkho ca pettiyo;
atk-s0202a0:436_0: Athassa bhagavā yasmā na kevalaṃ rūpameva,
atk-s0202a0:436_4: Therassa kira etadahosi “sammāsambuddho mayhaṃ attabhāvanissitaṃ chandarāgaṃ ñatvā ‘samaṇena nāma evarūpo
atk-s0202a0:436_5: vitakko na vitakkitabbo’ti neva pariyāyena kathaṃ kathesi,
atk-s0202a0:436_6: gaccha bhikkhu rāhulaṃ vadehi ‘mā puna evarūpaṃ vitakkaṃ vitakkesī’ti na dūtaṃ pesesi.
atk-s0202a0:436_7: Maṃ sammukkhe ṭhatvāyeva pana sabhaṇḍakaṃ coraṃ cūḷāya gaṇhanto viya sammukhā sugatovādaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0202a0:436_8: Sugatovādo ca nāma asaṅkheyyehipi kappehi dullabho.
atk-s0202a0:436_9: Evarūpassa buddhassa sammukhā ovādaṃ labhitvā ko nu viññū paṇḍitajātiko ajja gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisissatī”ti.
atk-s0202a0:436_10: Athesa āyasmā āhārakiccaṃ pahāya yasmiṃ nisinnaṭṭhāne ṭhitena ovādo laddho,
atk-s0202a0:436_12: Bhagavāpi taṃ āyasmantaṃ nivattamānaṃ disvā na evamāha –
atk-s0202a0:437_0: Addasā kho āyasmā sāriputtoti bhagavati gate pacchā gacchanto addasa.
atk-s0202a0:437_1: Etassa kirāyasmato ekakassa viharato aññaṃ vattaṃ,
atk-s0202a0:437_3: Yadā hi dve aggasāvakā ekākino vasanti,
atk-s0202a0:437_4: tadā pātova senāsanaṃ sammajjitvā sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ katvā samāpattiṃ appetvā sannisinnā attano cittaruciyā bhikkhācāraṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0202a0:437_5: Bhagavatā saddhiṃ viharantā pana therā evaṃ na karonti.
atk-s0202a0:437_6: Tadā hi bhagavā bhikkhusaṅghaparivāro paṭhamaṃ bhikkhācāraṃ gacchati.
atk-s0202a0:437_7: Tasmiṃ gate thero attano senāsanā nikkhamitvā –
atk-s0202a0:437_8: “bahūnaṃ vasanaṭṭhāne nāma sabbeva pāsādikaṃ kātuṃ sakkonti vā,
atk-s0202a0:437_9: na vā sakkontī”ti tattha tattha gantvā asammaṭṭhaṃ ṭhānaṃ sammajjati.
atk-s0202a0:437_21: Yathā hi cakkavatti kuhiñci gantukāmo senāya parivārito paṭhamaṃ nikkhamati,
atk-s0202a0:437_23: evaṃ saddhammacakkavatti bhagavā bhikkhusaṅghaparivāro paṭhamaṃ nikkhamati,
atk-s0202a0:437_24: tassa bhagavato pariṇāyakaratanabhūto dhammasenāpati imaṃ kiccaṃ katvā sabbapacchā nikkhamati.
atk-s0202a0:437_25: So evaṃ nikkhanto tasmiṃ divase aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle nisinnaṃ rāhulabhaddaṃ addasa.
atk-s0202a0:438_2: Thero kira “etassa bhagavatā rūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ kathita”nti anāvajjitvāva yenākārena ayaṃ acalo anobaddho hutvā nisinno,
atk-s0202a0:438_3: idamassa etissā nisajjāya kammaṭṭhānaṃ anucchavikanti cintetvā evamāha.
atk-s0202a0:438_4: Tattha ānāpānassatinti assāsapassāse pariggahetvā tattha catukkapañcakajjhānaṃ nibbattetvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ gaṇhāhīti dasseti.
atk-s0202a0:439_1: Idha bhikkhu ānāpānassatiṃ anuyutto ekāsane nisinnova sabbāsave khepetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0202a0:439_3: tathā asakkonto devaloke nibbattitvā dhammakathikadevaputtassa dhammaṃ sutvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0202a0:439_4: tato viraddho anuppanne buddhuppāde paccekabodhiṃ sacchikaroti,
atk-s0202a0:439_5: taṃ asacchikaronto buddhānaṃ sammukhībhāve bāhiyattherādayo viya khippābhiñño hoti,
atk-s0202a0:442_0: Somaṃ lokaṃ pabhāseti, abbhā muttova candimā”ti. –
atk-s0202a0:443_0: Imaṃ mahapphalataṃ sampassamāno thero saddhivihārikaṃ tattha niyojeti.
atk-s0202a0:444_1: thero ānāpānassatinti ubhopi kammaṭṭhānaṃ ācikkhitvā gatā,
atk-s0202a0:444_3: Bhagavā tassa ohīnabhāvaṃ jānantopi neva attanā khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ gahetvā agamāsi,
atk-s0202a0:444_11: “bhagavā maṃ vihāre ohīnaṃ jānantopi attanā laddhapiṇḍapātaṃ nāpi sayaṃ gahetvā āgato,
atk-s0202a0:444_14: upajjhāyopi me ohīnabhāvaṃ jānanto tatheva na kiñci akāsī”ti cittampi na uppannaṃ,
atk-s0202a0:444_15: kuto tappaccayā omānaṃ vā atimānaṃ vā janessati.
atk-s0202a0:444_20: itipi anattā”ti aggiṃ abhimatthento viya nirantaraṃ manasikatvā sāyanhasamaye cintesi –
atk-s0202a0:444_23: Ācariyupajjhāyānañhi vacanaṃ akaronto dubbaco nāma hoti.
atk-s0202a0:444_25: upajjhāyassapi vacanaṃ na karotī’ti ca garahuppattito kakkhaḷatarā pīḷā nāma natthī”ti bhāvanāvidhānaṃ pucchitukāmo bhagavato santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0202a0:444_26: Taṃ dassetuṃ atha kho āyasmā rāhulotiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:445_8: Idānissāpi dvicattālīsāya ākārehi attabhāvaṃ virājetvā visaṅkharitvā taṃnissitaṃ chandarāgaṃ anuppattidhammataṃ āpādessāmī”ti.
atk-s0202a0:445_13: Tasmā iminā mukhena taṃ dassetuṃ ākāsadhātuṃ vitthāresi.
atk-s0202a0:445_14: Apica ajjhattikena ākāsena paricchinnarūpampi pākaṭaṃ hoti.
atk-s0202a0:448_0: Ettha pana purimāsu tāva catūsu dhātūsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ mahāhatthipadopame vuttameva.
atk-s0202a0:449_8: jivhābandhanato hi yāva udarapaṭalā manussānaṃ vidatthicaturaṅgulaṃ chiddaṭṭhānaṃ hoti.
atk-s0202a0:449_12: Manussānañhi mahantaṃ paṭaparissāvanamattañca udarapaṭalaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0202a0:449_15: Dvattiṃsahatthamattaṃ ekavīsatiyā ṭhānesu vaṅkaṃ antaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0202a0:449_17: Yaṃ vā panaññampīti iminā sukhumasukhumaṃ cammamaṃsādiantaragatañceva lomakūpabhāvena ca ṭhitaṃ ākāsaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0202a0:450_2: Iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu hi arajjanto adussanto tādī nāma hoti.
atk-s0202a0:450_3: Manāpāmanāpāti ettha aṭṭha lobhasahagatacittasampayuttā manāpā nāma,
atk-s0202a0:450_5: Cittaṃ na pariyādāya ṭhassantīti ete phassā uppajjitvā tava cittaṃ antomuṭṭhigataṃ karonto viya pariyādāya
atk-s0202a0:450_7: mayhaṃ vaṇṇāyatanaṃ pasanna”nti puna attabhāvaṃ nissāya chandarāgo nuppajjissati.
atk-s0202a0:451_0: Na katthaci patiṭṭhitoti pathavīpabbatarukkhādīsu ekasmimpi na patiṭṭhito,
atk-s0202a0:452_4: na ca sakkā ahaṃ tādī homīti akāraṇā bhavituṃ,
atk-s0202a0:452_7: ahaṃ tādī homī”ti imehi kāraṇehi koci tādī nāma hoti,
atk-s0202a0:452_8: mettādibhāvanāya pana hotīti tādibhāvassa kāraṇadassanatthaṃ imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0202a0:453_0: Tattha bhāvayatoti upacāraṃ vā appanaṃ vā pāpentassa.
atk-s0202a0:453_4: Aratīti pantasenāsanesu ceva adhikusaladhammesu ca ukkaṇṭhitatā.
atk-s0202a0:453_5: Paṭighoti yattha katthaci sattesu saṅkhāresu ca paṭihaññanakileso.
atk-s0202a0:453_7: Uddhumātakādīsu asubhabhāvanā ca nāmesā vitthārato visuddhimagge kathitāva.
atk-s0202a0:453_10: Vipassanā eva vā esā asaññāpi saññāsīsena saññāti vuttā.
atk-s0202a0:454_1: Idāni therena pucchitaṃ pañhaṃ vitthārento ānāpānassatintiādimāha.
atk-s0202a0:454_2: Tattha idaṃ kammaṭṭhānañca kammaṭṭhānabhāvanā ca pāḷiattho ca saddhiṃ ānisaṃsakathāya sabbo sabbākārena visuddhimagge anussatiniddese vitthāritoyeva.
atk-s0202a0:458_3: Ṭhapitāni paṭikkhittānīti diṭṭhigatāni nāma na byākātabbānīti evaṃ ṭhapitāni ceva paṭikkhittāni ca.
atk-s0202a0:458_5: Taṃ me na ruccatīti taṃ abyākaraṇaṃ mayhaṃ na ruccati.
atk-s0202a0:459_1: Ko santo kaṃ paccācikkhasīti yācako vā hi yācitakaṃ paccācikkheyya,
atk-s0202a0:459_4: so dāni tvaṃ ko santo kaṃ paccācikkhasīti attho.
atk-s0202a0:460_1: Viddho assāti parasenāya ṭhitena viddho bhaveyya.
atk-s0202a0:460_9: Tena vuttaṃ yadi vā maruvāya yadi vā khīrapaṇṇinoti.
atk-s0202a0:460_11: Ropimanti ropetvā vaḍḍhitaṃ saravanato saraṃ gahetvā kataṃ.
atk-s0202a0:460_15: Evaṃ noti etāya diṭṭhiyā sati na hotīti attho.
atk-s0202a0:461_1: Attheva jātīti etāya diṭṭhiyā sati brahmacariyavāsova natthi,
atk-s0202a0:461_6: Mama sāvakā hi etesu nibbinnā idheva nibbānaṃ pāpuṇantīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0202a0:462_4: Na hetaṃ mālukyaputta atthasaṃhitanti etaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ vā etaṃ byākaraṇaṃ vā kāraṇanissitaṃ na hoti.
atk-s0202a0:462_5: Na ādibrahmacariyakanti brahmacariyassa ādimattampi pubbabhāgasīlamattampi na hoti.
atk-s0202a0:462_6: Na nibbidāyātiādīsu vaṭṭe nibbindanatthāya vā virajjhanatthāya vā vaṭṭanirodhāya vā rāgādivūpasamanatthāya
atk-s0202a0:462_7: vā abhiññeyye dhamme abhijānanatthāya vā catumaggasaṅkhātasambodhatthāya vā asaṅkhatanibbānasacchikiriyatthāya
atk-s0202a0:466_2: Tattha orambhāgiyānīti heṭṭhā koṭṭhāsikāni kāmabhave nibbattisaṃvattanikāni.
atk-s0202a0:466_4: Kassa kho nāmāti kassa devassa vā manussassa vā desitāni dhāresi,
atk-s0202a0:467_2: Evaṃ santepi tassa vāde bhagavatā doso āropito.
atk-s0202a0:467_5: Ayañhi tassa laddhi “samudācārakkhaṇeyeva kilesehi saṃyutto nāma hoti,
atk-s0202a0:467_9: “bhagavatā bhikkhusaṅghassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti attano dhammatāyeva ayaṃ dhammadesanā āraddhā,
atk-s0202a0:467_11: Handāhaṃ bhagavantaṃ yācitvā bhikkhūnaṃ dhammaṃ desessāmī”ti.
atk-s0202a0:467_13: Taṃ dassetuṃ “evaṃ vutte āyasmā ānando”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:468_8: “Sānusayā pahīyatī”ti vacanato panettha ekacce “aññaṃ saṃyojanaṃ añño anusayo”ti vadanti.
atk-s0202a0:468_9: “Yathā hi sabyañjanaṃ bhatta”nti vutte bhattato aññaṃ byañjanaṃ hoti,
atk-s0202a0:468_10: evaṃ “sānusayā”ti vacanato pariyuṭṭhānasakkāyadiṭṭhito aññena anusayena bhavitabbanti tesaṃ laddhi.
atk-s0202a0:468_12: Na hi sīsato añño puriso atthi.
atk-s0202a0:468_15: evaṃ sante bhagavatā therassa taruṇūpamo upārambho duāropito hotī”ti.
atk-s0202a0:468_19: appahīnaṭṭhena anusayoti imamatthaṃ sandhāya bhagavatā “sānusayā pahīyatī”ti evaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:469_6: Evamete daṭṭhabbāti evarūpā puggalā evaṃ daṭṭhabbā.
atk-s0202a0:470_3: Akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānāti iminā nīvaraṇappahānaṃ kathitaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:470_5: Vivicceva kāmehīti upadhivivekena kāmehi vinā hutvā.
atk-s0202a0:470_6: Vivicca akusalehīti akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānena kāyaduṭṭhullānaṃ paṭippassaddhiyā ca akusalehi vinā hutvā.
atk-s0202a0:470_7: Yadeva tattha hotīti yaṃ tattha antosamāpattikkhaṇeyeva samāpattisamuṭṭhitañca rūpādidhammajātaṃ hoti.
atk-s0202a0:470_8: Te dhammeti te rūpagatantiādinā nayena vutte rūpādayo dhamme.
atk-s0202a0:471_0: So tehi dhammehīti so tehi evaṃ tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā diṭṭhehi antosamāpattiyaṃ pañcakkhandhadhammehi.
atk-s0202a0:471_1: Cittaṃ paṭivāpetīti cittaṃ paṭisaṃharati moceti apaneti.
atk-s0202a0:471_2: Upasaṃharatīti vipassanācittaṃ tāva savanavasena thutivasena pariyattivasena paññattivasena ca etaṃ santaṃ
atk-s0202a0:471_3: nibbānanti evaṃ asaṅkhatāya amatāya dhātuyā upasaṃharati.
atk-s0202a0:471_4: Maggacittaṃ nibbānaṃ ārammaṇakaraṇavaseneva etaṃ santametaṃ paṇītanti na evaṃ vadati,
atk-s0202a0:471_5: iminā pana ākārena taṃ paṭivijjhanto tattha cittaṃ upasaṃharatīti attho.
atk-s0202a0:471_6: So tattha ṭhitoti tāya tilakkhaṇārammaṇāya vipassanāya ṭhito.
atk-s0202a0:471_7: Āsavānaṃ khayaṃ pāpuṇātīti anukkamena cattāro magge bhāvetvā pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0202a0:471_9: Samathavipassanāsu hi sabbaso chandarāgaṃ pariyādātuṃ sakkonto arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0202a0:472_0: Yadeva tattha hoti vedanāgatanti idha pana rūpaṃ na gahitaṃ. Kasmā?
atk-s0202a0:472_2: Ayañhi heṭṭhā rūpāvacarajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā rūpaṃ atikkamitvā arūpāvacarasamāpattiṃ samāpannoti samathavasenapinena rūpaṃ atikkantaṃ,
atk-s0202a0:472_3: heṭṭhā rūpaṃ sammadeva sammasitvā taṃ atikkamma idāni arūpaṃ sammasatīti vipassanāvasenapinena rūpaṃ atikkantaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:472_4: Arūpe pana sabbasopi rūpaṃ natthīti taṃ sandhāyapi idha rūpaṃ na gahitaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:473_4: so paññāvimutto nāmāti ettha therassa kaṅkhā natthi.
atk-s0202a0:473_6: samathavaseneva pana gacchantesu eko cetovimutto nāma hoti,
atk-s0202a0:473_8: Vipassanāvasena gacchantesupi eko paññāvimutto nāma hoti,
atk-s0202a0:473_9: eko cetovimuttoti ettha kiṃ kāraṇanti pucchati.
atk-s0202a0:474_1: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti, na tvaṃ, ānanda,
atk-s0202a0:474_7: Samathavaseneva hi gacchantesu ekassa bhikkhuno cittekaggatā dhuraṃ hoti,
atk-s0202a0:474_11: Vipassanāvaseneva ca gacchantesu ekassa paññā dhuraṃ hoti,
atk-s0202a0:478_6: Siyā kukkuccaṃ siyā vippaṭisāroti evaṃ bhuñjanto yāvajīvaṃ brahmacariyaṃ carituṃ sakkhissāmi nu kho,
atk-s0202a0:478_7: na nu khoti iti me vippaṭisārakukkuccaṃ bhaveyyāti attho.
atk-s0202a0:478_8: Ekadesaṃ bhuñjitvāti porāṇakattherā kira patte bhattaṃ pakkhipitvā sappimhi dinne sappinā uṇhameva thokaṃ
atk-s0202a0:478_9: bhuñjitvā hatthe dhovitvā avasesaṃ bahi nīharitvā chāyūdakaphāsuke ṭhāne nisīditvā bhuñjanti.
atk-s0202a0:478_12: “sace sakiṃ pattaṃ pūretvā dinnaṃ bhattaṃ bhuñjitvā puna pattaṃ dhovitvā odanassa pūretvā laddhaṃ bahi nīharitvā chāyūdakaphāsuke ṭhāne bhuñjeyya,
atk-s0202a0:478_17: Ayaṃ kira atīte anantarāya jātiyā kākayoniyaṃ nibbatti.
atk-s0202a0:478_20: Tassa pana viravantasseva bhagavā taṃ madditvā ajjhottharitvā –
atk-s0202a0:478_21: “yo pana bhikkhu vikāle khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā khādeyya vā bhuñjeyya vā pācittiya”nti sikkhāpadaṃ paññapesi.
atk-s0202a0:479_0: Yathā tanti yathā aññopi sikkhāya na paripūrakārī ekavihārepi vasanto satthu sammukhībhāvaṃ na dadeyya,
atk-s0202a0:479_12: ananucchavikaṃ me kata”nti ayameva vitakko ahosi.
atk-s0202a0:479_13: Tasmā ekavihāre vasantopi lajjāya satthu sammukhībhāvaṃ nādāsi.
atk-s0202a0:480_1: Cīvarakammaṃ karontīti manussā bhagavato cīvarasāṭakaṃ adaṃsu,
atk-s0202a0:480_4: satthu sikkhāpadaṃ paññapentassa paṭibāhitakāraṇaṃ sādhukaṃ manasi karohīti attho.
atk-s0202a0:480_5: Dukkarataranti vassañhi vasitvā disāpakkante bhikkhū kuhiṃ vasitthāti pucchanti,
atk-s0202a0:480_7: bhagavā imasmiṃ antovasse kataraṃ jātakaṃ kathesi,
atk-s0202a0:480_11: nāma naṃ eko thero paṭibāhī”ti vakkhanti.
atk-s0202a0:480_13: “bhagavatopi nāma sikkhāpadaṃ paññapentassa paṭibāhitaṃ ayuttaṃ akāraṇa”nti vadanti.
atk-s0202a0:480_14: Evaṃ te ayaṃ doso mahājanantare pākaṭo hutvā duppaṭikārataṃ āpajjissatīti maññamānā evamāhaṃsu.
atk-s0202a0:480_15: Apica aññepi bhikkhū pavāretvā satthu santikaṃ āgamissanti.
atk-s0202a0:480_17: mama satthāraṃ khamāpentassa sahāyā hothā”ti saṅghaṃ sannipātessasi.
atk-s0202a0:480_22: Evampi te ayaṃ aparādho mahājanantare pākaṭo hutvā duppaṭikārataṃ āpajjissatīti maññamānāpi evamāhaṃsu.
atk-s0202a0:480_23: Atha vā bhagavā pavāretvā cārikaṃ pakkamissati,
atk-s0202a0:480_24: atha tvaṃ gatagataṭṭhāne bhagavato khamāpanatthāya saṅghaṃ sannipātessasi.
atk-s0202a0:481_1: bhagavā pana mahantepi aguṇe alaggitvā mayhaṃ accayaṃ paṭiggaṇhissatīti maññamāno etaṃ “accayo maṃ,
atk-s0202a0:481_4: Maṃ accagamāti maṃ atikkamma abhibhavitvā pavatto.
atk-s0202a0:481_7: puna evarūpassa aparādhassa dosassa khalitassa akaraṇatthāya.
atk-s0202a0:481_12: tampi te na paṭividdhaṃ na sallakkhitanti dasseti.
atk-s0202a0:482_3: Ete pana sattapi ariyapuggale bhagavatāpi evaṃ āṇāpetuṃ na yuttaṃ,
atk-s0202a0:482_4: bhagavatā āṇatte tesampi evaṃ kātuṃ na yuttaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:482_5: Aṭṭhānaparikappavasena pana ariyapuggalānaṃ suvacabhāvadassanatthaṃ bhaddālittherassa ca dubbacabhāvadassanatthametaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:483_0: Api nu tvaṃ tasmiṃ samaye ubhatobhāgavimuttoti desanaṃ kasmā ārabhi?
atk-s0202a0:483_3: ime satta ariyapuggalā loke dakkhiṇeyyā mama sāsane sāmino,
atk-s0202a0:483_4: mayi sikkhāpadaṃ paññapente paṭibāhitabbayutte kāraṇe sati etesaṃ paṭibāhituṃ yuttaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:483_6: mayi sikkhāpadaṃ paññapente tuyhaṃ paṭibāhituṃ na yuttanti.
atk-s0202a0:484_0: Ritto tucchoti anto ariyaguṇānaṃ abhāvena rittako tucchako,
atk-s0202a0:484_5: Taṃ te mayaṃ paṭiggaṇhāmāti taṃ tava aparādhaṃ mayaṃ khamāma.
atk-s0202a0:484_8: ariyassa vinaye buddhassa bhagavato sāsane vuḍḍhi nāma. Katamā?
atk-s0202a0:484_9: Accayaṃ accayato disvā yathādhammaṃ paṭikaritvā āyatiṃ saṃvarāpajjanā.
atk-s0202a0:484_10: Desanaṃ pana puggalādhiṭṭhānaṃ karonto “yo accayaṃ accayato disvā yathādhammaṃ paṭikaroti,
atk-s0202a0:485_1: Satthāpi upavadatīti “asukavihāravāsī asukassa therassa saddhivihāriko asukassa antevāsiko itthannāmo
atk-s0202a0:485_2: nāma bhikkhu lokuttaradhammaṃ nibbattetuṃ araññaṃ paviṭṭho”ti sutvā –
atk-s0202a0:485_4: yo mayhaṃ pana sāsane sikkhāya aparipūrakārī”ti evaṃ upavadati,
atk-s0202a0:485_8: Attanāpi attānanti sīlaṃ āvajjantassa saṃkiliṭṭhaṭṭhānaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti,
atk-s0202a0:485_11: So “kiṃ mādisassa araññavāsenā”ti vippaṭisārī uṭṭhāya pakkamati.
atk-s0202a0:485_12: Attāpi attānaṃ upavaditoti attanāpi attā upavadito,
atk-s0202a0:485_15: So vivicceva kāmehītiādi evaṃ sacchikarotīti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:486_1: Pasayha pasayha kāraṇaṃ karontīti appamattakepi dose niggahetvā punappunaṃ kārenti.
atk-s0202a0:486_2: No tathāti mahantepi aparādhe yathā itaraṃ,
atk-s0202a0:486_3: evaṃ pasayha na kārenti. So kira, “āvuso, bhaddāli,
atk-s0202a0:486_7: kañci bhikkhuṃ pesetvā attano santikaṃ pakkosāpetvā,
atk-s0202a0:486_10: evarūpaṃ nāma hotī”ti evaṃ satthusantikāpi anuggahaṃ paccāsīsati.
atk-s0202a0:487_0: Atha bhagavā bhikkhusaṅghopi satthāpi ovaditabbayuttameva ovadati,
atk-s0202a0:487_4: Na sammā vattatīti sammā vattampi na vattati.
atk-s0202a0:487_5: Na lomaṃ pātetīti anulomavatte na vattati,
atk-s0202a0:487_7: Na nitthāraṃ vattatīti nitthāraṇakavattamhi na vattati,
atk-s0202a0:487_13: Na khippameva vūpasammatīti khippaṃ na vūpasammati,
atk-s0202a0:487_23: mukhadhovanavelā”tiādīni vatvā divasabhāgepi rattibhāgepi āgataṃ uyyojentiyeva.
atk-s0202a0:488_5: janapadavāsino nāma gāmantasenāsane vasanaṭṭhānanisajjanādīni na phāsukāni honti,
atk-s0202a0:488_7: sīghamassa adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasamemā”ti sannipatitvā āpattito vuṭṭhāpetvā suddhante patiṭṭhāpenti.
atk-s0202a0:490_1: Saddhāmattakena vahati pemamattakenāti ācariyupajjhāyesu appamattikāya gehassitasaddhāya appamattakena gehassitapemena yāpeti.
atk-s0202a0:490_3: navapabbajito pabbajjāya guṇaṃ ajānanto ācariyupajjhāyesu pemamattena yāpeti,
atk-s0202a0:490_5: Appamattakampi hi saṅgahaṃ labhitvā pabbajjāya ṭhitā abhiññāpattā mahāsamaṇā bhavissanti.
atk-s0202a0:491_2: Sattesu hāyamānesūti paṭipattiyā hāyamānāya sattā hāyanti nāma.
atk-s0202a0:491_4: Paṭipattisaddhammopi hi paṭipattipūrakesu sattesu asati antaradhāyati nāma.
atk-s0202a0:491_6: Yesu diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikā parūpavādavippaṭisāravadhabandhanādayo ceva apāyadukkhavisesabhūtā ca āsavā tiṭṭhantiyeva.
atk-s0202a0:491_7: Yasmā nesaṃ te kāraṇaṃ hontīti attho.
atk-s0202a0:491_8: Te āsavaṭṭhānīyā vītikkamadhammā yāva na saṅghe pātubhavanti,
atk-s0202a0:491_9: na tāva satthā sāvakānaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññapetīti ayamettha yojanā.
atk-s0202a0:492_0: Evaṃ akālaṃ dassetvā puna kālaṃ dassetuṃ yato ca kho,
atk-s0202a0:492_6: yasmiṃ kāle āsavaṭṭhānīyā dhammāti saṅkhaṃ gatā vītikkamadosā saṅghe pātubhavanti,
atk-s0202a0:492_7: tadā satthā sāvakānaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññapeti. Kasmā?
atk-s0202a0:493_0: Evaṃ āsavaṭṭhānīyānaṃ dhammānaṃ anuppattiṃ sikkhāpadapaññattiyā akālaṃ,
atk-s0202a0:493_1: uppattiñca kālanti vatvā idāni tesaṃ dhammānaṃ anuppattikālañca uppattikālañca dassetuṃ “na tāva, bhaddāli,
atk-s0202a0:493_4: Saṅgho hi yāva na theranavamajjhimānaṃ vasena mahattaṃ patto hoti,
atk-s0202a0:493_6: sāsane ekacce āsavaṭṭhānīyā dhammā na uppajjanti.
atk-s0202a0:494_0: “Yo pana bhikkhu anupasampannena uttaridvirattatirattaṃ sahaseyyaṃ kappeyya pācittiyaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:494_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī anuvassaṃ vuṭṭhāpeyya pācittiyaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:494_2: Yā pana bhikkhunī ekavassaṃ dve vuṭṭhāpeyya pācittiya”nti.
atk-s0202a0:496_1: Saṅgho hi yāva na lābhaggapatto hoti,
atk-s0202a0:496_2: na tāva lābhaṃ paṭicca āsavaṭṭhānīyā dhammā uppajjanti.
atk-s0202a0:497_0: “Yo pana bhikkhu acelakassa vā paribbājakassa vā paribbājikāya vā sahatthā khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā dadeyya pācittiya”nti.
atk-s0202a0:499_1: Saṅgho hi yāva na yasaggapatto hoti,
atk-s0202a0:499_2: na tāva yasaṃ paṭicca āsavaṭṭhānīyā dhammā uppajjanti.
atk-s0202a0:500_1: Saṅgho hi yāva na bāhusaccapatto hoti,
atk-s0202a0:500_3: Bāhusaccapatte pana yasmā ekaṃ nikāyaṃ dve nikāye pañcapi nikāye uggahetvā ayoniso ummujjamānā puggalā
atk-s0202a0:500_4: rasena rasaṃ saṃsandetvā uddhammaṃ ubbinayaṃ satthu sāsanaṃ dīpenti,
atk-s0202a0:500_6: “yo pana bhikkhu evaṃ vadeyya tathāhaṃ bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi …pe…
atk-s0202a0:500_7: samaṇuddesopi ce evaṃ vadeyyā”tiādinā nayena sikkhāpadaṃ paññapeti.
atk-s0202a0:501_0: Rattaññutaṃ pattoti ettha rattiyo jānantīti rattaññū.
atk-s0202a0:501_1: Attano pabbajitadivasato paṭṭhāya bahū rattiyo jānanti,
atk-s0202a0:501_4: Tatra rattaññutaṃ patte saṅghe upasenaṃ vaṅgantaputtaṃ ārabbha sikkhāpadaṃ paññattanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:501_5: So hāyasmā ūnadasavasse bhikkhū upasampādente disvā ekavasso saddhivihārikaṃ upasampādesi.
atk-s0202a0:501_10: Evaṃ paññatte sikkhāpade puna bhikkhū “dasavassamhā dasavassamhā”ti bālā abyattā upasampādenti.
atk-s0202a0:501_18: byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena dasavassena vā atirekadasavassena vā upasampādetu”nti.
atk-s0202a0:501_19: Iti rattaññutaṃ pattakāle dve sikkhāpadāni paññattāni.
atk-s0202a0:502_1: Ājānīyasusūpamaṃ dhammapariyāyaṃ desesinti taruṇājānīyaupamaṃ katvā dhammaṃ desayiṃ.
atk-s0202a0:502_2: Tatrāti tasmiṃ asaraṇe. Na kho, bhaddāli,
atk-s0202a0:502_3: eseva hetūti na esa sikkhāya aparipūrakārībhāvoyeva eko hetu.
atk-s0202a0:503_1: Mukhādhāne kāraṇaṃ kāretīti khalīnabandhādīhi mukhaṭṭhapane sādhukaṃ gīvaṃ paggaṇhāpetuṃ kāraṇaṃ kāreti.
atk-s0202a0:504_0: Anukkameti cattāropi pāde ekappahāreneva ukkhipane ca nikkhipane ca.
atk-s0202a0:504_1: Parasenāya hi āvāṭe ṭhatvā asiṃ gahetvā āgacchantassa assassa pāde chindanti.
atk-s0202a0:504_2: Tasmiṃ samaye esa ekappahāreneva cattāropi pāde ukkhipissatīti rajjubandhanavidhānena etaṃ kāraṇaṃ karonti.
atk-s0202a0:504_3: Maṇḍaleti yathā asse nisinnoyeva bhūmiyaṃ patitaṃ āvudhaṃ gahetuṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0202a0:504_6: Rattiṃ okkantakaraṇasmiñhi yathā padasaddo na suyyati,
atk-s0202a0:504_7: tadatthaṃ ekasmiṃ ṭhāne saññaṃ datvā aggaggakhurehiyeva gamanaṃ sikkhāpenti.
atk-s0202a0:504_12: paraṃ palāyantaṃ anubandhitvā gahaṇatthañca etaṃ kāraṇaṃ kāreti.
atk-s0202a0:504_14: yuddhakālasmiñhi hatthīsu vā koñcanādaṃ karontesu assesu vā hasantesu rathesu vā nighosantesu yodhesu
atk-s0202a0:504_15: vā ukkuṭṭhiṃ karontesu tassa ravassa abhāyitvā parasenapavesanatthaṃ ayaṃ kāraṇā karīyati.
atk-s0202a0:505_1: Kūṭakaṇṇarañño kira guḷavaṇṇo nāma asso ahosi.
atk-s0202a0:505_2: Rājā pācīnadvārena nikkhamitvā cetiyapabbataṃ gamissāmīti kalambanadītīraṃ sampatto.
atk-s0202a0:505_3: Asso tīre ṭhatvā udakaṃ otarituṃ na icchati,
atk-s0202a0:505_5: “aho tayā asso sikkhāpito udakaṃ otarituṃ na icchatī”ti āha. Ācariyo –
atk-s0202a0:505_9: vāle tinte rañño aṅge udakaṃ pāteyyā’ti evaṃ tumhākaṃ sarīre udakapātanabhayena na otarati,
atk-s0202a0:505_16: tathārūpena pahārena chinnabhinnasarīrāpi assārohaṃ parasenāya apātetvā bahi nīharantiyeva.
atk-s0202a0:506_6: Tattha pakatiyā uttamahayova uttamahayakāraṇaṃ arahati, na añño.
atk-s0202a0:506_7: Uttamahayakāraṇāya eva ca hayo uttamajavaṃ paṭipajjati,
atk-s0202a0:507_1: eko kira rājā ekaṃ sindhavapotakaṃ labhitvā sindhavabhāvaṃ ajānitvāva imaṃ sikkhāpehīti ācariyassa adāsi.
atk-s0202a0:507_2: Ācariyopi tassa sindhavabhāvaṃ ajānanto taṃ māsakhādakaghoṭakānaṃ kāraṇāsu upaneti.
atk-s0202a0:507_3: So attano ananucchavikattā kāraṇaṃ na paṭipajjati.
atk-s0202a0:507_4: So taṃ dametuṃ asakkonto “kūṭasso ayaṃ mahārājā”ti vissajjāpesi.
atk-s0202a0:508_0: Athekadivasaṃ eko assācariyapubbako daharo upajjhāyassa bhaṇḍakaṃ gahetvā gacchanto taṃ parikhāpiṭṭhe carantaṃ disvā – “anaggho, bhante,
atk-s0202a0:508_6: rājā appeva nāma buddhasāsane pasīdeyya rañño kathehī”ti.
atk-s0202a0:508_13: Tumhākaṃ bhuñjanakasuvaṇṇathāle tumhākaṃ bhuñjanakabhattaṃ tumhākaṃ pivanakaraso tumhākaṃ gandhā tumhākaṃ mālāti.
atk-s0202a0:509_0: Asso gandhaṃ ghāyitvāva “mayhaṃ guṇajānanakaācariyo atthi maññe”ti sīsaṃ ukkhipitvā olokento aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0202a0:509_4: Atha naṃ gandhehi vilimpitvā rājapiḷandhanaṃ piḷandhitvā “purato purato gacchā”ti accharaṃ pahari.
atk-s0202a0:509_5: So daharassa purato purato gantvā maṅgalassaṭṭhāne aṭṭhāsi. Daharo – “ayaṃ te, mahārāja,
atk-s0202a0:509_7: imināva naṃ niyāmena katipāhaṃ paṭijaggāpehī”ti vatvā nikkhami.
atk-s0202a0:510_0: Atha katipāhassa accayena āgantvā assassa ānubhāvaṃ passissasi,
atk-s0202a0:510_6: Daharo accharaṃ paharitvā “etaṃ rukkhaṃ anupariyāhī”ti assassa saññaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0202a0:510_8: Rājā neva gacchantaṃ na āgacchantaṃ addasa.
atk-s0202a0:510_12: Valañjakadaṇḍaṃ etaṃ rukkhaṃ nissāya ṭhapethāti vatvā accharaṃ pahari “valañjakadaṇḍaṃ gahetvā ehī”ti.
atk-s0202a0:510_13: Asso pakkhanditvā mukhena gahetvā āgato. Diṭṭhaṃ,
atk-s0202a0:511_0: Puna accharaṃ pahari “uyyānassa pākāramatthakena caritvā ehī”ti.
atk-s0202a0:511_4: Rattakambalaṃ āharāpetvā assassa pāde bandhāpetvā tatheva saññaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0202a0:511_6: Balavatā purisena āviñchanaalātaggisikhā viya uyyānapākāramatthake paññāyittha.
atk-s0202a0:512_0: Puna “pokkharaṇiṃ otaritvā padumapattesu cārikaṃ carāhī”ti saññaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0202a0:512_2: ekaṃ pattampi anakkantaṃ vā phālitaṃ vā chinditaṃ vā khaṇḍitaṃ vā nāhosi. Diṭṭhaṃ,
atk-s0202a0:512_7: Evaṃ uttamahayo eva uttamakāraṇāya uttamajavaṃ paṭipajjati.
atk-s0202a0:513_7: Rañño aṅganteva saṅkhaṃ gacchatīti yattha katthaci gacchantena hatthaṃ viya pādaṃ viya anohāyeva gantabbaṃ hoti.
atk-s0202a0:513_9: catūsu vā senaṅgesu ekaṃ aṅgaṃ hoti.
atk-s0202a0:514_3: Ṭhapetvā pana aṭṭha phalaṅgāni sesā dhammā vimuttīti veditabbā.
atk-s0202a0:514_5: Ayaṃ pana desanā ugghaṭitaññūpuggalassa vasena arahattanikūṭaṃ gahetvā niṭṭhāpitāti.
atk-s0202a0:518_2: Tattha yena so vanasaṇḍoti ayampi mahāudāyitthero bhagavatā saddhiṃyeva piṇḍāya pavisitvā saddhiṃ paṭikkami.
atk-s0202a0:518_3: Tasmā yena so bhagavatā upasaṅkamanto vanasaṇḍo tenupasaṅkamīti veditabbo.
atk-s0202a0:519_5: evarūpaṃ pana paṇītabhojanaṃ alabhantā kathaṃ yāpessāmāti evaṃ paṇītabhojanaṃ paṭicca ahosīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:519_10: Sabbā tā rattinti sabbā tā saṅkhatiyo rattiṃyeva honti,
atk-s0202a0:519_11: divā pana appā parittā thokikā hontīti.
atk-s0202a0:519_12: Manussā hi divā yāgukañjiyādīhi yāpetvāpi rattiṃ yathāsatti yathāpaṇītameva bhuñjanti.
atk-s0202a0:520_0: Puna bhūtapubbanti iminā ratti vikālabhojane ādīnavaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0202a0:520_4: Corā kira katakammā yaṃ nesaṃ devataṃ āyācitvā kammaṃ nipphannaṃ,
atk-s0202a0:520_5: tassa upahāratthāya manusse māretvā galalohitādīni gaṇhanti.
atk-s0202a0:520_6: Te aññesu manussesu māriyamānesu kolāhalā uppajjissanti,
atk-s0202a0:520_7: pabbajitaṃ pariyesanto nāma natthīti maññamānā bhikkhū gahetvā mārenti.
atk-s0202a0:520_9: Akatakammehīti aṭavito gāmaṃ āgamanakāle kammanipphannatthaṃ puretaraṃ balikammaṃ kātukāmehi.
atk-s0202a0:520_10: Asaddhammena nimantetīti “ehi bhikkhu ajjekarattiṃ idheva bhuñjitvā idha vasitvā sampattiṃ anubhavitvā sve gamissasī”ti methunadhammena nimanteti.
atk-s0202a0:521_0: Puna bhūtapubbanti iminā attanā diṭṭhakāraṇaṃ katheti.
atk-s0202a0:521_6: Pisāco vata manti pisāco maṃ khādituṃ āgato vata.
atk-s0202a0:521_10: yassa pitā vā mātā vā atthi,
atk-s0202a0:521_11: taṃ mātāpitaro amhākaṃ puttakoti yathā tathā vā uppādetvā yaṃkiñci khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ datvā ekasmiṃ ṭhāne sayāpenti.
atk-s0202a0:521_12: So evaṃ rattiṃ piṇḍāya na carati.
atk-s0202a0:522_1: Evamevāti evameva kiñci ānisaṃsaṃ apassantā nikkāraṇeneva.
atk-s0202a0:522_4: Kiṃ panimassāti imassa appamattakassa hetu kiṃ vattabbaṃ nāma,
atk-s0202a0:522_5: nanu apassantena viya asuṇantena viya bhavitabbanti.
atk-s0202a0:522_7: Adhisallikhatevāyanti ayaṃ samaṇo navanītaṃ pisanto viya padumanāḷasuttaṃ kakacena okkantanto viya atisallekhati,
atk-s0202a0:522_14: Evaṃ pana avatvā bhagavantaṃ parivāretvā nisinnā ‘evaṃ bhagavā,
atk-s0202a0:523_2: Thūlo kaliṅgaroti gale baddhaṃ mahākaṭṭhaṃ viya hoti.
atk-s0202a0:523_4: Sā kira ravasataṃ ravitvā naccasataṃ naccitvā sakiṃ gocaraṃ gaṇhāti.
atk-s0202a0:523_5: Ākāsato bhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhitaṃ pana naṃ disvā vacchapālakādayo kīḷanatthaṃ pūtilatāya bandhanti.
atk-s0202a0:523_8: Tañhi tassāti taṃ pūtilatābandhanaṃ tassā appasarīratāya ceva appathāmatāya ca balavabandhanaṃ nāma,
atk-s0202a0:523_10: Tesanti tesaṃ moghapurisānaṃ saddhāmandatāya ca paññāmandatāya ca balavaṃ bandhanaṃ nāma,
atk-s0202a0:523_11: dukkaṭavatthumattakampi mahantaṃ pārājikavatthu viya duppajahaṃ hoti.
atk-s0202a0:524_1: Sukkapakkhe pahātabbassāti kiṃ imassa appamattakassa pahātabbassa hetu bhagavatā vattabbaṃ atthi,
atk-s0202a0:524_3: Nanu evaṃ bhagavato adhippāyaṃ ñatvāpi pahātabbamevāti attho.
atk-s0202a0:524_9: Migabhūtena cetasā viharantīti apaccāsīsanapakkhe ṭhitā hutvā viharanti.
atk-s0202a0:524_10: Migo hi pahāraṃ labhitvā manussāvāsaṃ gantvā bhesajjaṃ vā vaṇatelaṃ vā labhissāmīti ajjhāsayaṃ akatvā
atk-s0202a0:524_11: pahāraṃ labhitvāva agāmakaṃ araññaṃ pavisitvā pahaṭaṭṭhānaṃ heṭṭhā katvā nipatitvā phāsubhūtakāle uṭṭhāya gacchati.
atk-s0202a0:524_14: Tañhi tassāti taṃ varattabandhanaṃ tassa hatthināgassa mahāsarīratāya ceva mahāthāmatāya ca dubbalabandhanaṃ nāma.
atk-s0202a0:524_16: Tesaṃ tanti tesaṃ taṃ kulaputtānaṃ saddhāmahantatāya ca paññāmahantatāya ca mahantaṃ pārājikavatthupi dukkaṭavatthumattakaṃ viya suppajahaṃ hoti.
atk-s0202a0:525_5: Oluggavilugganti yassa gehayaṭṭhiyo piṭṭhivaṃsato muccitvā maṇḍale laggā,
atk-s0202a0:525_7: Kākātidāyinti yattha kiñcideva bhuñjissāmāti anto nisinnakāle visuṃ dvārakiccaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-s0202a0:525_9: Sūrakākā hi palāyanakāle ca yathāsammukhaṭṭhāneneva nikkhamitvā palāyanti.
atk-s0202a0:525_10: Naparamarūpanti na puññavantānaṃ gehaṃ viya uttamarūpaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:525_16: Naparamarūpanti yathā puññavantānaṃ gandhasālibījādi parisuddhaṃ bījaṃ,
atk-s0202a0:525_19: Naparamarūpāti pacchisīsā lambatthanī mahodarā pisācā viya bībhacchā.
atk-s0202a0:525_22: yohanti so vatāhaṃ puriso nāma assaṃ,
atk-s0202a0:526_0: So na sakkuṇeyyāti so evaṃ cintetvāpi gehaṃ gantvā –
atk-s0202a0:526_2: sattapi aṭṭhapi gāme piṇḍāya caritvā yathādhoteneva pattena āgantabbampi hoti,
atk-s0202a0:526_3: evaṃ yāpetuṃ asakkontassa me puna āgatassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ icchitabbaṃ,
atk-s0202a0:526_6: Athassa taṃ agārakaṃ vejayantapāsādo viya upaṭṭhāti.
atk-s0202a0:526_13: “mayi gate ayaṃ gharaṇī imaṃ dhaññaṃ tena tena saddhiṃ bhuñjissati.
atk-s0202a0:526_14: Puna āgatena jīvitavutti nāma laddhabbā hoti,
atk-s0202a0:526_16: Athassa sā aḍḍhateḷasāni koṭṭhāgārasatāni viya upaṭṭhāti.
atk-s0202a0:526_18: “mayi gate imaṃ hatthigopako vā assagopako vā yo koci palobhessati,
atk-s0202a0:526_19: puna āgatena bhattapācikā nāma laddhabbā hoti,
atk-s0202a0:526_21: Athassa sā rūpinī devī viya upaṭṭhāti.
atk-s0202a0:528_4: te tañceva nappajahantī”ti pajahanakā ca appajahanakā ca rāsivasena dassitā,
atk-s0202a0:528_6: Idāni yathā nāma dabbasambhāratthaṃ gato puriso paṭipāṭiyā rukkhe chinditvā puna nivattitvā vaṅkañca pahāya kamme upanetabbayuttakameva gaṇhāti,
atk-s0202a0:528_7: evameva appajahanake chaḍḍetvā abbohārike katvā pajahanakapuggalā cattāro hontīti dassetuṃ imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0202a0:530_0: Tattha puthujjano sotāpanno sakadāgāmī anāgāmīti ime cattāro janā nappajahanti nāma.
atk-s0202a0:530_6: Eteyeva pana cattāro janā pajahanti nāma.
atk-s0202a0:530_9: Āraddhavipassako hi satisammosena sahasā kilese uppanne “mādisassa nāma bhikkhuno kileso uppanno”ti saṃvegaṃ
atk-s0202a0:530_10: katvā vīriyaṃ paggayha vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā maggena kilese samugghāteti.
atk-s0202a0:530_15: indriyabhāvaneti imesu suttesu kiñcāpi tatiyavāro gahito,
atk-s0202a0:531_0: Upadhi dukkhassa mūlanti ettha pañca khandhā upadhi nāma.
atk-s0202a0:531_1: Taṃ dukkhassa mūlanti iti viditvā kilesupadhinā nirupadhi hoti,
atk-s0202a0:531_3: Upadhisaṅkhaye vimuttoti taṇhakkhaye nibbāne ārammaṇato vimutto.
atk-s0202a0:532_1: Evaṃ cattāro puggale vitthāretvā idāni ye pajahanti,
atk-s0202a0:532_4: tepi “ime nāma ettake kilese nappajahantī”ti dassetuṃ pañca kho ime udāyi kāmaguṇātiādimāha.
atk-s0202a0:532_7: Bhāyitabbanti etassa sukhassa paṭilābhatopi vipākatopi bhāyitabbaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:532_12: Na bhāyitabbanti etassa sukhassa paṭilābhatopi vipākatopi na bhāyitabbaṃ,
atk-s0202a0:533_1: Iñjitasmiṃ vadāmīti iñjanaṃ calanaṃ phandananti vadāmi.
atk-s0202a0:533_2: Kiñca tattha iñjitasminti kiñca tattha iñjitaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:533_3: Idaṃ tattha iñjitasminti ye ete aniruddhā vitakkavicārā,
atk-s0202a0:533_6: Aniñjitasmiṃ vadāmīti idaṃ catutthajjhānaṃ aniñjanaṃ acalanaṃ nipphandananti vadāmi.
atk-s0202a0:534_3: na ettāvatā alametanti sanniṭṭhānaṃ kātabbanti vadāmi.
atk-s0202a0:534_4: Nevasaññānāsaññāyatanassāpīti evarūpāyapi santāya samāpattiyā pahānameva vadāmi.
atk-s0202a0:534_5: Aṇuṃ vā thūlaṃ vāti khuddakaṃ vā mahantaṃ vā appasāvajjaṃ vā mahāsāvajjaṃ vā.
atk-s0202a0:534_7: Desanā pana neyyapuggalassa vasena arahattanikūṭeneva niṭṭhāpitāti.
atk-s0202a0:538_3: Pañcamattāni bhikkhusatānīti adhunā pabbajitānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pañca satāni.
atk-s0202a0:538_7: bhagavato santike dhammaṃ sutvā attano attano yathāupanissayena patiṭṭhahissantī”ti.
atk-s0202a0:538_11: Senāsanāni paññāpayamānāti attano attano ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ vasanaṭṭhānāni pucchitvā dvāravātapānāni
atk-s0202a0:538_12: vivaritvā mañcapīṭhakaṭasārakādīni nīharitvā papphoṭetvā yathāṭṭhāne saṇṭhāpayamānā.
atk-s0202a0:539_2: Kevaṭṭā maññe macchavilopeti kevaṭṭānaṃ macchapacchiṭhapitaṭṭhāne mahājano sannipatitvā –
atk-s0202a0:539_6: mayhaṃ khuddako”ti evaṃ uccāsaddaṃ mahāsaddaṃ karonti.
atk-s0202a0:539_8: Macchagahaṇatthaṃ jāle pakkhittepi tasmiṃ ṭhāne kevaṭṭā ceva aññe ca “paviṭṭho na paviṭṭho,
atk-s0202a0:539_12: Na vo mama santike vatthabbanti tumhe mādisassa buddhassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ āgantvā evaṃ mahāsaddaṃ karotha,
atk-s0202a0:539_13: attano dhammatāya vasantā kiṃ nāma sāruppaṃ karissatha,
atk-s0202a0:539_14: tumhādisānaṃ mama santike vasanakiccaṃ natthīti dīpeti.
atk-s0202a0:539_15: Tesu ekabhikkhupi “bhagavā tumhe mahāsaddamattakena amhe paṇāmethā”ti vā aññaṃ vā kiñci vattuṃ nāsakkhi,
atk-s0202a0:539_18: Evaṃ pana tesaṃ ahosi “mayaṃ satthāraṃ passissāma,
atk-s0202a0:539_21: Evarūpassa pana garuno satthu santikaṃ āgantvā mahāsaddaṃ karimhā,
atk-s0202a0:539_24: na no laddhaṃ bhagavato santike vatthuṃ,
atk-s0202a0:540_1: Tenupasaṅkamiṃsūti te kira sakyā āgamanasamayepi te bhikkhū tattheva nisinnā passiṃsu.
atk-s0202a0:540_3: “kiṃ nu kho ete bhikkhū pavisitvāva paṭinivattā,
atk-s0202a0:540_4: jānissāma taṃ kāraṇa”nti cintetvā yena te bhikkhū tenupasaṅkamiṃsu.
atk-s0202a0:540_6: Kahaṃ pana tumheti tumhe idāneva āgantvā kahaṃ gacchatha,
atk-s0202a0:540_12: idāni attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gacchāmā”ti kiñcāpi evaṃ vacanaparihāro atthi,
atk-s0202a0:540_13: evarūpaṃ pana lesakappaṃ akatvā yathābhūtameva ārocetvā bhagavatā kho, āvuso,
atk-s0202a0:540_17: “dvīhi aggasāvakehi saddhiṃ pañcasu bhikkhusatesu gacchantesu bhagavato pādamūlaṃ vigacchissati,
atk-s0202a0:540_21: na mayaṃ jīvituṃ asakkontā pabbajitā”ti ekabhikkhupi paṭippharito nāma nāhosi,
atk-s0202a0:541_2: Abhivadatūti etu bhikkhusaṅghoti evaṃ cittaṃ uppādento abhivadatu.
atk-s0202a0:541_3: Anuggahitoti āmisānuggahena ca dhammānuggahena ca anuggahito.
atk-s0202a0:541_4: Aññathattanti dasabalassa dassanaṃ na labhāmāti pasādaññathattaṃ bhaveyya.
atk-s0202a0:541_7: Siyā aññathattanti udakavārakāle udakaṃ alabhantānaṃ milātabhāvena aññathattaṃ bhaveyya,
atk-s0202a0:541_9: Vacchakassa pana khīrapipāsāya sussanaṃ aññathattaṃ nāma,
atk-s0202a0:542_1: Pasādito bhagavāti thero kira tattha nisinnova dibbacakkhunā brahmānaṃ āgataṃ addasa,
atk-s0202a0:542_4: “kañci bhikkhuṃ pesetvā pakkosiyamānānaṃ gamanaṃ nāma na phāsukaṃ,
atk-s0202a0:542_8: Diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāranti phalasamāpattivihāraṃ anuyutto maññe bhagavā viharitukāmo,
atk-s0202a0:542_9: so idāni yathāruciyā viharissatīti evaṃ me ahosīti vadati.
atk-s0202a0:542_10: Mayampi dānīti mayaṃ paraṃ ovadamānā vihārato nikkaḍḍhitā,
atk-s0202a0:542_13: Thero imasmiṃ ṭhāne viraddho attano bhārabhāvaṃ na aññāsi.
atk-s0202a0:543_6: Itaro pana na sakkotīti dassetuṃ imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0202a0:544_1: Kodhupāyāsassetaṃ adhivacananti yathā hi bāhiraṃ udakaṃ otiṇṇo ūmīsu osīditvā marati,
atk-s0202a0:544_2: evaṃ imasmiṃ sāsane kodhupāyāse osīditvā vibbhamati.
atk-s0202a0:545_1: Odarikattassetaṃ adhivacananti yathā hi bāhiraṃ udakaṃ otiṇṇo kumbhīlena khādito marati,
atk-s0202a0:545_2: evaṃ imasmiṃ sāsane odarikattena khādito vibbhamati.
atk-s0202a0:546_5: Pañcannetaṃ kāmaguṇānaṃ adhivacananti yathā hi bāhiraṃ udakaṃ otiṇṇo āvaṭṭe nimujjitvā marati,
atk-s0202a0:546_6: evaṃ imasmiṃ sāsane pabbajito pañcakāmaguṇāvaṭṭe nimujjitvā vibbhamati.
atk-s0202a0:547_3: Mātugāmassetaṃ adhivacananti yathā hi bāhiraṃ udakaṃ otiṇṇo caṇḍamacchaṃ āgamma laddhappahāro marati,
atk-s0202a0:547_4: evaṃ imasmiṃ sāsane mātugāmaṃ āgamma uppannakāmarāgo vibbhamati.
atk-s0202a0:548_0: Imāni pana cattāri bhayāni bhāyitvā yathā udakaṃ anorohantassa udakaṃ nissāya ānisaṃso natthi,
atk-s0202a0:548_1: udakapipāsāya pipāsito ca hoti rajojallena kiliṭṭhasarīro ca,
atk-s0202a0:548_2: evamevaṃ imāni cattāri bhayāni bhāyitvā sāsane apabbajantassāpi imaṃ sāsanaṃ nissāya ānisaṃso natthi,
atk-s0202a0:548_3: taṇhāpipāsāya pipāsito ca hoti kilesarajena saṃkiliṭṭhacitto ca.
atk-s0202a0:548_4: Yathā pana imāni cattāri bhayāni abhāyitvā udakaṃ orohantassa vuttappakāro ānisaṃso hoti,
atk-s0202a0:548_5: evaṃ imāni abhāyitvā sāsane pabbajitassāpi vuttappakāro ānisaṃso hoti.
atk-s0202a0:548_7: “cattāri bhayāni bhāyitvā udakaṃ anotaranto sotaṃ chinditvā paratīraṃ pāpuṇituṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0202a0:548_9: evamevaṃ bhāyitvā sāsane apabbajantopi taṇhāsotaṃ chinditvā nibbānapāraṃ daṭṭhuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0202a0:548_12: Ayaṃ pana desanā neyyapuggalassa vasena niṭṭhāpitāti.
atk-s0202a0:552_3: Pubbe kira amhākaṃ bodhisatto vānarayoniyaṃ nibbatto,
atk-s0202a0:552_13: akhāditapubbāni pana phalāni apītapubbāni ca pānīyāni maṃ apucchitvā mā khādittha mā pivitthā”ti.
atk-s0202a0:553_0: Te ekadivasaṃ caramānā aññaṃ pabbatapādaṃ gantvā gocaraṃ gahetvā pānīyaṃ olokentā ekaṃ amanussapariggahitaṃ
atk-s0202a0:553_1: pokkharaṇiṃ disvā sahasā apivitvā samantā parivāretvā mahāsattassa āgamanaṃ olokayamānā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0202a0:553_2: Mahāsatto āgantvā “kiṃ tātā pānīyaṃ na pivathā”ti āha.
atk-s0202a0:553_4: Sādhu tātāti samantā padaṃ pariyesamāno otiṇṇapadaṃyeva addasa,
atk-s0202a0:553_7: Tāvadeva ca tattha abhinibbattaamanusso udakaṃ dvedhā katvā uṭṭhāsi setamukho nīlakucchi rattahatthapādo
atk-s0202a0:553_21: Evaṃ sante ekopi vo na muccissatīti.
atk-s0202a0:553_23: na ca te vasaṃ gamissāmāti ekanaḷaṃ āharāpetvā koṭiyaṃ gahetvā dhami,
atk-s0202a0:553_26: sesavānarānaṃ pāṭiyekke naḷe āharāpetvā dhamitvā adāsi.
atk-s0202a0:555_0: Naḷena vāriṃ pissāma, neva maṃ tvaṃ vadhissasī”ti. ;
atk-s0202a0:556_0: Tato paṭṭhāya yāva ajjadivasā tasmiṃ ṭhāne naḷā ekacchiddāva honti.
atk-s0202a0:556_1: Iminā hi saddhiṃ imasmiṃ kappe cattāri kappaṭṭhiyapāṭihāriyāni nāma –
atk-s0202a0:556_6: Iti sā pokkharaṇī naḷena pānīyassa pītattā naḷakapānāti nāmaṃ labhi.
atk-s0202a0:556_7: Aparabhāge taṃ pokkharaṇiṃ nissāya gāmo patiṭṭhāsi,
atk-s0202a0:557_4: te amhehi sadisāva hutvā abhiramantīti dīpenti.
atk-s0202a0:558_0: Neva rājābhinītātiādīsu eko rañño aparādhaṃ katvā palāyati.
atk-s0202a0:558_6: Tassa kocideva suhado gantvā taṃ pavattiṃ ārocetvā tvaṃ sace jīvitumicchasi,
atk-s0202a0:559_0: Eko pana corānaṃ mūlaṃ chindanto carati.
atk-s0202a0:559_4: Corā palātoti sutvā “palātaṭṭhānepi no na muccissati,
atk-s0202a0:560_0: Eko pana bahuṃ iṇaṃ khāditvā tena iṇena aṭṭo pīḷito tamhā gāmā palāyati.
atk-s0202a0:561_0: Rājabhayādīnaṃ pana aññatarena bhayena bhīto aṭṭo āturo hutvā nikkhamma pabbajito bhayaṭṭo nāma.
atk-s0202a0:561_1: Dubbhikkhādīsu jīvituṃ asakkonto pabbajito ājīvikāpakato nāma,
atk-s0202a0:561_3: Imesu pana ekopi imehi kāraṇehi pabbajito nāma natthi,
atk-s0202a0:562_2: yaṃ kāmehi ca akusaladhammehi ca vivittena paṭhamadutiyajjhānasaṅkhātaṃ pītisukhaṃ adhigantabbaṃ,
atk-s0202a0:562_3: sace taṃ vivicca kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi pītisukhaṃ nādhigacchati,
atk-s0202a0:562_4: aññaṃ vā upari dvinnaṃ jhānānaṃ catunnañca maggānaṃ vasena santataraṃ sukhaṃ nādhigacchati,
atk-s0202a0:562_5: tassa ime abhijjhādayo cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhantīti.
atk-s0202a0:562_8: Evaṃ yo pabbajitvā pabbajitakiccaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0202a0:562_9: tassa ime satta pāpadhammā uppajjitvā cittaṃ pariyādiyantīti dassetvā idāni yassa te dhammā cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhanti,
atk-s0202a0:562_10: soyeva samaṇakiccampi kātuṃ na sakkotīti puna vivekaṃ anuruddhā…pe…
atk-s0202a0:563_0: Evaṃ kaṇhapakkhaṃ dassetvā idāni teneva nayena sukkapakkhaṃ dassetuṃ puna vivekantiādimāha.
atk-s0202a0:564_7: Appaṭisandhikassa puna bhave paṭisandhi natthīti vadanto upapattīsu byākaroti nāma.
atk-s0202a0:565_2: Na iti maṃ jano jānātūti evaṃ maṃ mahājano jānissati,
atk-s0202a0:565_3: evaṃ me mahājanassa antare kittisaddo uggacchissatīti imināpi kāraṇena na byākarotīti attho.
atk-s0202a0:566_1: So kho panassa āyasmāti so parinibbuto āyasmā imassa ṭhitassa āyasmato.
atk-s0202a0:566_3: Evaṃdhammoti ettha pana samādhipakkhikā dhammā dhammāti adhippetā.
atk-s0202a0:566_4: Phāsuvihāro hotīti tena bhikkhunā pūritapaṭipattiṃ pūrentassa arahattaphalaṃ sacchikatvā phalasamāpattivihārena phāsuvihāro hoti,
atk-s0202a0:566_5: arahattaṃ pattumasakkontassa paṭipattiṃ pūrayamānassa caratopi phāsuvihāroyeva nāma hoti.
atk-s0202a0:570_4: Taṃ kira upaṭṭhākakule nisinnaṃ upaṭṭhāko āha “asukattherassa me, bhante,
atk-s0202a0:570_6: Sādhu te kataṃ taṃyeva takketvā viharantassa cīvaraṃ dentenāti.
atk-s0202a0:571_1: Tattha yo dvīsu mahātheresu ubhato nisinnesu te anāpucchitvāva cīvarena vā jāṇunā vā ghaṭṭento nisīdati,
atk-s0202a0:571_3: Evaṃ akatvā pana attano pattaāsanasantike ṭhatvā nisīdāvusoti vutte nisīditabbaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:571_5: bhanteti āpucchitvā nisīditabbaṃ āpucchitakālato paṭṭhāya nisīdāti vuttepi avuttepi nisīdituṃ vaṭṭatiyeva.
atk-s0202a0:571_6: Na paṭibāhissāmīti ettha yo attano pattāsanaṃ atikkamitvā navakānaṃ pāpuṇanaṭṭhāne nisīdati,
atk-s0202a0:571_7: ayaṃ nave bhikkhū āsanena paṭibāhati nāma.
atk-s0202a0:571_8: Tasmiñhi tathā nisinne navā bhikkhū “amhākaṃ nisīdituṃ na detī”ti ujjhāyantā tiṭṭhanti vā āsanaṃ vā pariyesantā āhiṇḍanti.
atk-s0202a0:572_4: Atipāto pavisitvā atidivā nikkhamantassa hi cetiyaṅgaṇabodhiyaṅgaṇavattādīni parihāyanti.
atk-s0202a0:572_5: Kālasseva mukhaṃ dhovitvā makkaṭakasuttāni chindantena ussāvabindū nipātentena gāmaṃ pavisitvā yāguṃ
atk-s0202a0:572_6: pariyesitvā yāva bhikkhākālā antogāmeyeva nānappakāraṃ tiracchānakathaṃ kathentena nisīditvā bhattakiccaṃ
atk-s0202a0:572_7: katvā divā nikkhamma bhikkhūnaṃ pādadhovanavelāya vihāraṃ paccāgantabbaṃ hoti.
atk-s0202a0:572_8: Na purebhattaṃ pacchābhattaṃ kulesu cārittaṃ āpajjitabbanti “yo pana bhikkhu nimantito sabhatto samāno
atk-s0202a0:572_9: santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchā purebhattaṃ vā pacchābhattaṃ vā kulesu cārittaṃ āpajjeyya,
atk-s0202a0:572_10: aññatra samayā pācittiya”nti imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ rakkhantena tassa vibhaṅge vuttaṃ purebhattañca pacchābhattañca cārittaṃ na āpajjitabbaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:572_11: Uddhato hoti capaloti uddhaccapakatiko ceva hoti cīvaramaṇḍana-
atk-s0202a0:572_13: senāsanamaṇḍanā imassa vā pūtikāyassa kelāyanā maṇḍanāti evaṃ vuttena ca taruṇadārakāvacāpalyena samannāgato.
atk-s0202a0:573_0: Paññavatā bhavitabbanti cīvarakammādīsu itikattabbesu upāyapaññāya samannāgatena bhavitabbaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:573_1: Abhidhamme abhivinayeti abhidhammapiṭake ceva vinayapiṭake ca pāḷivasena ceva aṭṭhakathāvasena ca yogo karaṇīyo.
atk-s0202a0:573_2: Sabbantimena hi paricchedena abhidhamme dukatikamātikāhi saddhiṃ dhammahadayavibhaṅgaṃ vinā na vaṭṭati.
atk-s0202a0:573_3: Vinaye pana kammākammavinicchayena saddhiṃ suvinicchitāni dve pātimokkhāni vinā na vaṭṭati.
atk-s0202a0:574_0: Āruppāti ettāvatā aṭṭhapi samāpattiyo vuttā honti.
atk-s0202a0:574_1: Tā pana sabbena sabbaṃ asakkontena sattasupi yogo karaṇīyo,
atk-s0202a0:574_4: Sabbantimena paricchedena ekaṃ kasiṇe parikammakammaṭṭhānaṃ paguṇaṃ katvā ādāya vicaritabbaṃ,
atk-s0202a0:574_8: arahattaṃ anabhisambhuṇantena anāgāmiphale sakadāgāmiphale sotāpattiphale vā patiṭṭhātabbaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:574_9: Sabbantimena pariyāyena ekaṃ vipassanāmukhaṃ yāva arahattā paguṇaṃ katvā ādāya vicaritabbaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:574_11: Imaṃ pana desanaṃ āyasmā sāriputto neyyapuggalassa vasena ābhisamācārikavattato paṭṭhāya anupubbena arahattaṃ pāpetvā niṭṭhāpesīti.
atk-s0202a0:578_6: ime pañca ānisaṃse sampassamānā aññatreva rattibhojanā bhuñjatha.
atk-s0202a0:578_8: divā vikālabhojananti imāni dve bhojanāni ekappahārena ajahāpetvā ekasmiṃ samaye divā vikālabhojanameva jahāpesi,
atk-s0202a0:578_9: puna kālaṃ atināmetvā rattiṃ vikālabhojanaṃ jahāpento evamāha. Kasmā?
atk-s0202a0:578_10: Imāni hi dve bhojanāni vattamānāni vaṭṭe āciṇṇāni samāciṇṇāni nadiṃ otiṇṇaudakaṃ viya anupakkhandāni,
atk-s0202a0:578_11: nivātesu ca gharesu subhojanāni bhuñjitvā vaḍḍhitā sukhumālā kulaputtā dve bhojanāni ekappahārena pajahantā kilamanti.
atk-s0202a0:578_12: Tasmā ekappahārena ajahāpetvā bhaddālisutte divā vikālabhojanaṃ jahāpesi,
atk-s0202a0:578_14: Jahāpento pana na tajjitvā vā niggaṇhitvā vā,
atk-s0202a0:578_15: tesaṃ pahānapaccayā pana appābādhatañca sañjānissathāti evaṃ ānisaṃsaṃ dassetvāva jahāpesi.
atk-s0202a0:579_1: Assajipunabbasukāti assaji ca punabbasuko ca chasu chabbaggiyesu dve gaṇācariyā.
atk-s0202a0:579_2: Paṇḍuko lohitako mettiyo bhummajako assaji punabbasukoti ime cha janā chabbaggiyā nāma.
atk-s0202a0:579_3: Tesu paṇḍukalohitakā attano parisaṃ gahetvā sāvatthiyaṃ vasanti,
atk-s0202a0:579_5: ime dve janā kīṭāgirismiṃ āvāsikā honti.
atk-s0202a0:580_4: divasassa tayo vāre bhuñjitvā sukhavedanaṃyeva uppādento na imasmiṃ sāsane kiccakārī nāma hoti,
atk-s0202a0:580_6: ettakā na sevitabbāti etamatthaṃ dassetuṃ imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0202a0:580_7: Evarūpaṃ sukhavedanaṃ pajahathāti idañca gehassitasomanassavasena vuttaṃ,
atk-s0202a0:580_9: Ito paresupi dvīsu vāresu gehassitanekkhammasitānaṃyeva domanassānañca upekkhānañca vasena attho veditabbo.
atk-s0202a0:581_1: Evaṃ sevitabbāsevitabbavedanaṃ dassetvā idāni yesaṃ appamādena kiccaṃ kattabbaṃ,
atk-s0202a0:581_6: Tattha kataṃ tesaṃ appamādenāti tesaṃ yaṃ appamādena kattabbaṃ,
atk-s0202a0:581_9: yattha vasantena sakkā honti maggaphalāni pāpuṇituṃ.
atk-s0202a0:581_10: Indriyāni samannānayamānāti saddhādīni indriyāni samānaṃ kurumānā.
atk-s0202a0:582_6: te pañcāti evaṃ sabbepi ime satta puggalā hontīti imamatthaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0202a0:583_3: So catunnaṃ arūpasamāpattīnaṃ ekekato vuṭṭhāya saṅkhāre sammasitvā arahattaṃ pattānaṃ catunnaṃ,
atk-s0202a0:583_4: nirodhā vuṭṭhāya arahattaṃ pattaanāgāmino ca vasena pañcavidho hoti.
atk-s0202a0:583_7: idhekacco puggalo aṭṭha vimokkhe kāyena phusitvā viharati,
atk-s0202a0:583_8: paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā hontī”ti evaṃ abhidhamme aṭṭhavimokkhalābhino vasena āgatā.
atk-s0202a0:584_2: catūhi jhānehi vuṭṭhāya arahattaṃ pattā cattāro cāti imesaṃ vasena pañcavidhova hoti.
atk-s0202a0:584_4: “na heva kho aṭṭha vimokkhe kāyena phusitvā viharati,
atk-s0202a0:584_5: paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā honti.
atk-s0202a0:585_3: so sotāpattiphalaṭṭhaṃ ādiṃ katvā yāva arahattamaggaṭṭhā chabbidho hontīti veditabbo.
atk-s0202a0:585_5: “idhekacco puggalo aṭṭha vimokkhe kāyena phusitvā viharati,
atk-s0202a0:585_6: paññāya cassa disvā ekacce āsavā parikkhīṇā honti.
atk-s0202a0:586_3: sukho nirodhoti ñātaṃ hoti diṭṭhaṃ viditaṃ sacchikataṃ phusitaṃ paññāyāti diṭṭhippatto.
atk-s0202a0:586_4: Vitthārato panesopi kāyasakkhi viya chabbidho hoti.
atk-s0202a0:586_8: tathāgatappaveditā cassa dhammā paññāya vodiṭṭhā honti vocaritā…pe…
atk-s0202a0:587_6: Tathāgatappaveditā cassa dhammā paññāya vodiṭṭhā honti vocaritā…pe…
atk-s0202a0:587_9: Etesu hi saddhāvimuttassa pubbabhāgamaggakkhaṇe saddahantassa viya okappentassa viya adhimuccantassa viya ca kilesakkhayo hoti,
atk-s0202a0:587_10: diṭṭhippattassa pubbabhāgamaggakkhaṇe kilesacchedakañāṇaṃ adandhaṃ tikhiṇaṃ sūraṃ hutvā vahati.
atk-s0202a0:587_11: Tasmā yathā nāma nātitikhiṇena asinā kadaliṃ chindantassa chinnaṭṭhānaṃ na maṭṭhaṃ hoti,
atk-s0202a0:587_16: Yathā pana nisitaasinā kadaliṃ chindantassa chinnaṭṭhānaṃ maṭṭhaṃ hoti,
