atk-s0202a0:861_0: Padumuttare pana anuppanne eva haṃsavatiyā dve kuṭumbikā saddhā pasannā kapaṇaddhikayācakādīnaṃ dānaṃ paṭṭhapayiṃsu.
atk-s0202a0:861_1: Tadā pabbatavāsino pañcasatā tāpasā haṃsavatiṃ anuppattā.
atk-s0202a0:861_2: Te dvepi janā tāpasagaṇaṃ majjhe bhinditvā upaṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0202a0:861_5: Tadā tesaṃ te yāvajīvaṃ upaṭṭhānaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0202a0:861_6: Tāpasesu bhuñjitvā anumodanaṃ karontesu eko sakkabhavanassa vaṇṇaṃ kathesi,
atk-s0202a0:862_0: Kuṭumbikesu eko sakkabhavanaṃ patthanaṃ katvā sakko hutvā nibbatto,
atk-s0202a0:862_2: Taṃ sakko attano upaṭṭhānaṃ āgataṃ disvā nāgayoniyaṃ abhiramasīti pucchi.
atk-s0202a0:862_4: Tena hi padumuttarassa bhagavato dānaṃ datvā imasmiṃ ṭhāne patthanaṃ karohi,
atk-s0202a0:862_6: Nāgarājā satthāraṃ nimantetvā bhikkhusatasahassaparivārassa bhagavato sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ dadamāno padumuttarassa
atk-s0202a0:862_7: dasabalassa puttaṃ uparevataṃ nāma sāmaṇeraṃ disvā sattame divase buddhappamukhassa saṅghassa dibbavatthāni
atk-s0202a0:862_10: “anāgate gotamassa nāma buddhassa putto rāhulakumāro bhavissatī”ti disvā “samijjhissati te patthanā”ti kathesi.
atk-s0202a0:862_12: Sakko tassa vacanaṃ sutvā tatheva sattāhaṃ dānaṃ datvā bhinnaṃ raṭṭhaṃ sandhāretuṃ pāletuṃ samatthakule
atk-s0202a0:862_13: nibbattitvā saddhāpabbajitaṃ raṭṭhapālaṃ nāma kulaputtaṃ disvā –
atk-s0202a0:862_14: “ahampi anāgate lokasmiṃ tumhādise buddhe uppanne bhinnaṃ raṭṭhaṃ sandhāretuṃ pāletuṃ samatthakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0202a0:862_15: ayaṃ kulaputto viya saddhāpabbajito raṭṭhapālo nāma bhaveyya”nti patthanamakāsi.
atk-s0202a0:865_0: Evaṃ padumuttarasammāsambuddhakāle tassetaṃ nāmaṃ uppannanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:866_3: ahaṃ kho yena yena kāraṇena bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi,
atk-s0202a0:866_4: tena tena me upaparikkhato evaṃ hoti –
atk-s0202a0:866_5: “yadetaṃ sikkhattayabrahmacariyaṃ ekadivasampi akhaṇḍaṃ katvā carimakacittaṃ pāpetabbatāya ekantaparipuṇṇaṃ caritabbaṃ,
atk-s0202a0:866_6: ekadivasampi ca kilesamalena amalīnaṃ katvā carimakacittaṃ pāpetabbatāya ekantaparisuddhaṃ,
atk-s0202a0:866_8: nayidaṃ sukaraṃ agāraṃ ajjhāvasatā agāramajjhe vasantena ekantaparipuṇṇaṃ…pe… carituṃ,
atk-s0202a0:866_9: yaṃnūnāhaṃ kesañca massuñca ohāretvā kāsāyarasapītatāya kāsāyāni brahmacariyaṃ carantānaṃ anucchavikāni
atk-s0202a0:866_10: vatthāni acchādetvā agārasmā nikkhamitvā anagāriyaṃ pabbajeyya”nti.
atk-s0202a0:867_0: Acirapakkantesu thullakoṭṭhikesu brāhmaṇagahapatikesu yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamīti raṭṭhapālo anuṭṭhitesu tesu na bhagavantaṃ pabbajjaṃ yāci. Kasmā?
atk-s0202a0:867_1: Tatthassa bahū ñātisālohitā mittāmaccā santi, te –
atk-s0202a0:867_3: na labbhā tayā pabbajitu”nti bāhāyampi gahetvā ākaḍḍheyyuṃ,
atk-s0202a0:867_4: tato pabbajjāya antarāyo bhavissatīti saheva parisāya uṭṭhahitvā thokaṃ gantvā puna kenaci sarīrakiccalesena
atk-s0202a0:867_9: Bhagavā pana yasmā rāhulakumārassa pabbajitato pabhuti mātāpitūhi ananuññātaṃ puttaṃ na pabbājeti,
atk-s0202a0:867_10: tasmā naṃ pucchi anuññātosi pana tvaṃ,
atk-s0202a0:868_4: añño koci jeṭṭho vā kaniṭṭho vā natthi.
atk-s0202a0:868_5: Ettha ca ekaputtoti vattabbe anukampāvasena ekaputtakoti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:868_11: jātakālato pabhuti dhātīhi aṅkato aṅkaṃ āharitvā dhāriyamāno assakarathakādīhi bālakīḷanakehi kīḷayamāno
atk-s0202a0:868_12: sādurasabhojanaṃ bhojayamāno sukhena parihaṭo. Na tvaṃ,
atk-s0202a0:868_15: tāta raṭṭhapāla appamattakampi kalabhāgaṃ dukkhassa na jānāsi na sarasīti attho.
atk-s0202a0:868_16: Maraṇenapi te mayaṃ akāmakā vinā bhavissāmāti sacepi tava amhesu jīvamānesu maraṇaṃ bhaveyya,
atk-s0202a0:868_17: tena te maraṇenapi mayaṃ akāmakā anicchakā na attano ruciyā vinā bhavissāma,
atk-s0202a0:868_19: Kiṃ pana mayaṃ tanti evaṃ sante kiṃ pana kiṃ nāma taṃ kāraṇaṃ,
atk-s0202a0:868_21: Atha vā kiṃ pana mayaṃ tanti kena pana kāraṇena mayaṃ taṃ jīvantaṃ anujānissāmāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0202a0:869_1: Tatthevāti yattha naṃ ṭhitaṃ mātāpitaro nānujāniṃsu,
atk-s0202a0:869_4: Paricārehīti gandhabbanaṭanāṭakādīni paccupaṭṭhapetvā tattha sahāyakehi saddhiṃ yathāsukhaṃ indriyāni cārehi sañcārehi,
atk-s0202a0:869_5: ito cito ca upanehīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0202a0:869_6: Atha vā paricārehīti gandhabbanaṭanāṭakādīni paccupaṭṭhapetvā sahāyakehi saddhiṃ laḷa upalaḷa rama,
atk-s0202a0:869_8: Kāme paribhuñjantoti attano puttadārehi saddhiṃ bhoge bhuñjanto.
atk-s0202a0:869_9: Puññāni karontoti buddhañca dhammañca saṅghañca ārabbha dānappadānādīni sugatimaggasaṃsodhakāni kusalakammāni karonto.
atk-s0202a0:870_0: Athassa mātāpitaro tikkhattuṃ vatvā paṭivacanampi alabhamānā sahāyake pakkosāpetvā “esa vo sahāyako pabbajitukāmo,
atk-s0202a0:870_10: Pabbajitaṃ pana naṃ mātāpitaropi kālena kālaṃ passissanti,
atk-s0202a0:870_13: divase divase mattikāpattaṃ gahetvā piṇḍāya caritabbaṃ,
atk-s0202a0:870_16: so taṃ carituṃ asakkonto puna idheva āgamissati,
atk-s0202a0:870_19: Mātāpitaropi naṃ “pabbajitena ca pana te mātāpitaro uddassetabbā”ti imaṃ katikaṃ katvā anujāniṃsu.
atk-s0202a0:870_21: “atha kho raṭṭhapālassa kulaputtassa sahāyakā yena raṭṭhapālassa kulaputtassa mātāpitaro…pe…
atk-s0202a0:871_1: Balaṃ gahetvāti sappāyabhojanāni bhuñjanto ucchādanādīhi ca kāyaṃ pariharanto kāyabalaṃ janetvā mātāpitaro
atk-s0202a0:871_2: vanditvā assumukhaṃ ñātiparivaṭṭaṃ pahāya yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami…pe…
atk-s0202a0:871_5: Bhagavā samīpe ṭhitaṃ aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ āmantesi –
atk-s0202a0:871_6: “tena hi bhikkhu raṭṭhapālaṃ pabbājehi ceva upasampādehi cā”ti. Sādhu,
atk-s0202a0:871_7: bhanteti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato paṭissutvā raṭṭhapālaṃ kulaputtaṃ jinadattiyaṃ saddhivihārikaṃ laddhā pabbājesi ceva upasampādesi ca.
atk-s0202a0:871_9: “alattha kho raṭṭhapālo kulaputto bhagavato santike pabbajjaṃ,
atk-s0202a0:872_0: Pahitatto viharantoti dvādasa saṃvaccharāni evaṃ viharanto.
atk-s0202a0:872_2: tasmā puññavā abhinīhārasampannopi samāno “ajja ajjeva arahatta”nti samaṇadhammaṃ karontopi dvādasame vasse arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0202a0:873_0: Yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamīti mayhaṃ mātāpitaro pabbajjaṃ anujānamānā –
atk-s0202a0:873_1: “tayā kālena kālaṃ āgantvā amhākaṃ dassanaṃ dātabba”nti vatvā anujāniṃsu,
atk-s0202a0:873_5: idāni bhagavantaṃ āpucchitvā attānaṃ mātāpitūnaṃ dassessāmīti cintetvā āpucchitukāmo upasaṅkami.
atk-s0202a0:873_6: Manasākāsīti “kiṃ nu kho raṭṭhapāle gate koci upaddavo bhavissatī”ti manasi akāsi.
atk-s0202a0:873_7: Tato “bhavissatī”ti ñatvā “sakkhissati nu kho raṭṭhapālo taṃ madditu”nti olokento tassa arahattasampattiṃ disvā “sakkhissatī”ti aññāsi.
atk-s0202a0:874_6: te me pādadhovanauṇhodakapādamakkhanatelādīni pesissantī”ti cittampi anuppādetvā uyyānameva pāvisi.
atk-s0202a0:875_3: “ime samaṇakā amhākaṃ piyaputtakaṃ pabbājetvā corānaṃ hatthe nikkhipitvā viya ekadivasampi na dassāpenti,
atk-s0202a0:875_4: evaṃ pharusakārakā ete puna imaṃ ṭhānaṃ upasaṅkamitabbaṃ maññanti,
atk-s0202a0:875_5: ettova nikaḍḍhitabbā ete”ti cintetvā etaṃ “imehi muṇḍakehī”tiādivacanaṃ avoca.
atk-s0202a0:875_14: Chaḍḍetukāmā hotīti yasmā antamaso dāsakammakārānaṃ gorūpānampi aparibhogāraho,
atk-s0202a0:875_15: tasmā naṃ kacavaraṃ viya bahi chaḍḍetukāmā hoti.
atk-s0202a0:875_17: Bhaginīti ariyavohārena attano dhātiṃ ñātidāsiṃ ālapati.
atk-s0202a0:875_23: viññatti vā payuttavācā vā na hotīti. Na hoti. Kasmā?
atk-s0202a0:875_27: taṃ sabbaṃ “detha āharatha ākirathā”ti vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0202a0:875_28: Teneva hi ayamāyasmā aggaariyavaṃsiko samānopi evamāha.
atk-s0202a0:876_0: Hatthānanti bhikkhāgahaṇatthaṃ pattaṃ upanāmayato maṇibandhato pabhuti dvinnampi hatthānaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:876_2: Sarassāti sace taṃ bhaginīti vācaṃ nicchārayato sarassa ca.
atk-s0202a0:876_4: “puttassa me raṭṭhapālassa viya suvaṇṇakacchapapiṭṭhisadisā imā hatthapādapiṭṭhiyo,
atk-s0202a0:876_6: madhuro saro”ti gihikāle sallakkhitapubbaṃ ākāraṃ aggahesi sañjāni sallakkhesi.
atk-s0202a0:876_7: Tassa hāyasmato dvādasavassāni araññāvāsañceva piṇḍiyālopabhojanañca paribhuñjantassa aññādiso sarīravaṇṇo ahosi,
atk-s0202a0:876_8: tena naṃ sā ñātidāsī disvāva na sañjāni,
atk-s0202a0:877_1: Raṭṭhapālassa mātaraṃ etadavocāti therassa aṅgapaccaṅgāni saṇṭhāpetvā thaññaṃ pāyetvā saṃvaḍḍhitadhātīpi
atk-s0202a0:877_5: putto raṭṭhapālo”tiādivacanaṃ vattuṃ avisahantī vegena gharaṃ pavisitvā raṭṭhapālassa mātaraṃ etadavoca.
atk-s0202a0:877_7: Sace je saccanti ettha jeti ālapane nipāto.
atk-s0202a0:877_11: sace saccaṃ bhaṇasī”ti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0202a0:878_1: Mahākule itthiyo bahi nikkhamantā garahaṃ pāpuṇanti,
atk-s0202a0:878_5: Aññataraṃ kuṭṭamūlanti tasmiṃ kira dese dānapatīnaṃ gharesu sālā honti,
atk-s0202a0:878_8: Tattha pabbajitā piṇḍāya caritvā nisīditvā bhuñjanti.
atk-s0202a0:878_11: Tasmā tampi aññatarassa kulassa īdisāya sālāya aññataraṃ kuṭṭamūlanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:878_12: Na hi pabbajitā kapaṇamanussā viya asāruppe ṭhāne nisīditvā bhuñjantīti.
atk-s0202a0:879_0: Atthi nāma tātāti ettha atthīti vijjamānatthe,
atk-s0202a0:879_7: yesaṃ no tvaṃ īdise ṭhāne nisīditvā ābhidosikaṃ kummāsaṃ paribhuñjissasi.
atk-s0202a0:879_12: yesaṃ no tvaṃ īdise ṭhāne nisīditvā ābhidosikaṃ kummāsaṃ paribhuñjissasi.
atk-s0202a0:879_15: tava abbhantare sāsanaṃ nissāya paṭiladdho samaṇaguṇo,
atk-s0202a0:879_16: yaṃ tvaṃ subhojanarasasaṃvaḍḍhitopi imaṃ jigucchaneyyaṃ ābhidosikaṃ kummāsaṃ amatamiva nibbikāro paribhuñjissasīti.
atk-s0202a0:879_17: So pana gahapati dukkhābhitunnatāya etamatthaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ katvā vattumasakkonto –
atk-s0202a0:879_26: idaṃ paccakkhampi ahaṃ na saddahāmi na marisayāmī”ti.
atk-s0202a0:879_27: Idaṃ ettakaṃ vacanaṃ gahapati therassa pattamukhavaṭṭiyaṃ gahetvā ṭhitakova kathesi.
atk-s0202a0:879_28: Theropi pitari pattamukhavaṭṭiyaṃ gahetvā ṭhiteyeva taṃ pūtikummāsaṃ paribhuñji sunakhavantasadisaṃ pūtikukkuṭaṇḍamiva bhinnaṭṭhāne pūtikaṃ vāyantaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:879_29: Puthujjanena kira tathārūpaṃ kummāsaṃ paribhuñjituṃ na sakkā.
atk-s0202a0:879_30: Thero pana ariyiddhiyaṃ ṭhatvā dibbojaṃ amatarasaṃ paribhuñjamāno viya paribhuñjitvā dhamakaraṇena udakaṃ
atk-s0202a0:879_31: gahetvā pattañca mukhañca hatthapāde ca dhovitvā kuto no gahapatītiādimāha.
atk-s0202a0:880_1: Neva dānanti deyyadhammavasena neva dānaṃ alatthamha.
atk-s0202a0:880_6: na tāva tāta gehe bhattaṃ sampādiyatī”ti evaṃ paṭisanthāravasena paccakkhānampi na alatthamha.
atk-s0202a0:880_12: Buddhasāsane ca pattantare padumaṃ viya bhasmāchanno aggi viya pheggupaṭicchanno candanasāro viya suttikāpaṭicchannaṃ
atk-s0202a0:880_13: muttaratanaṃ viya valāhakapaṭicchanno candimā viya mādisānaṃ paṭicchannaguṇānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ anto natthi,
atk-s0202a0:881_0: Ehi tātāti tāta tuyhaṃ gharaṃ mā hotu,
atk-s0202a0:881_3: Adhivāsesīti thero pana pakatiyā ukkaṭṭhasapadānacāriko svātanāyabhikkhaṃ nāma nādhivāseti,
atk-s0202a0:881_5: Mātu kirassa theraṃ anussaritvā mahāsoko uppajji,
atk-s0202a0:881_12: Yathā orato ṭhito puriso pārato ṭhitaṃ majjhimappamāṇaṃ purisaṃ na passati,
atk-s0202a0:882_1: Idaṃ te tātāti kahāpaṇapuñjañca suvaṇṇapuñjañca dassento āha.
atk-s0202a0:882_3: idaṃ te mātāmahiyā mātu imaṃ gehaṃ āgacchantiyā gandhamālādīnaṃ atthāya dinnaṃ dhananti attho.
atk-s0202a0:882_4: Aññaṃ pettikaṃ aññaṃ pitāmahanti yaṃ pana te pitu ca pitāmahānañca santakaṃ,
atk-s0202a0:882_7: Ettha ca “pitāmaha”nti taddhitalopaṃ katvā vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:882_10: Taṃ taṃ dhanaṃ rakkhantassa ca rājādīnaṃ vasena dhanaparikkhayaṃ pāpuṇantassa kassaci uppajjamānasokādayo sandhāya evamāha.
atk-s0202a0:882_13: so dāni me dhammakathaṃ kātuṃ āraddho,
atk-s0202a0:882_14: ayaṃ na me vacanaṃ karissatī”ti uṭṭhāya gantvā assa orodhānaṃ dvāraṃ vivarāpetvā –
atk-s0202a0:882_16: gacchatha yaṃ kiñci katvā naṃ gaṇhituṃ vāyamathā”ti uyyojesi.
atk-s0202a0:882_17: Suvaye ṭhitā nāṭakitthiyo nikkhamitvā theraṃ parivārayiṃsu,
atk-s0202a0:882_18: tāsu dve jeṭṭhakitthiyo sandhāya purāṇadutiyikātiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:882_19: Paccekaṃ pādesu gahetvāti ekekamhi pāde naṃ gahetvā.
atk-s0202a0:883_0: Kīdisā nāma tā ayyaputta accharāyoti kasmā evamāhaṃsu?
atk-s0202a0:883_1: Tadā kira sambahule khattiyakumārepi brāhmaṇakumārepi seṭṭhiputtepi mahāsampattiyo pahāya pabbajante
atk-s0202a0:883_2: disvā pabbajjāguṇaṃ ajānantā kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpenti “kasmā ete pabbajantī”ti.
atk-s0202a0:883_6: Atha thero paṭikkhipanto na kho mayaṃ bhaginītiādimāha.
atk-s0202a0:883_8: Tattheva mucchitā papatiṃsūti taṃ bhaginivādena samudācarantaṃ disvā “mayaṃ ajja āgamissati,
atk-s0202a0:883_9: ajja āgamissatī”ti dvādasa vassāni bahi na nikkhantā,
atk-s0202a0:883_10: etaṃ nissāya no dārakā na laddhā,
atk-s0202a0:883_14: tasmā tāpi “idāni mayaṃ anāthā jātā”ti attanova cintayamānā –
atk-s0202a0:883_16: so amhe pajāpatiyo samānā attanā saddhiṃ ekamātukucchiyā sayitadārikā viya maññatī”ti samuppannabalavasokā
atk-s0202a0:884_0: Mā no viheṭhethāti mā amhe dhanaṃ dassetvā mātugāme ca uyyojetvā viheṭhayittha,
atk-s0202a0:884_6: pabbajjāvesaṃ hāretvā nhāyitvā tayo janā ekato bhuñjissāmā”ti maññamāno therassa bhikkhaṃ na deti. Thero –
atk-s0202a0:884_7: “mādisassa khīṇāsavassa āhārantarāyaṃ katvā ete bahuṃ apuññaṃ pasaveyyu”nti tesaṃ anuggahena evamāha.
atk-s0202a0:885_2: Tattha passāti santike ṭhitajanaṃ sandhāya vadati.
atk-s0202a0:885_6: Samussitanti tīṇi aṭṭhisatāni navahi nhārusatehi bandhitvā navahi maṃsapesisatehi limpitvā samantato ussitaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:885_7: Āturanti jarāturatāya rogāturatāya kilesāturatāya ca niccāturaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:885_11: Susāne chaḍḍitakaḷevarabhūtampi cetaṃ kākakulalādayo patthayantiyevāti bahusaṅkappo nāma hoti.
atk-s0202a0:885_12: Yassa natthi dhuvaṃ ṭhitīti yassa kāyassa māyāmarīcipheṇapiṇḍa udakapupphuḷādīnaṃ viya ekaṃseneva ṭhiti nāma natthi,
atk-s0202a0:886_1: Saha vatthebhi sobhatīti gandhādīhi maṇikuṇḍalehi ca cittakatampi rūpaṃ vatthehi saheva sobhati,
atk-s0202a0:887_1: Cuṇṇakamakkhitanti sāsapakakkena mukhapīḷakādīni nīharitvā loṇamattikāya duṭṭhalohitaṃ viliyāpetvā tilapiṭṭhena
atk-s0202a0:887_2: lohitaṃ pasādetvā haliddiyā vaṇṇaṃ sampādetvā cuṇṇakagaṇḍikāya mukhaṃ paharanti,
atk-s0202a0:888_0: Aṭṭhāpadakatāti rasodakena makkhitvā nalāṭapariyante āvattanaparivatte katvā aṭṭhapadakaracanāya racitā.
atk-s0202a0:889_5: Imāya hi gāthāya thero mātāpitaro migaluddake viya katvā dassesi,
atk-s0202a0:889_10: Yathā hi mahāmigo yāvadatthaṃ nivāpatiṇaṃ khāditvā pānīyaṃ pivitvā gīvaṃ ukkhipitvā disaṃ oloketvā “imaṃ
atk-s0202a0:889_11: nāma ṭhānaṃ gatassa sotthi bhavissatī”ti migaluddakānaṃ paridevantānaṃyeva vākaraṃ aghaṭṭayamānova uppatitvā
atk-s0202a0:889_12: araññaṃ pavisitvā ghanacchāyassa chattassa viya gumbassa heṭṭhā mandamandena vātena bījayamāno āgatamaggaṃ
atk-s0202a0:889_14: evameva thero imā gāthā bhāsitvā ākāseneva gantvā migacīre paccupaṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0202a0:890_1: Pitā kirassa seṭṭhi sattasu dvārakoṭṭhakesu aggaḷaṃ dāpetvā malle āṇāpesi –
atk-s0202a0:890_3: hatthapādesu naṃ gahetvā kāsāyāni haritvā gihivesaṃ gaṇhāpethā”ti.
atk-s0202a0:890_5: “ete mādisaṃ mahākhīṇāsavaṃ hatthe vā pāde vā gahetvā apuññaṃ pasaveyyuṃ,
atk-s0202a0:890_6: taṃ nesaṃ mā ahosī”ti cintetvā ākāsena agamāsi.
atk-s0202a0:890_8: “ṭhitakova imā gāthā bhāsitvā vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā rañño korabyassa migacīre paccupaṭṭhāsī”ti ayaṃ vācanāmaggoyeva.
atk-s0202a0:891_2: Sodhentoti uyyānamaggaṃ samaṃ kāretvā antouyyāne tacchitabbayuttaṭṭhānāni tacchāpento sammajjitabbayuttāni ṭhānāni sammajjāpento vālukāokiraṇa-
atk-s0202a0:891_6: Yena rājā korabyo tenupasaṅkamīti amhākaṃ rājā sadā imassa kulaputtassa vaṇṇaṃ kathesi,
atk-s0202a0:891_10: gantvā rañño ārocessāmīti cintetvā yena rājā korabyo tenupasaṅkami.
atk-s0202a0:892_0: Kittayamāno ahosīti so kira rājā theraṃ anussaritvā balamajjhepi nāṭakamajjhepi –
atk-s0202a0:892_1: “dukkaraṃ kataṃ kulaputtena tāva mahantaṃ sampattiṃ pahāya pabbajitvā punanivattitvā anapalokentenā”ti guṇaṃ kathesi,
atk-s0202a0:892_3: Vissajjethāti vatvāti orodhamahāmattabalakāyādīsu yassa yaṃ anucchavikaṃ,
atk-s0202a0:892_6: mahāmattamahāraṭṭhikādīnaṃ vasena uggatuggatameva parisaṃ gahetvā upasaṅkamīti attho.
atk-s0202a0:892_7: Idha bhavaṃ raṭṭhapālo hatthatthare nisīdatūti hatthattharo tanuko bahalapupphādiguṇaṃ katvā atthato abhilakkhito hoti,
atk-s0202a0:892_8: tādise anāpucchitvā nisīdituṃ na yuttanti maññamāno evamāha.
atk-s0202a0:894_5: yassa vā pana puṭabhattaṃ viya tatheva tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0202a0:894_9: Nātisītāya naccuṇhāyāti teneva kāraṇena nātisītāya naccuṇhāya.
atk-s0202a0:895_6: Anabhissaroti asaraṇo abhisaritvā abhigantvā assāsetuṃ samatthena virahito.
atk-s0202a0:895_8: Sabbaṃ pahāya gamanīyanti sakabhaṇḍanti sallakkhitaṃ sabbaṃ pahāya lokena gantabbaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:896_6: Yassa hi phalakañca āvudhañca gahetvā parasenaṃ pavisitvā abhinnaṃ bhindato bhinnaṃ sandhārayato parahatthagataṃ rajjaṃ āharituṃ ūrubalaṃ atthi,
atk-s0202a0:897_0: Pariyodhāya vattissantīti uppannaṃ uppaddavaṃ odhāya avattharitvā vattissantīti sallakkhetvā gahitā.
atk-s0202a0:898_2: imasmiṃ rājakule pahūtaṃ hiraññasuvaṇṇanti idaṃ so rājā upari dhammuddesassa kāraṇaṃ āharanto āha.
atk-s0202a0:899_0: Athāparaṃ etadavocāti etaṃ “passāmi loke”tiādinā nayena catunnaṃ dhammuddesānaṃ anugītiṃ avoca.
atk-s0202a0:900_1: Tattha bhiyyova kāme abhipatthayantīti ekaṃ labhitvā dve patthayanti,
atk-s0202a0:900_2: dve labhitvā cattāroti evaṃ uttaruttari vatthukāmakilesakāme patthayantiyeva.
atk-s0202a0:901_2: Oraṃ samuddassāti yaṃ samuddassa orato sakaraṭṭhaṃ,
atk-s0202a0:902_0: Aho vatā noti aho vata nu,
atk-s0202a0:902_2: Amarāti cāhūti amaraṃ iti ca āhu.
atk-s0202a0:902_4: yaṃ mataṃ ñātī parivāretvā kandanti, taṃ –
atk-s0202a0:903_5: Bālo ca bālyā vadhitova setīti bālo bālabhāvena maraṇaphassaṃ āgamma vadhitova seti abhihatova sayati.
atk-s0202a0:903_6: Akataṃ vata me kalyāṇantiādivippaṭisāravasena calati vedhati vipphandati.
atk-s0202a0:903_7: Dhīro ca na vedhatīti dhīro sugatinimittaṃ passanto na vedhati na calati.
atk-s0202a0:904_0: Yāya vosānaṃ idhādhigacchatīti yāya paññāya imasmiṃ loke sabbakiccavosānaṃ arahattaṃ adhigacchati,
atk-s0202a0:905_0: Upeti gabbhañca parañca lokanti tesu pāpaṃ karontesu yo koci satto paramparāya saṃsāraṃ āpajjitvā gabbhañca parañca lokaṃ upeti.
atk-s0202a0:905_1: Tassappapaññoti tassa tādisassa appapaññassa añño appapañño abhisaddahanto.
atk-s0202a0:906_0: Sakammunā haññatīti attanā katakammavasena “kasāhipi tāletī”tiādīhi kammakāraṇāhi haññati.
atk-s0202a0:906_1: Pecca paramhi loketi ito gantvā paramhi apāyaloke.
atk-s0202a0:907_5: Apaṇṇakaṃ sāmaññameva seyyoti aviruddhaṃ advajjhagāmiṃ ekantaniyyānikaṃ sāmaññameva “seyyo,
atk-s0202a0:907_9: idaṃ disvā ca sutvā ca pabbajitosmīti maṃ dhārehīti desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesīti.
atk-s0202a0:911_2: Tattha maghadevaambavaneti pubbe maghadevo nāma rājā taṃ ambavanaṃ ropesi.
atk-s0202a0:911_3: Tesu rukkhesu palujjamānesu aparabhāge aññepi rājāno ropesuṃyeva.
atk-s0202a0:911_4: Taṃ pana paṭhamavohāravasena maghadevambavananteva saṅkhaṃ gataṃ.
atk-s0202a0:911_5: Sitaṃ pātvākāsīti sāyanhasamaye vihāracārikaṃ caramāno ramaṇīyaṃ bhūmibhāgaṃ disvā –
atk-s0202a0:911_6: “vasitapubbaṃ nu kho me imasmiṃ okāse”ti āvajjanto –
atk-s0202a0:911_7: “pubbe ahaṃ maghadevo nāma rājā hutvā imaṃ ambavanaṃ ropesiṃ,
atk-s0202a0:911_8: ettheva pabbajitvā cattāro brahmavihāre bhāvetvā brahmaloke nibbattiṃ.
atk-s0202a0:911_9: Taṃ kho panetaṃ kāraṇaṃ bhikkhusaṅghassa apākaṭaṃ,
atk-s0202a0:911_10: pākaṭaṃ karissāmī”ti aggaggadante dassento sitaṃ pātu akāsi.
atk-s0202a0:912_4: Tatra brāhmaṇagahapatikesūti yopi so pubbarājūhi brāhmaṇānaṃ dinnaparihāro,
atk-s0202a0:912_10: cātuddasapannarasānaṃ paccuggamanānuggamanavasena terasiyañca pāṭipade cāti ime divasā pāṭihārikapakkhāti veditabbā.
atk-s0202a0:913_3: Sirasmiñhi palitesu pātubhūtesu maccurājassa santike ṭhito viya hoti,
atk-s0202a0:913_6: Yathā hi alaṅkatapaṭiyattāya devatāya ākāse ṭhatvā “asukadivase marissatī”ti vutte taṃ tatheva hoti,
atk-s0202a0:913_7: evaṃ sirasmiṃ palitesu pātubhūtesu devatābyākaraṇasadisameva hoti.
atk-s0202a0:913_10: Sabbabodhisattā hi jiṇṇabyādhitamatapabbajite disvāva saṃvegamāpajjitvā nikkhamma pabbajanti. Yathāha –
atk-s0202a0:918_0: Iminā pariyāyena palitāni visuddhidevānaṃ dūtattā devadūtāti vuccanti.
atk-s0202a0:919_0: Kappakassa gāmavaraṃ datvāti satasahassuṭṭhānakaṃ jeṭṭhakagāmaṃ datvā.
atk-s0202a0:919_3: Tassa hi añjalismiṃ ṭhapitāni palitāni disvāva saṃvego uppajjati.
atk-s0202a0:919_5: evaṃ santepi maccurājassa santike ṭhitaṃ viya attānaṃ maññamāno saṃviggo pabbajjaṃ roceti.
atk-s0202a0:925_1: Kesamassuṃ ohāretvāti tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajantāpi hi paṭhamaṃ kesamassuṃ ohāretvā pabbajanti,
atk-s0202a0:925_2: tato paṭṭhāya vaḍḍhite kese bandhitvā jaṭākalāpadharā hutvā vicaranti.
atk-s0202a0:925_4: Pabbajito pana anesanaṃ ananuyuñjitvā rājagehato āhaṭabhikkhāya yāpento brahmavihāraṃ bhāvesi.
atk-s0202a0:926_0: Kumārakīḷitaṃ kīḷīti aṅkena aṅkaṃ parihariyamāno kīḷi.
atk-s0202a0:926_1: Mālākalāpaṃ viya hi naṃ ukkhipitvāva vicariṃsu.
atk-s0202a0:926_3: pabbajīti imassa pabbajitadivase pañca maṅgalāni ahesuṃ.
atk-s0202a0:926_8: tassa puttassa nāmakaraṇamaṅgalanti ekasmiṃyeva samaye pañca maṅgalāni ahesuṃ,
atk-s0202a0:927_1: Puttapaputtakāti puttā ca puttaputtā cāti evaṃ pavattā tassa paramparā.
atk-s0202a0:927_4: “pavattati nu kho taṃ mayā manussaloke nihataṃ kalyāṇavatta”nti āvajjanto addasa –
atk-s0202a0:927_7: Na kho panāhaṃ mayhaṃ paveṇiyā ucchijjituṃ dassāmīti attano vaṃse jātaraññoyeva aggamahesiyā kucchismiṃ
atk-s0202a0:927_8: paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā attano vaṃsassa nemiṃ ghaṭento viya nibbatto,
atk-s0202a0:927_10: Iti so pabbajitarājūnaṃ sabbapacchimako hutvā pabbajitoti pabbajjāpacchimako ahosi.
atk-s0202a0:927_12: Tassa hi sabbarājūhi atirekatarā dve guṇā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0202a0:927_13: Catūsu dvāresu satasahassaṃ satasahassaṃ vissajjetvā devasikaṃ dānaṃ adāsi,
atk-s0202a0:927_15: Anuposathikesu hi rājānaṃ passissāmāti gatesu dovāriko pucchati “tumhe uposathikā no vā”ti.
atk-s0202a0:927_17: te nivāreti “anuposathikānaṃ rājā dassanaṃ na detī”ti.
atk-s0202a0:927_18: “Mayaṃ janapadavāsino kāle bhojanaṃ kuhiṃ labhissāmā”tipi tattha vacanokāso natthi.
atk-s0202a0:927_19: Catūsu hi dvāresu rājaṅgaṇe ca anekāni bhattacāṭisahassāni paṭiyattāneva honti.
atk-s0202a0:927_20: Tasmā mahājano icchiticchitaṭṭhāne massuṃ kāretvā nhāyitvā vatthāni parivattetvā yathārucitaṃ bhojanaṃ
atk-s0202a0:927_21: bhuñjitvā uposathaṅgāni adhiṭṭhāya rañño gehadvāraṃ gacchati.
atk-s0202a0:927_23: Tena hi āgacchathāti pavesetvā rañño dasseti.
atk-s0202a0:927_24: Iti imehi dvīhi guṇehi atirekataro ahosi.
atk-s0202a0:928_2: Te kira devā videharaṭṭhe mithilanagaravāsino rañño ovāde ṭhatvā pañca sīlāni rakkhitvā uposathakammaṃ
atk-s0202a0:928_3: katvā tattha nibbattā rañño guṇakathaṃ kathenti.
atk-s0202a0:929_0: Nisinno hotīti pāsādavarassa uparigato dānañca sīlañca upaparikkhamāno nisinno hoti.
atk-s0202a0:929_7: Tassa “idaṃ mahantaṃ idaṃ mahanta”nti nicchituṃ asakkontasseva sakko gantvā purato pāturahosi.
atk-s0202a0:929_16: Rājā adiṭṭhapubbaṃ rūpaṃ disvā bhīto ahosi lomahaṭṭhajāto.
atk-s0202a0:932_0: Dānaṃ vā brahmacariyaṃ vā, katamaṃ su mahapphala”nti. –
atk-s0202a0:933_4: dasavassasahassāni dasannaṃ jaṭilasahassānaṃ dānaṃ datvā pettivisayato na mutto,
atk-s0202a0:933_5: sīlavantā pana mayhaṃ dānaṃ bhuñjitvā brahmaloke nibbattā”ti vatvā imā gāthā avoca –
atk-s0202a0:936_0: Na hete sulabhā kāyā, yācayogena kenaci;
atk-s0202a0:938_0: Evaṃ rañño kaṅkhaṃ vinodetvā devalokagamanāya paṭiññāgahaṇatthaṃ lābhā te mahārājātiādimāha.
atk-s0202a0:938_3: puññavantānaṃ pana vasanaṭṭhānaṃ disvā āgatena manussapathe sukhaṃ kathetuṃ hotīti adhivāsesi.
atk-s0202a0:939_1: Evaṃ bhaddantavāti evaṃ hotu bhaddakaṃ tava vacananti vatvā.
atk-s0202a0:939_12: tasmā heṭṭhāmukhaṃ rathaṃ pesesīti na sallakkhetabbaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:939_14: evameva manussānaṃ sāyamāsabhatte niṭṭhite candena saddhiṃ yuganaddhaṃ katvā pesesi,
atk-s0202a0:939_23: Evaṃ rathaṃ āharitvā rañño pāsādaṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pācīnasīhapañjaraṭṭhāne rathaṃ nivattetvā āgatamaggābhimukhaṃ
atk-s0202a0:940_3: yaṃ me sakkena devaraññā dibbaratho pesito,
atk-s0202a0:940_4: so ca kho na jātigottaṃ vā kulappadesaṃ vā paṭicca pesito,
atk-s0202a0:940_10: appamattā hothā”ti mahājanaṃ ovaditvā pañcasu sīlesu patiṭṭhāpetvā rathaṃ abhiruhi.
atk-s0202a0:940_11: Tato mātali saṅgāhako “ahampi mahārājassa mamānucchavikaṃ karissāmī”ti ākāsamhi dve magge dassetvā apica mahārājātiādimāha.
atk-s0202a0:941_4: Yenāti yena maggena gantvā yattha pāpakammantā pāpakānaṃ kammānaṃ vipākaṃ paṭisaṃvediyanti,
atk-s0202a0:941_5: taṃ ṭhānaṃ sakkā hoti passitunti attho.
atk-s0202a0:943_0: Yena vā pāpakammantā, puññakammā ca ye narā”ti. –
atk-s0202a0:947_0: Ubhayeneva maṃ mātali nehīti mātali dvīhi maggehi maṃ nehi,
atk-s0202a0:947_4: Tato mātali attano ānubhāvena rājānaṃ pañcadasa mahāniraye dassesi.
atk-s0202a0:950_1: Nirayaṃ dassetvā rathaṃ nivattetvā devalokābhimukhaṃ gantvā bīraṇīdevadhītāya soṇadinnadevaputtassa gaṇadevaputtānañca
atk-s0202a0:958_0: Evaṃ gacchato pana tassa rathanemi vaṭṭiyā cittakūṭadvārakoṭṭhakassa ummāre pahatamatteva devanagare kolāhalaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0202a0:958_1: Sakkaṃ devarājānaṃ ekakaṃyeva ohāya devasaṅgho mahāsattaṃ paccuggamanamakāsi,
atk-s0202a0:958_2: taṃ devatānaṃ ādaraṃ disvā sakko cittaṃ sandhāretuṃ asakkonto –
atk-s0202a0:958_6: “ayaṃ rājā ajja āgantvā ekadivaseneva devagaṇaṃ attano abhimukhamakāsi.
atk-s0202a0:958_11: tuyhaṃ imasmiṃ devaloke vasituṃ puññaṃ natthi,
atk-s0202a0:958_12: aññesaṃ puññena vasāhī”ti iminā adhippāyena evamāha.
atk-s0202a0:958_15: paraṃ nissāya laddhaṃ kho pana yācitvā laddhabhaṇḍakaṃ viya hotī”ti paṭikkhipanto alaṃ mārisātiādimāha.
atk-s0202a0:962_1: Bodhisatto pana manussattabhāvena kativāre devalokaṃ gatoti. Cattāro –
atk-s0202a0:962_3: So mandhātukāle devaloke asaṅkhyeyyaṃ kālaṃ vasi,
atk-s0202a0:962_7: Guttilavīṇāvādakakāle ca nimirājakāle ca muhuttamattaṃ vasi,
atk-s0202a0:963_0: 314. Tattheva mithilaṃ paṭinesīti paṭinetvā pakatisirigabbheyeva patiṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0202a0:964_3: Na so agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajīti ettakamattameva na akāsi,
atk-s0202a0:965_1: Samucchedo hotīti ettha kalyāṇavattaṃ ko samucchindati,
atk-s0202a0:965_4: kena pavattitaṃ nāma hotīti ayaṃ vibhāgo veditabbo.
atk-s0202a0:965_5: Tattha sīlavā bhikkhu “na sakkā mayā arahattaṃ laddhu”nti vīriyaṃ akaronto samucchindati.
atk-s0202a0:969_2: Tattha mahākaccānoti gihikāle ujjenikarañño purohitaputto abhirūpo dassanīyo pāsādiko suvaṇṇavaṇṇo ca.
atk-s0202a0:969_6: Vuddho ceva arahā cāti daharaṃ arahantampi na tathā sambhāventi yathā mahallakaṃ,
atk-s0202a0:969_7: thero pana vuddho ceva ahosi arahā ca. Brāhmaṇā,
atk-s0202a0:969_8: bho kaccānāti so kira rājā brāhmaṇaladdhiko,
atk-s0202a0:969_10: Brāhmaṇova seṭṭho vaṇṇotiādīsu jātigottādīnaṃ paññāpanaṭṭhāne brāhmaṇāva seṭṭhāti dasseti.
atk-s0202a0:969_11: Hīno añño vaṇṇoti itare tayo vaṇṇā hīnā lāmakāti vadati.
atk-s0202a0:969_16: Orasā mukhato jātāti ure vasitvā mukhato nikkhantā,
atk-s0202a0:970_4: Khattiyopissāssāti khattiyopi assa issariyasampattassa pubbuṭṭhāyī assa.
atk-s0202a0:970_5: Nesaṃ ettha kiñcīti na etesaṃ ettha kiñci.
atk-s0202a0:971_1: Āsanena vā nimanteyyāmāti nisinnāsanaṃ papphoṭetvā idha nisīdāti vadeyyāma.
atk-s0202a0:971_3: Tattha duvidho abhihāro vācāya ceva kāyena ca.
atk-s0202a0:971_4: “Tumhākaṃ icchiticchitakkhaṇe mamaṃ cīvarādīhi vadeyyātha yenattho”ti vadanto hi vācāya abhiharitvā nimanteti nāma.
atk-s0202a0:971_5: Cīvarādivekallaṃ sallakkhetvā “idaṃ gaṇhathā”ti tāni dento pana kāyena abhiharitvā nimanteti nāma.
atk-s0202a0:971_8: Yā panesā āvudhahatthe purise ṭhapentena rakkhā,
atk-s0202a0:971_9: sā dhammikā nāma saṃvihitā na hoti.
atk-s0202a0:971_10: Yathā pana avelāya kaṭṭhahārikāpaṇṇahārikādayo vihāraṃ na pavisanti,
atk-s0202a0:971_11: migaluddakādayo vihārasīmāya mige vā macche vā na gaṇhanti,
atk-s0202a0:971_12: evaṃ saṃvidahantena dhammikā nāma saṃvihitā hoti.
atk-s0202a0:972_0: Evaṃ santeti evaṃ catunnampi vaṇṇānaṃ pabbajitānaṃ pabbajitasakkārena same samāne.
atk-s0202a0:976_3: So ca maṅgalapāsādo olokanakapadumaṃ dassetvā kato,
atk-s0202a0:977_1: Yāva pacchimasopānakaḷevarāti ettha pacchimasopānakaḷevaranti paṭhamaṃ sopānaphalakaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:977_2: Addasā khoti olokanatthaṃyeva dvārakoṭṭhake ṭhito addasa.
atk-s0202a0:977_3: Bhagavā tuṇhī ahosīti “kissa nu kho atthāya rājakumārena ayaṃ mahāsakkāro kato”ti āvajjanto puttapatthanāya katabhāvaṃ aññāsi.
atk-s0202a0:977_6: “buddhānaṃ kira adhikāraṃ katvā manasā icchitaṃ labhantī”ti. So –
atk-s0202a0:977_11: Atha bhagavā “nibbattissati nu kho etassa putto”ti āvajjetvā “na nibbattissatī”ti addasa.
atk-s0202a0:978_0: Pubbe kira so ekasmiṃ dīpe vasamāno samacchandena sakuṇapotake khādi.
atk-s0202a0:978_3: Ubhohi pana samānacchandehi hutvā pāpakammaṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0202a0:978_6: “buddhānaṃ adhikāraṃ katvā patthitapatthitaṃ labhantīti loke anussavo,
atk-s0202a0:978_13: Etarahi ca akkamantesu bahū bhikkhū paracittaviduno,
atk-s0202a0:978_24: ime paṭipattiṃ pūretuṃ na sakkontī”ti manussā vippaṭisārino bhavissantīti imehi kāraṇehi bhagavā akkamituṃ anicchanto tuṇhī ahosi.
atk-s0202a0:978_28: Maṅgalatthāya paññattaṃ anakkamantesu pana akkamanatthāya anupaññattiṃ ṭhapesi – “gihī,
atk-s0202a0:979_1: Pacchimaṃ janataṃ tathāgato anukampatīti idaṃ thero vuttesu kāraṇesu tatiyaṃ kāraṇaṃ sandhāyāha.
atk-s0202a0:979_2: Na kho sukhena sukhanti kasmā āha?
atk-s0202a0:979_4: tasmā ahampi satthārā samānacchando bhavissāmīti maññamāno evamāha.
atk-s0202a0:980_1: So kho ahantiādi “yāva rattiyā pacchime yāme”ti tāva mahāsaccake vuttanayena veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:980_2: Tato paraṃ yāva pañcavaggiyānaṃ āsavakkhayā pāsarāsisutte vuttanayena veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:981_6: Kosambiyaṃ kira parantaparājā nāma rajjaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0202a0:981_7: Rājamahesī garubhārā ākāsatale raññā saddhiṃ bālātapaṃ tappamānā rattakambalaṃ pārupitvā nisinnā hoti,
atk-s0202a0:981_8: eko hatthiliṅgasakuṇo “maṃsapesī”ti maññamāno gahetvā ākāsaṃ pakkhandi.
atk-s0202a0:981_14: Tiyāmarattiṃ deve vassante kambalaṃ pārupitvā nisīdi.
atk-s0202a0:981_16: So tassā saddena aruṇe uggate rukkhamūlaṃ āgato jātiṃ pucchitvā nisseṇiṃ bandhitvā otāretvā attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ netvā yāguṃ pāyesi.
atk-s0202a0:981_17: Dārakassa meghautuñca pabbatautuñca gahetvā jātattā udenoti nāmaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0202a0:981_18: Tāpaso phalāphalāni āharitvā dvepi jane posesi.
atk-s0202a0:982_0: Sā ekadivasaṃ tāpasassa āgamanavelāya paccuggamanaṃ katvā itthikuttaṃ dassetvā tāpasaṃ sīlabhedaṃ āpādesi.
atk-s0202a0:982_1: Tesaṃ ekato vasantānaṃ kāle gacchante parantaparājā kālaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0202a0:982_2: Tāpaso rattibhāge nakkhattaṃ oloketvā rañño matabhāvaṃ ñatvā –
atk-s0202a0:982_4: putto te kiṃ idha vasituṃ icchati,
atk-s0202a0:982_5: udāhu pettike rajje chattaṃ ussāpetu”nti pucchi.
atk-s0202a0:982_6: Sā puttassa ādito paṭṭhāya sabbaṃ pavattiṃ ācikkhitvā chattaṃ ussāpetukāmatañcassa ñatvā tāpasassa ārocesi.
atk-s0202a0:982_10: Pubbe kirassa sakko upaṭṭhānaṃ āgantvā “kena kilamathā”ti pucchi.
atk-s0202a0:982_12: Tassa sakko hatthiganthañceva vīṇakañca datvā “palāpetukāmatāya sati imaṃ tantiṃ vādetvā imaṃ silokaṃ vadeyyātha,
atk-s0202a0:982_13: pakkositukāmatāya sati imaṃ silokaṃ vadeyyāthā”ti āha.
atk-s0202a0:982_15: So ekaṃ vaṭarukkhaṃ abhiruhitvā hatthīsu āgatesu tantiṃ vādetvā silokaṃ vadati,
atk-s0202a0:983_0: So sippassa ānubhāvaṃ ñatvā punadivase pakkosanasippaṃ payojesi.
atk-s0202a0:983_2: So tassa khandhagato yuddhasamatthe taruṇahatthī uccinitvā kambalañca muddikañca gahetvā mātāpitaro vanditvā
atk-s0202a0:983_3: nikkhanto anupubbena taṃ taṃ gāmaṃ pavisitvā –
atk-s0202a0:983_5: sampattiṃ atthikā āgacchantū”ti janasaṅgahaṃ katvā nagaraṃ parivāretvā –
atk-s0202a0:983_7: mayhaṃ chattaṃ dethā”ti asaddahantānaṃ kambalañca muddikañca dassetvā chattaṃ ussāpesi.
atk-s0202a0:983_8: So hatthivittako hutvā “asukaṭṭhāne sundaro hatthī atthī”ti vutte gantvā gaṇhāti.
atk-s0202a0:983_9: Caṇḍapajjoto “tassa santike sippaṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti kaṭṭhahatthiṃ payojetvā tassa anto yodhe nisīdāpetvā
atk-s0202a0:983_10: taṃ hatthiṃ gahaṇatthāya āgataṃ gaṇhitvā tassa santike sippaṃ gahaṇatthāya dhītaraṃ uyyojesi.
atk-s0202a0:983_11: So tāya saddhiṃ saṃvāsaṃ kappetvā taṃ gahetvā attano nagaraṃyeva agamāsi.
atk-s0202a0:983_12: Tassā kucchiyaṃ uppanno ayaṃ bodhirājakumāro attano pitu santike sippaṃ uggaṇhi.
atk-s0202a0:984_5: Sā panesā āgamanasaddhā adhigamasaddhā okappanasaddhā pasādasaddhāti catubbidhā.
atk-s0202a0:984_6: Tattha sabbaññubodhisattānaṃ saddhā abhinīhārato paṭṭhāya āgatattā āgamanasaddhā nāma.
atk-s0202a0:984_8: Buddho dhammo saṅghoti vutte acalabhāvena okappanaṃ okappanasaddhā nāma.
atk-s0202a0:984_14: iminā pana aṅgena tīsupi ratanesu saddhā adhippetā.
atk-s0202a0:985_4: Nātisītāya nāccuṇhāyāti atisītagahaṇiko hi sītabhīrū hoti,
atk-s0202a0:985_9: Yathābhūtaṃ attānaṃ āvikattāti yathābhūtaṃ attano aguṇaṃ pakāsetā.
atk-s0202a0:985_10: Udayatthagāminiyāti udayañca atthañca gantuṃ paricchindituṃ samatthāya,
atk-s0202a0:985_14: Sammādukkhakkhayagāminiyāti tadaṅgavasena kilesānaṃ pahīnattā yaṃ dukkhaṃ khīyati,
atk-s0202a0:985_16: Iti sabbehipi imehi padehi vipassanāpaññāva kathitā.
atk-s0202a0:985_18: Imāni ca pañca padhāniyaṅgāni lokiyāneva veditabbāni.
atk-s0202a0:986_1: Sāyamanusiṭṭho pāto visesaṃ adhigamissatīti atthaṅgate sūriye anusiṭṭho aruṇuggamane visesaṃ adhigamissati.
atk-s0202a0:986_4: Dandhapañño hi neyyapuggalo sattahi divasehi arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0202a0:986_7: Aho buddho aho dhammo aho dhammassa svākkhātatāti yasmā buddhadhammānaṃ uḷāratāya dhammassa ca svākkhātatāya
atk-s0202a0:986_8: pāto kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathāpetvā sāyaṃ arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0202a0:987_3: kucchigatoti kiṃ panevaṃ saraṇaṃ gahitaṃ hotīti. Na hoti.
atk-s0202a0:987_8: so ca sallakkhetvā “ahaṃ saraṇaṃ gato upāsako”ti satiṃ uppādeti,
atk-s0202a0:991_2: Tattha aṅgulīnaṃ mālaṃ dhāretīti kasmā dhāreti?
atk-s0202a0:992_0: Ayaṃ kira kosalarañño purohitassa mantāṇiyā nāma brāhmaṇiyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ aggahesi.
atk-s0202a0:992_2: Tassa mātukucchito nikkhamanakāle sakalanagare āvudhāni pajjaliṃsu,
atk-s0202a0:992_3: rañño maṅgalasakuntopi sirisayane ṭhapitā asilaṭṭhipi pajjali.
atk-s0202a0:992_4: Brāhmaṇo nikkhamitvā nakkhattaṃ olokento coranakkhattena jātoti rañño santikaṃ gantvā sukhaseyyabhāvaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0202a0:993_4: rajjassa vā jīvitassa vā antarāyo bhavissati maññe”ti. Mā bhāyi, mahārāja,
atk-s0202a0:993_13: Evaṃ vatvā ca pana rañño manaṃ gaṇhitukāmo āha –
atk-s0202a0:993_20: kappāsapicumhi ṭhapitaṃ tālavaṇṭakaraṇasatthakanti ete pajjalantā kiñci na hiṃsiṃsu,
atk-s0202a0:994_12: Tato ekaṃ kharamantaṃ mantayiṃsu “ācariyassa antaraṃ katvā naṃ bhindissāmā”ti tayo rāsī hutvā paṭhamaṃ
atk-s0202a0:994_20: mā me puttaṃ mayhaṃ antare paribhindathā”ti niṭṭhubhi.
atk-s0202a0:994_22: atha itarehi tayopi koṭṭhāsā āgantvā tatheva vatvā –
atk-s0202a0:995_0: Ācariyo sinehena vadante disvā “atthi maññe santhavo”ti paribhijjitvā cintesi “ghātemi na”nti.
atk-s0202a0:995_2: “sace ghātessāmi ‘disāpāmokkho ācariyo attano santikaṃ sippuggahaṇatthaṃ āgate māṇavake dosaṃ uppādetvā jīvitā voropetī’ti.
atk-s0202a0:995_5: atha naṃ sippassa pariyosānupacāroti vatvā jaṅghasahassaṃ ghātehīti vakkhāmi.
atk-s0202a0:995_6: Avassaṃ ettha eko uṭṭhāya taṃ ghātessatī”ti.
atk-s0202a0:996_2: evaṃ te sippassa upacāro kato bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0202a0:996_5: Aladdhupacāraṃ sippaṃ phalaṃ na deti tātāti.
atk-s0202a0:996_6: So pañcāvudhaṃ gahetvā ācariyaṃ vanditvā aṭaviṃ paviṭṭho.
atk-s0202a0:996_7: Aṭaviṃ pavisanaṭṭhānepi aṭavimajjhepi aṭavito nikkhamanaṭṭhānepi ṭhatvā manusse ghāteti.
atk-s0202a0:996_8: Vatthaṃ vā veṭhanaṃ vā na gaṇhāti.
atk-s0202a0:996_16: tato vijjhitvā aṅgulīnaṃ mālaṃ katvā dhāresi,
atk-s0202a0:996_19: dāruādīnaṃ atthāya araññaṃ gantuṃ samattho nāma natthi.
atk-s0202a0:997_0: Rattibhāge antogāmampi āgantvā pādena paharitvā dvāraṃ ugghāteti.
atk-s0202a0:997_1: Tato sayiteyeva māretvā eko ekoti gahetvā gacchati.
atk-s0202a0:997_4: Manussā tiyojanato paṭṭhāya gharāni pahāya dārake hatthesu gahetvā āgamma sāvatthiṃ parivāretvā khandhāvāraṃ bandhitvā rājaṅgaṇe sannipatitvā – “coro, te deva,
atk-s0202a0:997_6: Bhaggavo “mayhaṃ putto bhavissatī”ti ñatvā brāhmaṇiṃ āha –
atk-s0202a0:997_15: catūsu hi janesu vissāso nāma natthi,
atk-s0202a0:997_21: Tasmā ahaṃ pana gantvā mayhaṃ puttaṃ ānessāmīti nikkhantā.
atk-s0202a0:998_0: Taṃdivasañca bhagavā paccūsasamaye lokaṃ volokento aṅgulimālaṃ disvā –
atk-s0202a0:998_2: Agāmake araññe ṭhito catuppadikaṃ gāthaṃ sutvā mama santike pabbajitvā cha abhiññā sacchikarissati.
atk-s0202a0:998_5: karissāmissa saṅgaha”nti pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā piṇḍāya pavisitvā katabhattakicco taṃ saṅgaṇhitukāmo vihārā nikkhami.
atk-s0202a0:999_1: Saṅkaritvā saṅkaritvāti saṅketaṃ katvā vaggavaggā hutvā.
atk-s0202a0:999_2: Hatthatthaṃ gacchantīti hatthe atthaṃ vināsaṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0202a0:999_3: Kiṃ pana te bhagavantaṃ sañjānitvā evaṃ vadanti asañjānitvāti?
atk-s0202a0:999_6: Coropi tasmiṃ samaye dīgharattaṃ dubbhojanena ca dukkhaseyyāya ca ukkaṇṭhito hoti.
atk-s0202a0:999_9: So pana idāni ekaṃ labhitvā sahassaṃ pūressatīti saññī hutvā yameva paṭhamaṃ passāmi,
atk-s0202a0:999_10: taṃ ghātetvā gaṇanaṃ pūretvā sippassa upacāraṃ katvā kesamassuṃ ohāretvā nhāyitvā vatthāni parivattetvā
atk-s0202a0:999_11: mātāpitaro passissāmīti aṭavimajjhato aṭavimukhaṃ āgantvā ekamantaṃ ṭhitova bhagavantaṃ addasa.
atk-s0202a0:1000_0: Iddhābhisaṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkhāsīti mahāpathaviṃ ummiyo uṭṭhapento viya saṃharitvā aparabhāge akkamati,
atk-s0202a0:1000_3: Bhagavā purato mahantaṃ aṅgaṇaṃ dassetvā sayaṃ majjhe hoti,
atk-s0202a0:1000_5: So “idāni naṃ pāpuṇitvā gaṇhissāmī”ti sabbathāmena dhāvati.
atk-s0202a0:1000_8: So “ettha naṃ pāpuṇitvā gaṇhissāmī”ti vegena dhāvati.
atk-s0202a0:1000_9: Bhagavā tassa purato mātikaṃ vā thalaṃ vā dasseti,
atk-s0202a0:1000_17: So kira ekaṃ gumbaṃ ghaṭṭetvā mige uṭṭhāpeti.
atk-s0202a0:1000_18: Tato cittaruciyaṃ migaṃ anubandhanto gaṇhitvā pacitvā khādati.
atk-s0202a0:1000_19: Puccheyyanti yena kāraṇenāyaṃ gacchantova ṭhito nāma,
atk-s0202a0:1000_21: yaṃnūnāhaṃ imaṃ samaṇaṃ taṃ kāraṇaṃ puccheyyanti attho.
atk-s0202a0:1001_1: Nidhāyāti yo vihiṃsanatthaṃ bhūtesu daṇḍo pavattayitabbo siyā,
atk-s0202a0:1001_2: taṃ nidhāya apanetvā mettāya khantiyā paṭisaṅkhāya avihiṃsāya sāraṇīyadhammesu ca ṭhito ahanti attho.
atk-s0202a0:1001_3: Tuvamaṭṭhitosīti pāṇesu asaññatattā ettakāni pāṇasahassāni ghātentassa tava mettā vā khanti vā paṭisaṅkhā vā avihiṃsā vā sāraṇīyadhammo vā natthi,
atk-s0202a0:1001_6: tiracchānayoniyaṃ pettivisaye asurakāye vā dhāvissasīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0202a0:1002_4: mahāmāyāya puttassa siddhatthassa samaṇarañño etaṃ gajjitaṃ,
atk-s0202a0:1002_6: saṅgahakaraṇatthaṃ me bhagavā āgato”ti cintetvā cirassaṃ vata metiādimāha.
atk-s0202a0:1002_8: Paccupādīti cirassaṃ kālassa accayena mayhaṃ saṅgahatthāya imaṃ mahāvanaṃ paṭipajji.
atk-s0202a0:1003_5: Idha pana tīhipi imehi padehi araññameva vuttaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:1004_0: Tamehi bhikkhūti tadā avocāti bhagavato imaṃ pabbājento kuhiṃ satthakaṃ labhissāmi,
atk-s0202a0:1004_3: Athassa pubbe sīlavantānaṃ aṭṭhaparikkhārabhaṇḍakassa dinnabhāvaṃ ñatvā dakkhiṇahatthaṃ pasāretvā –
atk-s0202a0:1004_5: cara brahmacariyaṃ sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāyā”ti āha.
atk-s0202a0:1005_0: “Ticīvarañca patto ca, vāsi sūci ca bandhanaṃ;
atk-s0202a0:1007_0: Evaṃ vuttā aṭṭha parikkhārā sarīrapaṭibaddhāva hutvā nibbattiṃsu.
atk-s0202a0:1007_1: Eseva tassa ahu bhikkhubhāvoti esa ehibhikkhubhāvo tassa upasampannabhikkhubhāvo ahosi,
atk-s0202a0:1007_2: na hi ehibhikkhūnaṃ visuṃ upasampadā nāma atthi.
atk-s0202a0:1008_2: teneva attano pattacīvaraṃ gāhāpetvā taṃ pacchāsamaṇaṃ katvā gatoti attho.
atk-s0202a0:1008_7: Mayā saddhiṃ na kathesi tātā”ti vadantī āhiṇḍitvā apassamānā ettova gatā.
atk-s0202a0:1009_0: Pañcamattehi assasatehīti sace corassa parājayo bhavissati,
atk-s0202a0:1009_12: bhagavā hi maṃ na kevalaṃ samparāyikeneva atthena saṅgaṇhāti,
atk-s0202a0:1009_20: sammāsambuddhena pana nivattito’ti” garahamokkhaṃ sampassamāno agamāsi.
atk-s0202a0:1010_1: Api nāma bhagavā tassa upanissayaṃ oloketvā taṃ ānetvā pabbājeyyāti bhagavato parigaṇhanatthaṃ āha.
atk-s0202a0:1010_2: Raññoti na kevalaṃ raññoyeva bhayaṃ ahosi,
atk-s0202a0:1010_3: avasesopi mahājano bhīto phalakāvudhāni chaḍḍetvā sammukhasammukhaṭṭhāneva palāyitvā nagaraṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0202a0:1010_4: dvāraṃ pidhāya aṭṭālake āruyha olokento aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0202a0:1010_6: “aṅgulimālo ‘rājā mayhaṃ santikaṃ āgacchatī’ti ñatvā paṭhamataraṃ āgantvā jetavane nisinno,
atk-s0202a0:1010_9: Natthi te ito bhayanti ayañhi idāni kunthakipillikaṃ jīvitā na voropeti,
atk-s0202a0:1010_10: natthi te imassa santikā bhayanti attho.
atk-s0202a0:1011_2: Pabbajitaṃ dāruṇakammena uppannanāmaṃ gahetvā voharituṃ na yuttaṃ,
atk-s0202a0:1011_3: mātāpitūnaṃ gottavasena naṃ samudācarissāmīti maññamāno pucchi.
atk-s0202a0:1011_4: Parikkhārānanti etesaṃ atthāya ahaṃ ussukkaṃ karissāmīti attho.
atk-s0202a0:1011_5: Kathentoyeva ca udare baddhasāṭakaṃ muñcitvā therassa pādamūle ṭhapesi.
atk-s0202a0:1012_6: “Hatthimpi dhāvantaṃ anubandhitvā gaṇhāmī”ti āgataṭṭhāne raññā pesitahatthādayo so evaṃ aggahesi. Rājāpi –
atk-s0202a0:1012_8: rathehevā”ti evaṃ anekavāraṃ bahū hatthādayo pesesi.
atk-s0202a0:1012_10: “ahaṃ are aṅgulimālo”ti tasmiṃ uṭṭhāya saddaṃ karonte ekopi āvudhaṃ parivattetuṃ nāsakkhi,
atk-s0202a0:1012_14: rathāpi tattheva bhijjantīti idaṃ sandhāya rājā evaṃ vadati.
atk-s0202a0:1013_0: Piṇḍāya pāvisīti na idaṃ paṭhamaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0202a0:1013_3: manussā ca naṃ disvā uttasantipi palāyantipi dvārampi thakenti,
atk-s0202a0:1013_4: ekacce aṅgulimāloti sutvāva palāyitvā araññaṃ vā pavisanti,
atk-s0202a0:1013_9: Bahi alabhanto nagaraṃ sabbasādhāraṇanti nagaraṃ pavisati.
atk-s0202a0:1013_11: tattha aṅgulimālo āgatoti kūṭasahassānaṃ bhijjanakāraṇaṃ hoti.
atk-s0202a0:1013_13: Ekena ūnamanussasahassaṃ ghātentassa ekadivasampi kāruññaṃ nāhosi,
atk-s0202a0:1014_0: Tena hīti yasmā te kāruññaṃ uppannaṃ,
atk-s0202a0:1014_9: Idāni pana te ariyā nāma jāti.
atk-s0202a0:1014_12: tena hi “ariyāya jātiyā”ti evaṃ visesetvā vadāhīti uyyojesi.
atk-s0202a0:1015_0: Taṃ itthiṃ etadavocāti itthīnaṃ gabbhavuṭṭhānaṭṭhānaṃ nāma na sakkā purisena upasaṅkamituṃ.
atk-s0202a0:1015_2: Aṅgulimālatthero saccakiriyaṃ katvā sotthikaraṇatthāya āgatoti ārocāpesi.
atk-s0202a0:1015_3: Tato te sāṇiyā parikkhipitvā therassa bahisāṇiyaṃ pīṭhakaṃ paññāpesuṃ.
atk-s0202a0:1015_5: “yato ahaṃ bhagini sabbaññubuddhassa ariyāya jātiyā jāto”ti saccakiriyaṃ akāsi,
atk-s0202a0:1015_6: saha saccavacaneneva dhamakaraṇato muttaudakaṃ viya dārako nikkhami.
atk-s0202a0:1015_8: Imañca pana parittaṃ na kiñci parissayaṃ na maddati,
atk-s0202a0:1015_13: Yā dubbalā hoti na sakkā ānetuṃ,
atk-s0202a0:1016_0: Kiṃ pana bhagavā theraṃ vejjakammaṃ kārāpesīti?
atk-s0202a0:1016_7: “idāni kira aṅgulimālatthero mettacittaṃ paṭilabhitvā saccakiriyāya manussānaṃ sotthibhāvaṃ karotīti manussā theraṃ upasaṅkamitabbaṃ maññissanti,
atk-s0202a0:1016_8: tato bhikkhāhārena akilamanto samaṇadhammaṃ kātuṃ sakkhissatī”ti anuggahena saccakiriyaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0202a0:1016_10: Therassāpi ca “samaṇadhammaṃ karissāmī”ti mūlakammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhāne nisinnassa cittaṃ kammaṭṭhānābhimukhaṃ na gacchati,
atk-s0202a0:1016_11: aṭaviyaṃ ṭhatvā manussānaṃ ghātitaṭṭhānameva pākaṭaṃ hoti.
atk-s0202a0:1016_14: jīvitaṃ me dehi sāmīti maraṇabhītānaṃ vacanākāro ca hatthapādavikāro ca āpāthaṃ āgacchati,
atk-s0202a0:1016_15: so vippaṭisārī hutvā tatova uṭṭhāya gacchati,
atk-s0202a0:1016_16: athassa bhagavā taṃ jātiṃ abbohārikaṃ katvāvāyaṃ vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ gaṇhissatīti ariyāya jātiyā saccakiriyaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0202a0:1017_1: Aññenapi leḍḍu khittoti kākasunakhasūkarādīnaṃ paṭikkamāpanatthāya samantā sarakkhepamatte ṭhāne yena
atk-s0202a0:1017_2: kenaci disābhāgena khitto āgantvā therasseva kāye patati.
atk-s0202a0:1017_4: Gaṇṭhikaṃ paṭimuñcitvā piṇḍāya caritvā paṭinivattetvā yāva gaṇṭhikapaṭimukkaṭṭhānaṃ āgacchati,
atk-s0202a0:1017_6: Bhinnena sīsenāti mahācammaṃ chinditvā yāva aṭṭhimariyādā bhinnena.
atk-s0202a0:1018_2: kammassa vipākenāti idaṃ sabhāgadiṭṭhadhammavedanīyakammaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:1018_4: Sattasu cittesu kusalā vā akusalā vā paṭhamajavanacetanā diṭṭhadhammavedanīyakammaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0202a0:1018_9: natthi kammavipākoti imassa tikassa vasena ahosikammaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0202a0:1018_12: Tathā asakkontaṃ vuttanayeneva taṃ ahosikammaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0202a0:1018_16: Sati saṃsārappavattiyā ahosikammaṃ nāma na hoti.
atk-s0202a0:1018_17: Therassa pana upapajjavedanīyañca aparāpariyavedanīyañcāti imāni dve kammāni kammakkhayakarena arahattamaggena samugghāṭitāni,
atk-s0202a0:1018_21: Tasmā yassa khoti ettha yādisassa kho tvaṃ, brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0202a0:1019_1: abbhā mahikā dhūmo rajo rāhūti imehi pana upakkilesehi mutto candimā idha adhippeto.
atk-s0202a0:1019_2: Yathā hi evaṃ nirupakkileso candimā lokaṃ pabhāseti,
atk-s0202a0:1019_3: evaṃ pamādakilesavimutto appamatto bhikkhu imaṃ attano khandhāyatanadhātulokaṃ pabhāseti,
atk-s0202a0:1020_0: Kusalena pidhīyatīti maggakusalena pidhīyati appaṭisandhikaṃ karīyati.
atk-s0202a0:1020_1: Yuñjati buddhasāsaneti buddhasāsane kāyena vācāya manasā ca yuttappayutto viharati.
atk-s0202a0:1021_0: Disā hi meti idaṃ kira thero attano parittāṇākāraṃ karonto āha.
atk-s0202a0:1021_1: Tattha disā hi meti mama sapattā.
atk-s0202a0:1021_3: “yathā mayaṃ aṅgulimālena māritānaṃ ñātakānaṃ vasena dukkhaṃ vediyāma,
atk-s0202a0:1021_5: te mayhaṃ disā catusaccadhammakathaṃ suṇantūti attho.
atk-s0202a0:1021_7: Ye dhammamevādapayanti santoti ye santo sappurisā dhammaṃyeva ādapenti samādapenti gaṇhāpenti,
atk-s0202a0:1021_8: te manujā mayhaṃ sapattā bhajantu sevantu payirupāsantūti attho.
atk-s0202a0:1022_2: Suṇantu dhammaṃ kālenāti khaṇe khaṇe khantimettāpaṭisaṅkhāsāraṇīyadhammaṃ suṇantu.
atk-s0202a0:1022_3: Tañca anuvidhīyantūti tañca dhammaṃ anukarontu pūrentu.
atk-s0202a0:1023_0: Na hi jātu so mamaṃ hiṃseti yo mayhaṃ diso,
atk-s0202a0:1023_2: Aññaṃ vā pana kiñci nanti na kevalaṃ maṃ,
atk-s0202a0:1023_3: aññampi pana kañci puggalaṃ mā hiṃsantu mā viheṭhentu.
atk-s0202a0:1023_4: Pappuyya paramaṃ santinti paramaṃ santibhūtaṃ nibbānaṃ pāpuṇitvā.
atk-s0202a0:1023_9: so sabbaṃ tasathāvaraṃ rakkhituṃ samattho hoti.
atk-s0202a0:1023_12: Imā tisso gāthā attano parittaṃ kātuṃ āha.
atk-s0202a0:1024_0: Idāni attanova paṭipattiṃ dīpento udakañhi nayanti nettikāti āha.
atk-s0202a0:1024_1: Tattha nettikāti ye mātikaṃ sodhetvā bandhitabbaṭṭhāne bandhitvā udakaṃ nayanti.
atk-s0202a0:1024_3: Namayantīti telakañjikena makkhetvā kukkuḷe tāpetvā unnatunnataṭṭhāne namentā ujuṃ karonti.
atk-s0202a0:1024_8: Attānaṃ damayantīti yathā nettikā ujumaggena udakaṃ nayanti,
atk-s0202a0:1024_11: evamevaṃ paṇḍitā attānaṃ damenti ujukaṃ karonti nibbisevanaṃ karonti.
atk-s0202a0:1025_9: Tāya hi goṇā viya gīvāya rajjuyā,
atk-s0202a0:1025_10: sattā hadaye baddhā taṃ taṃ bhavaṃ nīyanti,
atk-s0202a0:1025_13: Yasmā hi maggacetanāya kammaṃ paccati vipaccati ḍayhati,
atk-s0202a0:1025_16: Tāya hi phuṭṭhattā esa aṇaṇo nikkileso jāto,
atk-s0202a0:1025_18: Bhuñjāmīti cettha theyyaparibhogo iṇaparibhogo dāyajjaparibhogo sāmiparibhogoti cattāro paribhogā veditabbā.
atk-s0202a0:1025_20: So hi cattāro paccaye thenetvā bhuñjati.
atk-s0202a0:1026_0: Kāmaratisanthavanti duvidhesupi kāmesu taṇhāratisanthavaṃ mā anuyuñjatha mā karittha.
atk-s0202a0:1026_1: Nayidaṃ dummantitaṃ mamāti yaṃ mayā sammāsambuddhaṃ disvā pabbajissāmīti mantitaṃ,
atk-s0202a0:1026_3: Saṃvibhattesu dhammesūti ahaṃ satthāti evaṃ loke uppannehi ye dhammā saṃvibhattā,
atk-s0202a0:1026_6: tasmā mayhaṃ idaṃ āgamanaṃ svāgataṃ nāma gatanti.
atk-s0202a0:1026_8: Kataṃ buddhassa sāsananti yaṃ buddhassa sāsane kattabbakiccaṃ atthi,
atk-s0202a0:1026_10: Tīhi vijjāhi navahi ca lokuttaradhammehi desanaṃ matthakaṃ pāpesīti.
atk-s0202a0:1030_2: Tattha neva kammantā paṭibhantīti na sabbena sabbaṃ paṭibhanti,
atk-s0202a0:1030_5: Ettha ca na paṭibhātīti na ruccati.
atk-s0202a0:1031_1: mahārājāti tassa atthaṃ asallakkhayamānāpi satthari saddhāya evaṃ vadati.
atk-s0202a0:1031_4: Atha vā cara pireti parato gaccha,
atk-s0202a0:1032_1: Dvidhā chetvāti asinā dve koṭṭhāse karonto chinditvā.
atk-s0202a0:1032_2: Attānaṃ upphālesīti teneva asinā attano udaraṃ phālesi.
atk-s0202a0:1032_3: Yadi hi tassa sā appiyā bhaveyya,
atk-s0202a0:1032_4: idāni aññaṃ mātugāmaṃ gaṇhissāmīti attānaṃ na ghāteyya.
atk-s0202a0:1032_6: tasmā paralokepi tāya saddhiṃ samaṅgibhāvaṃ patthayamāno evamakāsi.
atk-s0202a0:1033_1: Piyā te vajirīti evaṃ kirassā ahosi – “sacāhaṃ,
atk-s0202a0:1033_8: kenaci saddhiṃ palāyitvā gamanavasena aññathābhāvo veditabbo.
atk-s0202a0:1034_0: Vāsabhāyāti vāsabhā nāma rañño ekā devī, taṃ sandhāyāha.
atk-s0202a0:1035_0: Piyā te ahanti kasmā sabbapacchā āha?
atk-s0202a0:1035_6: evaṃ sante kathā patiṭṭhānaṃ na labhissatī”ti kathāya patiṭṭhānatthaṃ sabbapacchā pucchi.
atk-s0202a0:1036_1: Ācamitvā hatthapāde dhovitvā mukhaṃ vikkhāletvā satthāraṃ namassitukāmo evamāha.
atk-s0202a0:1040_3: Tassa kira phāsukānaṃ upari tālaphalamattaṃ paṇḍaraṭṭhānaṃ atthi,
atk-s0202a0:1040_5: Sirivaḍḍhaṃ mahāmattanti paccekahatthiṃ abhiruhitvā kathāphāsukatthaṃ saddhiṃ gacchantaṃ evaṃnāmakaṃ mahāmattaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:1041_6: yaṃ mayaṃ viññūhīti idaṃ padaṃ gahetvā pañhena paripūretuṃ nāsakkhimhā,
atk-s0202a0:1041_7: taṃ kāraṇaṃ āyasmatā evaṃ vadantena paripūritaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:1042_5: Tassāti tassa evaṃ attabyābādhādīnaṃ atthāya pavattakāyasamācārassa.
atk-s0202a0:1043_1: tathāgato kusaladhammasamannāgatoti ettha sabbesaṃyeva akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānaṃ vaṇṇetīti.
atk-s0202a0:1043_6: bhagavā pana pahīnākusalatāya yathākārī tathāvādīti dassetuṃ evaṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0202a0:1045_2: Datvā ca pana gandhakuṭiyaṃ vitānaṃ katvā bandhi.
atk-s0202a0:1045_5: Neyyapuggalassa pana vasena ayaṃ desanā niṭṭhitāti.
atk-s0202a0:1049_3: tassa hi nigamassa medavaṇṇā pāsāṇā kirettha ussannā ahesuṃ,
atk-s0202a0:1049_9: ayaṃ pana bandhulasenāpatiṃ saddhiṃ dvattiṃsāya puttehi ekadivaseneva gaṇhathāti āṇāpesi,
atk-s0202a0:1049_10: taṃdivasañcassa bhariyāya mallikāya pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ bhagavā nimantito,
atk-s0202a0:1049_11: buddhappamukhe bhikkhusaṅghe gharaṃ āgantvā nisinnamatte “senāpati kālaṅkato”ti sāsanaṃ āharitvā mallikāya adaṃsu.
atk-s0202a0:1049_13: “Raññā ayye senāpati saddhiṃ dvattiṃsāya puttehi ekappahāreneva gahāpito”ti ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0202a0:1049_14: Mahājanagataṃ mā karitthāti ovaṭṭikāya paṇṇaṃ katvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ parivisi.
atk-s0202a0:1049_17: taṃ apanetvā aññaṃ āharāpetvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ parivisi.
atk-s0202a0:1050_2: Tasmiṃ samaye mallikā paṇṇaṃ nīharitvā bhagavato purato ṭhapetvā –
atk-s0202a0:1050_3: “bhagavā imaṃ dvattiṃsāya puttehi saddhiṃ senāpatino matasāsanaṃ,
atk-s0202a0:1050_7: anamatagge saṃsāre nāma vattamānānaṃ hoti eta”nti aniccatādipaṭisaṃyuttaṃ dhammakathaṃ katvā agamāsi.
atk-s0202a0:1050_9: Rājā mallikaṃ pakkosāpetvā “senāpatino amhākaṃ antare bhinnadoso atthi natthī”ti pucchi.
atk-s0202a0:1050_11: So tassā vacanena tassa niddosabhāvaṃ ñatvā vippaṭisārī balavadomanassaṃ uppādesi. So –
atk-s0202a0:1050_12: “evarūpaṃ nāma adosakārakaṃ maṃ sambhāvayitvā āgataṃ sahāyakaṃ vināsesi”nti tato paṭṭhāya pāsāde vā nāṭakesu
atk-s0202a0:1050_13: vā rajjasukhesu vā cittassādaṃ alabhamāno tattha tattha vicarituṃ āraddho.
atk-s0202a0:1051_0: Dīghaṃ kārāyananti dīghakārāyano nāma bandhulasenāpatissa bhāgineyyo “etassa me mātulo adosakārako nikkāraṇena
atk-s0202a0:1051_4: dharaṇitalaṃ bhindanto viya sāgaraṃ parivattento viya vicittavesasobhena mahatā balakāyenāti attho.
atk-s0202a0:1051_14: Yattha sudaṃ mayanti na tena tattha bhagavā payirupāsitapubbo,
atk-s0202a0:1051_16: tasmā yādisesu sudaṃ mayanti ayamettha attho.
atk-s0202a0:1052_1: mahārājāti paṇḍito senāpati “rājā bhagavantaṃ mamāyatī”ti jānāti,
atk-s0202a0:1052_2: so sace maṃ rājā “kahaṃ bhagavā”ti vadeyya,
atk-s0202a0:1052_3: adandhāyantena ācikkhituṃ yuttanti carapurise payojetvā bhagavato nivāsanaṭṭhānaṃ ñatvāva viharati.
atk-s0202a0:1052_5: Ārāmaṃ pāvisīti bahinigame khandhāvāraṃ bandhāpetvā kārāyanena saddhiṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0202a0:1053_5: Ākoṭehīti agganakhena īsakaṃ kuñcikacchiddasamīpe koṭehīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0202a0:1056_2: Atigaruno sammāsambuddhassa santikaṃ uddhatavesena gantuṃ na yuttanti ca,
atk-s0202a0:1056_3: ekakova upasaṅkamitvā attano rucivasena sammodissāmi cāti.
atk-s0202a0:1056_4: Pañcasu hi rājakakudhabhaṇḍesu nivattitesu tvaṃ nivattāti vattabbaṃ na hoti,
atk-s0202a0:1056_8: Ayaṃ kirassa adhippāyo “pubbepi ayaṃ rājā samaṇena gotamena saddhiṃ catukkaṇṇamantaṃ mantetvā mayhaṃ mātulaṃ saddhiṃ dvattiṃsāya puttehi gaṇhāpesi,
atk-s0202a0:1057_0: Vivari bhagavā dvāranti na bhagavā uṭṭhāya dvāraṃ vivari,
atk-s0202a0:1057_2: “bhagavā tumhehi anekesu kappakoṭīsu dānaṃ dadamānehi na sahatthā dvāravivaraṇakammaṃ kata”nti sayameva dvāraṃ vivaṭaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:1057_3: Taṃ pana yasmā bhagavato manena vivaṭaṃ,
atk-s0202a0:1057_6: Tasmiṃ pana paviṭṭhamatteyeva kārāyano pañca rājakakudhabhaṇḍāni gahetvā khandhāvāraṃ gantvā viṭaṭūbhaṃ āmantesi “chattaṃ samma ussāpehī”ti.
atk-s0202a0:1057_12: Kārāyano rañño ekaṃ assañca asiñca ekameva ca paricārikaṃ itthiṃ ṭhapetvā –
atk-s0202a0:1057_14: mā āgacchatū”ti viṭaṭūbhassa chattaṃ ussāpetvā taṃ gahetvā sāvatthimeva gato.
atk-s0202a0:1058_12: Yathā ekacce jīvitahetu atikkamantā pāṇakoṭikaṃ katvā caranti,
atk-s0202a0:1058_15: bhanteti buddhasubuddhatāya dhammasvākkhātatāya saṅghasuppaṭipannatāya ca etaṃ evaṃ hoti,
atk-s0202a0:1059_1: Na viya maññe cakkhuṃ bandhanteti cakkhuṃ abandhante viya.
atk-s0202a0:1059_2: Apāsādikañhi disvā puna olokanakiccaṃ na hoti,
atk-s0202a0:1059_3: tasmā so cakkhuṃ na bandhati nāma.
atk-s0202a0:1059_9: Amhākaṃ kule jātā evarūpā hontīti vadanti.
atk-s0202a0:1059_12: Tattha kasiṇaparikammaṃ katvā samāpattiṃ nibbattento uḷāraṃ pubbe visesaṃ sañjānāti nāma,
atk-s0202a0:1059_13: samāpattiṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ gaṇhanto uḷāraṃ pubbato aparaṃ visesaṃ sañjānāti nāma.
atk-s0202a0:1060_2: Jāpetāyaṃ vā jāpetunti dhanena vā jāpetabbayuttakaṃ jāpetuṃ jānituṃ adhanaṃ kātuṃ.
atk-s0202a0:1060_3: Pabbājetāyaṃ vā pabbājetunti raṭṭhato vā pabbājetabbayuttakaṃ pabbājetuṃ.
atk-s0202a0:1061_4: Mamabhattāti mama santakaṃ bhattaṃ etesanti mamabhattā.
atk-s0202a0:1061_5: Mamayānāti mama santakaṃ yānaṃ etesanti mamayānā.
atk-s0202a0:1061_8: Tadā kira rājā niddaṃ anokkantova okkanto viya hutvā nipajji.
atk-s0202a0:1061_9: Atha te thapatayo “katarasmiṃ disābhāge bhagavā”ti pucchitvā “asukasmiṃ nāmā”ti sutvā mantayiṃsu –
atk-s0202a0:1061_11: tena sīse kate rājā pādato hoti.
atk-s0202a0:1061_13: tena sīse kate satthā pādato hoti,
atk-s0202a0:1061_18: Na kho pana mayaṃ sakkoma jānamānā satthāraṃ pādato kātu”nti rājānaṃ pādato katvā nipajjiṃsu.
atk-s0202a0:1062_1: Pakkāmīti gandhakuṭito nikkhamitvā kārāyanassa ṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ gato,
atk-s0202a0:1062_3: tatthāpi aññaṃ adisvā taṃ itthiṃ pucchi.
atk-s0202a0:1062_6: rājagahaṃ gantvā bhāgineyyena saddhiṃ āgantvā mayhaṃ rajjaṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti rājagahaṃ gacchanto antarāmagge kaṇājakabhattañceva bhuñji,
atk-s0202a0:1062_8: Tassa sukhumālapakatikassa āhāro na sammā pariṇāmi.
atk-s0202a0:1062_9: So rājagahaṃ pāpuṇantopi vikāle dvāresu pihitesu pāpuṇi.
atk-s0202a0:1062_10: “Ajja sālāyaṃ sayitvā sve mayhaṃ bhāgineyyaṃ passissāmī”ti bahinagare sālāya nipajji.
atk-s0202a0:1062_13: Tato paṭṭhāya padasā gantuṃ asakkonto tassā itthiyā aṅke nipajjitvā balavapaccūse kālamakāsi.
atk-s0202a0:1062_15: “dvīsu rajjesu rajjaṃ kāretvā idāni parassa bahinagare anāthasālāya anāthakālakiriyaṃ katvā nipanno mayhaṃ
atk-s0202a0:1062_16: sāmi kosalarājā”tiādīni vadamānā uccāsaddena paridevituṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0202a0:1062_18: Rājā āgantvā disvā sañjānitvā āgatakāraṇaṃ ñatvā mahāparihārena sarīrakiccaṃ karitvā “viṭaṭūbhaṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti bheriṃ carāpetvā balakāyaṃ sannipātesi.
atk-s0202a0:1062_22: idāni pana viṭaṭūbhopi tumhe nissāya chattaṃ ussāpetuṃ arahatiyevā”ti saññāpetvā nivāresuṃ.
atk-s0202a0:1063_1: Tīsu hi ratanesu yattha katthaci cittīkāre kate sabbattha katoyeva hoti,
atk-s0202a0:1063_2: tasmā bhagavati cittīkāre kate dhammopi katova hotīti bhagavā “dhammacetiyānī”ti āha.
atk-s0202a0:1067_2: Tattha uruññāyanti uruññāti tassa raṭṭhassapi nagarassapi etadeva nāmaṃ,
atk-s0202a0:1067_4: Kaṇṇakatthale migadāyeti tassa nagarassa avidūre kaṇṇakatthalaṃ nāma eko ramaṇīyo bhūmibhāgo atthi,
atk-s0202a0:1067_5: so migānaṃ abhayatthāya dinnattā migadāyoti vuccati,
atk-s0202a0:1067_9: Somā ca bhaginī sakulā ca bhaginīti imā dve bhaginiyo rañño pajāpatiyo.
atk-s0202a0:1067_11: Rañño bhuñjanaṭṭhānañhi sabbāpi orodhā kaṭacchuādīni gahetvā rājānaṃ upaṭṭhātuṃ gacchanti,
atk-s0202a0:1068_5: mayaṃ attano dhammatāya bhagavantaṃ daṭṭhuṃ āgatoti maññāma,
atk-s0202a0:1068_6: ayaṃ pana mātugāmānaṃ sāsanaṃ gahetvā āgato,
atk-s0202a0:1068_9: Pucchito pana so attano āgamanakāraṇaṃ kathessati,
atk-s0202a0:1068_10: evamassa ayaṃ garahā na uppajjissatīti garahamocanatthaṃ evamāha.
atk-s0202a0:1069_2: Sakideva sabbaṃ ussati sabbaṃ dakkhitīti yo ekāvajjanena ekacittena atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ sabbaṃ ussati vā dakkhiti vā,
atk-s0202a0:1069_4: Ekena hi cittena atītaṃ sabbaṃ jānissāmīti āvajjitvāpi atītaṃ sabbaṃ jānituṃ na sakkā,
atk-s0202a0:1069_6: Anāgatapaccuppannaṃ pana tena cittena sabbeneva sabbaṃ na jānātīti.
atk-s0202a0:1070_1: Pañcimānīti imasmiṃ sutte pañca padhāniyaṅgāni lokuttaramissakāni kathitāni.
atk-s0202a0:1070_3: kiṃ ruccatī”ti vutte “mayhaṃ lokuttarānevāti ruccatī”ti āha.
atk-s0202a0:1070_14: Puthujjanassa padhānaṃ sotāpannassa padhānaṃ na pāpuṇāti…pe…

atk-s0202a0:1070_28: Ariyasāvakassa pana saṭho māyāvīti nāmaṃ natthi.
atk-s0202a0:1070_30: “pañca padhāniyaṅgāni lokuttarāni kathitānīti mayhaṃ ruccatī”ti āha.

atk-s0202a0:1073_7: Abrahmacariyavantampi sampannakāmaguṇaṃ amaccaṃ bandhanāgāraṃ pavesetvā itthīnaṃ mukhampi passituṃ adento tamhā ṭhānā cāveti nāma.
atk-s0202a0:1074_0: Dassanāyapi nappahontīti kāmāvacare tāva abyābajjhe deve sabyābajjhā devā cakkhuviññāṇadassanāyapi nappahonti. Kasmā?
atk-s0202a0:1074_2: Rūpāvacare pana ekavimānasmiṃyeva tiṭṭhanti ca nisīdanti cāti cakkhuviññāṇadassanāya pahonti,
atk-s0202a0:1074_3: etehi diṭṭhaṃ pana sallakkhitaṃ paṭividdhaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ daṭṭhuṃ sallakkhituṃ paṭivijjhituṃ na sakkontīti ñāṇacakkhunā dassanāya nappahonti,
atk-s0202a0:1075_2: bhanteti rājā theraṃ jānantopi ajānanto viya pucchati. Kasmā?
atk-s0202a0:1075_6: Atha kho aññataro purisoti sā kira kathā viṭaṭūbheneva kathitā,
atk-s0202a0:1075_8: tayā kathitā”ti kupitā aññamaññaṃ imasmiṃyeva ṭhāne attano attano balakāyaṃ uṭṭhāpetvā kalahampi kareyyunti nivāraṇatthaṃ so rājapuriso etadavoca.
atk-s0202a0:1075_10: Ayaṃ pana desanā neyyapuggalassa vasena niṭṭhitāti.
atk-s0202a0:1080_2: Tattha mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhinti mahatāti guṇamahattenapi mahatā,
atk-s0202a0:1080_4: So hi bhikkhusaṅghe guṇehipi mahā ahosi appicchatādiguṇasamannāgatattā,
atk-s0202a0:1080_9: Pañcamattehi bhikkhusatehīti pañca mattā etesanti pañcamattāni.
atk-s0202a0:1080_11: tasmā yathā bhojane mattaññūti vutte bhojane mattaṃ jānāti pamāṇaṃ jānātīti attho hoti,
atk-s0202a0:1080_12: evamidhāpi tesaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ pañcamattā pañcapamāṇanti evamattho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0202a0:1081_3: Saha nighaṇḍunā ca keṭubhena ca sanighaṇḍukeṭubhānaṃ,
atk-s0202a0:1081_8: Itihāsapañcamānanti āthabbaṇavedaṃ catutthaṃ katvā “itiha āsa itiha āsā”ti īdisavacanappaṭisaṃyutto purāṇakathāsaṅkhāto
atk-s0202a0:1081_11: Padañca tadavasesañca byākaraṇaṃ adhīyati pavedeti cāti padako veyyākaraṇo.
atk-s0202a0:1081_13: Mahāpurisalakkhaṇanti mahāpurisānaṃ buddhādīnaṃ lakkhaṇadīpakaṃ dvādasasahassaganthappamāṇaṃ satthaṃ,
atk-s0202a0:1081_15: yesaṃ vasena “iminā lakkhaṇena samannāgatā buddhā nāma honti,
atk-s0202a0:1081_26: Avayo nāma yo tāni atthato ca ganthato ca sandhāretuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0202a0:1082_1: Ayaṃ tātāti ayaṃ mahallakatāya gantuṃ asakkonto māṇavaṃ āmantetvā evamāha.
atk-s0202a0:1082_2: Apica esa brāhmaṇo cintesi “imasmiṃ loke ‘ahaṃ buddho ahaṃ buddho’ti uggatassa nāmaṃ gahetvā bahū janā vicaranti,
atk-s0202a0:1082_3: tasmā na me anussavamatteneva upasaṅkamituṃ yuttaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:1082_6: Yaṃnūnāhaṃ mama antevāsikaṃ pesetvā ‘buddho vā no vā’ti jānitvā upasaṅkameyya”nti tasmā māṇavaṃ āmantetvā “ayaṃ tātā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0202a0:1083_2: pathaviyaṃ ṭhito pathaviṃ na passāmīti viya candimasūriyānaṃ obhāse ṭhito candimasūriye na passāmīti
atk-s0202a0:1083_3: viya vadasī”tiādīni vatvā jānanākāraṃ dassento āgatāni kho tātātiādimāha.
atk-s0202a0:1083_5: Tathāgato kira uppajjissatīti paṭikacceva suddhāvāsā devā vedesu lakkhaṇāni pakkhipitvā “buddhamantā
atk-s0202a0:1083_6: nāma ete”ti brāhmaṇavesena vede vācenti “tadanusārena mahesakkhā sattā tathāgataṃ jānissantī”ti.
atk-s0202a0:1083_20: Tattha kiñcāpi yehi samannāgato rājā hoti,
atk-s0202a0:1083_25: Sace agāraṃ ajjhāvasatīti yadi agāre vasati,
atk-s0202a0:1083_27: Catūhi acchariyadhammehi saṅgahavatthūhi ca lokaṃ rañjanato rājā.
atk-s0202a0:1083_31: parahitāya ca iriyāpathacakkānaṃ vatto etasmiṃ atthīti cakkavattī.
atk-s0202a0:1083_36: Dhammena rajjaṃ labhitvā rājā jātoti dhammarājā.
atk-s0202a0:1083_40: catusamuddantāya catubbidhadīpabhūsitāya ca pathaviyā issaroti attho.
atk-s0202a0:1083_41: Ajjhattaṃ kopādipaccatthike bahiddhā ca sabbarājāno vijesīti vijitāvī.
atk-s0202a0:1083_44: janapado vā tamhi thāvariyappatto anussukko sakammanirato acalo asampavedhīti janapadatthāvariyappatto.
atk-s0202a0:1083_47: Cakkaratanantiādīsu cakkañca taṃ ratijananatthena ratanañcāti cakkaratanaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:1084_0: Imesu pana ratanesu ayaṃ cakkavattirājā cakkaratanena ajitaṃ jināti,
atk-s0202a0:1084_10: Visesato cassa purimāni tīṇi adosakusalamūlajanitakammānubhāvena sampajjanti,
atk-s0202a0:1084_14: vitthāro pana bojjhaṅgasaṃyutte ratanasuttassa upadesato gahetabbo.
atk-s0202a0:1084_15: Apica bālapaṇḍitasuttepi imesaṃ ratanānaṃ uppattikkamena saddhiṃ vaṇṇanā āgamissati.
atk-s0202a0:1086_0: Arahaṃ hoti sammāsambuddho loke vivaṭṭacchadoti ettha rāgadosamohamānadiṭṭhiavijjāduccaritachadanehi
atk-s0202a0:1086_1: sattahi paṭicchanne kilesandhakāraloke taṃ chadanaṃ vivaṭṭetvā samantato sañjātāloko hutvā ṭhitoti vivaṭṭacchado.
atk-s0202a0:1086_5: Atha vā vivaṭṭo ca vicchado cāti vivaṭṭacchado,
atk-s0202a0:1086_8: sammāsambuddho chadanābhāvenāti evaṃ purimapadadvayasseva hetudvayaṃ vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0202a0:1086_15: Tvaṃ mantānaṃ paṭiggahetāti imināssa sūrabhāvaṃ janeti.
atk-s0202a0:1087_1: Sopi tāya ācariyakathāya lakkhaṇesu vigatasammoho ekobhāsajāto viya buddhamante sampassamāno evaṃ,
atk-s0202a0:1087_9: Buddhānañhi nisinnānaṃ vā nipannānaṃ vā koci lakkhaṇaṃ pariyesituṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0202a0:1087_11: Tasmā lakkhaṇapariyesanatthaṃ āgataṃ disvā buddhā uṭṭhāyāsanā tiṭṭhanti vā caṅkamaṃ vā adhiṭṭhahanti.
atk-s0202a0:1087_19: Vicikicchatīti tato tato tāni vicinanto kicchati na sakkoti daṭṭhuṃ.
atk-s0202a0:1087_20: Nādhimuccatīti tāya vicikicchāya sanniṭṭhānaṃ na gacchati.
atk-s0202a0:1087_21: Na sampasīdatīti tato “paripuṇṇalakkhaṇo aya”nti bhagavati pasādaṃ nāpajjati.
atk-s0202a0:1087_25: asampasādena tehi tīhi dhammehi cittassa kālussiyabhāvo.
atk-s0202a0:1087_28: Bhagavato hi vāraṇasseva kosohitavatthaguyhaṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ padumagabbhasamānaṃ,
atk-s0202a0:1087_30: antomukhagatāya ca jivhāya pahūtabhāvaṃ asallakkhento tesu dvīsu lakkhaṇesu kaṅkhī ahosi vicikicchī.
atk-s0202a0:1088_0: Atha kho bhagavāti atha bhagavā cintesi –
atk-s0202a0:1088_1: “sacāhaṃ imassa etāni dve lakkhaṇāni na dassessāmi,
atk-s0202a0:1088_3: Etassa kaṅkhāya sati ācariyopissa nikkaṅkho na bhavissati,
atk-s0202a0:1088_6: dhammaṃ asuṇanto tīṇi sāmaññaphalāni na sacchikarissati.
atk-s0202a0:1088_7: Etasmiṃ pana nikkaṅkhe ācariyopissa nikkaṅkho maṃ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṃ sutvā tīṇi sāmaññaphalāni sacchikarissati.
atk-s0202a0:1090_4: Mahājanena hirikaraṇokāsaṃ brahmāyubrāhmaṇassa ca antevāsiuttarassa ca bāvariyassa antevāsīnaṃ soḷasabrāhmaṇānañca
atk-s0202a0:1090_5: selassa ca brāhmaṇassa antevāsīnaṃ tisatamāṇavānañca dassesi, bhanteti. Na, mahārāja,
atk-s0202a0:1090_8: iddhiyā abhisaṅkharitvā nivāsananivatthaṃ kāyabandhanabaddhaṃ cīvarapārutaṃ chāyārūpakamattaṃ dassesi mahārājāti.
atk-s0202a0:1090_9: Chāyaṃ diṭṭhe sati diṭṭhoyeva. Nanu, bhanteti?
atk-s0202a0:1091_6: Ubhopi kaṇṇasotānītiādīsu cettha buddhānaṃ kaṇṇasotesu malaṃ vā jallikā vā natthi,
