atk-s0202a0:1092_1: Ahañhi mahāpurisalakkhaṇāni samannesitvā gato “diṭṭhāni te, tāta,
atk-s0202a0:1092_6: na jānāmīti vutte pana ācariyo kujjhissati “nanu tvaṃ mayā sabbampetaṃ jānanatthāya pesito,
atk-s0202a0:1092_9: Bhagavā nhānaṭṭhānaṃ mukhadhovanaṭṭhānaṃ sarīrapaṭijagganaṭṭhānaṃ rājarājamahāmattādīnaṃ orodhehi saddhiṃ
atk-s0202a0:1092_10: parivāretvā nisinnaṭṭhānanti imāni cattāri ṭhānāni ṭhapetvā sesaṭṭhānesu antamaso ekagandhakuṭiyampi
atk-s0202a0:1093_1: “ayaṃ kira brahmāyubrāhmaṇassa māṇavo uttaro nāma ‘buddho vā no vā’ti tathāgatassa buddhabhāvaṃ vīmaṃsanto carati,
atk-s0202a0:1093_6: Tattha pacchābhattaṃ alaṅkatadhammāsane nisīditvā dantakhacitaṃ cittabījaniṃ gahetvā mahājanassa dhammaṃ desente bhagavati uttaropi avidūre nisīdati.
atk-s0202a0:1093_7: Dhammassavanapariyosāne saddhā manussā svātanāya bhagavantaṃ nimantetvā māṇavampi upasaṅkamitvā evaṃ vadanti – “tāta,
atk-s0202a0:1093_9: tvampi bhagavatā saddhiṃ āgantvā amhākaṃ gehe bhattaṃ gaṇheyyāsī”ti.
atk-s0202a0:1093_11: uttaropi padavāre padavāre pariggaṇhanto padānupadiko anubandhati.
atk-s0202a0:1093_12: Kulagehaṃ paviṭṭhakāle dakkhiṇodakaggahaṇaṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbaṃ olokento nisīdati.
atk-s0202a0:1093_13: Bhattakiccāvasāne tathāgatassa pattaṃ bhūmiyaṃ ṭhapetvā nisinnakāle māṇavakassa pātarāsabhattaṃ sajjenti.
atk-s0202a0:1093_14: So ekamante nisinno bhuñjitvā puna āgantvā satthu santike ṭhatvā bhattānumodanaṃ sutvā bhagavatā saddhiṃyeva vihāraṃ gacchati.
atk-s0202a0:1094_0: Tattha bhagavā bhikkhūnaṃ bhattakiccapariyosānaṃ āgamento gandhamaṇḍalamāḷe nisīdati.
atk-s0202a0:1094_1: Bhikkhūhi bhattakiccaṃ katvā pattacīvaraṃ paṭisāmetvā āgamma vanditvā kāle ārocite bhagavā gandhakuṭiṃ pavisati,
atk-s0202a0:1094_3: Bhagavā parivāretvā āgataṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ gandhakuṭippamukhe ṭhito ovaditvā uyyojetvā gandhakuṭiṃ pavisati,
atk-s0202a0:1094_8: “bhoto gotamassa vihāravelā bhavissatī”ti māṇavo gandhakuṭidvāraṃ pidahanto nikkhamitvā ekamantaṃ nisīdati.
atk-s0202a0:1094_9: Manussā purebhattaṃ dānaṃ datvā bhuttapātarāsā samādinnauposathaṅgā suddhuttarāsaṅgā mālāgandhādihatthā dhammaṃ suṇissāmāti vihāraṃ āgacchanti,
atk-s0202a0:1095_0: Bhagavā muhuttaṃ sīhaseyyaṃ kappetvā vuṭṭhāya pubbabhāgena paricchinditvā samāpattiṃ samāpajjati.
atk-s0202a0:1095_1: Samāpattito vuṭṭhāya mahājanassa āgatabhāvaṃ ñatvā gandhakuṭito nikkhamma mahājanaparivuto gandhamaṇḍalamāḷaṃ
atk-s0202a0:1095_4: “kiṃ nu kho samaṇo gotamo gehassitavasena parisaṃ ussādento vā apasādento vā dhammaṃ deseti,
atk-s0202a0:1095_5: udāhu no”ti akkharakkharaṃ padaṃ padaṃ pariggaṇhāti.
atk-s0202a0:1095_6: Bhagavā tathāvidhaṃ kathaṃ akathetvāva kālaṃ ñatvā desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0202a0:1095_7: Māṇavo iminā niyāmena pariggaṇhanto satta māse ekato vicaritvā bhagavato kāyadvārādīsu aṇumattampi avakkhalitaṃ na addasa.
atk-s0202a0:1095_9: yaṃ buddhabhūtassa manussabhūto māṇavo na passeyya,
atk-s0202a0:1095_10: yassa bodhisattabhūtassa chabbassāni padhānabhūmiyaṃ amanussabhūto māro devaputto gehassitavitakkamattampi
atk-s0202a0:1095_11: adisvā buddhabhūtaṃ ekasaṃvaccharaṃ anubandhitvā kiñci apassanto –
atk-s0202a0:1098_2: “ahaṃ bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ satta māse anubandhamāno kiñci vajjaṃ na passāmi.
atk-s0202a0:1098_3: Sace panāhaṃ aññepi satta māse satta vā vassāni vassasataṃ vā vassasahassaṃ vā anubandheyyaṃ,
atk-s0202a0:1098_7: Samaṇassa gotamassa sabhāvaguṇeneva buddhabhāvaṃ vatvā mayhaṃ ācariyassa ārocessāmī”ti bhagavantaṃ āpucchitvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ vanditvā nikkhami.
atk-s0202a0:1099_2: taṃ bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ tathāsantaṃyeva saddo abbhuggato”ti pucchito, “ācariya,
atk-s0202a0:1099_6: bhoto gotamassa ākāsaṃ viya apariyanto guṇagaṇo.
atk-s0202a0:1099_8: taṃ bhavantaṃ gotama”ntiādīni vatvā yathādiṭṭhāni dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇāni paṭipāṭiyā ācikkhitvā kiriyasamācāraṃ ācikkhi.
atk-s0202a0:1099_11: ediso ca ediso ca bhavaṃ gotamo tato ca bhiyyo”ti.
atk-s0202a0:1100_1: Tattha suppatiṭṭhitapādoti yathā hi aññesaṃ bhūmiyaṃ pādaṃ ṭhapentānaṃ aggatalaṃ vā paṇhi vā passaṃ vā paṭhamaṃ phusati,
atk-s0202a0:1100_5: Tassa pana suvaṇṇapādukatalaṃ viya ekappahāreneva sakalaṃ pādatalaṃ bhūmiṃ phusati,
atk-s0202a0:1100_7: Tasmā “suppatiṭṭhitapādo kho pana so bhavaṃ gotamo”ti vadati.
atk-s0202a0:1101_1: sacepi hi bhagavā anekasataporisaṃ narakaṃ akkamissāmīti pādaṃ nīharati,
atk-s0202a0:1101_2: tāvadeva ninnaṭṭhānaṃ vātapūritaṃ viya kammārabhastaṃ unnamitvā pathavīsamaṃ hoti,
atk-s0202a0:1101_4: Dūre akkamissāmīti abhinīharantassa sineruppamāṇopi pabbato seditavettaṅkuro viya namitvā pādasamīpaṃ āgacchati.
atk-s0202a0:1101_5: Tathā hissa yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ katvā yugandharapabbataṃ akkamissāmīti pāde abhinīharato pabbato namitvā pādasamīpaṃ āgato,
atk-s0202a0:1101_6: so taṃ akkamitvā dutiyapādena tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ akkami.
atk-s0202a0:1101_7: Na hi cakkalakkhaṇena patiṭṭhātabbaṭṭhānaṃ visamaṃ bhavituṃ sakkoti.
atk-s0202a0:1101_8: Khāṇu vā kaṇḍako vā sakkharakathalā vā uccārapassāvo vā kheḷasiṅghāṇikādīni vā purimatarāva apagacchanti,
atk-s0202a0:1101_10: Tathāgatassa hi sīlatejena paññātejena dhammatejena dasannaṃ pāramīnaṃ ānubhāvena ayaṃ mahāpathavī samā mudu pupphābhikiṇṇā hoti.
atk-s0202a0:1102_1: Tesaṃ arā ca nemi ca nābhi ca pāḷiyaṃ vuttāva.
atk-s0202a0:1102_2: Sabbākāraparipūrānīti iminā pana ayaṃ viseso veditabbo –
atk-s0202a0:1102_3: tesaṃ kira cakkānaṃ pādatalassa majjhe nābhi dissati,
atk-s0202a0:1103_2: satti siri vaccho nandi sovattiko vaṭaṃsako vaḍḍhamānakaṃ macchayugalaṃ bhaddapīṭhaṃ aṅkusaṃ tomaro pāsādo
atk-s0202a0:1103_3: toraṇaṃ setacchattaṃ khaggo tālavaṇṭaṃ morahatthako vāḷabījanī uṇhīsaṃ patto maṇi kusumadāmaṃ nīluppalaṃ
atk-s0202a0:1103_4: rattuppalaṃ setuppalaṃ padumaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ puṇṇaghaṭo puṇṇapāti samuddo cakkavāḷo himavā sineru candimasūriyā
atk-s0202a0:1103_6: antamaso cakkavattirañño parisaṃ upādāya sabbo cakkalakkhaṇasseva parivāro.
atk-s0202a0:1104_2: Yathā hi aññesaṃ aggapādo dīgho hoti,
atk-s0202a0:1104_6: Tathāgatassa pana catūsu koṭṭhāsesu dve koṭṭhāsā aggapādo hoti,
atk-s0202a0:1104_8: catutthe koṭṭhāse āraggena vaṭṭetvā ṭhapitā viya rattakambale geṇḍukasadisā paṇhi hoti.
atk-s0202a0:1105_0: Dīghaṅgulīti yathā aññesaṃ kāci aṅguli dīghā hoti,
atk-s0202a0:1105_3: Tathāgatassa pana makkaṭasseva dīghahatthapādaṅguliyo mūle thūlā anupubbena gantvā agge tanukā niyyāsatelena
atk-s0202a0:1106_0: Mudutalunahatthapādoti sappimaṇḍe osādetvā ṭhapitaṃ satavāravihatakappāsapaṭalaṃ viya mudū,
atk-s0202a0:1106_1: jātamattakumārassa viya ca niccakālaṃ talunā ca hatthapādā assāti mudutalunahatthapādo.
atk-s0202a0:1107_1: Ediso hi phaṇahatthako purisadosena upahato pabbajjampi na labhati.
atk-s0202a0:1107_2: Tathāgatassa pana catasso hatthaṅguliyo pañcapi pādaṅguliyo ekappamāṇā honti,
atk-s0202a0:1107_3: tāsaṃ ekappamāṇattāya yavalakkhaṇaṃ aññamaññaṃ paṭivijjhitvā tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0202a0:1107_4: Athassa hatthapādā kusalena vaḍḍhakinā yojitajālavātapānasadisā honti.
atk-s0202a0:1108_0: Uddhaṃ patiṭṭhitagopphakattā ussaṅkhā pādā assāti ussaṅkhapādo.
atk-s0202a0:1108_2: Tena tesaṃ pādā āṇibaddhā viya thaddhā honti,
atk-s0202a0:1108_5: Tathāgatassa pana abhiruhitvā upari gopphakā patiṭṭhahanti.
atk-s0202a0:1108_6: Tenassa nābhito paṭṭhāya uparimakāyo nāvāya ṭhapitasuvaṇṇapaṭimā viya niccalo hoti,
atk-s0202a0:1108_9: Puratopi pacchatopi ubhayapassesupi ṭhatvā passantānaṃ pādatalāni paññāyanti,
atk-s0202a0:1109_2: samantato samasaṇṭhitena maṃsena parikkhittāhi suvaṭṭitāhi sāligabbhasadisāhi jaṅghāhi samannāgatoti attho.
atk-s0202a0:1110_2: Avasesajanā hi khujjā vā honti vāmanā vā,
atk-s0202a0:1110_5: Te aparipuṇṇakāyattā na sakkonti anonamantā jaṇṇukāni parimajjituṃ.
atk-s0202a0:1111_0: Usabhavāraṇādīnaṃ viya suvaṇṇapadumakaṇṇikasadise kose ohitaṃ paṭicchannaṃ vatthaguyhaṃ assāti kosohitavatthaguyho.
atk-s0202a0:1112_0: Suvaṇṇavaṇṇoti jātihiṅgulakena majjitvā dīpidāṭhāya ghaṃsitvā gerukaparikammaṃ katvā ṭhapitaghanasuvaṇṇarūpakasadisoti attho.
atk-s0202a0:1112_1: Etenassa ghanasiniddhasaṇhasarīrataṃ dassetvā chavivaṇṇadassanatthaṃ kañcanasannibhattacoti vuttaṃ,
atk-s0202a0:1113_3: Hatthadhovanapādadhovanādīni pana utuggahaṇatthāya ceva dāyakānaṃ puññaphalatthāya ca buddhā karonti,
atk-s0202a0:1113_5: Senāsanaṃ pavisantena hi bhikkhunā pāde dhovitvā pavisitabbanti vuttametaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:1114_0: Uddhaggalomoti āvaṭṭapariyosāne uddhaggāni hutvā mukhasobhaṃ ullokayamānāni viya ṭhitāni lomāni assāti uddhaggalomo.
atk-s0202a0:1115_2: Yebhuyyena hi sattā khandhe kaṭiyaṃ jāṇūsūti tīsu ṭhānesu namanti.
atk-s0202a0:1115_6: eke mukhaṃ unnāmetvā nakkhattāni gaṇayantā viya caranti,
atk-s0202a0:1115_9: Tathāgato pana ujumeva uggantvā dīghappamāṇo devanagare ussitasuvaṇṇatoraṇaṃ viya hoti.
atk-s0202a0:1116_0: Sattussadoti dve hatthapiṭṭhiyo dve pādapiṭṭhiyo dve aṃsakūṭāni khandhoti imesu sattasu ṭhānesu paripuṇṇamaṃsussado assāti sattussado.
atk-s0202a0:1116_5: Tathāgato pana sattasu ṭhānesu paripuṇṇamaṃsussadattā nigūḷhanhārujālehi hatthapiṭṭhādīhi vaṭṭetvā ṭhapitasuvaṇṇavaṇṇāliṅgasadisena
atk-s0202a0:1116_6: khandhena silārūpakaṃ viya cittakammarūpakaṃ viya ca khāyati.
atk-s0202a0:1117_0: Sīhassa pubbaddhaṃ viya kāyo assāti sīhapubbaddhakāyo.
atk-s0202a0:1117_3: Tathāgatassa pana sīhassa pubbaddhakāyova sabbo kāyo paripuṇṇo.
atk-s0202a0:1117_4: Sopi sīhasseva na tattha tattha vinatunnatādivasena dussaṇṭhitavisaṇṭhito,
atk-s0202a0:1118_2: kammavipāke paccupaṭṭhite yehi aṅgehi dīghehi sobhati,
atk-s0202a0:1119_0: Iti nānācittena puññacittena cittito dasahi pāramīhi sajjito tathāgatassa attabhāvo,
atk-s0202a0:1119_1: tassa loke sabbasippino vā iddhimanto vā paṭirūpakampi kātuṃ na sakkonti.
atk-s0202a0:1120_4: Tathāgatassa pana kaṭito paṭṭhāya maṃsapaṭalaṃ yāva khandhā uggamma samussitasuvaṇṇaphalakaṃ viya piṭṭhiṃ chādetvā patiṭṭhitaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:1121_1: Yathā paṇṇāsahatthatāya vā satahatthatāya vā samakkhandhasākho nigrodho dīghatopi vitthāratopi ekappamāṇova hoti,
atk-s0202a0:1121_3: Yathā aññesaṃ kāyo vā dīgho hoti byāmo vā,
atk-s0202a0:1122_1: Yathā eke koñcā viya bakā viya varāhā viya ca dīghagalā vaṅkagalā puthulagalā ca honti,
atk-s0202a0:1122_7: meghassa viya gajjato saro mahā hoti.
atk-s0202a0:1123_3: Tathāgatassa hi satta rasaharaṇisahassāni uddhaggāni hutvā gīvāyameva paṭimukkāni.
atk-s0202a0:1123_4: Tilaphalamattopi āhāro jivhagge ṭhapito sabbaṃ kāyaṃ anupharati,
atk-s0202a0:1123_5: teneva mahāpadhānaṃ padahantassa ekataṇḍulādīhipi kāḷāyayūsapasatenāpi kāyassa yāpanaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0202a0:1123_6: Aññesaṃ pana tathā abhāvā na sakalakāyaṃ ojā pharati,
atk-s0202a0:1123_8: Idaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ appābādhatāsaṅkhātassa nissandaphalassa vasena pākaṭaṃ hoti.
atk-s0202a0:1124_3: Tathāgatassa pana sīhassa heṭṭhimaṃ viya dvepi paripuṇṇāni dvādasiyaṃ pakkhassa candasadisāni honti.
atk-s0202a0:1125_1: heṭṭhime vīsatīti cattālīsa dantā assāti cattālīsadanto.
atk-s0202a0:1126_0: Aññesañca keci dantā uccā keci nīcāti visamā honti,
atk-s0202a0:1127_0: Aññesaṃ kumbhīlānaṃ viya dantā viraḷā honti,
atk-s0202a0:1127_2: Tathāgatassa pana kanakalatāya samussāpitavajirapanti viya aviraḷā tulikāya dassitaparicchedā viya dantā honti.
atk-s0202a0:1128_1: tena kāci dāṭhā kāḷāpi vivaṇṇāpi honti.
atk-s0202a0:1128_2: Tathāgato susukkadāṭho osadhitārakampi atikkamma virocamānāya pabhāya samannāgatadāṭho,
atk-s0202a0:1129_0: Pahūtajivhoti aññesaṃ jivhā thūlāpi hoti kisāpi rassāpi thaddhāpi visamāpi,
atk-s0202a0:1129_1: tathāgatassa pana mudu dīghā puthulā vaṇṇasampannā hoti.
atk-s0202a0:1129_2: So taṃ lakkhaṇaṃ pariyesituṃ āgatānaṃ kaṅkhāvinodanatthaṃ mudukattā taṃ jivhaṃ kathinasūciṃ viya vaṭṭetvā ubho nāsikasotāni parāmasati,
atk-s0202a0:1129_5: Evaṃ tassā mududīghaputhulabhāvaṃ pakāsento kaṅkhaṃ vinodeti.
atk-s0202a0:1130_0: Brahmassaroti aññe chinnassarāpi bhinnassarāpi kākassarāpi honti,
atk-s0202a0:1130_1: tathāgato pana mahābrahmuno sarasadisena sarena samannāgato.
atk-s0202a0:1130_2: Mahābrahmuno hi pittasemhehi apalibuddhattā saro visuddho hoti.
atk-s0202a0:1130_4: vatthussa suddhattā nābhito paṭṭhāya samuṭṭhahanto saro visuddho aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgatova samuṭṭhāti.
atk-s0202a0:1131_1: karavikasakuṇe kira madhurarasaṃ ambapakkaṃ mukhatuṇḍakena paharitvā paggharitaṃ rasaṃ sāyitvā pakkhena
atk-s0202a0:1131_2: tālaṃ datvā vikūjamāne catuppadādīni mattāni viya laḷituṃ ārabhanti.
atk-s0202a0:1131_3: Gocarappasutāpi catuppadā mukhagatānipi tiṇāni chaḍḍetvā taṃ saddaṃ suṇanti,
atk-s0202a0:1131_4: vāḷamigā khuddakamige anubandhamānā ukkhittapādaṃ anukkhipitvāva tiṭṭhanti,
atk-s0202a0:1131_7: udake macchāpi kaṇṇapaṭalaṃ apphoṭentā taṃ saddaṃ suṇamānāva tiṭṭhanti.
atk-s0202a0:1132_2: buddhasaddena sadiso kassaci saddo”ti saṅghaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0202a0:1132_7: Rājā “imasmiṃ pañjare nisīditvā karaviko āgacchatū”ti suvaṇṇapañjaraṃ vissajjesi.
atk-s0202a0:1132_8: Pañjaro gantvā ekassa karavikassa purato aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0202a0:1132_13: Atha rājā “kathaṃ bhaṇe ime saddaṃ karontī”ti āha?
atk-s0202a0:1132_16: So attanova chāyaṃ disvā “ñātakā me āgatā”ti maññamāno pakkhena tāḷaṃ datvā mañjussarena maṇivaṃsaṃ dhamamāno viya viravi.
atk-s0202a0:1132_20: kīdiso nu kho sabbaññutaññāṇasirippattassa bhagavato ahosī”ti pītiṃ uppādetvā taṃ pītiṃ avijahitvā sattahi
atk-s0202a0:1132_23: Tato satabhāgena sahassabhāgena ca madhurataro tathāgatassa saddo,
atk-s0202a0:1132_24: loke pana karavikato aññassa madhurarassa abhāvato “karavikabhāṇī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:1133_1: nīlayuttaṭṭhāne panassa umāpupphasadisena ativisuddhena nīlavaṇṇena samannāgatāni akkhīni honti.
atk-s0202a0:1133_5: kāḷayuttaṭṭhāne addāriṭṭhakasadisena kāḷavaṇṇena samannāgatāni suvaṇṇavimāne ugghāṭitamaṇisīhapañjarasadisāni khāyanti.
atk-s0202a0:1134_0: Gopakhumoti ettha pakhumanti sakalaṃ cakkhubhaṇḍaṃ adhippetaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:1134_5: hatthimūsikakākādīnaṃ akkhisadisehi viniggatehi gambhīrehipi akkhīhi samannāgatā honti.
atk-s0202a0:1134_6: Tathāgatassa pana dhovitvā majjitvā ṭhapitamaṇiguḷikā viya mudusiniddhanīlasukhumapakhumācitāni akkhīni.
atk-s0202a0:1135_1: Bhamukantareti dvinnaṃ bhamukānaṃ vemajjhe nāsikamatthakeyeva jātā.
atk-s0202a0:1135_7: Sā panesā koṭiyaṃ gahetvā ākaḍḍhiyamānā upaḍḍhabāhuppamāṇā hoti,
atk-s0202a0:1135_8: vissaṭṭhā dakkhiṇāvaṭṭavasena āvaṭṭitvā uddhaggā hutvā santiṭṭhati,
atk-s0202a0:1135_9: suvaṇṇaphalakamajjhe ṭhapitarajatapupphuḷakā viya suvaṇṇaghaṭato nikkhamamānā khīradhārā viya aruṇappabhārañjite
atk-s0202a0:1135_10: gamanatale osadhitārakā viya ca atimanoharāya siriyā virocati.
atk-s0202a0:1136_0: Uṇhīsasīsoti idaṃ paripuṇṇanalāṭatañceva paripuṇṇasīsatañcāti dve atthavase paṭicca vuttaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:1136_1: Tathāgatassa hi dakkhiṇakaṇṇacūḷikato paṭṭhāya maṃsapaṭalaṃ uṭṭhahitvā sakalaṃ nalāṭaṃ chādayamānaṃ pūrayamānaṃ gantvā vāmakaṇṇacūḷikāya patiṭṭhitaṃ,
atk-s0202a0:1136_3: Pacchimabhavikabodhisattānaṃ kira imaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ viditvā rājūnaṃ uṇhīsapaṭṭaṃ akaṃsu,
atk-s0202a0:1136_11: Tathāgatassa pana āraggena vaṭṭetvā ṭhapitaṃ viya suparipuṇṇaṃ udakapupphuḷasadisaṃ sīsaṃ hoti.
atk-s0202a0:1136_13: Dutiyanayena uṇhīsaṃ viya sabbattha parimaṇḍalasīsoti uṇhīsasīso.
atk-s0202a0:1137_0: Imāni pana mahāpurisalakkhaṇāni kammaṃ kammasarikkhakaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ lakkhaṇānisaṃsanti ime cattāro koṭṭhāse
atk-s0202a0:1137_1: ekekasmiṃ lakkhaṇe dassetvā kathitāni sukathitāni honti.
atk-s0202a0:1137_2: Tasmā bhagavatā lakkhaṇasutte vuttāni imāni kammādīni dassetvā kathetabbāni.
atk-s0202a0:1137_3: Suttavasena vinicchituṃ asakkontena sumaṅgalavilāsiniyā dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāya tasseva suttassa vaṇṇanāya vuttanayena gahetabbāni.
atk-s0202a0:1138_3: imehi dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇehi so bhavaṃ gotamo samannāgato devanagare samussitaratanavicittaṃ suvaṇṇatoraṇaṃ
atk-s0202a0:1138_4: viya yojanasatubbedho sabbapāliphullo pāricchattako viya selantaramhi supupphitasālarukkho viya tārāgaṇapaṭimaṇḍitagaganatalamiva
atk-s0202a0:1138_5: ca attano sirivibhavena lokaṃ ālokaṃ kurumāno viya caratīti imatthampi dīpetvā kiriyācāraṃ ācikkhituṃ
atk-s0202a0:1139_1: Dakkhiṇenāti buddhānañhi ṭhatvā vā nisīditvā vā nipajjitvā vā gamanaṃ abhinīharantānaṃ dakkhiṇapādova purato hoti.
atk-s0202a0:1139_3: Nātidūre pādaṃ uddharatīti taṃ dakkhiṇapādaṃ na atidūre ṭhapessāmīti uddharati.
atk-s0202a0:1139_4: Atidūrañhi abhihariyamāne dakkhiṇapādena vāmapādo ākaḍḍhiyamāno gaccheyya,
atk-s0202a0:1139_8: Dakkhiṇapāde pana pamāṇeneva uddhate vāmapādopi pamāṇeneva uddhariyati,
atk-s0202a0:1140_0: Nātisīghanti divā vihārabhattatthāya gacchanto bhikkhu viya na atisīghaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0202a0:1140_1: Nātisaṇikanti yathā pacchato āgacchanto okāsaṃ na labhati,
atk-s0202a0:1140_4: na satthiṃ unnāmetīti gambhīre udake gacchanto viya na ūruṃ unnāmeti.
atk-s0202a0:1140_5: Na onāmetīti rukkhasākhāchedanadaṇḍaṅkusapādo viya na pacchato osakkāpeti.
atk-s0202a0:1140_6: Na sannāmetīti obaddhānābaddhaṭṭhānehi pādaṃ koṭṭento viya na thaddhaṃ karoti.
atk-s0202a0:1140_7: Na vināmetīti yantarūpakaṃ kīḷāpento viya na ito cito ca cāleti.
atk-s0202a0:1140_9: uparimakāyo nāvāya ṭhapitasuvaṇṇapaṭimā viya niccalo hoti.
atk-s0202a0:1140_10: Dūre ṭhatvā olokento hi buddhānaṃ ṭhitabhāvaṃ vā gamanabhāvaṃ vā na jānāti.
atk-s0202a0:1140_11: Kāyabalenāti bāhā khipanto sarīrato sedehi muccantehi na kāyabalena gacchati.
atk-s0202a0:1140_12: Sabbakāyenevāti gīvaṃ aparivattetvā rāhulovāde vuttanāgāpalokitavaseneva apaloketi.
atk-s0202a0:1141_0: Na uddhantiādīsu nakkhattāni gaṇento viya na uddhaṃ ulloketi,
atk-s0202a0:1141_1: naṭṭhaṃ kākaṇikaṃ vā māsakaṃ vā pariyesanto viya na adho oloketi,
atk-s0202a0:1141_2: na hatthiassādayo passanto viya ito cito ca vipekkhamāno gacchati.
atk-s0202a0:1141_3: Yugamattanti navavidatthimatte cakkhūni ṭhapetvā gacchanto yugamattaṃ pekkhati nāma,
atk-s0202a0:1141_4: bhagavāpi yuge yutto sudantaājānīyo viya ettakaṃ passanto gacchati.
atk-s0202a0:1141_5: Tato cassa uttarīti yugamattato paraṃ na passatīti na vattabbo.
atk-s0202a0:1141_6: Na hi kuṭṭaṃ vā kavāṭaṃ vā gaccho vā latā vā āvarituṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0202a0:1141_7: atha khvassa anāvaraṇañāṇassa anekāni cakkavāḷasahassāni ekaṅgaṇāneva honti.
atk-s0202a0:1141_8: Antaragharanti heṭṭhā mahāsakuludāyisutte indakhīlato paṭṭhāya antaragharaṃ,
atk-s0202a0:1141_10: Na kāyantiādi pakatiiriyapatheneva pavisatīti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:1141_11: Daliddamanussānaṃ nīcagharakaṃ pavisantepi hi tathāgate chadanaṃ vā uggacchati,
atk-s0202a0:1141_14: Nātidūreti atidūre parivattantena hi ekaṃ dve padavāre piṭṭhibhāgena gantvā nisīditabbaṃ hoti.
atk-s0202a0:1141_15: Nāccāsanneti accāsanne parivattantena ekaṃ dve padavāre purato gantvā nisīditabbaṃ hoti.
atk-s0202a0:1141_16: Tasmā yasmiṃ padavāre ṭhitena purato vā pacchato vā agantvā nisīditabbaṃ hoti,
atk-s0202a0:1142_0: Pāṇināti kaṭivātābādhiko viya na āsanaṃ hatthehi gahetvā nisīdati.
atk-s0202a0:1142_1: Pakkhipatīti yo kiñci kammaṃ katvā kīḷanto ṭhitakova patati,
atk-s0202a0:1142_2: yopi orimaṃ aṅgaṃ nissāya nisinno ghaṃsanto yāva pārimaṅgā gacchati,
atk-s0202a0:1142_3: pārimaṅgaṃ vā nissāya nisinno tatheva yāva orimaṅgā āgacchati,
atk-s0202a0:1142_4: sabbo so āsane kāyaṃ pakkhipati nāma.
atk-s0202a0:1142_5: Bhagavā pana evaṃ akatvā āsanassa majjhe olambakaṃ dhārento viya tūlapicuṃ ṭhapento viya saṇikaṃ nisīdati.
atk-s0202a0:1142_6: Hatthakukkuccanti pattamukhavaṭṭiyaṃ udakabinduṭhapanaṃ makkhikabījaniyā paṇṇacchedanaphālanādi hatthena asaṃyatakaraṇaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:1143_3: Na paritassatīti bhayaparitassanāyapi taṇhāparitassanāyapi na paritassati.
atk-s0202a0:1143_4: Ekacco hi dhammakathādīnaṃ atthāya āgantvā manussesu vanditvā ṭhitesu “sakkhissāmi nu kho tesaṃ cittaṃ gaṇhanto dhammaṃ vā kathetuṃ,
atk-s0202a0:1143_7: Ekacco “manāpā nu kho me yāgu āgacchissati,
atk-s0202a0:1143_13: Vivekavattaṃ nāma katabhattakiccassa bhikkhuno divāvihāre samathavipassanāvasena mūlakammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā nisīdanaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:1143_14: Evaṃ nisinnassa hi iriyāpatho upasanto hoti.
atk-s0202a0:1144_0: Na pattaṃ unnāmetītiādīsu ekacco pattamukhavaṭṭiyā udakadānaṃ āharanto viya pattaṃ unnāmeti,
atk-s0202a0:1144_4: evaṃ akatvā ubhohi hatthehi gahetvā īsakaṃ nāmetvā udakaṃ paṭiggaṇhātīti attho.
atk-s0202a0:1144_5: Na samparivattakanti parivattetvā paṭhamameva pattapiṭṭhiṃ na dhovati.
atk-s0202a0:1145_0: Nātithokanti yathā ekacco pāpiccho appicchataṃ dassento muṭṭhimattameva gaṇhāti, na evaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:1145_2: Byañjanamattāyāti byañjanassa mattā nāma odanato catuttho bhāgo.
atk-s0202a0:1145_3: Ekacco hi bhatte manāpe bhattaṃ bahuṃ gaṇhāti,
atk-s0202a0:1145_6: Na ca byañjanenāti amanāpañhi byañjanaṃ ṭhapetvā bhattameva bhuñjanto,
atk-s0202a0:1145_7: bhattaṃ vā ṭhapetvā byañjanameva khādanto byañjanena ālopaṃ atināmeti nāma.
atk-s0202a0:1145_10: Dvattikkhattunti tathāgatassa hi puthujivhāya dantānaṃ upanītabhojanaṃ dvattikkhattuṃ dantehi phuṭṭhamattameva
atk-s0202a0:1145_13: Na mukhe avasiṭṭhāti pokkharapatte patitaudakabindu viya vinivattitvā paragalameva yāti,
atk-s0202a0:1145_16: Buddhānañhi antamaso pānīyepi dibbojā pakkhittāva hoti,
atk-s0202a0:1145_17: tena nesaṃ sabbattheva raso pākaṭo hoti,
atk-s0202a0:1146_0: Aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgatanti “neva davāyā”ti vuttehi aṭṭhahi aṅgehi samannāgataṃ.
atk-s0202a0:1146_1: Visuddhimagge panassa vinicchayo āgatoti sabbāsavasutte vuttametaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:1146_4: Tattha pattaṃ gahetvā sukhumajālahatthaṃ pesetvā dve vāre sañcāreti.
atk-s0202a0:1146_5: Ettāvatā pokkharapatte patitaudakaṃ viya vinivattitvā gacchati.
atk-s0202a0:1146_6: Na ca anatthikoti yathā ekacco pattaṃ ādhārake ṭhapetvā patte udakaṃ na puñchati,
atk-s0202a0:1146_9: Na ca ativelānurakkhīti yathā ekacco pamāṇātikkantaṃ ārakkhaṃ ṭhapeti,
atk-s0202a0:1146_10: bhuñjitvā vā patte udakaṃ puñchitvā cīvarabhogantaraṃ pavesetvā pattaṃ udarena akkamitvā gaṇhāti,
atk-s0202a0:1147_0: Na ca anumodanassāti yo hi bhuttamattova dārakesu bhattatthāya rodantesu chātajjhattesu manussesu bhuñjitvā anāgatesveva anumodanaṃ ārabhati,
atk-s0202a0:1147_4: Yopi manussesu āgantvā anumodanatthāya vanditvā nisinnesu anumodanaṃ akatvāva “kathaṃ tissa,
atk-s0202a0:1147_13: manussānaṃ pana okāsaṃ ñatvā āyācitakāle karonto nātināmeti nāma,
atk-s0202a0:1148_0: Na taṃ bhattanti kiṃ bhattaṃ nāmetaṃ uttaṇḍulaṃ atikilinnantiādīni vatvā na garahati.
atk-s0202a0:1148_1: Na aññaṃ bhattanti svātanāya vā punadivasāya vā bhattaṃ uppādessāmīti hi anumodanaṃ karonto aññaṃ bhattaṃ paṭikaṅkhati. Yo vā –
atk-s0202a0:1148_4: atha me anumodanāvasāne attano pakkabhattatopi thokaṃ dassantī”ti anumodanaṃ vaḍḍheti,
atk-s0202a0:1148_7: Na ca muccitukāmoti ekacco hi paṭisaṃmuñcitvā gacchati,
atk-s0202a0:1148_11: Accukkaṭṭhanti yo hi yāva hanukaṭṭhito ukkhipitvā pārupati,
atk-s0202a0:1148_15: Yopi ubhato ukkhipitvā udaraṃ vivaritvā yāti,
atk-s0202a0:1148_17: Yo ekaṃsaṃ katvā thanaṃ vivaritvā yāti,
atk-s0202a0:1149_0: Allīnanti yathā aññesaṃ sedena tintaṃ allīyati,
atk-s0202a0:1149_2: Apakaṭṭhanti khalisāṭako viya kāyato muccitvāpi na tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0202a0:1149_3: Vātoti verambhavātopi uṭṭhahitvā cāletuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0202a0:1149_6: So neva attabyābādhāyātiādīni na pubbenivāsacetopariyañāṇānaṃ atthitāya vadati,
atk-s0202a0:1149_10: kiṃ mahākuṭumbikātiādīni vatvā gehassitavasena na ussādeti.
atk-s0202a0:1149_14: Na hi bhikkhū kiñci acchinditvā gaṇhanti,
atk-s0202a0:1149_15: mā bhāyī”ti vā “kiṃ tuyhaṃ evaṃ macchariyajīvitaṃ nāmā”ti vā ādīni vatvā gehassitapemena na apasādeti.
atk-s0202a0:1150_13: Bahiddhāti aṅgulimattampi parisato bahiddhā na gacchati. Tasmā?
atk-s0202a0:1150_14: So evarūpo madhurassaro akāraṇā mā nassīti.
atk-s0202a0:1150_15: Iti bhagavato ghoso parisāya matthakeneva carati.
atk-s0202a0:1151_0: Avalokayamānāti sirasmiṃ añjaliṃ ṭhapetvā bhagavantaṃ olokentāva paccosakkitvā dassanavijahanaṭṭhāne vanditvā gacchanti.
atk-s0202a0:1151_1: Avijahitattāti yo hi kathaṃ sutvā vuṭṭhito aññaṃ diṭṭhasutādikaṃ kathaṃ kathento gacchati,
atk-s0202a0:1151_3: Yo pana sutadhammakathāya vaṇṇaṃ kathentova gacchati,
atk-s0202a0:1151_6: Gacchantanti rajjuyantavasena ratanasattubbedhaṃ suvaṇṇagghikaṃ viya gacchantaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:1151_7: Addasāma ṭhitanti samussitakañcanapabbataṃ viya ṭhitaṃ addasāma.
atk-s0202a0:1151_8: Tato ca bhiyyoti vitthāretvā guṇe kathetuṃ asakkonto avasese guṇe saṃkhipitvā kalāpaṃ viya suttakabaddhaṃ viya ca katvā vissajjento evamāha.
atk-s0202a0:1151_11: Mahāpathavimahāsamuddādayo viya hi tassa bhoto anantā appameyyā guṇā ākāsamiva vitthāritāti.
atk-s0202a0:1152_2: Pabbajite upasaṅkamantena hi cīvaraparikammādisamaye vā ekaṃ nivāsetvā sarīrabhañjanasamaye vā upasaṅkamitvā tatova paṭinivattitabbaṃ hoti,
atk-s0202a0:1152_4: Puretaraṃ pana okāse kārite divāṭṭhānaṃ sammajjitvā cīvaraṃ pārupitvā bhikkhu vivitte ṭhāne nisīdati,
atk-s0202a0:1152_11: Jiṇṇo vuḍḍhoti attano uggatabhāvaṃ akathetvā kasmā evamāha?
atk-s0202a0:1152_13: mahallakabhāvaṃ ñatvā sīghaṃ okāsaṃ karissatīti evamāha.
atk-s0202a0:1153_0: 391. Oramiya okāsamakāsīti vegena uṭṭhāya dvidhā bhijjitvā okāsamakāsi.
atk-s0202a0:1156_1: Paccabhāsīti ekappahārena pucchite aṭṭha pañhe byākaronto patiabhāsi.
atk-s0202a0:1156_6: Abhiññā vositoti taṃ arahattaṃ abhijānitvā vosito vosānappatto.
atk-s0202a0:1157_4: Brahmacariyassa kevalīti yaṃ brahmacariyassa kevalī sakalabhāvo,
atk-s0202a0:1157_7: Pāragū sabbadhammānanti sabbesaṃ lokiyalokuttaradhammānaṃ abhiññāya pāraṃ gato,
atk-s0202a0:1157_9: Pāragūti vā ettāvatā pariññāpāragū pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ,
atk-s0202a0:1157_15: Buddho tādī pavuccatīti tādiso chahi ākārehi pāraṃ gato sabbākārena catunnaṃ saccānaṃ buddhattā buddhoti pavuccatīti.
atk-s0202a0:1158_0: Kiṃ pana ettāvatā sabbe pañhā vissajjitā hontīti?
atk-s0202a0:1158_3: muttaṃ rāgehīti iminā tāva bāhitapāpattā brāhmaṇoti paṭhamapañho vissajjito hoti.
atk-s0202a0:1158_4: Pāragūti iminā vedehi gatattā vedagūti dutiyapañho vissajjito hoti.
atk-s0202a0:1158_5: Pubbenivāsantiādīhi imāsaṃ tissannaṃ vijjānaṃ atthitāya tevijjoti tatiyapañho vissajjito hoti.
atk-s0202a0:1158_6: Muttaṃ rāgehi sabbasoti imināva nissaṭattā pāpadhammānaṃ sottiyoti catutthapañho vissajjito hoti.
atk-s0202a0:1158_7: Jātikkhayaṃ pattoti iminā pana arahattasseva vuttattā pañcamapañho vissajjito hoti.
atk-s0202a0:1158_8: Vositoti ca brahmacariyassa kevalīti ca imehi chaṭṭhapañho vissajjito hoti.
atk-s0202a0:1158_9: Abhiññā vosito munīti iminā sattamapañho vissajjito hoti.
atk-s0202a0:1158_11: buddho tādī pavuccatīti iminā aṭṭhamapañho vissajjito hoti.
atk-s0202a0:1159_3: Dhammassānudhammanti imasmiṃ sutte dhammo nāma arahattamaggo,
atk-s0202a0:1159_4: anudhammo nāma heṭṭhimā tayo maggā tīṇi ca sāmaññaphalāni,
atk-s0202a0:1159_6: Na ca maṃ dhammādhikaraṇaṃ vihesesīti mañca dhammakāraṇā na kilamesi,
atk-s0202a0:1159_9: Tattha parinibbāyīti pana padena desanāya arahatteneva kūṭaṃ gahitanti.
atk-s0202a0:1163_4: dvādasahi satehi paññāsāya ca bhikkhūhi saddhinti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0202a0:1163_5: Te pana sāvakasannipāte sannipatitā bhikkhūyeva sabbe ehibhikkhupabbajjāya pabbajitā khīṇāsavā.
atk-s0202a0:1163_9: dhanarakkhaṇatthāya pana tāpasapabbajjaṃ samādāya rañño paṇṇākāraṃ datvā bhūmibhāgaṃ gahetvā tattha assamaṃ
atk-s0202a0:1163_10: kāretvā vasati pañcahi sakaṭasatehi vaṇijjaṃ payojetvā kulasahassassa nissayo hutvā,
atk-s0202a0:1163_11: assamepi cassa eko tālarukkho divase divase ekaṃ sovaṇṇamayaṃ tālaphalaṃ muñcatīti vadanti.
atk-s0202a0:1163_16: Ayañhi keṇiyo tucchahattho bhagavato dassanāya gantuṃ lajjāyamāno –
atk-s0202a0:1163_17: “vikālabhojanā viratānampi pānakaṃ kappatī”ti cintetvā susaṅkhatabadarapānaṃ pañcahi kājasatehi gāhāpetvā agamāsi.
atk-s0202a0:1163_19: “atha kho keṇiyassa jaṭilassa etadahosi kiṃ nu kho ahaṃ samaṇassa gotamassa harāpeyya”nti bhesajjakkhandhake pāḷiāruḷhoyeva.
atk-s0202a0:1164_0: Dutiyampi kho bhagavāti kasmā punappunaṃ paṭikkhipi?
atk-s0202a0:1164_4: Ayaṃ pana aḍḍhateḷasāni bhikkhusatāni disvā ettakānaṃyeva bhikkhaṃ paṭiyādessati,
atk-s0202a0:1164_5: sveva selo tīhi purisasatehi saddhiṃ pabbajissati.
atk-s0202a0:1164_6: Ayuttaṃ kho pana navake aññato pesetvā imeheva saddhiṃ gantuṃ,
atk-s0202a0:1164_7: ime vā aññato pesetvā navakehi saddhiṃ gantuṃ.
atk-s0202a0:1164_10: Tato bhikkhūsu piṇḍāya carantesu manussā ujjhāyissanti –
atk-s0202a0:1164_11: “cirassāpi keṇiyo samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ nimantetvā yāpanamattaṃ dātuṃ nāsakkhī”ti,
atk-s0202a0:1164_13: Paṭikkhepe pana kate “samaṇo gotamo punappunaṃ ‘tvañca brāhmaṇesu abhippasanno’ti brāhmaṇānaṃ nāmaṃ gaṇhātī”ti
atk-s0202a0:1164_16: te tena nimantitā bhikkhū hutvā bhuñjissanti.
atk-s0202a0:1164_17: Evamassa saddhā anurakkhitā bhavissatīti punappunaṃ paṭikkhipi.
atk-s0202a0:1164_21: kiṃ jātaṃ yadi ahaṃ brāhmaṇesu abhippasanno,
atk-s0202a0:1166_3: So me nimantitoti so mayā nimantito.
atk-s0202a0:1166_4: Atha brāhmaṇo paripakkopanissayattā buddhasaddaṃ sutvāva amatenevābhisitto pasādaṃ āvikaronto buddhoti,
atk-s0202a0:1166_7: Keṇiyo yathābhūtaṃ ācikkhanto buddhoti, bho sela,
atk-s0202a0:1167_6: Accāsanne hi atidūre vā pāde nikkhipamāne saddo uṭṭhāti,
atk-s0202a0:1167_8: Sīhāva ekacarāti gaṇavāsī sīho sīhapotakādīhi saddhiṃ pamādaṃ āpajjati,
atk-s0202a0:1167_10: Iti appamādavihāraṃ dassento ekacarasīhena opammaṃ karoti.
atk-s0202a0:1167_11: Mā me bhontoti ācāraṃ sikkhāpento āha.
atk-s0202a0:1167_13: sace tumhe kathāvāraṃ alabhitvā mama kathāya antare kathaṃ pavesessatha,
atk-s0202a0:1167_16: No ca kho naṃ jānāmīti vipassīpi bodhisatto caturāsītisahassattherapabbajitaparivāro satta māsāni bodhisattacārikaṃ cari,
atk-s0202a0:1167_19: Evaṃ paripuṇṇasarīralakkhaṇehi samannāgatāpi buddhā na honti.
atk-s0202a0:1167_20: Tasmā brāhmaṇo “no ca kho naṃ jānāmī”ti āha.
atk-s0202a0:1168_1: Paripuṇṇakāyoti lakkhaṇehi paripuṇṇatāya ahīnaṅgatāya ca paripuṇṇasarīro.
atk-s0202a0:1168_7: Mahāpurisalakkhaṇāti paṭhamaṃ vuttabyañjanāneva vacanantarena nigamento āha.
atk-s0202a0:1169_0: Idāni tesu lakkhaṇesu attano cittarucitāni gahetvā thomento pasannanettotiādimāha.
atk-s0202a0:1169_7: taṃ “majjhe samaṇasaṅghassā”ti iminā pariyāyena thomayatā puna vuttaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:1171_2: te sakavaṇṇe bhaññamāne attānaṃ pātukarontī”ti imaṃ selassa manorathaṃ pūrento rājāhamasmītiādimāha.
atk-s0202a0:1171_4: yaṃ maṃ tvaṃ sela “rājā arahasi bhavitu”nti yācasi,
atk-s0202a0:1171_6: Sati ca rājatte yathā añño rājā yojanasataṃ vā anusāsati yojanasahassaṃ vā,
atk-s0202a0:1171_9: ahañhi dhammarājā anuttaro bhavaggato avīcipariyantaṃ katvā tiriyaṃ appamāṇalokadhātuyo anusāsāmi.
atk-s0202a0:1171_12: Na hi me koci sīlena vā…pe…
atk-s0202a0:1171_14: svāhaṃ evaṃ dhammarājā anuttaro anuttareneva catusatipaṭṭhānādibhedena dhammena cakkaṃ vattemi.
atk-s0202a0:1171_20: Cakkaṃ appaṭivattiyanti yaṃ cakkaṃ appaṭivattiyaṃ hoti samaṇena vā…pe…
atk-s0202a0:1172_0: Evaṃ attānaṃ āvikarontaṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā pītisomanassajāto selo puna daḷhīkaraṇatthaṃ sambuddho paṭijānāsīti gāthādvayamāha.
atk-s0202a0:1172_1: Tattha ko nu senāpatīti rañño bhoto dhammena pavattitassa cakkassa anupavattako senāpati ko nūti pucchi.
atk-s0202a0:1173_0: Tena ca samayena bhagavato dakkhiṇapasse āyasmā sāriputto nisinno hoti suvaṇṇapuñjo viya siriyā sobhamāno,
atk-s0202a0:1173_1: taṃ dassento bhagavā mayā pavattitanti gāthamāha.
atk-s0202a0:1173_2: Tattha anujāto tathāgatanti tathāgataṃ hetuṃ anujāto,
atk-s0202a0:1173_4: Apica avajāto anujāto atijātoti tayo vuttā.
atk-s0202a0:1173_6: so tathāgatassa putto nāma na hoti.
atk-s0202a0:1173_9: Tathāgatassa pana eko anujātova putto hoti,
atk-s0202a0:1174_0: Evaṃ “ko nu senāpatī”ti pañhaṃ byākaritvā yaṃ selo āha “sambuddho paṭijānāsī”ti,
atk-s0202a0:1174_1: tatra naṃ nikkaṅkhaṃ kātukāmo “nāhaṃ paṭiññāmatteneva paṭijānāmi,
atk-s0202a0:1174_2: apicāhaṃ iminā kāraṇena buddho”ti ñāpetuṃ abhiññeyyanti gāthamāha.
atk-s0202a0:1174_3: Tatra abhiññeyyanti vijjā ca vimutti ca.
atk-s0202a0:1174_6: Hetuvacanena pana phalasiddhito tesaṃ phalāni nirodhasaccadukkhasaccānipi vuttāneva honti.
atk-s0202a0:1174_7: Evaṃ sacchikātabbaṃ sacchikataṃ pariññātabbaṃ pariññātanti idampettha saṅgahitanti catusaccabhāvanāphalañca
atk-s0202a0:1174_8: vimuttiñca dassento “bujjhitabbaṃ bujjhitvā buddho jātosmī”ti yuttahetunā buddhabhāvaṃ sādheti.
atk-s0202a0:1175_0: Evaṃ nippariyāyena attānaṃ āvikatvā attani kaṅkhāvitaraṇatthaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ aticāriyamāno vinayassūti gāthattayamāha.
atk-s0202a0:1175_2: Anuttaroti yathā bāhiravejjena vūpasamitarogo imasmiññevattabhāve kuppati, na evaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:1175_3: Mayā vūpasamitassa pana rogassa bhavantarepi uppatti natthi,
atk-s0202a0:1175_8: Mārasenappamaddanoti kāmā te paṭhamā senāti evaṃ āgatāya mārasenāya pamaddano.
atk-s0202a0:1176_0: Evaṃ vutte selo brāhmaṇo tāvadeva bhagavati sañjātapasādo pabbajjāpekkho hutvā imaṃ bhontoti gāthattayamāha.
atk-s0202a0:1176_2: Tato tepi māṇavakā pabbajjāpekkhā hutvā evañce ruccati,
atk-s0202a0:1176_4: Atha selo tesu māṇavakesu tuṭṭhacitto te ca dassento pabbajjaṃ yācanto “brāhmaṇā”ti gāthamāha.
atk-s0202a0:1177_0: Tato bhagavā yasmā selo atīte padumuttarassa bhagavato sāsane tesaṃyeva tiṇṇaṃ purisasatānaṃ gaṇaseṭṭho
atk-s0202a0:1177_1: hutvā tehi saddhiṃ pariveṇaṃ kāretvā dānādīni puññāni katvā tena kammena devamanussasampattiṃ anubhavamāno
atk-s0202a0:1177_2: pacchime bhave tesaṃyeva ācariyo hutvā nibbatto,
atk-s0202a0:1177_3: tañca tesaṃ kammaṃ vimuttiparipākāya paripakkaṃ ehibhikkhubhāvassa ca upanissayabhūtaṃ,
atk-s0202a0:1177_4: tasmā te sabbeva ehibhikkhupabbajjaṃ pabbājento svākkhātanti gāthamāha.
atk-s0202a0:1177_7: Yattha amoghāti yasmiṃ maggabrahmacariye appamattassa sikkhattayapūraṇena sikkhato pabbajjā amoghā hoti,
atk-s0202a0:1177_10: Te sabbe pattacīvaradharā hutvā ākāsenāgantvā vassasatikattherā viya suvinītā bhagavantaṃ abhivādayiṃsu.
atk-s0202a0:1177_11: Evamimaṃ tesaṃ ehibhikkhubhāvaṃ sandhāya “alattha kho selo”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:1178_2: Tattha aggiparicariyaṃ vinā brāhmaṇānaṃ yaññābhāvato “aggihuttamukhā yaññā”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:1178_7: Nadīnaṃ ādhārato paṭisaraṇato ca sāgaro “mukha”nti vutto.
atk-s0202a0:1178_8: Candayogavasena “ajja kattikā ajja rohiṇī”ti saññāṇato ālokakaraṇato sommabhāvato ca “nakkhattānaṃ mukhaṃ cando”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:1178_10: Dakkhiṇeyyānaṃ pana aggattā visesena tasmiṃ samaye buddhappamukhaṃ saṅghaṃ sandhāya “puññaṃ ākaṅkhamānānaṃ,
atk-s0202a0:1179_2: pañcahi cakkhūhi cakkhumā bhagavā yasmā mayaṃ ito aṭṭhame divase taṃ saraṇaṃ āgatamhā,
atk-s0202a0:1179_3: tasmā attanā tava sāsane anuttarena damathena dantāmhā,
atk-s0202a0:1180_0: Tato paraṃ bhagavantaṃ dvīhi gāthāhi thometvā tatiyāya vandanaṃ yācanto bhikkhavo tisatā imetiādimāhāti.
atk-s0202a0:1184_2: Tattha nānāverajjakānanti aṅgamagadhādīhi nānappakārehi verajjehi āgatānaṃ,
atk-s0202a0:1184_6: Mayaṃ pana nhānasuddhiyā bhāvanāsuddhiyāpi brāhmaṇāva sujjhantīti vadāma,
atk-s0202a0:1184_7: ayuttampi samaṇo gotamo karotīti maññamānā evaṃ cintayiṃsu.
atk-s0202a0:1185_1: Duppaṭimantiyāti amhādisehi adhammavādīhi dukkhena paṭimantitabbā honti.
atk-s0202a0:1185_2: Dhammavādino nāma parājayo na sakkā kātunti dasseti.
atk-s0202a0:1185_4: tayo vede uggahetvā sabbapacchā pabbajantā yehi mantehi pabbajanti,
atk-s0202a0:1186_1: Dissanti kho panātiādi tesaṃ laddhibhindanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:1186_2: Tattha brāhmaṇiyoti brāhmaṇānaṃ puttapaṭilābhatthāya āvāhavivāhavasena kulā ānītā brāhmaṇiyo dissanti.
atk-s0202a0:1186_3: Tā kho panetā aparena samayena utuniyopi honti,
atk-s0202a0:1186_8: Yonijāva samānāti brāhmaṇīnaṃ passāvamaggena jātā samānā.
atk-s0202a0:1186_15: ettāvatā “mayaṃ mahābrahmuno ure vasitvā mukhato nikkhantā”ti vattuṃ mā labhantūti ayaṃ mukhato jātacchedakavādo vutto.
atk-s0202a0:1187_2: dāso hutvā ayyo hotīti brāhmaṇo sabhariyo vaṇijjaṃ payojento yonakaraṭṭhaṃ vā kambojaraṭṭhaṃ vā gantvā kālaṃ karoti,
atk-s0202a0:1187_3: tassa gehe vayappatte putte asati brāhmaṇī dāsena vā kammakarena vā saddhiṃ saṃvāsaṃ kappeti.
atk-s0202a0:1187_4: Ekasmiṃ dārake jāte so puriso dāsova hoti,
atk-s0202a0:1187_6: Mātito suddho pitito asuddho so vaṇijjaṃ payojento majjhimapadesaṃ gantvā brāhmaṇadārikaṃ gahetvā tassā kucchismiṃ puttaṃ paṭilabhati,
atk-s0202a0:1187_7: sopi mātitova suddho hoti pitito asuddho.
atk-s0202a0:1187_8: Evaṃ brāhmaṇasamayasmiññeva jātisambhedo hotīti dassanatthametaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:1187_10: ko assāsoti yattha tumhe dāsā hontā sabbeva dāsā hotha,
atk-s0202a0:1187_14: yaṃ brāhmaṇova seṭṭho vaṇṇoti vadathāti dīpeti.
atk-s0202a0:1188_0: 404. Khattiyova nu khotiādayo suttacchedakavādā nāma honti.
atk-s0202a0:1189_4: Ettha assalāyanāti ettha sabbasmiṃ aggikiccaṃ karonte.
atk-s0202a0:1190_3: Pañcamo hi pādasikavaṇṇopi atthīti saṃkhittena tesaṃ vāde dosadassanatthaṃ idha khattiyakumārotiādimāha.
atk-s0202a0:1190_4: Tatra amutra ca panesānanti amusmiñca pana purimanaye etesaṃ māṇavakānaṃ kiñci nānākaraṇaṃ na passāmīti vadati.
atk-s0202a0:1190_6: Khattiyakumārassa hi brāhmaṇakaññāya uppanno khattiyapādasiko nāma,
atk-s0202a0:1191_0: Evaṃ pañcamassa vaṇṇassa atthitāya cātuvaṇṇisuddhīti etesaṃ vāde dosaṃ dassetvā idāni puna cātuvaṇṇisuddhiyaṃ ovadanto taṃ kiṃ maññasītiādimāha.
atk-s0202a0:1192_1: Bhūtapubbanti assalāyana pubbe mayi jātiyā hīnatare tumhe seṭṭhatarā samānāpi mayā jātivāde pañhaṃ puṭṭhā sampādetuṃ na sakkhittha,
atk-s0202a0:1192_2: idāni tumhe hīnatarā hutvā mayā seṭṭhatarena buddhānaṃ sake jātivādapañhaṃ puṭṭhā kiṃ sampādessatha?
atk-s0202a0:1192_3: Na ettha cintā kātabbāti māṇavaṃ upatthambhento imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0202a0:1192_9: Ko nu khoti kahaṃ nu kho.
atk-s0202a0:1192_14: Tadā kira mahāsatto koṇḍadamako hutvā vicarati.
atk-s0202a0:1192_16: Tato paṭṭhāya ca vassasatikatāpasopi tadahujātaṃ brāhmaṇakumāraṃ avandanto koṇḍito hoti.
atk-s0202a0:1194_0: Asitenāti pañcābhiññena asitena devalena isinā imaṃ gandhabbapañhaṃ puṭṭhā na sampāyissanti.
atk-s0202a0:1194_2: Na puṇṇo dabbigāhoti tesaṃ sattannaṃ isīnaṃ dabbiṃ gahetvā paṇṇaṃ pacitvā dāyako puṇṇo nāma eko ahosi,
atk-s0202a0:1194_4: Tvaṃ sācariyako tesaṃ puṇṇopi na hoti,
atk-s0202a0:1195_0: Ayaṃ pana assalāyano saddho ahosi pasanno,
atk-s0202a0:1195_2: Yāvajjadivasā assalāyanavaṃse jātā nivesanaṃ kāretvā antonivesane cetiyaṃ karontevāti.
atk-s0202a0:1199_5: Yo vā panettha dhammoti yo vā pana ettha dhammo sabhāvo,
atk-s0202a0:1199_9: Tato thero “navauposathāgāre viya bahunā kammena idha bhavitabba”nti cintetvā caṅkamā oruyha paṇṇasālaṃ pavisitvā nisīdi.
atk-s0202a0:1200_2: “ayaṃ brāhmaṇo ‘dhammikaṃ pabbajjaṃ upagato samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā natthī’ti vadati.
atk-s0202a0:1200_3: Imassa cattāro puggale dve ca parisā dassetvā ‘catutthaṃ puggalaṃ katarāya parisāya bahulaṃ passasī’ti pucchissāmi,
atk-s0202a0:1200_5: Evametaṃ sakamukheneva ‘dhammiko paribbajo atthī’ti vadāpessāmī”ti imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0202a0:1201_2: Sānuggahā vācā bhāsitā sakāraṇā vācā bhāsitā.
atk-s0202a0:1202_1: Kiṃ pana teti gihi nāma kappiyampi akappiyampi vadeyyāti vivecanatthaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0202a0:1202_3: Kārāpetvā ca pana kālaṃ katvā sagge nibbatto.
atk-s0202a0:1202_4: Etassa kira jānanasippe mātarampi pitarampi ghātetvā attāva ghātetabboti āgacchati.
atk-s0202a0:1202_5: Etaṃ sippaṃ jānanto ṭhapetvā etaṃ añño sagge nibbatto nāma natthi,
atk-s0202a0:1202_6: esa pana theraṃ upanissāya puññaṃ katvā tattha nibbattitvā ca pana “kenāhaṃ kammena idha nibbatto”ti
atk-s0202a0:1202_7: āvajjetvā yathābhūtaṃ ñatvā ekadivasaṃ jiṇṇāya bhojanasālāya paṭisaṅkharaṇatthaṃ saṅghe sannipatite manussavesena
atk-s0202a0:1202_22: ghoṭamukho nāma imaṃ sālaṃ kāretvā sagge nibbatto,
atk-s0202a0:1202_23: asuke ca asuke ca ṭhāne mayā ṭhapitaṃ dhanaṃ atthi,
atk-s0202a0:1202_25: dārake ca posehī”ti vatvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ vanditvā vehāsaṃ uppatitvā devalokameva agamāsi.
atk-s0202a0:1206_2: Tattha devavane sālavaneti tasmiṃ kira devatānaṃ balikammaṃ karīyati,
atk-s0202a0:1206_6: tassa sāmī hutvā yāya mariyādāya tattha vasitabbaṃ,
atk-s0202a0:1206_13: Yasmā pana so gāmo bahi āvijjhitvā jātena hatthiassādīnaṃ ghāsatiṇena ceva gehacchadanatiṇena ca sampanno,
atk-s0202a0:1206_15: yasmā cassa abbhantare vaṭṭacaturassādisaṇṭhānā bahū pokkharaṇiyo,
atk-s0202a0:1206_16: jalajakusumavicittāni ca bahi anekāni taḷākāni vā udakassa niccabharitāneva honti,
atk-s0202a0:1207_2: Ettāvatā yasmiṃ gāme brāhmaṇo setacchattaṃ ussāpetvā rājalīlāya vasati.
atk-s0202a0:1207_11: Atha vā rājabhogganti sabbaṃ chejjabhejjaṃ anusāsantena titthapabbatādīsu suṅkaṃ gaṇhantena setacchattaṃ ussāpetvā raññā hutvā bhuñjitabbaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:1207_12: Tattha raññā pasenadinā kosalena dinnaṃ rājadāyanti.
atk-s0202a0:1207_14: dāyakarājadīpanatthaṃ panassa “raññā pasenadinā kosalena dinna”nti idaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:1207_16: yathā dinnaṃ na puna gahetabbaṃ hoti nissaṭṭhapariccattaṃ,
atk-s0202a0:1208_2: Ekekissā disāya saṅgho tesaṃ atthīti saṅghī.
atk-s0202a0:1208_3: Pubbe gāmassa anto agaṇā bahi nikkhamitvā gaṇā sampannāti gaṇībhūtā.
atk-s0202a0:1208_5: Khattaṃ āmantesīti khattā vuccati pucchitapañhabyākaraṇasamattho mahāmatto,
atk-s0202a0:1209_1: Nānāverajjakānanti nānāvidhesu rajjesu aññesu kāsikosalādīsu jātā vā nivasanti vā,
atk-s0202a0:1209_5: Te tassa gamanaṃ sutvā cintesuṃ – “ayaṃ, caṅkī,
atk-s0202a0:1209_7: yebhuyyena ca aññe brāhmaṇā samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ saraṇaṃ gatā,
atk-s0202a0:1209_10: addhā samaṇassa gotamassa āvaṭṭaniyā māyāya āvaṭṭito saraṇaṃ gamissati.
atk-s0202a0:1209_11: Tato etassāpi gehadvāre brāhmaṇānaṃ asannipāto bhavissati.
atk-s0202a0:1209_12: Handassa gamanantarāyaṃ karomā”ti sammantayitvā tattha agamaṃsu.
atk-s0202a0:1209_13: Taṃ sandhāya “atha kho te brāhmaṇā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:1210_12: Yāva sattamā pitāmahayugāti ettha pitu pitā pitāmaho,
atk-s0202a0:1210_17: Tato uddhaṃ sabbepi pubbapurisā pitāmahaggahaṇeneva gahitā.
atk-s0202a0:1210_20: Atha vā akkhitto anupakuṭṭho jātivādenāti dasseti.
atk-s0202a0:1210_24: na akkosaṃ vā nindaṃ vā pattapubbo.
atk-s0202a0:1210_27: itipi hīnajātiko esoti evarūpena vacanenāti attho.
atk-s0202a0:1211_2: Bhoto hi gehe pathaviyaṃ paṃsuvālikā viya bahu dhanaṃ,
atk-s0202a0:1211_3: samaṇo pana gotamo adhano bhikkhāya udaraṃ pūretvā yāpetīti dassenti.
atk-s0202a0:1211_6: tassa tassa paṭipakkhavasena bhagavato aguṇaṃyeva dassemāti maññamānā vadanti.
atk-s0202a0:1212_9: Tesaṃ matena vaṇṇo ca pokkharañca vaṇṇapokkharāni,
atk-s0202a0:1212_11: Iti paramāya vaṇṇapokkharatāyāti uttamaparisuddhena vaṇṇena ceva sarīrasaṇṭhānasampattiyā cāti attho.
atk-s0202a0:1212_15: Akhuddāvakāso dassanāyāti bhoto sarīre dassanassa okāso na khuddako mahā.
atk-s0202a0:1214_0: Kālyāṇavācotiādīsu kalyāṇā sundarā parimaṇḍalapadabyañjanā vācā assāti kalyāṇavāco.
atk-s0202a0:1214_15: Atthassa viññāpaniyātiādimajjhapariyosānaṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā bhāsitatthassa viññāpanasamatthāya.
atk-s0202a0:1215_1: Evaṃ vutteti evaṃ tehi brāhmaṇehi vutte, caṅkī,
atk-s0202a0:1215_2: “ime brāhmaṇā attano vaṇṇe vuccamāne atussanakasatto nāma natthi,
atk-s0202a0:1215_3: vaṇṇamassa bhaṇitvā nivāressāmāti jātiādīhi mama vaṇṇaṃ vadanti,
atk-s0202a0:1215_4: na kho pana me yuttaṃ attano vaṇṇe rajjituṃ.
atk-s0202a0:1215_5: Handāhaṃ etesaṃ vādaṃ bhinditvā samaṇassa gotamassa mahantabhāvaṃ ñāpetvā etesaṃ tattha gamanaṃ karomī”ti cintetvā tena hi, bho,
atk-s0202a0:1215_7: Tattha yepi “ubhato sujāto”tiādayo attano guṇehi sadisā guṇā,
atk-s0202a0:1215_9: ke ca samaṇassa gotamassa jātisampattiādayo guṇā”ti attano guṇehi uttaritareyeva maññamāno,
atk-s0202a0:1215_10: itare pana ekanteneva bhagavato mahantabhāvadīpanatthaṃ pakāseti.
atk-s0202a0:1215_11: Mayameva arahāmāti evaṃ niyamento cettha idaṃ dīpeti –
atk-s0202a0:1215_15: sattasu mahāsaresu udakaṃ upanidhāya ussāvabindu paritto lāmako,
atk-s0202a0:1215_16: evamevaṃ samaṇassa gotamassa jātisampattiādayo guṇe upanidhāya amhākaṃ guṇā parittā lāmakā,
atk-s0202a0:1215_17: tasmā mayameva arahāma taṃ bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ dassanāya upasaṅkamitunti.
atk-s0202a0:1216_0: Bhūmigatañca vehāsaṭṭhañcāti ettha rājaṅgaṇe ceva uyyāne ca sudhāmaṭṭhā pokkharaṇiyo sattaratanapūriṃ katvā bhūmiyaṃ ṭhapitaṃ dhanaṃ bhūmigataṃ nāma,
atk-s0202a0:1216_1: pāsādaniyūhādayo pana pūretvā ṭhapitaṃ vehāsaṭṭhaṃ nāma.
atk-s0202a0:1216_3: Tathāgatassa pana jātadivaseyeva saṅkho elo uppalo puṇḍarīkoti cattāro nidhayo upagatā.
atk-s0202a0:1216_8: Iti bhagavā pahūtaṃ hiraññasuvaṇṇaṃ ohāya pabbajitoti veditabbo.
atk-s0202a0:1217_0: Akhuddāvakāsoti ettha bhagavati aparimāṇoyeva dassanāvakāsoti veditabbo.
atk-s0202a0:1217_2: rājagahe kira aññataro brāhmaṇo “samaṇassa kira gotamassa pamāṇaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkā”ti sutvā bhagavato
atk-s0202a0:1217_3: piṇḍāya pavisanakāle saṭṭhihatthaṃ veḷuṃ gahetvā nagaradvārassa bahi ṭhatvā sampatte bhagavati veḷuṃ
atk-s0202a0:1217_6: Punadivase dve veḷū ghaṭetvā samīpe aṭṭhāsi,
atk-s0202a0:1217_7: bhagavā dvinnaṃ veḷūnaṃ upari dviveṇumattameva paññāyamāno,
atk-s0202a0:1217_12: sacepi tvaṃ sakalacakkavāḷagabbhaṃ pūretvā ṭhitaveḷuṃ ghaṭetvā āgamissasi,
atk-s0202a0:1217_14: Na hi mayā cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni kappasatasahassañca tathā pāramiyo pūritā,
atk-s0202a0:1218_1: rāhu kira asurindo cattāri yojanasahassāni aṭṭha ca yojanasatāni ucco,
atk-s0202a0:1218_9: satthāraṃ onamitvā oloketuṃ na sakkhissāmī”ti na gacchati.
atk-s0202a0:1218_10: So ekadivasaṃ bhagavato vaṇṇaṃ sutvā “yathā kathañca olokessāmī”ti āgato.
atk-s0202a0:1218_11: Bhagavā tassa ajjhāsayaṃ viditvā “catūsu iriyāpathesu katarena dassemī”ti cintetvā “ṭhitako nāma nīcopi ucco viya paññāyati,
atk-s0202a0:1218_13: gandhakuṭipariveṇe mañcakaṃ paññāpehī”ti vatvā tattha sīhaseyyaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0202a0:1218_14: Rāhu āgantvā nipannaṃ bhagavantaṃ gīvaṃ unnāmetvā nabhamajjhe puṇṇacandaṃ viya ulloketi.
atk-s0202a0:1218_16: bhagavā onamitvā oloketuṃ na sakkhissāmīti na gacchinti.
atk-s0202a0:1218_17: Na mayā asurinda adhomukhena pāramiyo pūritā,
atk-s0202a0:1219_1: Taṃ pana sīlaṃ ariyaṃ uttamaṃ parisuddhaṃ,
atk-s0202a0:1219_6: Bahūnaṃ ācariyapācariyoti bhagavato ekekāya dhammadesanāya caturāsītipāṇasahassāni aparimāṇāpi devamanussā maggaphalāmataṃ pivanti.
atk-s0202a0:1220_0: Khīṇakāmarāgoti ettha kāmaṃ bhagavato sabbepi kilesā khīṇā,

atk-s0202a0:1294_3: Tattha “kammunā”ti upaḍḍhagāthāya vitthāraṇatthaṃ kassako kammunātiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:1295_0: Paṭiccasamuppādadassāti iminā paccayena evaṃ hotīti evaṃ paṭiccasamuppādadassāvino.
atk-s0202a0:1295_2: aññāpi hīnapaṇītatā hīnapaṇīte kamme vipaccamāne hotīti.
atk-s0202a0:1296_0: Kammunā vattatīti gāthāya pana lokoti vā pajāti vā sattoti vā ekoyevattho,
atk-s0202a0:1296_2: Purimapadena cettha “atthi brahmā mahābrahmā seṭṭho sajitā”ti diṭṭhiyā paṭisedho veditabbo.
atk-s0202a0:1296_3: Kammunā hi tāsu tāsu gatīsu vattati loko,
atk-s0202a0:1296_5: Dutiyapadena “evaṃ kammunā nibbattopi ca pavattepi atītapaccuppannabhedena kammunā vattati,
atk-s0202a0:1296_6: sukhadukkhāni paccanubhonto hīnapaṇītādibhedañca āpajjanto pavattatī”ti dasseti.
atk-s0202a0:1296_7: Tatiyena tamevatthaṃ nigameti “evaṃ sabbathāpi kammanibandhanā sattā kammeneva baddhā hutvā pavattanti,
atk-s0202a0:1296_10: Yathā hi rathassa yāyato āṇi nibandhanaṃ hoti,
atk-s0202a0:1296_12: evaṃ lokassa nibbattato ca pavattato ca kammaṃ nibandhanaṃ,
atk-s0202a0:1296_13: na tena anibaddho nibbattati na pavattati.
atk-s0202a0:1297_1: tasmā seṭṭhena kammunā seṭṭhabhāvaṃ dassento tapenāti gāthādvayamāha.
atk-s0202a0:1297_6: Etenāti etena seṭṭhena parisuddhena brahmabhūtena kammunā brāhmaṇo hoti. Kasmā?
atk-s0202a0:1297_8: yasmā etaṃ kammaṃ uttamo brāhmaṇaguṇoti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0202a0:1298_1: Brahmā sakkoti brahmā ca sakko ca,
atk-s0202a0:1298_4: atha kho brahmā ca sakko ca so vijānataṃ paṇḍitānaṃ,
atk-s0202a0:1303_0: 463. Micchāpaṭipattinti aniyyānikaṃ akusalapaṭipadaṃ. Sammāpaṭipattinti niyyānikaṃ kusalapaṭipadaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:1304_0: Mahaṭṭhantiādīsu mahantehi veyyāvaccakarehi vā upakaraṇehi vā bahūhi attho etthāti mahaṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:1304_3: idaṃ sveti evaṃ mahantāni adhikārasaṅkhātāni adhikaraṇāni etthāti mahādhikaraṇaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:1304_4: Bahūnaṃ kamme yuttappayuttatāvasena pīḷāsaṅkhāto mahāsamārambho etthāti mahāsamārambhaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:1304_7: Kasikamme cettha naṅgalakoṭiṃ ādiṃ katvā upakaraṇānaṃ pariyesanavasena mahaṭṭhatā,
atk-s0202a0:1304_8: vaṇijjāya yathāṭhitaṃyeva bhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā parivattanavasena appaṭṭhatā veditabbā.
atk-s0202a0:1304_10: maṇisuvaṇṇādīsu acchekatādīhi ca vaṇijjakammaṃ appaphalaṃ hoti,
atk-s0202a0:1305_1: Evameva khoti yathā kasikammaṭṭhānaṃ vipajjamānaṃ appaphalaṃ hoti,
atk-s0202a0:1305_3: Akatakalyāṇo hi kālaṃ katvā niraye nibbattati.
atk-s0202a0:1305_12: tathāpi uparīti kālaṃ katvā niraye nibbatto.
atk-s0202a0:1305_13: “Iminā amhākaṃ yaññe doso dinno”ti sahassaṃ gahetvā nīharituṃ adaṃsu.
atk-s0202a0:1305_15: Katakalyāṇo hi kālaṃ katvā sagge nibbattati.
atk-s0202a0:1305_17: Yathā pana taṃ vaṇijjakammaṭṭhānaṃ vipajjamānaṃ appaphalaṃ hoti,
atk-s0202a0:1305_18: evaṃ sīlesu aparipūrakārino anesanāya yuttassa pabbajjākammaṭṭhānampi.
atk-s0202a0:1305_19: Evarūpā hi neva jhānādisukhaṃ na saggamokkhaṃ labhati.
atk-s0202a0:1305_21: Sīlāni hi pūretvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhento arahattampi pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0202a0:1306_1: bho gotamoti idha kiṃ pucchāmīti pucchati?
atk-s0202a0:1306_3: “pabbajito ime pañca dhamme pūretuṃ samattho nāma natthi,
atk-s0202a0:1306_6: “gihissa vā ahaṃ māṇava pabbajitassa vā”ti punappunaṃ vadati,
atk-s0202a0:1306_8: mayhameva pucchaṃ maññe na sallakkhetīti cāgasīsena pañca dhamme pucchāmīti pucchati.
atk-s0202a0:1306_9: Sace te agarūti sace tuyhaṃ yathā brāhmaṇā paññapenti,
atk-s0202a0:1306_10: tathā idha bhāsituṃ bhāriyaṃ na hoti,
atk-s0202a0:1306_16: te pade pade akkhare akkhare dosameva vadanti.
atk-s0202a0:1306_17: Ekantapaṇḍitā pana kathaṃ sutvā sukathitaṃ pasaṃsanti,
atk-s0202a0:1306_20: Bhagavatā ca sadiso ekantapaṇḍito nāma natthi,
atk-s0202a0:1306_23: yatthassu bhavanto vā nisinno bhavantarūpo vā”ti.
atk-s0202a0:1307_3: Etadavocāti bhagavatā andhaveṇūpamāya niggahito taṃ paccāharituṃ asakkonto yathā nāma dubbalasunakho
atk-s0202a0:1307_4: migaṃ uṭṭhapetvā sāmikassa abhimukhaṃ katvā sayaṃ apasakkati,
atk-s0202a0:1307_8: Tassa kira kāyo setapokkharasadiso devanagare ussāpitarajatatoraṇaṃ viya sobhati,
atk-s0202a0:1307_13: hatthapādatalāni ceva mukhañca katalākhārasaparikammaṃ viya sobhati.
atk-s0202a0:1307_15: Arājake ṭhāne rājānaṃ kātuṃ yuttamimaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ,
atk-s0202a0:1307_19: na mātukucchiyanti iti naṃ pokkhare sayitattā “pokkharasāyī”tipi sañjānanti.
atk-s0202a0:1307_26: Idāni naṃ bhagavā sācariyakaṃ niggaṇhituṃ kiṃ pana māṇavātiādimāha.
atk-s0202a0:1308_1: Tattha katamā nesaṃ seyyoti katamā vācā tesaṃ seyyo,
atk-s0202a0:1308_7: Evaṃ santeti lokavohāraṃ amuñcitvā tulayitvā jānitvā kāraṇanissitaṃ katvā kathitāya seyyabhāve sati.
atk-s0202a0:1309_4: Svāssāti dhūmachārikādīnaṃ abhāvena so assa aggi accimā ca vaṇṇimā ca pabhassaro cāti.
atk-s0202a0:1309_7: yatheva hi tiṇakaṭṭhupādānaṃ paṭicca jalamāno aggi dhūmachārikaṅgārānaṃ atthitāya sadoso hoti,
atk-s0202a0:1309_8: evamevaṃ pañca kāmaguṇe paṭicca uppannā pīti jātijarābyādhimaraṇasokādīnaṃ atthitāya sadosā.
atk-s0202a0:1309_9: Yathā pana pariccattatiṇakaṭṭhupādāno dhūmādīnaṃ abhāvena parisuddho,
atk-s0202a0:1309_10: evamevaṃ lokuttarajjhānadvayasampayuttā pīti jātiādīnaṃ abhāvena parisuddhāti attho.
atk-s0202a0:1310_1: Idāni ye te brāhmaṇehi cāgasīsena pañca dhammā paññattā,
atk-s0202a0:1310_2: tepi yasmā pañceva hutvā na niccalā tiṭṭhanti,
atk-s0202a0:1310_4: Tasmā taṃ dosaṃ dassetuṃ ye te māṇavātiādimāha.
atk-s0202a0:1311_0: Kattha bahulaṃ samanupassasīti idaṃ bhagavā yasmā –
atk-s0202a0:1311_1: “esa ime pañca dhamme pabbajito paripūretuṃ samattho nāma natthi,
atk-s0202a0:1311_4: gahaṭṭho pūretuṃ samattho nāma natthī”ti teneva mukhena bhaṇāpetuṃ pucchati.
atk-s0202a0:1312_0: Na satataṃ samitaṃ saccavādītiādīsu gahaṭṭho aññasmiṃ asati vaḷañjanakamusāvādampi karotiyeva,
atk-s0202a0:1312_1: pabbajitā asinā sīse chijjantepi dve kathā na kathenti.
atk-s0202a0:1312_2: Gahaṭṭho ca antotemāsamattampi sikkhāpadaṃ rakkhituṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0202a0:1312_3: pabbajito niccameva tapassī sīlavā tapanissitako hoti.
atk-s0202a0:1312_4: Gahaṭṭho māsassa aṭṭhadivasamattampi uposathakammaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0202a0:1312_8: Gahaṭṭho salākabhattampi akhaṇḍaṃ katvā dātuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0202a0:1312_9: pabbajitā aññasmiṃ asati kākasunakhādīnampi piṇḍaṃ denti,
atk-s0202a0:1312_11: Cittassāhametenti ahaṃ ete pañca dhamme mettacittassa parivāre vadāmīti attho.
atk-s0202a0:1313_2: Yo hi kevalaṃ tattha jātova hoti,
atk-s0202a0:1313_4: tassa samantā gāmamaggā na sabbaso paccakkhā honti,
atk-s0202a0:1313_10: Dandhāyitattanti “ayaṃ nu kho maggo ayaṃ na nu kho”ti kaṅkhāvasena cirāyitattaṃ.
atk-s0202a0:1313_11: Vitthāyitattanti yathā sukhumaṃ atthajātaṃ sahasā pucchitassa kassaci sarīraṃ thaddhabhāvaṃ gaṇhāti,
atk-s0202a0:1313_14: Tassa hi purisassa mārāvaṭṭanādīnaṃ vasena siyā ñāṇassa paṭighāto,
atk-s0202a0:1313_15: tena so dandhāyeyya vā vitthāyeyya vā,
atk-s0202a0:1313_17: na sakkā tassa kenaci antarāyo kātunti dīpeti.
atk-s0202a0:1314_0: Seyyathāpi māṇava balavā saṅkhadhamoti ettha balavāti balasampanno.
atk-s0202a0:1314_3: Dubbalo hi saṅkhadhamako saṅkhaṃ dhamantopi na sakkoti catasso disā sarena viññāpetuṃ,
atk-s0202a0:1314_7: Mettāya cetovimuttiyāti ettha mettāyāti vutte upacāropi appanāpi vaṭṭati,
atk-s0202a0:1314_9: Yaṃ pamāṇakataṃ kammanti pamāṇakataṃ kammaṃ nāma kāmāvacaraṃ vuccati,
atk-s0202a0:1314_12: Tañhi pamāṇaṃ atikkamitvā odhisakaanodhisaka disāpharaṇavasena vaḍḍhetvā katattā appamāṇakatanti vuccati.
atk-s0202a0:1314_14: na taṃ tatrāvatiṭṭhatīti taṃ kāmāvacarakammaṃ tasmiṃ rūpārūpāvacarakamme na ohīyati na tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0202a0:1314_16: Kāmāvacarakammaṃ tassa rūpārūpāvacarakammassa antarā laggituṃ vā ṭhātuṃ vā rūpārūpāvacarakammaṃ pharitvā
atk-s0202a0:1314_17: pariyādiyitvā attano okāsaṃ gahetvā patiṭṭhātuṃ vā na sakkoti,
atk-s0202a0:1314_18: atha kho rūpārūpāvacarakammameva kāmāvacaraṃ mahogho viya parittaudakaṃ pharitvā pariyādiyitvā attano okāsaṃ gahetvā tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0202a0:1314_19: tassa vipākaṃ paṭibāhitvā sayameva brahmasahabyataṃ upanetīti.
atk-s0202a0:1318_4: Sā kira sotāpannā ariyasāvikā bhāradvājagottassa brāhmaṇassa bhariyā.
atk-s0202a0:1318_5: So brāhmaṇo pubbe kālena kālaṃ brāhmaṇe nimantetvā tesaṃ sakkāraṃ karoti.
atk-s0202a0:1318_6: Imaṃ pana brāhmaṇiṃ gharaṃ ānetvā abhirūpāya mahākulāya brāhmaṇiyā cittaṃ kopetuṃ asakkonto brāhmaṇānaṃ sakkāraṃ kātuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0202a0:1318_9: ekāhampi brāhmaṇānaṃ sakkāraṃ na karosī”ti nippīḷenti.
atk-s0202a0:1318_10: So gharaṃ āgantvā brāhmaṇiyā tamatthaṃ ārocetvā – “sace,
atk-s0202a0:1318_15: So brāhmaṇe nimantetvā appodakaṃ pāyāsaṃ pacāpetvā gharañca sujjhāpetvā āsanāni paññāpetvā brāhmaṇe nisīdāpesi.
atk-s0202a0:1318_16: Brāhmaṇī mahāsāṭakaṃ nivāsetvā kaṭacchuṃ gahetvā parivisantī dussakaṇṇake pakkhalitvā “brāhmaṇe parivisāmī”ti
atk-s0202a0:1318_17: saññampi akatvā āsevanavasena sahasā satthārameva anussaritvā udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0202a0:1319_0: Brāhmaṇā udānaṃ sutvā “ubhatopakkhiko esa samaṇassa gotamassa sahāyo,
atk-s0202a0:1319_1: nāssa deyyadhammaṃ gaṇhissāmā”ti kupitā bhojanāni chaḍḍetvā nikkhamiṃsu.
atk-s0202a0:1319_4: ettakaṃ te khīrañca taṇḍulādīni ca nāsitānī”ti ativiya kopavasaṃ upagato –
atk-s0202a0:1319_5: “evameva panāyaṃ vasalī yasmiṃ vā tasmiṃ vā tassa muṇḍakassa samaṇassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati,
atk-s0202a0:1319_6: idāni tyāhaṃ vasali tassa satthuno vādaṃ āropessāmī”ti āha.
atk-s0202a0:1319_8: gantvā vijānissasī”ti vatvā “na khvāhaṃ taṃ, brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0202a0:1320_0: “Kiṃsu chetvā sukhaṃ seti, kiṃsu chetvā na socati;
atk-s0202a0:1323_0: “Kodhaṃ chetvā sukhaṃ seti, kodhaṃ chetvā na socati;
atk-s0202a0:1325_0: Vadhaṃ ariyā pasaṃsanti, tañhi chetvā na socatī”ti. –
atk-s0202a0:1326_2: Tasseva kaniṭṭhabhātā akkosakabhāradvājo nāma “bhātā me pabbajito”ti sutvā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0202a0:1326_3: akkositvā bhagavatā vinīto pabbajitvā arahattaṃ patto.
atk-s0202a0:1326_5: Sopi bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṃ pucchitvā vissajjanaṃ sutvā pabbajitvā arahattaṃ patto.
atk-s0202a0:1326_7: So pañhaṃ pucchitvā pañhabyākaraṇapariyosāne pabbajitvā arahattaṃ patto.
atk-s0202a0:1326_8: Saṅgāravo māṇavoti ayaṃ tesaṃ sabbakaniṭṭho tasmiṃ divase brāhmaṇehi saddhiṃ ekabhattagge nisinno.
atk-s0202a0:1327_1: Diṭṭhadhammābhiññāvosānapāramippattāti diṭṭhadhamme abhiññāte imasmiññeva attabhāve abhijānitvā vositavosānā
atk-s0202a0:1327_2: hutvā pāramīsaṅkhātaṃ sabbadhammānaṃ pārabhūtaṃ nibbānaṃ pattā mayanti vatvā ādibrahmacariyaṃ paṭijānantīti attho.
atk-s0202a0:1327_3: Ādibrahmacariyanti brahmacariyassa ādibhūtā uppādakā janakāti evaṃ paṭijānantīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0202a0:1328_7: Atthi devāti puṭṭho samānoti idaṃ māṇavo “sammāsambuddho ajānantova pakāsesī”ti saññāya āha.
atk-s0202a0:1328_9: Tucchaṃ musā hotīti tumhākaṃ kathā aphalā nipphalā hoti.
atk-s0202a0:1328_10: Evaṃ māṇavo bhagavantaṃ musāvādena niggaṇhāti nāma.
atk-s0202a0:1328_12: Tvaṃ pana aviññutāya mayā byākatampi na jānāsīti dīpeti.
atk-s0202a0:1328_13: Uccena sammatanti uccena saddena sammataṃ pākaṭaṃ lokasmiṃ.
atk-s0202a0:1328_14: Adhidevāti susudārakāpi hi devā nāma honti,
atk-s0202a0:1328_15: deviyo nāma honti devā pana adhidevā nāma,
atk-s0202a0:1328_16: loke devo devīti laddhanāmehi manussehi adhikāti attho.
